item.text: @#/ /rgyud ga pa bzhugs so//
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA sam+ba ro da ya tan+t+ra rA dzA nA ma/ bod
skad du/ dpal bde mchog sdom pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/
dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
na| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
@#/ /dang / thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs te/ 'phags pa dga' bo
la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis bskor cing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i dbus su phyag na rdo rje la
gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig
tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ lag pa thal mo sbyar nas bcom
ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ kye| rnam pa kun mchog sdom pa yis/ /bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid dang / /rdzogs pa yang ni
ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan lha las mnyan par 'tshal/ /rlung dang me dang chu dang sa/ /de bzhin nam mkha' ji ltar lags/ /rnam pa lnga
ni ji ltar lha/ /gtso bo yul drug de bzhin ci/ /phyi dang nang du gnas pa yi/ /sku gsum byin rlabs ji lta bu/ /lha yi sku ni ji ltar lags/ /
gtso bos de bzhin lha mo gsungs/ /zla ba nyi ma ci zhig lha/ /lam lnga po ni ji ltar lags/ /lus kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu/ /de bzhin rtsa
yi gzugs ni ci/ /rtsa yi grangs kyi tshad ni du/ /de bzhin lus kyi gong bu ci/ /spas pa'i dam tshig gi ni brda/ /gtso bos bdag la bshad
du gsol/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi/ /gnas la sogs pa'i brda du zhig /ji ltar sa la sogs pa 'thob/ /mtshan ma ji ltar mthong
@##/ /bar 'gyur/ /khyed kyi las ni bcu gnyis gang / /sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /bgrang phreng dag ni ji ltar
rigs/ /bzlas pa'i grangs ni du zhig lags/ /lha yi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ci/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba du zhig mchis/ /sngags kyi dngos grub
ci zhig lha/ /gzhon nu ma yi mchod pa ci/ /bya dang bya min nyi ma gang / /gtso bo myos byed gtor ma ci/ /bdud rtsi lnga sogs ji ltar lha/ /lcags
kyu lnga sogs ji ltar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba bshad du gsol/ /thig gdab pa ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar sa ni yongs su sbyang / /srung
pa'i 'khor lo ji ltar 'gyur/ /slob dpon gyi ni bya ba gang / /ji ltar slob ma yongs su gzung / /dbang bskur ba yi grangs ni du/ /bzhi pa
yang ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /dus kyi nges pa ji lta bu/ /de bzhin 'chi ba blu ba gang / /dus bzhi'i ming ni du zhig mchis/ /gling bzhi pa ni ji ltar
lags/ /dus dang dus min dngos grub ci/ /spyod pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud ni du/ /rnal 'byor rgyud ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /mdo sde'i grangs ni ji lta bu/ /de bzhin
pha rol phyin pa du/ /rab gnas sbyin sreg mchod sbyin dang / /sngags kyi dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur/ /bcud kyis len ni ji ltar lha/ /myos byed btung ba ji ltar 'gyur/ /gsang sngags
ji ltar 'byung 'gyur lha/ /sngags btu ba ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /tshar gcad pa ni ci zhig lha/ /gtso bo rjes gzung ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan de nyid rnams ni ci/ /stong pa nyid dang snying rje gang / /
stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ci/ /ji ltar de bzhin nyid rang bzhin/ /chos rnams thams cad yongs shes pa'i/ /sgom pa'i mtshan nyid gtso bos gsungs/ /dpal bde mchog 'byung
ba'i rgyud las/ zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje/ gsang ba 'byung ba 'di zhus pa legs so/ /legs so//
de nas de'i phyir bskyed pa yi/ /rim pa'i sgom pa yang dag bshad/ /sna tshogs las kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /skye gnas bzhi po rnams su 'gyur/ /sgong skyes mngal nas skyes pa dang //
drod gsher dang ni rdzus skyes rnams/ /ngang pa khrung khrung rma bya dang / /ne tso bzhad tshogs sgong skyes te/ /glang po ma he ba lang rta/ /bong bu mi sogs mngal nas skyes/ /srin bu 'bru
@#/ /dang phye ma leb/ /nya la sogs pa drod gsher skyes/ /lha dang dmyal ba'i sems can rnams/ /de bzhin bar do'i srid pa dang / /bskal pa dang po pa
la sogs/ /'di rnams rdzus skyes sems can no/ /shar gyi lus 'phags pa lang spyod/ /de bzhin byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /gling gsum po yi mi rnams ni/ /longs spyod chen
pos yang dag 'tsho/ /blun rmongs bye brag mi phyed cing / /rtog med rnam par spyod med pa'o/ /dzam+bu'i gling du legs skyes pa/ /las kyis par rab tu grags/ /legs byas
nyes par byas pa'i las/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams/ /skye ba sngon gyi rnam smin 'dir/ /skye bo rnams la snang bar 'gyur/ /rgyags dang ser sna gdug sems rnams//
g.yo sgyu mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / /chags sdang gti mug la sogs kyis/ /rims dang nad la sogs pas gzir/ /dzam+bu gling pa'i gtso bo mchog /yul dbus su ni skyes pa ste//
sngon gyi dge ba la ltos nas/ /dbang po rno 'bring rtul por 'gyur/ /mi ru skyes pa 'bras bu'i dam pa dang po ste/ /rang gi khyim nas nges 'byung rnyed pa gnyis pa yin/ /rab tu byung
nas dge ba sgrub pa gsum pa ste/ /rtse gcig yid ni thob par gyur pa bzhi par gsungs/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin/ /mi rnams kyis rab mi shes te/ /thog med dus kyi nyon
mongs kyi/ /bag chags rab tu bsags byas pa/ /de phyir sngon byas las kyis ni/ /skye dang 'chi ba yang dag 'byung / /tshogs pa ma rnyed de srid du/ /zhag bdun bar do'i srid par
gnas/ /srid pa bar do'i sems can ni/ /'gron po'i bgrod pa ji bzhin du/ /'di ltar las kyi zhags pa yis/ /'gro ba drug tu rab tu skye/ /pha ma'i kun du sbyor sogs ni/ /
sred pa'i skye bos mthong gyur nas/ /rta la zhon bzhin rnam shes ni/ /rlung gi bzhon pa zhon nas su/ /skad cig thang cig nyid la ni/ /shin tu myur bar 'ongs gyur nas/ /shin
tu dga' dang bcas stobs kyis/ /kha yi lam nas 'jug par 'gyur/ /rtsa ni stong phrag bdun cu gnyis/ /rab bskul de yi skad cig la/ /A li kA li zhu byas pas/ /mchog
tu dga' ba yang dag thob/ /khu ba khrag de'i dbus su ni/ /thig le'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas/ /dang po'i rnam pa nur nur po/ /mer mer po ni gnyis pa yin/ /ltar ltar po
skyes gsum pa ste/ /de bzhin bzhi pa gor gor po/ /rlung rnams kyis ni bskul tsam gyis/ /sha yi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur/ /zla ba lnga gyur sa bon las/ /yan lag lnga ni rab tu
skye| |zla ba bdun na skra dang sbu/ /sen mo rtags ni skye bar 'gyur/ /zla ba brgyad na dbang bo dang / /lus kyi yan lag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba dgun yang dag rdzogs/ /zla ba
@#/ /bcu na sems dang ldan/ /nur nur rang bzhin mi bskyod pa/ /mer mer po ni rin chen 'byung / /'od dpag med mgon ltar ltar po/ /gor gor po
ni don yod grub/ /mkhrang 'gyur rnam par snang mdzad de/ /rnam pa lngar ni bstan pa yin/ /dri chu khrag ni mi bskyod pa/ /sa bon rang bzhin 'od dpag med/ /gong bu rin chen
'byung ldan te/ /ro gcig 'dres pa rnam snang bzhugs/ /skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon na de bzhin gnas/ /g.yon nas khu ba zhes bshad de/ /
g.yas nas de bzhin khrag yin no/ /de dag gcig tu 'dus gyur pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no/ /las kyi sa bon dbang thob pas/ /rlung gis yang dag bsgyur nas
su| |chos kyi 'byung gnas sgo ru ni/ /gdong ni nges par phyogs par 'gyur/ /dku g.yas su ni brten nas su/ /tsog pur mngon par phyogs te gnas/ /dku g.yon yang
dag brten nas ni/ /shes rab ltor ni mngon phyogs 'gyur/ /mkhas pas sa bon lhung ba'i rim/ /dus kyi skad cig yang dag mtshon/ /g.yas nas rlung ni rgyu ba gang / /thams
cad du ni skyes bur 'gyur/ /g.yon nas rlung ni rgyu ba gang / /nges par bud med rnams su 'gyur/ /gnyis ka'i dbus rgyu'i sa bon gang / /rtag tu ma ning 'gyur ba'o/ /chu
khams pa yir shes par bya/ /me yi khams ni ma yi'o/ /pags pa sha dang khrag rnams ni/ /ma las skyes zhes bshad pa ste/ /rgyus pa rkang dang khu ba rnams/ /pha las skyes zhes
bshad pa yin/ /drug po 'di dag bsdus pa'i lus/ /rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs pa/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /'du byed rnam shes de bzhin te/ /sangs
rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin du/ /phung po nges par skye ba yin/ /srid pa bskyed pa'i rim shes pas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i phyir/ /'di ni phung po yongs mkhyen pa'i/ /de nyid
gsungs pa rnams kyis bshad/ /'di ni bskyed pa'i rim pa nges par bstan pa'i rim par dbye ba ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas gang zhig shes tsam gyis/ /myur
du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'i/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgom pa ni/ /yang dag rab tu bshad par bya/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
sku| |rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim bsgrubs pas/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes gsungs so/ /dbang po dman pas bskyed rim gyi/ /dkyil 'khor bsgom zhing bsam par bya/ /
dbang po rnon pos skad cig gi /rnam pas sems tsam dkyil 'khor bsam/ /skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgoms pa ni/ /khams gsum
@#/ /gzhal yas khang bdag nyid/ /srog chags rnams ni dkyil 'khor pa/ /de dbus skad cig rnam pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po rnal 'byor pa'o/ /oM
AHhUM gi sngags kyis ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ /mtho ris sa steng sa 'og tu/ /skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur/ /skad cig rnam pas rnal 'byor te/ /skad
cig rnam pas gsang sngags 'don/ /dbang po kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde ba mchog /khams bzhi pa dang phung po lnga/ /de bzhin yul drug bdag nyid
ni| |khrag 'thung lha mo'i ye shes te/ /de la tha dad mi brtag go /dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid rgyas btab/ /de bzhin mkha' mnyam stong pa nyid/ /sna tshogs de bzhin nyid
bdag nyid/ /thabs ni snying rje'i stobs yin te/ /zung du 'jug pa rnam rtog bral/ /dkyil 'khor snying po mchog yin no/ /rnam par mi rtog sbyor bsams kyang / /de tshe mi rtog
bsam mi khyab/ /de yang rnam pa kun gyi mchog /bde ba'i dbang po rnam pa med/ /de nyid dngos dang dngos min bdag /rtag tu srid pas 'byung bar mdzad/ /sna tshogs spros pa'i
rtog pa med/ /rtag tu 'byung ba bde ba che/ /skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /de las skye ba yang dag 'byung / /bems po min phyir bdag nyid rig /mi shes rnam par mi mthong
bas| |gzugs med gang du'ang mi gnas shing / /'gyur ba med cing brtan pa'o/ /kun rdzob skye ba 'byung bas na/ /chad pa min phyir dngos med min/ /lhan cig skyes dga'i rang dngos
su| |chos rnams thams cad lhan cig skyes/ /bdag byin brlab par rab 'byung ba/ /mi shigs 'jig pa med pa ste/ /skye ba med pa'i ro myong bas/ /sgom pa yang ni de nyid de/ /
stong nyid so sor rtogs pas na/ /bsam gtan shes rab tu yang 'gyur/ /chos kun yongs su shes pa yi/ /sgom pa de nyid sgom med pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde ba che/ /phyag
rgya chen po mchog de bzhin/ /de nyid chos la 'jug pa'i phyir/ /de rnams dbye bas rab bstan pa/ /bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis/ /gsal bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni/ /e baM yi ge la rab gnas/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi las/ /rnam kun mchog gi sdom pa'o/ /sdom pa byang chub bde mchog ste/ /bltar med brjod
du med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni/ /'dus pa chen po'i mchog yin te/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i rim pa 'di/ /bla ma'i drin gyis gsal bar 'gyur/ /'di ni rdzogs
pa'i rim pa nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste gsum pa'o// //de nas de phyir 'byung ba bzhi'i/ /mtshan nyid yang dag bshad par bya/ /dngos po dag
@#/ /ni ma lus gang / /de ni 'byung ba'i rang bzhin te/ /sa de la ni dngos bo rten/ /mes ni thams cad 'tshed par byed/ /chu yis 'ju bar byed pa ste/ /rlung
gis lhan cig skyod par byed/ /nam mkha' yul gyis stong par gnas/ /der ni thams cad de las skyes/ /gang du gcig ni gnas pa der/ /bzhi po kun kyang nye bar gnas//
rtsa shing ljon pa 'khril shing sogs/ /bems po lta bu'i rnam shes tsam/ /gang dag 'gro drug sems can rnams/ /tshig dang tshig ni thams cad du/ /rnam shes bcas pa
lta bur gnas/ /de ltar srid pa'i dngos po kun/ /blo dang ldan pas shes par bya/ /sems can rnams ni 'chi ba na/ /yan lag nyid lag thams cad kyi/ /rlung ni thams cad
bskyod par 'gyur/ /skad cig de la me drod 'dor/ /chu ni rtag tu bskams gyur nas/ /de nas tshor ba med par 'gyur/ /lus la sogs pa'i sa khams kyi/ /sra ba nyid
tsam gnas par 'gyur/ /skye ba dang ni 'chi ba dag/ thams cad du ni 'byung bar 'gro/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams ni/ /'byung ba med par skye mi 'gyur/ /lha yi 'jig rten
skyong la sogs/ /thams cad la ni lhan cig gnas/ /rig byed grub mtha' thams cad kyis/ /rtag tu 'dod cing sgom pa ste/ /gang phyir thams cad kun tu 'gro/ sa steng
skyes bu kun la gnas/ /'byung ba bzhi po gtso bo mchog /bstan bcos kun las yang dag bshad/ /rlung ni srog tu yang dag pa lta/ /me ni 'tsho ba'i mtshan nyid de/ /chu ni bdud
rtsi'i ngo bo nyid/ /sa ni zhing tsam nyid du gnas/ /de la rtag tu gnas pa'i lha/ /rnam shes mchog gi dbang phyug ste/ /lha lnga yi ni rnam pa ru/ /rnam shes de ni yongs su 'gyur/ /
gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /de bzhin 'du byed rnam par shes/ /me long lta bu mnyam nyid dang / /so sor kun tu rtog pa dang / /de bzhin bya ba grub pa dang / /chos
dbyings shin tu rnam dag ste/ /ye shes 'di dag rab tu gnas/ /rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung / /'od dpag med dang don yod grub/ /de bzhin mi bskyod pa nyid de/ /
rnam lngar ro gcig rdzogs byang chub/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg bya chos de bzhin/ /yul drug tu ni shes bya ste/ /'di dag rnam par dag par bshad/ /
khams ni bco brgyad shes bya ste/ /de dag phung po'i rang bzhin nyid/ /yi ge mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir/ /mig la sogs pa bsgom bya
ste| |mig gi dbang po'i rnam shes ni/ /thugs kyi rdo rje'i rnam 'phrul yin/ /ngo bo nyid gsum rnam dag don/ /'od gsal ba yi go 'phang 'gyur/ /sgra dang rna ba rnam shes
@#/ /ni| |dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /sna dang dri dang rnam shes kyang / /de bzhin rnam dag shes par bya/ /ro dang lce dang rnam shes ni/ /don dam nyid
du rnam par dag/ lus dang reg bya rnam shes kyang / /sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bor skyes/ /yid dang chos dang yid rnam shes/ /snying po nyid du rnam par dag/ rnam shes drug ni
kun gzhi ru/ /'jug pas de bzhin gshegs pa yin/ /'od gsal ba yi go 'phang thob/ /he ru ka dpal yang dag gnas/ /yul dang yul can sbyor ba yis/ /rnam
rtog med pa'i go 'phang 'gyur/ /rnam dag kun gyi mchog gnas pas/ /yul ni rnam dag shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /gcig la de bzhin
gsum du brtags/ /skyabs gsum dang ni de nyid gsum/ /sku gsum rnam par grol ba gsum/ /zhal gsum yig gsum lha gsum ste/ /khams gsum pa yi
rang bzhin nyid/ /dkyil 'khor gsum dang rnal 'byor gsum/ /lam gsum du ni bstan pa ste/ /dam tshig gsum dang dge ba gsum/ /de bzhin sku dang gsung
dang thugs/ /shes rab dang ni thabs nyid dang / /de yi sbyor ba gsum pa ste/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas rang bzhin gyis/ /ji ltar gsang gsum mthong ba dang / /'khor
gsum mi dmigs sbyor ba yis/ /sngags gsum gyi ni rang bzhin nyid/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi/ /rtsa gsum gyi ni rang gi dngos/ /phyi rol 'jig rten pa yi chos/ /lha la sogs
pa'i bdag nyid nang / /phyi nang dag pa nyid kyi phyir/ /rnal 'byor pas ni sangs rgyas thob/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du/ /lha ni mngon sum dmigs par bya/ /rnam pa kun
gyi mchog rang bzhin/ /lha mor yongs su brtag par bya/ /dang po'i lha yi rang bzhin du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bzhugs/ /gnas dang zhing la sogs pa'i brda/ /dpa'
po rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa/ /de bzhin gnyis med mnyam sbyor la/ /lha rnams yang dag 'phro ba ste/ /tshad med lnga ni 'phro ba las/ /dkyil 'khor tshad can rnam par brtag /
lha yi rnal 'byor bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas rol pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i gzugs kyis ni/ /he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor/ /de dag mi phyed ngo bo nyid/ /
bsgom par nga yis bshad pa yin/ /de dag thams cad gnyis med thob/ /gzung dang 'dzin dang rnam bral ba/ /rags pa sgra zhes bshad pa ste/ /phra ba sems kyi rang bzhin
'gyur/ /bsam dang bral ba'i de nyid ni/ /go 'phang mchog ces yongs su grags/ /'di ni 'byung ba bzhi dang / /rnam pa lnga dang / yul drug lha'i rnam par dag pa rim par
@#/ /phye ba ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas zla ba nyi ma yi/ /rab tu dbye ba yang dag bshad/ /g.yas dang g.yon du sbyor ba yis/ /rim pa ji
bzhin rgyu ba ste/ /g.yon du rkan nas bzung nas ni/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'jug pa'i/ /zla ba'i rtsa ni 'og bltas par/ /A li zla bar yang dag 'bab/ /g.yas su
lte ba nas bzung nas/ /rkan gyi gnas su rab 'jug pa'i/ /nyi ma'i rtsa ni steng gnas te/ /kA li nyi mar rtag tu 'bab/ /sna yi sgo ni gnyis po nas/ /rtsa gnyis rgyu ba'i mtshan
nyid ni/ /rtsa g.yon 'jug pa'i lam yin te/ /g.yas pa 'byung ba'i lam yin no/ /nyi shar nas brtsams ji srid de/ /nub kyi bar ni nyin mo ste/ /nub pa nas brtsams
ji srid de/ /shar ba'i bar ni mtshan mor 'gyur/ /nyin dang mtshan mo zhag yin te/ /mel tshe thun zhes brjod pa yin/ /thun bzhi nyin mor shes bya ste/ /de bzhin
mtshan mo'ang thun bzhi'o/ /zhag gcig la ni 'pho ba yi/ /yan lag bcu drug rnams yin te/ /thun ni phyed phyed rtag tu rlung / /sna yi bu gar yang dag rgyu/ /yar
ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas/ /nyin zhag gsum gyi thun phyed la/ /zla ba'i rlung ni rgyu ba ste/ /de nas zhag gsum nyi ma'i rlung / /go rims 'dis ni ji srid du/ /yar tshes
bco lnga'i bar du'o/ /mar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas/ /nyin zhag gsum du snga dro ni/ /nyi ma'i rlung du grags pa rgyu/ /de bzhin tshes ni bco lnga'i par/ /thun re yi ni bzhi cha rnams//
chu tshod du ni brjod pas na/ /nyin zhag gcig la rtsa rnams ni/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis shes par bya/ /nyin zhag gcig la dbyug gu yi/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi'i tshad kyis ni/ /rtsa dang chu
tshod phyed du byug gu/ /thun gyi brgyad cha zhes su bshad/ /sna sgo'i rlung ni 'byung 'jug la/ /dbugs gcig tu ni rab tu grags/ /rlung gi sbyor ba la mkhas pas/ /dbugs drug
srog tu shes par bya/ /srog ni lnga bcu tham pa dang / /dbugs gsum rkang pa'ang de dang ldan/ /nyi ma byang du rgyu dus kyi/ /nyi ma dang po'i dbyug gu yin/ /nyi ma lhor ni rgyu dus kyi/ /
mtshan mo yang ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /dbyug gu re re'i 'phel 'grib ni/ /dus kyi dbyibs su shes par bya/ /dbugs ni drag po bzhi char bcas/ /'pho ba so so'i 'phel 'grib
yin| |dbugs kyi sum cha de'i bzhi cha'i/ /drug chas nyi ma re rer 'gyur/ /thun ni phyed phyed rgyu ba las/ /phyin ci log tu 'phos 'gyur na/ /rtsod pa la sogs nges 'gyur bas//
mkhas pas 'di dag yang dag brtag /nyi ma gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi/ /lnga dang drug tu gang tshe rlung / /phyin ci log tu rtag rgyu na/ /de tshe rtsod pa chen por 'gyur/ /zla
@#/ /phyed rtag tu log par rgyu/ /nad ni chen po yang dag 'byung / /zla ba gcig tu log par rgyu/ /snying sdug gnyen ni brlag par 'gyur/ /phyed dang gnyis su log
par rgyu/ /zla ba drug na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /thun mong dus su shes par bya/ /gzhan yang khyad par bshad bya ste/ /mnyam po bdun du nyi ma song / /gang tshe skye ba'i nyin zla ba/ /de
tshe rgyas pa zhes bya'i dus/ /'chi ba'i nges pa'i dus yin no/ /mi ni khyim gang las skyes pa/ /gang zhig gzhan yang bdun de'i phyir/ /der ni nyi ma mnyam bdun song / /mnyam
po bdun zhes bya bar bshad/ /nyi ma'i lam nas thams cad du/ /rlung ni rtag tu rgyu ba dag /rgyun mi 'chad par yang dang yang / /mkhas pas dus ni mtshon par bya/ /dus kyi
skad cig gang la rlung / /bgrod pa gzhan du 'jug 'gyur na/ /dus de'i skad cig rdzogs pa na/ /'chi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /nyi phyed dang por byas te nyi ma rdzogs dang
de bzhin nyin zhag gcig gi bar/ /de las zhag gnyis zhag gsum dang ni de bzhin zhag ni bzhi yi bar dag tu/ /rlung ni gang zhig rtsa la brten te g.yas pa min pa'i nyi
ma'i lam nas rgyu/ /de las sa dang nyi ma phyogs dang bkra shis drug bzhi 'di dag shes par bya/ /lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lngar nyin zhag 'di dag lnga lngar sbel bas bgrod par
'gyur/ /de las re res spel bas bcu ni sum 'gyur ji srid gsum gyis lhag pa'i bar/ /de las rgyas pa'i dus su gsum mig zla ba'i lo dang drug gsum zung zla'i zla/ /lhag ma
tshes dang phyogs mda' yon tan zung dang zla ba'i zhag tu 'tsho ba yin/ /re'u mig sum cu bdun bcas pa'i/ /'khor lo rim gsum bris nas ni/ /tshe dang srog gi rlung dag dang / /
nyin zhag mtshan ma rim bzhin bri/ /zhag lnga nas ni nyi shu lnga'i/ /bar bar gyi ni nyin zhag la/ /grangs ni bcu drug ma bshad gang / /de rnams tshang bar brjod par bya/ /zhag ni
drug bdun brgyad dgu yi/ /rim pas gal te rlung rgyu na/ /yon tan ldan yang nyin zhag ni/ /nyer bzhis ma tshang lo gsum na'o/ /drag po nyi ma yan lag sa'i/ /zhag ni rim pas rgyu
na ni| |yon tan ldan pa'ang nyin zhag ni/ /nyer bzhis ma tshang lo gnyis na'o/ /zhag ni bcu drug de bzhin du/ /bcu bdun dang ni bco brgyad dang / /bcu dgu yi ni rim pa yis/ /
rlung rgyu yon tan can yang zhag/ bcu gnyis gnyis 'gyur ma tshang ba'i/ /lo gcig na ni skyabs med gang / /de ni gshin rje'i grong khyer du/ /the tshom med par 'gro bar 'gyur//
nyi ma nyi shu gcig gnyis gsum/ /nyer bzhi'i rim pas rlung rgyu na/ /yon tan ldan pa'ang zhag drug ni/ /ma tshang zla ba drug na 'chi/ /re'u mig sum cu gnyis ldan pa'i/ /rim
@#/ /gnyis 'khor lo bris nas ni/ /der ni tshe yang yan lag rlung / /grangs kyi mtshan ma rim bzhin bri/ /'chi ba'i rtags ni 'di dag kun/ /rnam pa thams
cad shes byas nas/ /blo ldan 'chi ba blu ba yis/ /gal te brtan pa'i go 'phang 'dod/ /rtsa ni yang dag sbyang byas pas/ /de srid rlung ni sbyangs 'gyur te/ /so so'i rim bzhin
rnal 'byor pas/ /yang dang yang du mnan par bya/ /g.yon pa'i bu gar bcug nas ni/ /rtsa ni bsdams nas mnan bya zhing / /de bzhin du ni g.yas par rlung / /bkug
ste dal bus mnan par bya/ /sems can rnams kyi zhag gcig la/ /rgyu ba'i dbus kyi grangs kyi tshul/ /brgya phrag drug gis lhag pa yi/ /stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig go /
dbang chen gyis ni rgyal srid de/ /chus ni don rnams yang dag 'byung / /me yi rlung ni rnam rgyu bas/ /bkres skom du ba dang sdug bsngal nad/ /bya ba thams cad nyams
'gyur zhes/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog gis gsungs/ /rlung gis rtsod dang skyo dang rmongs/ /nor nyams nyon ni mongs par byed/ /dbang chen nor dang 'bru la sogs/ /rnyed
pa thob dang sdud byed pa'o/ /chu yi rlung ni rnam rgyu bas/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub kun byed pas/ /de yi sbyor ba mchog gtso bor/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gang gsungs pa'o/ /
rlung ni bcom ldan he ru ka'i/ /rang bzhin nyid de gsum du 'gyur/ /g.yon pa shes rab rang bzhin te/ /g.yas pa snying rje'i bdag nyid do/ /gnyis po mi phyed sbyor bar yang / /
gnyis ka nas ni rnam par rgyu/ /de bas de nyid rig pas der/ /dge mi dge sogs shes par bya/ /dug sogs gzhom dang lhag ma ni/ /bkra shis dpal ni bskyed pa la/ /shes
rab bdag nyid rab tu bsngags/ /rtag tu dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs/ /g.yul bsham rol rtsed ston mo dang / /bcad pa dang ni dbug pa dang / /sreg par btso ba'i las la
ni| |snying rje'i bdag nyid rab tu bsngags/ /gzhan yang gnyis bdag rdo rje can/ /the tshom 'gyur bar shes bya ste/ /dge dang mi dge nges med par/ /rlung rig pas ni 'dir
mtshon bya/ /mgon po ji ste A lir rgyu/ /'ga' zhig kA lir gnas 'dri 'am/ /kA li'i rgyu la A lir gnas/ /de yi 'dod don nyams par 'gyur/ /gang nas mgon po de rgyu
ba| |der gnas 'ga' zhig 'dri byed na/ /de yi don kun yang dag 'grub/ /gnyis kar gnas las the tshom 'gyur/ /rlung gi bdag nyid kyis mgon po'i/ /sku gsum por yang
shes par bya/ /'jug pa chos kyi sku yin te/ /gnas pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /'byung ba sprul pa'i sku zhes bshad/ /'di dag sku ni gsum por bzhed/ /'dri ba po 'am rang
@#/ /gi'ang rung / /chos skus thams cad dge ba ste/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa the tshom 'gyur/ /sprul pas 'thab mor ston pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yi srog rtsol
ni| |sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bor gnas/ /g.yon dang g.yas kyi gnas gang na/ /rim pa ji bzhin rnam par rgyu/ /g.yas nas rnam par rgyu ba'i 'od/ /me yi dkyil 'khor nyid
yin te/ /nags kyi me tog lta bu'i mdog/ de ni 'od dpag med pa'i lha/ /g.yon nas rnam par rgyu ba'i 'od/ /rtag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/ /kha dog ljang gu ltar snang ba/ /lha
ni don yod mchog yin no/ /gnyi ga nas ni rgyu ba'i 'od/ /gser gyi 'od ltar snang ba ste/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi ni rlung / /rtag tu rin chen 'byung ldan rgyu/ /'og nas
dal bar rab rgyus pa/ /kun da zla ba lta bur dkar/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor rgyu ba ste/ /'od chen rdo rje mgon po'o/ /lus kun la ni rjes 'gro'i rlung / /sems kun rab tu 'jug
byed pa/ /mgon po rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /'byung bar rab tu grags pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma ni mnyam gzhag pas/ /'jug pa'i rlung ni bgrang bar bya/ /ji srid 'bum la
sogs pa'i grangs/ /sgra dang bral bar rtag tu bzla/ /sgrub po sgra dang bral bar ni/ /'bum bzlas yongs su rdzogs pa na/ /tshe nyams pa yang lo lnga ru/ /'tsho bar 'dir ni
the tshom med/ /rtag tu nang par langs nas rlung / /stong phrag gcig tu bgrang bya ste/ /de bas rlung gi rnal 'byor la/ /rtag tu mnyam gzhag gnas par bya/ /yang na bum pa'i rnal
'byor gyis/ /rtag tu 'chi bdag las rgyal bya/ /bdag nyid rig pas rkang mthil bar/ /kun tu rlung gi dgang bya ste/ /bum pa can la brtan byas nas/ /dbye ba gsum gyis gzhom
par bshad/ /tha ma sum cu rtsa drug tsam/ /de yi nyis 'gyur 'bring de bzhin/ /sum 'gyur chen por shes bya ste/ /bum pa can des rgyal bar bya/ /bum pa can lngar shes byas
nas| |bdag nyid skyil mo krung bcas te/ /lag pa lan gsum mnyes nas ni/ /de nas lan drug se gol brdab/ /ji srid sum cu rtsa drug par/ /de srid bum pa can gyis bya/ /
sum 'gyur chen pos gzhom pa ni/ /brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pas so/ /brtan pa'i go 'phang 'dod pas ni/ /brtson pas de nyid kyis rgyal bya/ /bum pa'i sbyor bas rgyal bas na//
'chi bdag las ni ring du 'jug /bum pa can ni shes byas nas/ /'gog la brtan par gnas pa na/ /de la bskal pa stong du yang / /'chi bdag nye bar 'ong mi 'gyur/ /snying gi
chu skyes dbus son rlung / /hUM yig dkar po'i rnam par ni/ /gang gis mnyam par gzhag bsams na/ /de la yul sogs dmigs mi 'gyur/ /rlung gis 'khor ba'i steng du
@#/ /'gro/ mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu bgrod/ /snying ga yi ni chu skyes la/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das par gnas/ /steng dang 'og du rgyu ba'i rlung / /kha sbyar du ni
yid kyis byas/ /de yi sbyor bas goms byed na/ /des ni brtan pa'i go 'phang 'thob/ /rlung gi rnal 'byor mi shes pa'am/ /gang zhig shes kyang mi byed pa/ /de ni 'khor ba'i
sdug bsngal tshogs/ /du mas gtses pa'i srin bur 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'gro dang 'ong ba'i rlung / /blo dang ldan pas brtag bya ste/ /rlung gis thams cad byin gyis brlab/ /rlung ni
kun tu 'gro 'gyur ba'o/ /'di ni zla ba dang / nyi ma'i man ngag gi rim par phye ba ste lnga pa'o// //de nas lam lnga bzang po mchog /rnam par nges par rab bshad
bya| |bdag gzhan don ni phun tshogs pa'i/ /sgrub pos dge dang mi dge brtag /me dang rlung ni nyid dag dang / /de bzhin dbang chen dang ni chu'i/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag rgyu ba
las| |zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug /de bzhin bsad dang bskrad pa yi/ /mtshan nyid mkhas pas brtag par bya/ /de yi sbyor ba mi shes pa/ /de ni ngal ba don med 'gyur/ /
mes ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/ /rlung gis nor rnams nyams par 'gyur/ /dbang chen gyis ni rgyal srid 'gyur/ /chus ni nor dang 'bru rnams ster/ /g.yas pa na ni rgyu ba'i
khams/ /byin za'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba ni/ /pad+ma'i mgon po'i 'byung ba'o/ /g.yon pa nas ni rgyu ba'i khams/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /
kha dog ljang zhing gsal ba ni/ /las kyi mgon po'i 'byung ba'o/ /gnyi ga nas ni rgyu ba'i khams/ /gser gyi mdog ltar gsal ba ni/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /rin chen
mgon po'i rgyu ba'o/ /dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni/ /rdo rje mgon po'i rgyu ba'o/ /khams rnams kun ni yang dag
bsdus/ /rten dang brten pa'ang yang dag 'dzin/ /rnam snang mdzad ni rlung chen te/ /'chi ba'i lus las rnam par rgyu/ /rlung gi de nyid mi shes par/ /las dang las min mi 'grub ste/ /
rlung ni thams cad bgrod 'gyur bas/ /rtog ge pa yis mi shes so/ /rlung gi de nyid sngon 'gro bas/ /sngags kyi de nyid bsgrub par bya/ /sems can rnams kyi srog gyur pa/ /rlung zhes
bya ba las kun byed/ /'di ni rnam shes bzhon pa ste/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob byed pa/ /rgyud rnams kun gyis gsang ba ste/ /byang chub rgyu yi thabs yin no/ /'di ni lam lnga nges
par brtan pa'i rim par phye ba ste drug pa'o// //de nas rtsa yi 'khor lo ni/ /rim pa bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /lus kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i rtsa/ /stong phrag bdun
@#/ /cu rtsa gnyis 'gyur/ /rtsa rnams dang ni nye ba'i rtsa/ /de dag gnas la brten pa ste/ /brgya las nyi shu lhag pa'i rtsa/ /gtso bo zhes ni bya bar brjod/ /rtsa yi
gnas dang yul rnams ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i grangs yin te/ /de rnams dbus kyi rtsa gsum gang / /thams cad khyab cing brten pa'o/ /mgor ni pu l+li ra yin te/ /so dang sen mo
'bab par gnas/ /spyi gtsug dzA lan d+ha ra ste/ /skra dang spu ni 'bab par gnas/ /oD+yan rna ba g.yas pa'i rtsa/ /pags pa dang ni dri ma 'bab/ /mgo rgyab ar bu da yin te/ /
sha ni yang dag 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /go da ba ri rna ba g.yon/ /rgyus pa yang dag 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /smin dbus ra me shwa ri ste/ /rtag tu rus pa 'bab pa'o/ /mig ni de khi ko Tir
gnas/ /mchin pa 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no/ /mA la ba ni dpung pa gnyis/ /snying 'bab pa yi rtsa gnas so/ /mchan khung kA ma ru pa ste/ /rtag tu mig ni 'bab pa'o/ /nu ma gnyis
ni o Di ste| |rtag tu mkhris pa 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /tri sha ku ni lte ba ste/ /rtsa ni glo ba 'bab bas gnas/ /sna rtse ko sa la yin te/ /rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'bab pas gnas/ /kha ni ka
ling ga yin te/ /rtag tu gnye ma 'bab pas gnas/ /mgrin pa lam pA ka yin te/ /rtag tu lto ba 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /kany+tsi snying ga'i gnas yin te/ /bshang ba 'bab pa'i rtsa
yin no/ /'doms par hi ma la ya ste/ /mtshog ma'i mtshams ni 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /pre ta pu ri mtshan ma ste/ /bad kan 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no/ /gri ha de ba tA bshang lam ste/ /rtag tu
rnag ni 'bab pa'o/ /brla gnyis sau raSh+Ta yin te/ /rtag tu khrag ni 'bab pa'o/ /byin pa gnyis ni gser gling gnas/ /rdul 'bab pa yi rtsa yin no/ /rkang pa'i sor mo na ga ra/ /rtag
tu tshil 'bab rtsar shes bya/ /rkang pa'i bol ni sin d+hu ste/ /mchi ma 'bab pa'i gzugs can ma/ /ma ru de sha mthe bong ste/ /rtag tu mchil ma 'bab pas gnas/ /kul+lu ta
ni pus mo ste/ /rtag tu sna chu 'bab pas gnas/ /de dag dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa/ /la la nA ra ni gci ba 'bab/ /g.yas su khrag ni 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /ra sa nA zhes grags pa yin/ /
dbus kyi char ni yang dag 'jug /snying ga'i chu skyes dbus son pa/ /chu shing snye ma'i me tog bzhin/ /'phyang ba kha ni thur du bltas/ /til gyi mar me ltar 'bar zhing / /byang chub
sems ni mnyam 'bab ste/ /a ba d+hu'i tIr shes bya ste/ /lhan cig skyes pa ster byed pa'o/ /la la nA la sogs pa'i rtsa/ /rtsa rnams kun gyi gtso bo ste/ /de bas 'dir ni gzhan
bsten pa/ /gang+gA sin d+hur gzhan 'jug bzhin/ /gcig gyur ka ka mu kha ste/ /de nyid skye gnas gzhan ma yin/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku'i rang bzhin gyis/ /lus la brten par
@#/ /shes par bya/ /bud med rnams la'ang gtso bo gsum/ /la la nA sogs rtsa rnams yin/ /shes rab rang bzhin la la nA/ /ra sa nA ni thabs su gnas//
dbus nas a ba d+hU tI ni/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku la la nA/ /ra sa nA ni sprul pa'i sku/ /a ba d+hU tI chos sku ste/ /sku gsum por ni bshad
pa yin/ /rtsa rnams de dag thams cad ni/ /lus ni dge bar byed pa ste/ /de yi tshogs las yang dag byung / /gong bu lha yi bdag nyid do/ /gzugs las 'das pa gong bur
'gyur/ /gong bu las 'das lha nyid de/ /de phyir bsam mi khyab sbyor bas/ /de bzhin nyid bdag kun tu 'gro /sgrub pos cho ga gang gang gis/ /gong bu las 'das go
'phang gnas/ /des ni de yi bdag nyid du/ /gyur bas sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /'di ni rtsa yi 'khor lo'i thabs rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o// //de
nas gang zhig shes tsam gyis/ /myur du dngos grub 'gyur ba yi/ /dam tshig rnams kyang rim pa bzhin/ /yang dag par ni bshad par bya/ /rang gi khyim mam gsang ba'i
gnas/ /dben zhing yid ni dga' ba dang / /ri bo tshang tshing ri sul dang / /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni/ /ma mo'i khyim dang dur khrod dam/ /chu bo 'dus pa'i dbus su
ni| |bla med 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya/ /yon bdag dad pa chen po yis/ /zhing skyes gnas skyes sngags skyes ma'i/ /rnal 'byor ma dang rnal
'byor pa/ /slob dpon lha kun spyan drang bya/ /khyim pa 'am ni dge tshul lam/ /de bzhin dge slong slob dpon te/ /slob dpon kha cig 'jig rten pa/ /bstan la gnas pa'i dge slong
dam/ kha cig yon tan ldan pa'am/ /de bzhin mngon shes thob pa'ang rung / /'di rnams nang na yon bdag ni/ /gang la dad pas gtso mchog bya/ /slob dpon sngon du 'gro ba yis//
dkyil 'khor dge ba bri byas te/ /slob dpon dbang bskur yon tan ldan/ /'jig rten rnams kyis ma smad cing / /mi dge bcu yongs spangs pa ni/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtso
bor bya/ /rtag tu yon bdag blo ldan gyis/ /snying rje med cing khro dang gdug /khengs dang brkam chags bdag nyid bstod/ /mnyam par ma bzhag gis mi bya/ /gang zhig khyim
gnas longs spyod bsten/ /gshol 'dzugs dang ni tshong pa dang / /rmongs pas dam chos 'tshong pa ni/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtso bor min/ /'di ltar yon tan kun ldan zhing / /
thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /dul zhing brtson 'grus yang dag ldan/ /sred pa med cing nga rgyal med/ /rtag tu sems can bstan par ni/ /ltos bcas rgyan gyi
@#/ /brgyan pa dang / /thod pa'i rgyan la dga' ba dang / /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa'i/ /mkhas pas g.yon gyi phyogs su ni/ /g.yon pa'ang rab tu gzhag par
bya| |'di ltar yon tan ldan slob dpon/ /las rnams kun la rab tu bsngags/ /rim pa ji bzhin slob dpon dang / /lha rnams spyan drangs byon pa la/ /ji ltar rnyed pa'i dri chu
yis| |zhabs bkru bas ni gtsang byas nas/ /sa yongs brtag pa'i gnas su ni/ /slob dpon sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /rgan dang gzhon pa'i dbye ba bzhin/ /zhugs nas gdan
la gnas par bya/ /skal ba med dang nga rgyal can/ /de bzhin bla ma smod pa dang / /dam tshig ma mthong rang gi bu/ /de bzhin skyes pa bud med rnams/ /sgrub po dngos grub
'dod pa yis/ /dam tshig der ni gzhug mi bya/ /gal te phyugs ni de rnams zhugs/ /dngos grub ring du 'jug par 'gyur/ /dam tshig smad pas lus sems ni/ /sdug
bsngal de bzhin gnas nyams dang / /dpal las ring zhing sna tshogs pa'i/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni nyer 'tsher 'gyur/ /de ltar shes nas spang bya ste/ /mchod pa'i spyod yul
can rnams bsdu/ /rgan dang gzhon pa'i rim bzhin du/ /me tog bdug spos mar me dang / /tsan+dan dris ni khyad par du/ /blo dang ldan pas rtag mchod bya/ /gdugs dang
rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i/ /gtor ma slob dpon gyis rab brtag /lha ni bsnyen phyir mchod bya zhing / /yon bdag yid la 'dod pa yi/ /gang zhig zhi dang rgyas pa'i las/ /dngos grub don
du bris nas ni/ /gang gang mngon par 'dod pa yi/ /las de byin gyis brlab par bya/ /sbrang chang bur chang khu ba'i chang / /ji ltar rnyed pa dbul bar bya/ /gtsang zhing dul dang dpa' ba'i
sems/ /sred dang gti mug rnam par spangs/ /thams cad mtshungs par lta ba ni/ /las kyi rdo rjer rab tu brtag /bza' dang bca' dang de bzhin btung / /so rtsi dang ni spos de bzhin/ /
dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun nyid du/ /yon bdag gis ni dbul bya zhing / /phyi nas las kyi rdo rje ni/ /mkhas pas rdzas rnams yongs su spyad/ /thog mar lcags kyus mnyam ldan pa'i//
dam tshig yongs su spyad par bya/ /de nas thams cad yongs rdzogs par/ /slob dpon gyis ni byin gyis brlab/ /gnas dang nye gnas zhing dang ni/ /'dus dang dur khrod gnas pa'o//
dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma kun la/ /bdag ni gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo rnams kyi tshad ma dam tshig tshad ma dang / /des bshad gsung ni mchog tu tshad mar gyur pa ste/ /bden
par gyur pa des na lha mo rnams kyis 'dir/ /bdag ni rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur ni 'gyur bar shog /gzhan yang dkyil 'khor mdun du ni/ /snying gar thal mo rab sbyar te/ /yon bdag
@#/ /gis kyang smon lam ni/ /yongs su bsngo ba nyid du bya/ /srid dang zhi ba mnyam par chags pa bcom zhing yang dag rtog pa 'joms/ /khyed kyis dngos po
thams cad mkha' dang mnyam pa'i bdag nyid gzigs par ldan/ /mgon po thugs rje chu yi ljid kyis brlan par gyur pa'i thugs kyi chus/ /bdag la mdzod cig lha mo rnams
kyis shin tu rjes brtser mdzad du gsol/ /rnal 'byor bdud rtsi ro gcig gsol bas thugs ni rnam par dag pa ste/ /gnas la sogs pa'i yul du bgrod pas sku ni rnam par
dag pa yis/ /dpal ldan gnas kyi dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog gi mgon po ni/ /bla ma mchog la rtag tu mgo bos btud de gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa'
bo kun gyi sku ni rtag tu mdzes pa ste/ /lha mo rnams kyi rin chen sku yis 'khyud pas brgyan/ /'khor lor gnas mgon lhan cig skyes dga' dri med pa'i/ /rnal 'byor snying po bde
mchog la yang rtag phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun mkhyen shin tu rnam par dag pa'i gnas/ /lha mo rnams ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas kyis mdzes/ /'dren pa lhan cig
skyes pa'i dga' ba 'byung ba ste/ /dri med lhan cig skyes pa mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /tshigs bcad gsum gyis yang dag bstod/ /ji ltar de bar phyag kyang btsal/ /
yid spro ji ltar bde bar ni/ /ca co'i spro ba chen po yis/ /me tog phreng rnams kyis brgyan cing / /sna tshogs me tog gis mchod lus/ /chang gi ston mo'i dga' bcas pas/ /rdo rje'i
glus ni dga' bar bya/ /mchog tu dga' bas gar bya zhing / /gnas kyi mtshan ma'i stangs stabs gar/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis gar bya'o/ /der ni pa Ta ha sogs dang / /cang te'u
dang ni bkra shis rnga/ /rnga ring la sogs sna tshogs pa'i/ /rol mo yid 'ong bsgrag par bya/ /he ru ka bcas dbang po dang / /rnal 'byor ma mchog g.yon pa ste/ /de rjes tshogs
kyi gtso bo yis/ /yon bdag gi ni dge ba bsam/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma 'dus pas/ /skad cig shis pa brjod pa sbyin/ /bde ba phun tshogs ldan pa dang / /nad med pa
dang dge ba'i sems/ /'dod dang grol sogs yang dag 'thob/ /dngos grub phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par spros pa ni/ /cho ga bshad bzhin bsdu bar
bya| |lhag ma'i gtor ma bsdus nas ni/ /'byung po 'tshol ba rnams la sbyin/ /gnas dang zhing gnas rnal 'byor ma'i/ /tshogs la dri zhing tshim par bya/ /spyan drangs dpa'
bo thams cad ni/ /bde ba chen por gshegs su gsol/ /'di ni dam tshig gi brda'i cho ga rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas lag pa g.yon
@#/ /pa'i brda/ /cung zad tsam ni bshad bya ste/ /sgrub pos gang zhig shes tsam gyis/ /myur du dngos grub 'gyur ba'o/ /gang zhig sor mo gcig ston pa/ /de
la gnyis bstan legs 'ongs lan/ /gang zhig g.yon pa'i sor mo bsdams/ /bde 'am zhes pa'i rgyur shes bya/ /gang zhig ming med ston byed pa/ /de la mthe'u chung
bstan par bya/ /gang zhig gung mo ston byed pa/ /de la mthe bong bstan par bya/ /gang zhig srin lag ston byed pa/ /de la mgrin pa rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig pa ti sa
ston pa/ /de la rtse gsum bstan par bya/ /gang zhig nu ma ston byed pa/ /de la skra mtshams bstan par bya/ /gang zhig so ni ston byed pa/ /de la 'khor lo bstan
par bya/ /gang zhig khro gnyer ston byed pa/ /de la gtsug phud bstan par bya/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston byed pa/ /de la rol pa bstan par bya/ /bud med gang zhig g.yon
nas 'gro /rnal 'byor ma rtag g.yon nas te/ /skad ni chen pos rab tu smra/ /g.yon pa'i lta bas rnam blta zhing / /bud med rnams la dgar smra ba/ /de ni dam tshig
ldan shes bya/ /bud med rnams la gsol btab na/ /rigs kyi sa bon rab smra zhing / /rigs kyi bya ba mi 'dor la/ /rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos/ /gang zhig rig pa
rnam par 'dri/ /lag pa g.yon pas rang gi mgor/ /mgo la 'phrug par byed pa dang / /sgrub pa pos ni khyad par du/ /de yi rang rig dran par 'gyur/ /mkhur ba'am ni kos ko'am
sna dag tu ni sor mo ston/ /zur gyi lta bas dus rtag tu/ /rang gi rig la rnam par blta/ /bden 'byung 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma/ /rnyed dka' nges par dam tshig can/ /rang gi khyim
du thod pa dang / /dgra sta ral gri rgyal mtshan dang / /'khor lo dang ni rnga yab dang / /rtse gsum bris nas dga' byed cing / /rtag tu sha dang chang la dga'/ /'jigs dang ngo tsha 'joms
byed gang / /mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs yang dag 'byung / /lhan cig skyes ma zhes byar bshad/ /yul dang yul du mngon par skye/ /sgrub po rnams kyis rtag tu bsten/ /gnas dang
nye ba'i gnas dang ni/ /de bzhin zhing dang nye ba'i zhing / /tshan d+ho nye ba'i tshan d+ho ha/ /'dus pa nye ba'i 'dus pa dang / /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod de/ /dzam bu'i gling na yang dag gnas//
gnas ni pu l+li rar grags te/ /de bzhin dzA lan+d+hA ra'ang gnas/ /u D+yan de bzhin gnas yin te/ /de bzhin ar bu da yang gnas/ /nye gnas go dA ba rI ste/ /de bzhin rA me shwa
ri'i ming / /de bi ko Tir mngon brjod dang / /mA la ba yang nye ba'i gnas/ /zhing ni kA ma rU'i ming can te/ /o drir mngon par brjod pa'ang zhing / /nya zhing tri sha ku ni ste/ /ko sa
@#/ /lA yang nye ba'i zhing / /ka ling ga dang lam pA ka'ang / /de bzhin tshan d+ho ha yin te/ /kAny+tsi hi ma la ya ni/ /khyad par nye ba'i tshan d+ho ha'o/ /'dus pa
pre ta ba si ni/ /gri ha de ba yang de bzhin/ /sau rASh+Ta dang gser gling gang / /nye ba'i 'dus pa gnyis yin no/ /pa til pu tra dur khrod de/ /sin d+hu'ang de bzhin dur khrod do/ /
ma ru ku lu tA gnyis ni/ /nye ba'i dur khrod gnas su bshad/ /de ltar phyi rol gnas su grags/ /nang gi gnas nyid lus su brjod/ /rang lus rtsa yi gzugs la 'dir/ /
gnas kyi ming du rab tu grags/ /de gzugs lha yi rnam pa ste/ /des na nang gi bdag tu gnas/ /de phyir de yi gong bu'i dngos/ /lus 'di sangs rgyas kun mtshungs pa'o/ /
gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/ /de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med/ /zhing ni 'od byed sa yin te/ /nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba/ /mngon du gyur pa tshan d+hor shes/ /nye ba'i tshan d+ho
sbyang dka' ba'o/ /'dus pa ring du song ba ste/ /mi g.yo bar grags nye 'dus pa/ /dur khrod de bzhin legs blo gros/ /nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin/ /gnas sogs
sa yi rnam dag pa/ /rim pa ji bzhin bshad pa yin/ /gnas dang nye gnas sogs bsten pas/ /mi rnams dri ma med par 'gyur/ /blo ldan rnam rtog med pa ni/ /rgyu
zhing mtshan ma yang dag brtag /sna tshogs gzugs dang 'jigs gzugs ma/ /drag cing mi bzad dgod brtags la/ /rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /hUM gi sgra ni bsgrag par
bya| |the tshom thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /sgrub pos seng ge bzhin du spyad/ /mthong ngam reg la thos pas kyang / /myur du dngos grub rab 'gro 'gyur/ /'di ni brda dang / /gnas la
sogs pa'i brdas/ sa rnams nges par bstan pa'i rim pa phye ba ste dgu pa'o// //de nas gang zhig bris tsam gyis/ /sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'i/ /
zhi ba la sogs rab sbyor ba/ /yang dag rab tu bshad par bya/ /gur gum tsan+dan bsres pas gang / /yar ngo yi ni tshes la bri/ /'khor lo rtsibs drug bris nas ni/ /yi ge bdun pa'i
sngags sbyar zhing / /phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor/ /dbus su ming ni rnam spel ba'o/ /dar ram ras ni gtsang ma 'am/ /yang na kham phor kha sbyar la/ /gsang ste las ni bris
nas kyang / /srad bu dkar pos dkri bar bya/ /kha dog dkar pos shar bltas te/ /me tog dkar pos mchod par bya/ /mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsgrub bya gnas par
bltas la/ /bum pa dkar po zla ba'i bdud rtsi chus gar bas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /the tshom med pas thun gsum du/ /yi ge bdun pa'i sngags bzlas na/ /de ma thag tu zhi ba dang / /
@#/ /bde legs skyid dang tshe ring 'gyur/ /rims nad dug dang 'tshe ba la/ /lag pa g.yon par bsgom bya ste/ /'khor lo tsan+dan gyis bris la/ /me tog bdug
pas mchod par bya/ /bsgrub bya shar du kha bstan te/ /mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bya ba/ /gtor ma chu dang de bzhin me/ /de yi dbus su dur ba'am/ /rma bya'i sgro'am ku sha'i/
chus| khyad par du ni de la bya ba/ /gsang sngags 'di ni gtso bo mchog /zhi sogs cho ga rim bzhin byed/ /gur gum dri bzang bsres pa yis/ /rgyas pa'i 'khor lo bri bya ste/ /
swA hA'i yi ge dang sbel bar/ kham phor gnyis la bris nas ni/ /srad bu ser pos dkri byas la/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du gzhug /byang du kha bltas thun gsum du/ /kha dog
ser po bsgom byas la/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ser po la/ /bsgrub bya gnas par mkhas pas bsam/ /bdud rtsi ser pos dbang bskur zhing / /me tog ser pos mchod
par bya/ /rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni/ /rgyas pa'i bsam pas bzla bya ste/ /che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ /bau ShaT sngags kyis spel bar bya/ /nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel
ba dang / /dpal dang bkra shis mnyam par 'jug/ las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rgyas par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /tsan+dan dmar dang sen rtsi dang / /ming med
kyi ni khrag bsres te/ /ras sam gro ga'i 'dab ma'am/ kham phor so ni ma btang bzung / /yi ge hoHdang spel ba yis/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri/ /srad bu dmar pos
bcings nas ni/ /me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus gzhag la/ /nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas te/ kha dog dmar por bsgom byas las/ /dkyil 'khor
dmar po la gnas pa'i/ /bsgrub bya chags par rnam par bsam/ /rtag tu yig bdun 'byung ba ni/ /rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas bya ste/ /myos par 'gyur bas zhabs drung lhung / /
de ni grub par rnam par bsam/ /gal te dbang du 'ong bar ma gyur na mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang bral ba'i 'khrul 'khor seng ldeng gi 'dab ma la gdung bar byas na/ gang su yang rung skal
pa ngan pa'ang skal pa bzang por 'gyur te/ gzhan du ma yin no/ /dur khrod kyi ras sam/ zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras la rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang ldan pas yi ge dzaHhrI dang spel
ba'i 'khrul 'khor bri ba 'am/ kham phor ram/ bud med kyi thod pa la grub pa'i 'khor lo bris la srad bu dmar pos dkris te/ me tog dmar pos mchod la/ bsgrub bya'i
snying ga nas lcags kyus bkug cing mgrin pa nas zhags pas bcing bar bya'o/ /gang gis de ltar bsams kyang bsgrub bya nam yang 'ongs par ma gyur na seng ldeng gi shing la
@#/ /me sbar la bsros bas 'khrul 'khor tshar bcad par bya zhing / che ge mo A kaR+Sha ye hrIHdzaHzhes bya ba des bsgrub bya skad cig tsam de nyid la dgug par bya ste/ rkang
pas dgug pa bla na med pa'o/ /de nas gzhan yang mnan pa yi/ /cho ga bla med bshad par bya/ /ri mo brgyad brgyad mnyam sbyar bas/ /re'u mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ste/ /mkhas
pas de yi bar gyi ni/ /re'u mig bcu gsum stong par bya/ /zur dang zur du ri'u mig dgu/ /grwa bzhi la ni yang dag gnas/ /grwa bzhi kun gyi dbus gyi ni/ /ri'u mig stong pa
nyid byas la/ /dur khrod ras la zhal bzhi pa'i/ /sngags ni yang dag sbyar te bri/ /yung ba ldong ros bsres pa'i chus/ /'khor lo gnyis la bsgrub bya'i ming / /yi ge laM dang spel
te bri| |ri rab brgyad gnas bris pa yis/ /kham phor kha sbyar nyid du bya/ /ri rab steng du dbang chen gyi/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su laM gyis ni/ /mtshan cing sna tshogs rdo rje yis/ /
steng nas mnan par rnam par bsgom/ /srad bu ser pos rnam par dkri/ /he ru ka ni phyag gnyis pa'i/ /rnam par bdag lus yang dag bsgom/ /rnal 'byor pas ni lhor bltas te/ /
kha dog dmar por rnam par bsgom/ /bsgrub bya ri rab dbus gnas shing / /ri rab kyis ni mnan par bsgom/ /de steng sna tshogs rdo rje yis/ /yongs su mnan par rnam par
bsgom| |rang gi gnas su de byas na/ /dgra yi kha ni gnon pa dang / /dpung rnams kun kyang gnon par byed/ /dgra yi snying yang gnon pa'o/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ni huM hUM phaT/ laM lhas byin staM

b+ha ya/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na huM hUM phaT/ laM lhas byin staM b+ha ya/ oM gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya huM hUM phaT/ laM lhas byin staM b+ha ya/ oM A na ya ho bid+yA rA dza huM hUM phaT/ laM lhas byin staM b+ha
ya/ sngar bshad rim bzhin 'khor lo ni/ /de nyid kyis ni nges par bri/ /me tog ser pos mchod bya ste/ /ngag gnon pa yi mchog yin no/ /rtag tu dur khrod ras la ni/ /'khor
lo gnyis ni mngon bris te/ /yi ge baM ni bsgrub bya yi/ /ming dang spel bas kha bcings pa/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /ga'u kha sbyar byas pa yis/ /lug gi snying gar
bsgrub bya ni/ /rab tu zhugs pa rnam par bsams/ /sngags ni rgyun mi 'chad par bzla/ /nges par lkugs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang nges par ni/ /bsad pa'i cho ga
mchog bshad gra/ /lan tshwa ske tshe tsha ba'i mar/ /nim pa'i lo ma de bzhin dug /dur khrod sol ba d+ha du ra/ /rang gi sdigs mdzub khrag kyang rung / /rdzas 'di dag ni snag tshar
bya| |lho phyogs kha bltas sbyor bas ni/ /khwa yi gshog pa'i smyu gu yis/ /bsgrub bya de yi ming bzung ste/ /yi ge hUM dang rnam spel ba'i/ /'khor lo gnyis ni yang dag bri/ /
@#/ /khro zhing drag po'i nga ro dang / /g.yon brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /bskal ba'i me 'dra zhal rnam 'gyur/ /sngo zhing
mi bzad hUM gi sgras/ /mgur ni gang bar rnam par bsgom/ /gyo mo khrod kyi sar bsams pa'am/ /dur khrod sol bya yi ni dbus/ /'di la sogs pa'i sa phyogs su/ /bsgrub
bya gnas par mkhas pas bsam/ /rid cing dri ma dang bcas pa/ /gos hrul gyon par rnam bsam ste/ /yan lag kun dang mgo bo dang / /snying ga dang ni dpung bar yang / /sngags
kyis phug par bsam par bya/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la gnas pa'i lha/ /rang gi lus la rab tu gzhug /khyim stong lta bur bltas nas ni/ /phyag na sna tshogs mtshon cha can/ /khro
bo'i tshogs ni spro byas la/ /mtshon chas gsod par rnam bsam ste/ /dum bu drug tu btubs nas ni/ /tshil dang rkang dang zhag dang sha /za dang 'thung bar byed pa dang / /de bzhin
du ni khrag kyang 'thung / /ral gri dbyug tho gtun shing dang / /dgra sta 'khor lo tho ba yis/ /bsgrub bya la ni rdeg cing btub/ /dum bu brgyar ni gsheg par byed/ /khwa dang 'ug
pa bya rgod dang / /ce spyang srin po mkha' 'gro ma/ /de rnams khros pa'i yid kyis ni/ /za ba deng ni 'thung bar byed/ /yi ge hUM phaT dang spel ba'i/ /sngags dang de yis bzla byas
te| |dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i/ /dgra yi tshogs rnams bsad par bya/ /e ma ho gang phyir bsad pa'i las/ /bsad par gyur kyang ma bsad de/ /'khor ba'i rnam par
rtog pa tsam/ /de bzhin nyid du yid kyis rtogs/ /de nas yi ge phaT spel ba'i/ /'khor lo gnyis ni bri byas te/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni yang dag blang / /sngags kyis sbyar te bri
bar bya/ /rta dang ma he mnyam zhon pa'i/ /bsgrub bya bltas te yang dag bris/ /thod pa kha sbyar nang bzhag ste/ /srad bu sngon pos dkri bar bya/ /khro ba'i sems kyis nyi phyed dam/ /mtshan
mo de yi khyad par la/ /rab tu gtum pas bzhi mdo 'am/ /dur khrod 'jigs pa'i dbus su ni/ /gsang nas brkos te gzhug par bya/ /sngar bshad cho ga bzhin du mchod/ /rta dang
ma he dag 'thabs pas/ /de yi mod la 'byed par byed/ /gnyi ga khro zhing khro bas 'jigs/ /g.yul 'gyed pa yi bdag nyid che/ /phan tshun rtsod pa byed pas ni/ /rnam par sdang
'gyur gzhan du min/ /yi ge hUM phaT rnam spel ba'i/ /cho ga 'di nyid kyis 'dir bri/ /sngags dang bsgrub bya mnyam ldan pas/ /dur khrod ras la bris nas ni/ /thod pa kha sbyar
nang bzhag ste/ /srad bu nag pos dkris nas ni/ /he ru kar ni bsgoms nas su/ /ro bsregs sa brkos sba bar bya/ /mdun du yaM las byung ba'i rlung / /gzhu yi dbyibs can
@#/ /dbus gnas shing / /kha dog sngon po rnga mo zhon/ /lho phyogs su ni bskyod pa dang / /khro bo'i tshogs kyis khrid pas na/ /sa steng smyon pa bzhin du byed/ /yi
ge hUM phaT sbyar ba yi/ /sngags ni rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas/ /gang gi cho ga ci byas pa/ /de yi mod la skrod par 'gyur/ /sgrub po lhor bltas khros pa yis/ /ra khrag dur khrod thal
ba dang / /dug dang lan tshwa 'bru mar che/ /myos byed 'dang ma'i khu ba ni/ /ske tshe mnyam par yang dag sbyar/ /dur khrod ras la de bzhin du/ /'khor lo gnyis po nyid rim bzhin/ /
cho ga rdzogs par bri bar bya/ /bsad pa gshin rje'i lus la gnas/ /dbye ba rta dang ma he la/ /bskrad pa rnga mo la gnas pa/ /zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /mi mo rnams kyi snying
gar dbang / /rgyas pa glang chen rgyab tu'o/ /lkugs pa lug gi lus la gnas/ /mnan pa ri rab dbus te dgug /sha ra b+ha yi seng ge ra gnas/ /'di ltar las ni brtag par
bya| |las 'di dag dang bral ba'i las/ /bsgrubs kyang des ni mi 'grub ste/ /bla ma'i man ngag med pa'i las/ /stong pa bzhin du 'bras med 'gyur/ /'di ni las rab
'byams 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o// //de nas sngags kyi bzlas pa yis/ /mtshan nyid gsang ba bshad par bya/ /ri bo tshang
tshing ri sul dang / /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni/ /bzhi mdo dang ni 'dun khang gnas/ /dur khrod dam ni yid dga' ba/ /sngon du dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /phyi nas lha yi bdag
nyid kyis/ /sngar bshad cho gas yang dag par/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /ri 'am ri bo'i gnas su ni/ /snying po'i sngags ni bzla bar bya/ /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru ka huM hUM phaT swAhA/
'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni/ /bcu cha yi ni sbyin sreg bya/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das dngos grub/ /myur du 'grub ste gzhan du min/ /tshang tshing ljon shing gtams par ni/ /
rtag tu dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /nye ba'i snying po'i sngags rtag tu/ /rgyun mi 'chad par bzla zhing sgrub/ /oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas nas ni/ /bzlas
ba'i bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya/ /char dbab pa dang gter dang ni/ /ngag gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya/ /ri sul dri med chur bcas par/ /dkyil 'khor dge ba bris nas ni/ /rgyun mi

'chad par sngags bzlas te/ /zhal bzhi pa yi gsang sngags bzlas/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha huM hUM phaT/ gr-ih+NA gr-ih+NA huM hUM phaT/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ A na ya ho/ bid+yA rA
dzA huM hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yis bzhi 'bum bzlas/ /bcu cha yi ni sbyin sreg bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang bcud kyis len/ /de bzhin sems can don sgrub pa'o/ /rgya mtsho chen
@#/ /po'i 'gram song nas/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag bris nas ni/ /lha mo'i sngags ni khyad par du/ /'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas nas su/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin
cho ga ni/ /rdzogs pas bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya/ /oM badzra bai ro tsA nI ye hUM hUM phaDa swAhA/ 'jig rten dngos grub thams cad dang / /de bzhin mkha' spyod dngos grub bo/ /dur khrod du ni
sngar bshad pa'i/ /cho ga'i rim pas dkyil 'khor bri/ /yi ge bdun pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /'bum phrag gsum du bzlas la sgrub/ /bcu cha'i sbyin sreg byas nas las/ /rnam par
nges pas bsgrub par bya/ /dbye ba dang ni bskrad pa'i las/ /khyad par du ni bsad pa'i las/ /rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs bzhin/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /
bzhi mdor dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /mnan pa'i cho ga bsgrub par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gsang sngags ni/ /khri bzlas pas ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ bcu
cha'i sbyin sreg bsgrubs na ni/ /'byung po ro langs 'grub par 'gyur/ /gtsug lag khang ngam 'dun khang du/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya/ /lA ma'i sngags ni nges par
yang | |'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni/ /lha mo bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya/ /oM lA me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ /mig sman dang ni rkang mgyogs dang / /de bzhin dbang du byed pa ni/ /
'grub par 'dir ni the tshom med/ /dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas su ni/ /rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri byas la/ /khaN+Da ro hi sogs sngags kyis/ /cho ga sngon bzhin bsgrub par bya/ /oM
khaN+Da ro he hUM hUM phaDa swAhA/ 'bum phrag gnyis ni bzlas nas kyang / /bcu cha yi ni sbyin sreg bya/ /rgyun mi 'chad par sngags bzlas te/ /gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrub/
gzugs can ma yi gsang sngags ni/ /nges par 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas nas/ /lha mo bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya/ /'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /oM rU pi NI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/
me tog dang ni sbos dang dri/ /lha bshos gtor ma de bzhin te/ /bza' dang btung bas khyad par du/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni mchod bya zhing / /glu dang gar gyi khyad par gyis/ /
phyag rgya sngags ni bsgrags par bya/ /yid 'ong dam tshig rnyed nas ni/ /phyogs su bzhag nas bsgrub bya ste/ /las ni gang gis khyad par gyis/ /de yi rigs sogs brtag par bya//
lha yi rnam pa la gnas te/ /cho ga ji bzhin bzlas shing mchod/ /dus gang tshe na mi smra zhing / /der ni sngon du bsnyen pa bya/ /myos byed gtor mar mnyam ldan pas/ /sngags kyi nus
pa bsgrub bya ste/ /brgya dang stong dang 'bum gyi bar/ /der ni grangs nyid mtshon par bya/ /grangs med sngags ni bzlas pa yis/ /bla na med pa'i dge ba 'byung / /de dag nges par

@#/ /sbyor ba yis/ /bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni sngags kyi bzlas pa'i nges pa bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// //yang dag cho ga gang gis 'dir/ /'grub par the tshom med pa yi/ /bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ /gnod sbyin bdag po legs par nyon/ /gser dang dngul dang zangs ma
dang | |de bzhin shel dang dung la sogs/ /zhi dang rgyas pa dge la sbyar/ /zhi la ril bu brgya pa ste/ /ril bu brgya rtsa brgyad pa ni/ /rgyas pa'i las la rab bsngags te/ /mkhas
pas rgyal srid ched dam dpal/ /bde spro phun sum tshogs phyir bzlas/ /dbang dang dgug pa'i rab sbyor la/ /gur gum la sogs dri'i ril bu/ /byu ru tsan+dan dmar po'i
'bru/ |rtag tu ril bu lnga bcu'o/ /ru rak+Sha dang lung tang 'bras/ /de bzhin mi rus rnga mo dang / /bong bu ma he'i rus pa ni/ /drag spyod lkugs dang mnan pa dang / /dbye bas dag
ni tshar bcad dang / /gsad dang bskrad la sbyar bya ste/ /las kyi khyad par ji lta bar/ /bzlas pa'i phreng ba'ang bya ba yin/ /bong bu rnga mo'i spu dang ni/ /khwa yi sgro ni bsre byas la/ /
mnan dang bskrad pa'i las la ni/ /de yi srad bus brgyu bar bya/ /rta dang ma he'i spu yis ni/ /rnam par sdang la srad bu bya/ /dur khrod skra yi srad bu dang / /khyi yi spu ni bsre
bya ste| |de yi srad bu drag po yi/ /las la bsngags phyir sbyar bar bya/ /dge ba'i las la gzhon nu mas/ /bkal ba'i srad bus brgyu bar bya/ /zhi ba la ni mdzum la bzhag /rgyas pa rtag
tu gung mo yis/ /ming med kyis ni dbang zhes gsungs/ /tha ma yis ni mngon spyod yin/ /mthe bong lha yis rang bzhin gyis/ /las kun las ni sbyar bar bya/ /ril bu dgra bcom
mdo 'dzin ni/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor kyi rang bzhin te/ /bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i khyad par gyis/ /mnyam gzhag bsgom zhing bzlas par bya/ /rdzogs ldan dus su gcig bzlas pa/ /gsum
ldan dus su gnyis 'gyur bzlas/ /gnyis ldan dus na sum 'gyur bshad/ /rtsod dus bzhi 'gyur du ni bzla/ /sngags kyi grangs ni bzhi po yis/ /rgyun mi 'chad par gsang sngags
bzlas/ /bzlas pa'i phreng ba sogs bsdus pa/ /'di ni ngag gi bzlas pa ste/ /lha yi gzugs su dmigs pa yis/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid can/ /sngags kyi de nyid brda
yis ni/ /'gro dang 'ong ba yang dag bsam/ /mtha' gsum las ni rnam grol ba/ /don dam de bzhin nyid kyi don/ /'di rnams sngags kyi bzlas pa yi/ /cho ga'i mtshan nyid
gsungs pa yin/ /'di ni sngags kyi bzlas pa'i bgrang phreng nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /lha yi
@#/ /dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ste/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa can/ /dngos grub yon tan kun gyi gnas/ /'dod pa'i yon tan kun khyab pa'i/ /sa phyogs
mkhas pas yang dag brtag /khrag 'thung phyag gnyis sbyor ldan pas/ /phung po lnga sogs nga rgyal bya/ /zhal bzhi pa yi sngags brjod pas/ /phyogs ni bcing zhing ra ba ste/ /oM

suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ shar du'o/ /oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na huM hUM phaT/ byang du'o/ /oM gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya huM hUM phaT/ nub tu'o/ /oM A na ya ho bi d+ya rA dzA huM hUM phaT/ lho ru'o/ /phyogs
su se gol brdabs pa yis/ /gdug pa'i bdud ni bskrad par bya/ /snying ga'i chu skyes hUM yig las/ /'od zer phreng ba spro bar bya/ /de yi snang bas mdun du ni/ /bla ma sangs
rgyas sogs bltas la/ /phyag btsal me tog bdug sogs pas/ /mchod de rjes la sdig par bshags/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing / /byang chub sems ni
rnam par bskyed/ /gzhan la phan pa'i sems ni byams pa ste/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal 'joms byed snying rje yin/ /gzhan gyi bde bas tshim pa dga' ba ste/ /sems can
kun snyoms btang snyoms rnam par bsam/ /oM swA b+hA wa shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maHswa b+hA wa shud+d+ho nya haM/ zhes bya bas/ sems tsam nyid la rnam gnas shing / /byang chub tshogs
ni bsgom par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA wa at+ma ko nya haM/ rten dang brten pa'i gzugs su ni/ /bai raM b+ha la sogs pa bsam/ /yaM las byung ba'i rlung dkyil 'khor/ /gzhu 'dra
kha dog sngon po ste/ /de yi steng du raM las ni/ /me yi dkyil 'khor gyi ni gzugs/ /kha dog dmar po zur gsum pa/ /rdo rje rtse gsum gyis mtshan pa'o/ /de yi steng du baM byung ba'i/ /
chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar/ /de yi steng du'ang laM byung ba'i/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa/ /kha dog ser po grwa bzhir ni/ /de bzhin rdo rje rtse gsum mtshan/ /de yi steng du
sum byung ba'i/ /zur bzhi pa ni ri rab ste/ /rin chen bzhi yi bdag nyid mdzes/ /rtse mo brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de yi steng du hUM byung ba'i/ /sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /de yi
steng du pad+ma ni/ /lte ba ge sar ldan par sgom/ /de dbus A li kA li yi/ /dag pa'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su yi ge hUM/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin las/ /nyi
ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs pa'i/ /dpal he ru ka rnam par bsgom/ /dpa' bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /g.yas brkyang pa yis gdan la bzhugs/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag
po ste| |g.yas pa kund lta bu ste/ /g.yon pa dmar po cher 'jigs pa'o/ /ral ba'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /mnan cing bde ba chen
@#/ /pos bzhugs/ /rdo rje rnam snang mdzad mas 'khyud/ /thugs rje'i chags pas shas cher dgyes/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu ni/ /mnyam par ldan pas yang
dag 'khyud/ /gnyis pa'i phyag ni mchog gnyis kyis/ /glang chen pags pa gos su 'dzin/ /g.yas kyi gsum pas cang te'u ni/ /chos kun ngo bo nyid sgra sgrogs/ /g.yon gyi phyag
ni gsum pa yis/ /kha T+wAM ga rten thod pa bsnams/ /thod pa'i phreng bas thod du mdzad/ /zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan/ /dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan/ /rigs kyi bdag
po so cod pan mdzad/ /zhal ni rnam 'gyur cher 'jigs pa/ /sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o/ /stag gi pags pa'i na bza' can/ /ma mgo nyi shu phyed kyis brgyan/ /lha ni
phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing / /gar gyi nyams ni dgu dang ldan/ /de la 'khyud pa'i bcom ldan ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ma/ /gcer bu ban+d+hu ka yi mdog
dum bus brgyan pa'i ska rags can/ /skra grel ba dang rnam par gtsigs/ /khrag la dgyes shing 'dzag pa'o/ /phyag g.yon 'khyud pas gdug pa yi/ /bdud sogs khrag
can thod pa 'dzin/ /g.yas pa sdigs mdzub rdo rje can/ bskal ba'i me 'dra'i sku chen ma/ /byin pa gnyis ni mnyam 'khyud cing / /rtag tu bde ba cher dgyes
pa'o| |mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang / /khaN+Da ro hA+e gzugs can ma/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde 'byung ba/ /pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas su dgod/ /nag dang ljang dang
dmar ba dang / /ser skya'i mdog can spyan gsum ma/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis ma ste/ /kha T+wAM thod pa'i phyag ldan ma/ /g.yas pas rdo rje gri gug ste/ /gcer bu g.yas
brkyang pa yi zhabs/ /skra grol mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la ni/ /byang chub sems la sogs pa'i snod/ /bdud
rtsi lnga dang ldan pa dang / /glu dang gar gyi dga' bdes mchod/ /sgo bzhir lha tshogs gnas pa ste/ /rtag tu lha rnams bsgom par bya/ /shar gyi sgor ni khwa gdong ma/ /phyag gnyis
sngon mor bsgom par bya/ /byang gi sgor ni 'ug gdong ma/ /ljang gu skra ni grol ba'o/ /de bzhin khyi gdong ma ni dmar/ /nub kyi sgor ni yang dag gnas/ /phag gdong ma ni ser
mo ste| |lho sgor yi dwags gdan la gnas/ /me dang de bzhin bden 'brel dang / /rlung lha dbang ldan mtshams su ni/ /gshin rje brtan ma pho nya mo/ /gshin rje mche ba 'joms
ma ste| |de bzhin zur gnas lha mo ni/ /yid 'phrog gzugs ni gnyis ma ste/ /yi dwags la gnas drag mo che/ /phyag rgya lngas ni rnam pa brgyan pa'o/ /g.yon na thod pa kha T+wAM ga
@#/ /g.yas na rdo rje gri gug ste/ /rnal 'byor ma ni de rnams kun/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'o/ /de nas go cha gnyis shes nas/ /ye shes
'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /dam tshig 'khor lor mnyam par gzhug /de nas go cha gnyis bshad par bya ste/ /oM ha snying gar ro//
na maHhi mgo bo la'o/ /swAhA hUM/ spyi gtsug tu'o/ /bau Sha Ta he phrag pa gnyis la'o/ /hUM hUM hoHmig gnyis la'o/ /phaT haM yan lag thams cad la ste/ /mtshon cha'o/ /
dang po rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /gnyis pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs/ /gsum pa pad+ma gar dbang ste/ /dpal he ru ka bzhi par grags/ /lnga pa rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /
drug pa de bzhin rta mchog ste/ /go cha drug po rnams kyis bsrungs/ /oM baM ni rdo rje rnam snang mdzad ma'o/ /oM haM yaM ni gshin rje ma'o/ /oM hrIM maM ni rmongs byed ma'o//
oM hrIM hrIM ni bskyod byed ma'o/ /oM hUM hUM ni skrag byed ma'o/ /phaT phaT ni gtum mo lus thams cad la mtshon cha ste/ lte ba dang / /snying ga dang / /de bzhin du kha dang / mgo
bo dang / spyi gtsug la de bzhin du ni mtshon cha yin no/ /oM yo ga shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+honyahaM/ lag pa g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa snying gar bzhag ste/ pad+ma
rgyas pa'i gar bya'o/ /snying po'i phyag rgya la sogs lha/ /bskor ba mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni gtso bo mchog /lha yi rnal 'byor rnam par bsgom/ /chos dang longs
spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /bde chen 'khor lo sbyar bar bya/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rtsa rnams ni/ /lus kun dag par byed pa ste/ /gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis/ /lus ni sdud cing 'dzin
pa yin/ /lus 'di dpa' bo'i rang bzhin te/ /'di de sangs rgyas kun mtshungs pa'o/ /gnyis med rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab go 'phang bstan/ /rjes
mthun rnal 'byor sems kyis ni/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /'di ni dpal he ru ka'i bskyed pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas rdo rje
rnal 'byor ma/ /mchod pa yang dag rab bshad bya/ /gnas sogs bgrod par mi nus na/ /phyi yi rnal 'byor ma mchod bya/ /rang gi khyim du rnal 'byor ma/ /mchod de sngon du
bsnyen sogs bya/ /sngon du bsnyen pa med pa las/ /de yis don med yongs su ngal/ /mar ngo yi ni tshes bcu'am/ /yar ngo yang ni de bzhin te/ /khrus dang gtsang sbra sogs
ldan pas/ /dad pa'i sems kyis spyan drangs te/ /rang gi khyim du shar bltas par/ /yang dag gnas pas lha mo mchod/ /gur gum mig sman de bzhin du/ /li khri yis ni
@#/ /mgo la byug /lag pa rkang pa gdong de bzhin/ /byug pas byug cing mchod par bya/ /mgo la me tog phreng ba dbyangs/ /dri zhim pa yi bdug pas
bdug /gcig dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga/ /khyad par du ni bdun dang dgu/ /ji srid nyi shu bzhi yi bar/ /yon bdag nges par dad pa yis/ /bza' dang myos byed btung
ba dang / /nya dang sha la sogs ldan pas/ /phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs nas mchod/ /dpa' bos brda ni bstan par bya/ /rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa'i tshogs/ /lha yi bdag
nyid rtag tu mchod/ /gtor ma'i bya ba sngon 'gro bas/ /mar me lnga dang bza' ba dbul/ /glu dang bstod par rab ldan pas/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod/ /'dir ni
brtson pas rdo rje lha mo rnams/ /myos byed sha yis rab tu mchod byas te/ /dpal ldan rdo rje theg par mos 'gyur de'i/ /dad pas ston mos de rnams mchod byas na/ /thugs
ni mnyes pas mchog ni stsol 'gyur te/ /gang phyir mchog ni de yi lag na gnas/ /rnal 'byor ma ni mchod nas su/ /zhi rgyas mtshan ma brtag bya ste/ /gzhon nu ma
mchod skad cig la/ /dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras brtag /gang zhig lag gnyis nyed pa na/ /yid ni mnyes par ma gyur nas/ /des na nad rnams 'phel ba dang / /sdug
bsngal thob pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mchod byas de yi skad cig la/ /gad mo'i sgra ni phyung gyur na/ /nad med pa ni mi 'grub cing / /'chi ba nyid du the tshom med/ /mchod pa'i mod la 'du
byed cing / /mig gnyis nyed par byed na ni/ /skad cig la ni 'chi zhes brjod/ /sgrub pos rtag tu mchod byas pas/ /so so so sor zung rer ni/ /phan tshun gdong ni phyogs gyur
na| |thams cad du ni rtsod 'gyur bar/ /gzhon nu mas ni rtag tu ston/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rgyab phyogs blta/ /so yis sen mo 'cha' byed na/ /sha yi bza' bas ma tshim ste/ /
slar yang las ni dgos par 'gyur/ /bza' dang btung ba thams cad kyi/ /ston mos mnyes par ma gyur na/ /mtshon la sogs pa glo bur ba'i/ /nad ni 'phral du skye bar 'gyur/ /
'di ltar glu dang rol mo byed/ /yang dang yang du dgod pa na/ /rgyal po chom rkun 'jigs pa dag /gzhon nu de ston mkhas pas brtag /myos byed 'thungs nas yang dang yang //
rnam pa du mas gar byed na/ /de rnams la ni nad chen 'byung / /mchod pa'i dus su brtag par bya/ /ston mo'i bza' ba thams cad ni/ /dor nas phyogs su lta byed na/ /spyod pa
nyams par byas pa'i skyon/ /lha rnams bdag la 'khrugs pa'o/ /phan tshun gtam la 'jug pa dang / /gal te phan tshun rgod byed na/ /gtso bo'i cho ga nyams par ni/ /gzhon nu de
@#/ /bstan shes par bya/ /zos ma thag tu skyug byed na/ /smyo ba'i nad ni 'byung bar ston/ /mdzes ma gal te 'gro ba'i che/ /rgyab kyi phyogs su lta byed na/ /slar
yang las ni dgos pa dang / /yun ring zhig na nad 'byung ston/ /sa la rkang pas nyed pa na/ /gnas ni 'pho ba'i don du 'gyur/ /mchod dus babs par gyur na ni/ /phan tshun g.yul
ni 'gyed par ston/ /rnam 'gyur 'di dag bral bas ni/ /mchod pa 'grub par mtshon par bya/ /de bas brtson pas mchod nas ni/ /sgrub pos rtag tu brtag par bya/ /rdo rje rnal

'byor ma rnams mchod/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab ster/ /'di ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mchod pa'i cho ga nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas de phyir snod kyi ni/ /mtshan nyid mchog ni yang dag bshad/ /'jim pa'am de bzhin rus sbal snod/ /'khar ba'am zangs sam lcags las byas/ /gser ram dngul
las byas pa'am/ /dung ngam de bzhin nya phyis te/ /bal po se'u yi 'bras bu mchog /de bzhin gzhan yang gsar byung ba/ /rwa las byung dang shing snod sogs/ /gzhan yang rdo
snod khyad par ro/ /dum bu gcig dang dum bu gnyis/ /de bzhin gsum dang bzhi dang lnga/ /dum bu drug dang dum bu bdun/ /dum bu brgyad par rab tu grags/ /bram ze rgyal rigs
rje'u rigs sam/ /dmangs rigs bud med rigs mthar skyes/ /dkar dang dmar dang ljang skya dang / /ser dang de bzhin ser skya ste/ /thal ba'i mdog dang mdog ngan dang / /sna tshogs
mdog tu rab tu grags/ /lhag pa dman dang tha ma ste/ /de bzhin dbyibs ni sna tshogs dbye/ /gshongs gnyis glang po'i rgyab lta bu/ /de bzhin rdo rje'am khwa yi rkang / /so ni ljang
dang ser ba'am/ /lto ba'am srin bus zos de bzhin/ /'di kun rnam par bltas nas ni/ /de la yongs su brtag par bya/ /sa gzhi mnyam pa'i yul rnams sam/ /thang ngam bye ba'i
gshongs dag tu/ /sngags pas der ni sgrub byas la/ /de yi ltung ba brtag par bya/ /lhor bltas bram ze 'jig par 'gyur/ /bden bral lhung bas ba lang dang / /rigs med pa dang
rigs ngan 'jig /rlung bltas sngags ni 'jig pa ste/ /byang du bltas na phyug por 'gyur/ /dbang ldan sngags kyi dngos grub ste/ /brtul zhugs rgyun ni nyams pa med/ /mer
bltas nye bar 'phrog pa ste/ /de bzhin 'og bltas chom rgun ma'o/ /steng bltas gnas pas bud med 'joms/ /logs su lhung bas gtum mo ste/ /snod kyi mtshan nyid rnam shes
bya| |dum bu gcig pa gnas la dbang / /dum bu gnyis pa dkyil 'khor dang / /dum gsum sgrub po'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /dum bu bzhi pas sngags dngos grub/ /lnga pa yis ni
@#/ /zhi dang rgyas/ /dum drug slong mo rnyed par shes/ /dum bu bdun pas dbang du byed/ /dngos grub sgrub pa 'bras med phyir/ /de bzhin dum bu brgyad pa
spang | |bu ga gcig pa bram zer 'gyur/ /bu ga gnyis pa rgyal rigs 'gyur/ /bu ga gsum pa rje'u rigs shes/ /bu ga bzhi pa dmangs rigs rnams/ /bu ga mang po'am bu
ga med| |mkhas pa yis ni spang bar bya/ /bud med thod pa'ang mi bzung ste/ /khyad par du ni mdog nyams dang / /so med pa'am so nyams pa/ /dge ba 'dod pas bcang mi
bya| |so ljang bas ni sdug bsngal mang / /khwa yi rkang 'dras rtsod par 'gyur/ /gshong bu gnyis pas rgud par 'gyur/ /de bzhin glang po'i rgyab kyi nang / /dbus kyi gnas su
gshong bu bzhi/ /'dod 'jo'i bar ni blta bar bya/ /mdun phyogs su ni gshong bu gnyis/ /yid bzhin nor bu zhes byar bshad/ /dung dang kun da zla ba yi/ /mdog mtshungs
snum pa shis par blta/ /sngags rnams kun gyi dngos grub ster/ /sgrub pos dngos grub thob par byed/ /che zhing mdog ni ser po'am/ /pad+ma lta bu pad+mas mtshan/ /rgyas la
bsngags par gsungs pa ste/ /nor ni phun sum tshogs pa 'grub/ /snod ni gang zhig kha dog dmar/ /gzhan yang thig le dmar pos mtshan/ /rtag tu dbang dang dgug
pa yi| |dngos grub ster snod mtshan nyid do/ /ba lang kha lta bu yi dbyibs/ /shin tu sra zhing mu tig bcas/ /bsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba la/ /khyad par du ni rab tu bsngags/ /
snod ni rab bsngags yang dag thob/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab ster/ /gnas dang zhing du bgrod nas ni/ /sgrub pos lha mo bsgrub par bya/ /mtshan nyid 'di dag yongs rdzogs
pa| |bcangs na dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di ni snod kyi mtshan nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bco lnga pa'o// //de nas de phyir bdud rtsi lnga'i/ /
sgrub pa yang dag rab tu bshad/ /yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'byung ba'o/ /cho ga sbas pas bram ze yi/ /mngal nas skyes las yang dag blang / /des na
rnam snang mdzad pa'i ming / /grags te dngos grub yang dag bzhed/ /kha dog ljang zhing rab bzang lus/ /mig gi 'bras bu gnag pa yi/ /rin chen rigs ma rnyed nas de'i/ /
dri chus bsangs te bsgrub par bya/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus ldan zhing / /yan lag mdzes gzhon pad+ma'i rigs/ /bza' dang btung bas yang dag mchod/ /mkhas
pas mchod yon phul nas ni/ /de yi mod la snyoms 'jug byas/ /phan tshun gyi ni shu kra blang / /des na gar mkhan rigs ming can/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin
@#/ /grags/ /sngar bshad pa yi cho ga yis/ /dngos grub yongs su rdzogs bgrod pa/ /tshos mkhan zhes ni rab grags pa'i/ /dang po'i me tog rab
tu bsngags/ /dam tshig can ma'i gdol pa mo/ /gal te rnyed na rtag bsten bya/ /sha dang tshil dang de bzhin khrag /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /sgrub po dngos grub
'dod pa yis/ /lcags kyu lnga ni ji snyed pa'am/ /'dir ni bsad pa gtsor bshad pas/ /ji ste yang dag rnyed na gzung / /ba lang sha dang rta sha dang / /glang po'i sha yang de
bzhin te/ /mi yi sha dang khyi yi sha /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs pa'i/ /sgron ma lnga zhes grags pa'o/ /rnyed nas tshes bcu'i
dus su ni/ /dngos po 'di dag yang dag bsdu/ /dri zhim pa dang bsres nas ni/ /rab tu gsang ste sbyar bar bya/ /sgrub pa po yis gsang ba yis/ /ril bu'i rnam pa yang dag bya//
de yi mod la yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /bza' dang btung ba'i khyad par gyis/ /tshogs kyi dbus su byin brlabs nas/ /phyis nas las ni yang dag brtsam/ /sngags bzlas de
bzhin bsam gtan dang / /'dod pa kun gyi 'bras 'byung zhing / /lus kyi bcud kyis len dang ni/ /mchog tu grol ba'i dngos grub ster/ /rtag tu ril bu bsten byed pa/ /
'dod pa kun gyi 'bras rab ster/ /las rnams kun la rab sbyar na/ /mkha' spyod go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni bdud rtsi lnga sgrub pa des par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste
bcu drug pa'o// //de nas dkyil 'khor bri pa yi/ /cho ga mchog ni yang dag bshad/ /'di ltar 'ga' zhig gsol 'debs pa'am/ /rang nyid bsod nams 'dod pa
yis| |dang por rang lha'i bdag nyid kyi/ /'khor lo la gnas sngon bsnyen bya/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i dbang byas nas/ /der ni gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /brtan zhing zab mo'i chos
shes pa/ /rab gnas gtor ma'i pha rol son/ /sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid shes/ /rig pa'i gnas ni thams cad rig /gsang sngags tshul la dad cing mos/ /gzugs
bzang blta na sdug pa dang / /bla ma la gus brtser ldan na/ /sdom pa 'byung bar rab bshad bya/ /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas/ /gnas khang mdun khang sa phyogs
gtsang / /gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du/ /der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /sngon du las ni byas pa'i sar/ /brko ba la sogs mi bya ste/ /lag pas reg nas hUM yig
gi| sngags bzlas pas ni sa sbyang bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi cha'i/ /nyis 'gyur sa ni sbyang bar bya/ /rang gi sems ni yongs dag pa/ /de nyid kyis ni sa dag 'gyur/ /
@#/ /slob dpon sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /lha yi sku yi bdag nyid can/ /dpa' bo rdo rje dril 'chang ba/ /mkha' 'gror bcas la gsol ba gdab/ /blo ldan
rdo rje gsor byed cing / /dril bu 'khrol bar brtson pa yis/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba dang / /rab tu gdug pa'i bgegs tshogs bskrad/ /nga ni dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs/ /
srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ /lus srul la sogs gang ci'ang rung / /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams gzhan du dengs/ /ji ste ngas bsgo su zhig 'da'/ /rdo rje'i bdag po'i
sku yis ni/ /lus gsum las byung dgas bya ste/ /'dir ni brlag 'gyur gzhan du min/ /sa ni yongs su bzung byas nas/ /ra bas mtshams ni bcing bar bya/ /lag g.yas
dam bcas phyag rgya yis/ /yi ge baM byung sa'i lha mo/ /mdog ser gser gyi bum 'dzin la/ /bstod nas rab tu bskul bar bya/ /che ge zhes bya bdag dkyil 'khor/ /'dri
la lha mo khyed dbang gyur/ /me tog bdug pa sogs pas mchod/ /mkhas pas mchod yon phul byas la/ /bcom ldan khro mchog rdo rje can/ /de bzhin gshegs la gsol ba
gdab/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dgongs su gsol/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /mgon po lhan cig skyes 'byung ba'i/ /
dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'tshal lags na/ /de bas bcom ldan gus bdag la/ /bka' drin gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /gang gzhan gsang sngags lha rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong
ba'i lha rnams dang / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brten pa'i/ /'byung po bstan la mngon dga' ba/ /gang su rdo rje'i spyan ldan kun/ /dkyil 'khor bde mchog 'byung ba yi/ /dkyil
'khor 'dri bar bgyid lags pas/ /bdag dang de bzhin slob ma la/ /rjes su brtse ba bskyed du gsol/ /srad bu ye shes lnga ldan zhing / /nyi shu rtsa lngar rnam dbye bas/ /chos
kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /srad bu phan tshun bsgril bar bya/ /sgrub pos yi ge hUM brjod de/ /bdud rtsi lngas ni byug par bya/ /dkyus su 'khor lo'i nyis 'gyur la/ /sbom su sgo yi nyi
shu cha| |dzaHgsum brjod nas lte bar ni/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung nas/ /blo ldan nam mkhar thig gdab ste/ /de bzhin sa la'ang gdab par bya/ /gsal zhing mdzes par
ldan pa dang / /tshad ldan gtsang ma'i srad bu yis/ /dpal ldan lhan skyes 'byung dkyil 'khor/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya/ /khru phyed la sogs nas brtsams nas/ /ji
srid khru ni brgya yi bar/ /dang por tshangs pa'i thig yin te/ /gnyis pa la ni zur thig gdab/ /nub dang lho yi gnas su ni/ /slob dpon nges par yang dag gnas/ /shar dang byang
@#/ /gi phyogs gnas su/ /slob ma gnas te mnyam gzhag pas/ /dang por bzhi 'gyur bdag nyid du/ /re'u mig gcig ni thig gdab bya/ /de nas brgyad
'gyur bdag nyid du/ /re'u mig gcig gi thig rab gdab/ /gzhan yang brgyad 'gyur nyid du ni/ /re'u mig gcig ni thig gdab bya/ /de nas gzhan yang nyis 'gyur nyid//
re'u mig gcig ni thig rab gdab/ /de nas bzhi 'gyur nyid du ni/ /re'u mig gcig ni thig gdab bya/ /gzhan yang nyis 'gyur nyid du ni/ /re'u mig gcig ni thig rab
gdab| |de nas mkhas pas bzhi 'gyur nyid/ /re'u mig gcig ni thig gdab bya/ /de nas gnyis 'gyur bdag nyid de/ /re'u mig gnyis ni thig gdab bya/ /de nas
phyed ni rim gnyis bri/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor thig yin no/ /thig skud mtshan ma drug cu bzhi/ /dkyil 'khor thig gi mtshan nyid de/ /'khor lo'i phyi rol mthar thug
bar| |cho ga gsungs bzhin thig gdab bya/ /rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am/ /yang na 'bras la sogs pa ste/ /dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu nag po'ang de
bzhin te/ /slob dpon dbang ldan phyogs su ni/ /song ste mnyam par gzhag nas su/ /legs sbas g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis/ /ri mo lnga ni dgye bar bya/ /phan tshun
bar du nas re tsam/ /shong pa'i tshad du bri ba ste/ /ri mo sboms na nad du 'gyur/ /phra bas nor ni nyams par 'gyur/ /yon pos 'di ni rtsod par 'gyur/ /chad pas 'chi ba 'byung
bar 'gyur/ /shar phyogs su ni dkar po che/ /lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste/ /byang du mar gad yang dag ldan/ /dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni/ /in+d+ra nI
la 'od 'bar ba'o/ /gra yi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis spras par/ /mnyam par bzhag ste yang dag bri/ /rdo rjer ba'i nang du
ni| |dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan pa ste/ /gtum drag de bzhin tshang tshing dang / /rdo rje 'bar ba keng rus can/ /dbang ldan du ni mi bzad bzhad/ /byin za ru ni bkra shis mchog /
mun pa drag po bden bral du/ /rlung phyogs ki li ki li'i sgra/ /shar gyi shiR+Sha a shwata shing / /kang kel khyad par tsU ta'i shing / /pa TA de bzhin ka rany+dza/ /la tA parka paR+thi ba/ /
dbang po de bzhin sbyin byed dang / /klu yi dbang dang gshin rje'i bdag /dbang ldan de nas byin za dang / /srin po'i dbang po rlung gi bdag /bA su ki dang 'jog po nyid/ /karko Ta
dang pad+ma nyid/ /pad chen hu lu hu lu dang / /rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong ngo / /sgrogs pa dang ni cher sgrogs dang / /drag dang g.yo dang brtan de bzhin/ /gang ba dang ni de
@#/ /bzhin 'bebs/ /gtum pa 'di dag sprin dbang phyug /gzhan yang sna tshogs du ma yi/ /khwa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang / /lce sbyang lce spyang mo dang ni/ /'ol ba
dang ni 'ol ba mo/ /seng ge'i gdong dang stag gi gdong / /drag cing 'jigs pa'i gdong can ma/ /sprul ni ba lang mgo can dang / /gdong gnyis la sogs phyogs su
rgyu| |keng rus dang ni mdung gis phug /'phyang dang phyed tshig pa dang mgo /thod pa byin pa mgo rdum dang / /gtsigs pa'i mgo dang rus pa dang / /rig 'dzin grub pa
sna tshogs dang / /dam tshig spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs rnams dang / /gnod sbyin ro langs srin po sogs/ /ki li ki li'i sgra chen bdag/ dngos
grub rdzu 'phrul yang dag par/ /thob pa'i slob dpon gyi ni tshogs/ /dur khrod dbus su blta bar bya/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i
rim par phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas slob dpon mtshan nyid ni/ /yang dag rab tu bshad par bya/ /zhi zhing dul ba'i cha lugs can/ /
sems can kun rab mi 'jigs ster/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi rab sbyor shes/ /bstan bcos rig cing snying rjer ldan/ /sems can kun la bu bzhin blta/ /thams
cad du ni snyan par smra/ /sbyin la sogs la rtag tu dga'/ /bsam gtan rnal 'byor mngon par brtson/ /kun la mi 'tshe bden par smra/ /snying rje dang ni phan sems ldan/ /mnyam
sems dang ni phyag rgyar ldan/ /sems can rnams kyi mgon 'gyur zhing / /sems can bsam pa'i khyad par shes/ /mgon med pa ni rnams kyi gnyen/ /dbang po yongs su
rdzogs pa'i lus/ /gzugs dang ldan zhing blta na sdug /dbang bskur don gyi de nyid shes/ /tshig gsal yon tan rgya mtsho ste/ /rtag par rgyun tu gnas brten pa/ /de ni
slob dpon rig par bya/ /slob ma rigs bzang chos la spro/ /slob dpon gyis ni yang dag bsdu/ /snying rje med cing khro dang gdug /khengs dang brkam chags rnam g.yeng can//
drag dang rmongs dang snyoms las can/ /gzhan gyi srog la snying brtse med/ /gzhan gyi nor la sred pa ni/ /bla mas rtag tu spang bar bya/ /brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan/ /
bzod ldan drang zhing g.yo sgyu med/ /mi dge bcu ni yongs su spangs/ /sems can rnams la byams par blta/ /'bar ba'i me dang dug bzhin du/ /gzhan gyi nor la mi
reg cing / /rtag par rgyun tu bla ma mchod/ /dam chos lta bar spro ba dang / /rtag tu sbyin pa la sogs dga'/ /'jig rten pha rol mngon par 'dod/ /de dag slob mar rab
@#/ /bsngags te/ /dkyil 'khor dge ba bstan par bya/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /gus pa'i yid kyis gsol gdab bya/ /rnal 'byor ma mchog kha sbyor
ba'i| |dpa' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul brtan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag
la stsol/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang mo dang / /de bzhin phag mo he ru ka /gsang ba'i gnas sogs yang dag dgang / /lus la rnam gnas bshad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos
dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par mdzod/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /khyod
