nyams ldan pas/ /de bzhin bkra shis glu blang bya/ /rnam kun don ni yongs dag cing / /rnam pa med pa'i bde ba che/ /sgrub po shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /las
@#/ /rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'byor na nyi ma re re'am/ /de bzhin zla ba'am lo rer ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi gzugs/ /de bzhin
nyid du yongs su bsngo/ /sbyin pa la sogs thams cad kyis ni 'gro ba nyid kyis 'dod pa mchog ni kun rdzogs mdzad/ /he ru ka dpal mkha' 'gro ma sogs rnam rtog gti mug grong
khyer thams cad phye mar brlag /gang zhig 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i bla ma rgyal ba'i ye shes 'byung gnas mthar sbyin mdzad/ /de ni snying rje chen po'i dbang gyur 'phags
pa rnams kyi rtag tu myur bar bkra shis yin/ /'di ni gtor ma'i mchod pa bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste so gnyis pa'o// //de nas ye shes 'byung ba yi/ /
dngos grub sdom pa bshad par bya/ /sna tshogs tshul gyi thabs rnams ni/ /dngos grub rnams kyi gyu yi mchog /phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i lus/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med//
'di ltar bdag nyid mkha' mtshungs par/ /rtag tu grol ba'i bdag nyid mthong / /lus med thog ma tha ma med/ /sgra la sogs pa'i yon tan bral/ /gnyis pa las ni
rnam grol ba/ /rnam pa kun tu cir yang gnas/ /dngos med dngos po la brten nas/ /brten pa med par dngos por bya/ /yid med yid ni byas nas su/ /cung zad tsam
yang mi bsam mo/ /stan la gnas nas bla ma yi/ /brgyud par brtan par byas nas ni/ /de bzhin mkha' dang mtshungs pa yi/ /ro gcig sems ni bsgom par bya/ /bsam gtan
gzugs las rnam par grol/ /rtog ge'i sbyor ba rnam par spangs/ /sems byung sems su brtan gyur pa/ /'gro ba'ang rang bzhin tshul de bzhin/ /mkha' mtshungs nam mkha' yang
dag gnas/ /shel gyi nor bu dag pa bzhin/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i gzugs/ /spros bral dbang po'i spyod yul min/ /'gyur ba med tsang snang ba med/ /thams cad stong pa nyon
mongs med/ /'gro ba'i sgron ma srid pa yi/ /'ching ba 'joms shing tshig brjod bral/ /yid kyi'ang spyod yul ma yin te/ /gnyis ldan rnam grol nyon mongs med/ /don
dam grol ba rab stsol ba'i/ /'pho med de nyid la phyag 'tshal/ /ji ltar de nyid la reg nas/ /bsam pa kun gyis bsam du med/ /gang tshe bsam du med sems pa/ /
de tshe bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/ /sems can ji bzhin bsam med de/ /bsam med ji bzhin rgyal ba'ang de/ /gang phyir bsam bral sangs rgyas kyis/ /bsam
pa 'di ni rab tu bshad/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sems de la/ /bsam pa kun gyi bgrang las 'das/ /sna tshogs rtog pa'i rtog pa med/ /chags med bde ba chen
@#/ /po ste/ /rnam pa thams cad kyi ni mchog /dbang po kun 'das rnam ba med/ /dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid de/ /dngos dang dngos med
rnam par spangs/ /bems po min phyir bdag nyid rig /mi shes rnam par mi mthong ba'o/ /gzugs med gar yang mi gnas pa/ /'gyur ba med cing brtan pa'o/ /
dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la/ /blang dang dor ba gang la zhig /blang bya dang ni dor bya yi/ /chos kun rmi lam ji bzhin no/ /dga' ba yongs su shes pa yis/ /shes
rab pha rol phyin pa mchog /dga' ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa/ /'di ni dngos med byang chub bo/ /gnyis po ro gcig dbyer med pa/ /dga' ba'i bde ba chen po
nyid| |shes rab snying rje'i dbye ba ni/ /sgron me dang ni 'od zer bzhin/ /'di gnyis mi phyed bdag nyid ni/ /ro gcig dngos po'i sems yin no/ /shes
rab thabs ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub byed pa/ /de nyid la ni bla med pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun rnams rab tu zhugs/ /dbyer med
rnam par yang dag rig /gang zhig gnas pa rdo rje sems/ /ji srid rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur/ /bde bas sdom par byas na ni/ /sgrub pos bde
mchog rdzogs par ru/ /de srid de ni myong bar 'gyur/ /mdzes pa'i sgyu ma rnam 'phrul dag la de shes ji bzhin nyid/ /dga' dang skyo ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab
tu spyad/ /'jigs par byed pa'ang med cing bde ba 'byung ba'ang yod ma yin/ /de nyid kyis ni sgrub po de bzhin nyid bdag rjes su 'gro /e ma'o bde chen 'dod pa
yis| |sa gsum po ni gang ba ste/ /e ma'o zhi ba'i bde ba 'bab/ /sna tshogs mngon par byang chub rgyas/ /e ma'o bde ba'i bde chen po/ /e ma'o ji ltar ji ltar bza'//
e ma'o lhan skyes bdag nyid che/ /chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid/ /'gro ba chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong ba dang / /thos pa brag cha dang ni mtshungs par yang dag 'jug /sems
kyang mya ngan smig rgyu lta bur blta bya zhing / /'di ltar bza' dang btung ba nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /dri ni nam mkha'i me tog mtshungs par mnam pa dang / /yid ni nyi ma
zla ba bzhin du khyab par bya/ /yang dag gnas de'ang ri rab dang ni mtshungs pa yin/ /gzhon nu ma yi rmi lam de bzhin dmigs par bya/ /tha snyad dag ni sgyu ma mig
'phrul lta bur bgrod/ /'di dag ji bzhin lhan skyes bde 'byung de bzhin te/ /srid pa rang bzhin bral zhing bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs/ /rtag tu 'char ba bde
@#/ /gshegs lam mchog phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mchod pa thams cad yongs spangs te/ /bla ma mchod pa yang dag brtsam/ /de mnyes pas ni kun
mkhyen pa'i/ /ye shes mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /bla med mdzad pa'i slob dpon ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod na/ /de yi bsod nams ma byas ci/ /dka' thub ma
bstan ci zhig yod/ /'jigs dang sdig pa spangs pa dang / /bde ba dang ni ldan pa nyid/ /dam tshig spyod pa srung byed pa/ /de la rim pa rab bstan bya/ /ha ru ka dpal
mngon brjod rgyud/ /klog gam 'chang ngam bris nas ni/ /dngos grub rdzu 'phrul skal bzang dang / /byang chub sems dpa'ang thob par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo kun dang
mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/ /dpal sdom 'byung ba'i rgyud la ni/ /gang tshe sgom zhing sems byed na/ /longs spyod che zhing bde ba che/ /dbul
ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms par 'gyur/ /mos pa du ma'i sems can la/ /spyod pa sna tshogs ston mdzad de/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis 'dul ba la/ /thabs
gyang yang dag bstan pa yin/ /zab mo'i chos ni bstan pa la/ /gang zhig mos par ma gyur kyang / /smad pa dag tu mi bya ste/ /stong nyid snying rje mi phyed
pa'i| |chos nyid thams cad bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs brten pa'i/ /he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor/ /
sems can mos pas 'jug pa rnams/ /de dag kun la dga' ba ste/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor pa'i/ /he ru ka dpal go 'phang gnas/ /'di ni
rim par phye ba ste so gsum pa'o// //dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud chen po 'bum phrag gsum pa las/ lhan cig skyes ba
'byung ba'i rtogs pa las btus pa rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi gsang ba bklags pas 'grub pa dpal sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs
so|| ||shes rab dman zhing sbyangs pa chung mod kyi/ /rgyud kyi gzhung la dad pa brtan skyes pas/ /rang don tsam du bsgyur pa gang lags pa/ 'phags dang mkhas pa rnams
kyis bzod pa mdzod/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po gzhan la phan pa mtha' yas dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba rgyus ban+de smon lam grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
phab pa'o/ /slar yang yongs su rdzogs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po shrI ba na rat+na'i rgya dpe la gtugs nas lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal gyis kyang zhus so// //
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI DA kA N+Na ba ma hA yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba/
oM/ sangs rgyas dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das gsung gi mnga' bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
dpa' bo chen po'i dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpa' bo'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi b+ha ga rnams su rtsen pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /
der dpa' bo chen po'i dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa/ bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dbang po'i dra ba bdag gis mthong / /'khor ba dang ni nges 'byung gis/ /mya ngan 'das
pa so sor bskyed/ /de yi dbus su sku chen po/ /bdag gi dbang po yis rig go /dpa' bo rang gi rang bzhin ni/ /ye shes rgya mtshor mnyan par gyis/ /rnal 'byor ma
'khor lo dbus su/ /phag mo bdag ni 'dri ba'o/ /dbang po'i dra ba ci ru bshad/ /bdag gis gang du bshad par bya/ /mthong ba dang ni chen po'i sgra/ /bde ba za ba de bzhin
ci| |ting 'dzin ming ci de la ni/ /byung ba nyams par byas pa dang / /'khor ba yang dag byung ba ni/ /gang du thim par 'gyur ba yin/ /bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i ming / /
ji ltar slar yang yongs su bskyed/ /sku brjod pa ni gsung bar mdzod/ /nyid kyi dbang bos rig pa ni/ /bde ba chen por bzhugs gyur ba'i/ /bdag gi bdag pos gsung bar
mdzod/ /dpa' bo'i dbang phyug chen pos bka' stsal pa/ phag mo lha rdzas pad+ma can/ /lha mo rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /sngon du spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /mdor bsdus pa
yis bshad par bya/ /dbang po 'jig rten mchog chos bshad/ /dra pa de la yid rol ba'o/ /bdag gi nga rgyal tsam gyis ni/ /dam tshig mchog gang byung ba'o/ /de phyir ye
shes che mthong ste/ /thabs chen bde la bzhugs pas so/ /gang du dbang po rnams kyis za/ /de yis nga yi ming sngon song / /de tshe ting nge 'dzin tsam du/ /thub pa skyes mchog
rnams kyis gsungs/ /yang dag lhag rtogs ye shes ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi lha dbang pos/ /de rnams su byung ba'i sbyor bas/ /mkha' 'gro mchog mang gis byas so/ /
bde dang mi bde gnyis nyams las/ /slar yang 'dir na byung ba ste/ /sgra yi gzugs las byung zhing thon/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul lo/ /sems gsum rnams kyi
dbye ba yis/ /grub mo khyod kyis shes par gyis/ /'di yis rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom/ /'byung dang 'byung ba'i dus su ni/ /yongs su
@#/ /gsal ba 'od gsal ba'o/ /de phyir 'jig rten 'khor bar byed/ /de ni 'khor bar yongs su brjod/ /'dir ni sgyu ma skyes de bzhin/ /de ni thim pa'i
dngos po'ang med/ /myang 'das gzhan pa'i rdzas yod yin/ /'khor ba yi ni phyi rol son/ /srid pa'i rtse mo gang 'dzin pa/ /de phyir mya ngan 'das par brjod/ /gzugs
ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku/ /de yi gnas la rnam par 'phro/ /bdag chen ye shes gzugs kyi ni/ /dbang pos gsal bar rig pa ste/ /lha dang sbyin byed la sogs pas/ /mi
mthong mkha' la 'gro ba'i gzugs/ /lha khyod kyis ni gsung rnams kyi/ /ye shes chen po'i ros bdag chim/ /de ring bdag la the tshom mchis/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi rang
bzhin ci/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dpa' rnams thams cad rang bzhin te/ /rang bzhin de rnams chos can no/ /'dir ni 'dod pa dus brjod de/ /'dod
pa sems las yongs su byung / /'dod dang sems gnyis dag las ni/ /byung ba gzugs ni gtso bo'o/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /thog ma dbus mthar yang
dag gnas/ /gang zhig mtha' ma rnams kyi sems/ /sems de ro mnyam gyur pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba las/ /mkha' 'gro de ni de phyir byung / /rdo rje mkha'
'gro bdag nyid che/ /sa gsum po ni bsgrub par bya/ /gang tshe sngon du yang dag byung / /'gro ba'i gtso bo tshangs pa'o/ /gnas dang de bzhin ji ltar stong / /mgon po sems can
rnam grol byed/ /de tshe 'jig rten khams gzhan gyis/ /chung ngu 'dir ni bskul ba'o/ /gson gson byang chub spros son pa'i/ /sems can bsgral ba'i sems med pa/ /sgyu
ma'i rang bzhin khyod bzhugs nas/ /khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar mdzod/ /yon tan dag 'di thos nas ni/ /sems can grol byed 'di ltar bsgom/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa kun rnam pa/ /'gro ba'i gtso bo he ru ka /dpal ni sngon du mngon brjod pas/ /rten la sogs pa bskyed pa ste/ /glu dang rol mo dri za dang / /gzhan rnams gang rnams de
rnams dang / /'gro ba'i sde dang las dang ni/ /de yi rgyun las yongs su byung / /de la sogs pa mtha' med dang / /stong phrag sum cu rtsa gsum mo/ /gsang ba mchog gi
dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /de nyid rnam pa bcu drug dang / /skye ba dang ni thim pa'i rgyu/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'i de nyid/ /zla ba'i dbye bas 'gro
ba'o| |dga' ba rtag tu shes byas nas/ /ches gcig zla ba 'phel bas so/ /nag po sogs dang dkar mtha' yang / /thung ngu de bzhin 'dir shes bya/ /'di skad thos pa bdag
@#/ /gi ngag /gsang ba'i 'dod pa thams cad ster/ /de bzhin 'dir bdag the tshom mchis/ /gsang ba la sogs gsung ni ci/ /bdag gi bdag pos
gsung bar mdzod/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed pa/ /lha mo chen mo bdag dga' 'o/ /sems can kun gyi dgos pa'i rgyur/ /mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad bya ste/ /rtse
gcig pa yi sems kyis nyon/ /gsang ba khams thams cad kyi mtha'/ /dbang po'i gnas ni mchog yin la/ /rnam shes phun tshogs de rnams su/ /dgyes pa nam
mkha' las byung ba'o/ /thams cad bdag nyid khams gsum gyi/ /khyab pa'i gzugs su yang dag son/ /rtag bzhugs gnyis su med pa'i chos/ /sgyu ma rmi lam
lta bu mchog /yang na bdag med bcu drug dang / /khyad par du yang snying rje'o/ /de yi rnam par ye shes che/ /de kho na nyid kun tu son/ /'dir ni skye bar go bya ba/ /rnal 'byor
rjes su rnal 'byor ro/ /thim pa sgrub pa gnyis dang ni/ /de bzhin bsnyen pa gnyis kyang ngo / /rnal 'byor thig ler bshad pa ste/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'o/ /
dus kyi phyed dang zla ba yi/ /rdzogs ldan gsum gnyis rtsod dus son/ /'di yi rdo rje'i zhal bzhi po/ /dga' ba brgyad gnyis su 'gyur te/ /cha shas bcu drug rnam
ldan pa'i/ /phyags kyi dbye bas 'gro ba'o/ /thung ngu nyi ma'i rgyu ba yis/ /de bzhin du ni cha shas za/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya/ /gnyis med ye shes bla na med/ /byang chub sems
'od chen por ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po nges par 'gro/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med de/ /dngos rnams nam mkha'i me tog bzhin/ /sad pa na yang nyams pa ste/ /de gnas kun
tu gnas min pa'o/ /rmi lam yul med las byung ba/ /dbang po kun las byung ba med/ /gnyid log pa yi stobs kyis ni/ /sa gsum po ni bza' bar bya/ /gnyid mthug
skyes pa'i dus de ltar/ /sad med gnyid med rmi lam med/ /'das pa'i bde ba'i dus rnams su/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang lhag par gnas/ /mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems
dpa' ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro mchog tu bde/ /las kyi yul ni bsnyen byas na/ /sum cu rtsa gsum du ltung ngo / /ma rig pas bslad nges par ni/ /'gro ba dmyal sogs 'jigs
pa che/ /de'i phyir sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun/ /rdzu 'phrul che 'dir rjes chags bya/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdag po/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi ni ming / /de ni bdag la
sems pas gsungs/ /mkha' 'gro kun la bdag mchog tu/ /gsang ba der ni btud byas nas/ /phag mo lha rdzas rnal 'byor ma/ /gnyis med tshig gis ji ltar zhes/ /de
@#/ /bzhin yang nas yang du dris/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ phra mo'i rnam ba rtsa gsum ste/ /rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rgyu/ /de
phyir phra mor rig bya ste/ /rtsa 'byung ba ni bdag nyid che/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor ma/ /re re la ni de yongs ldan/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun der bshad de/ /gzhan yang de
ltar ngo mtshar che/ /ming mdor bstan pa'i rgya mtsho 'dir/ /de kun ji lta bzhin bshad bya/ /zla ba'o ma snum pa mo/ /'jam ma 'dod ma kun sbyin ma/ /ma dang srid mo bu
mo dang / /sring mo'i bu mo ne ne mo/ /gnyen mo pha yi ma dang ni/ /zhang po yi yang chung ma dang / /pad can dung can sna tshogs ma/ /glang po ma dang myos brlabs ma/ /gzugs ma
sgra ma dri ma dang / /rma reg ma yid ma dang / /chos dbyings ma dang tshogs can ma/ /gnyid ma le lo ma gzhan gnon/ /rlom pa mo dang sgeg mo dang / /bzang zhal ma dang drag mo
ma| |'thung ma za ma 'jigs pa mo/ /ha ha sgrogs ma dur khrod ma/ /bcom ldan dgyes mar rtag tu bshad/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor ma/ /las kyi cho ga blangs pa yis/ /
gzhan gyi ming yang shes par bya/ /gang zhig gang gir mngon brjod pa'i/ /rtsa de 'dir ni brjod pa'o/ /de rnams sems dpa' bde rang bzhin/ /mthar gyur mchog tu
zhi ba'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos po yang / /mchog tu zag med rnal 'byor ldan/ /mdog dang phyag sogs rnam pa ru/ /srid pa'i 'khor lor yang dag byung / /gnas
dang nye ba'i gnas sogs 'dir/ /pu l+li ra sogs dbus su'o/ /gang zhig gang gi lha'i bdag po/ /de ni de dang des rgyas gdab/ /nyid dang bdag tu rtsen gyur pa'i/ /bde ba
kun dang yang dag ldan/ /'di yis rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu de bzhin dang po'i lha/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun bde ster ba'i/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes 'di gsungs so//
nam mkha' thog ma tha ma med/ /gang 'drar mchog tu 'du shes pa/ /de 'drar bdag ni rig pa ste/ /snang med par yang yongs su gsal/ /der ni 'byung ba'ang yod min te/ /
'jig rten pa yi tha snyad mchog /ji ltar mkha' las me byung ba/ /bla med me 'dir de bzhin no/ /ro bro ba ni gcig dngos la/ /de yi nang na dngos mang po/ /gcig dang du ma'i
rang bzhin 'dis/ /thams cad ro ste ro'i khyab bdag /pho nya rnams kyi bdag po yis/ /sa gsum bo ni mchog tu za/ /thabs dang shes rab snying rje che/ /lha yi bdag po gzhan
med do/ /'dod chags ma yin chags bral min/ /dbu ma yang ni mi dmigs so/ /de ltar rtag shes rnal 'byor pas/ /'dod byas sun la longs spyad bya/ /rtag tu nang du gyur
@#/ /byas nas/ /kha dog rnams ni zhal las byung / /rtag tu lus kyi sbyin pa ste/ /sems las byung ba spang bar bya/ /de ltar 'dod chags sgyu mtha' la/ /
rol pa mchog gi go 'phang ngo / /'dod chags bral ba dga' ba gsum/ /spangs pa dbu ma zag pa med/ /bzung bar bya ba min pa ste/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin 'dod chags min//
bral ba'i dga' ba nyams pa ste/ /de la'ang dga' bar mi bya'o/ /de gnyis dbus na gnas pa yi/ /chos de la yang dga' dmigs med/ /dbye ba med pa yi ni chos/ /rdo rje
la ni dga' bar bgyis/ /lha yi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor bdag /skad cig mngon sum byed pa'o/ /lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor gyis/ /rnam par byas pa'i dbyibs su
'gyur/ /stong nyid rang bzhin gzugs rnal 'byor/ /rang byin brlab pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /bdag byin brlab dang bral rnal 'byor/ /spun skogs dum bu bzhin shes bya/ /'di
'dra'i mtshan nyid mchog gyur pa/ /skye bo phyugs rnams kyis mi shes/ /de phyir sgyu 'phrul 'di bsgoms na/ /byang chub bla na med pa 'thob/ /skye ba 'di la glen pa nyid/ /shes
rab snyan dngags skyes bur 'gyur/ /'di 'dra'i yon tan tshogs ldan pas/ /rmi lam dang ni mnyam par ltos/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud/ /'gro ste de phyir 'jig
rten pa'o/ /mngon sum rang nyid sngags kyi sku/ /'khor lo gsum rnams nyis 'gyur ro/ /gcig la 'khor lo gsum bshad de/ /gnyis pa nyis 'gyur du ni 'dod/ /'khor lo
gsum po thabs shes rab/ /snyoms par 'jug par 'chad pa'o/ /de ni nyis 'gyur zhes bya ste/ /'khor lo nyis 'gyur des bshad do/ /khams gsum gyi ni gnas chen po/ /
dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bsgom pa'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' dbang che/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes 'di
gsungs so/ /chos dang chos min gang du nub/ /byang chub der ni sems gzung gis/ /grub pa lha dang lha ma yin/ /dbang po dang ni yul dang ni/ /khams dang skye mched thams
cad ni/ /skye ba dang ni 'gag pa ste/ /rmongs pa 'ching zhing mkhas pa ni/ /yongs su shes pas grol ba'o/ /sems 'di rang nyid mngon sum du/ /khams gsum du ni rnam
bar gnas/ /bdag dang mchog khyod gnyis med las/ /tshogs pa'i gtso bo byung ba'o/ /spyod lam la sogs bye brag chos/ /mdo sde rnam shes dbu ma pa/ /mos pa'i sems
can rnams bshad de/ /bden pa ma yin rdzun pa min/ /phyag ni bcu gnyis dang ldan te/ /de bzhin zhal ni bzhi pa'o/ /kha dog nam mkha' sngon po la/ /spyan gsum brkyang bskum
@#/ /ldan pa ste/ /'phrog byed dkar mo mnyam par mnan/ /gzhan ni 'bum tsho stong phrag go /gang dang gang gi rgyud kyi ni/ /phyi dang gsang ba nang bdag
nyid| |de dang de yi gzugs nges par/ /lha ni he ru ka'i bdag nyid/ /rgyud dang rgyud kyi nang mchog tu/ /dbye ba mos ba'i dbang gis te/ /ming ni de 'drar shes par bya/ /'od
kyang he ru ka bsres pa'o/ /kha dog de dang 'drar shes bya/ /bzhugs tshul he ru ka'i rnam pa/ /sa ni bcu gnyis rnams kyi rgyu/ /de yi he ru ka dang 'dra/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin
gshegs/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor
ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa ste 'di ni le'u dang po'o// //phag mo lha rdzas rnal 'byor mas/ /slar yang rdo rje mchod
byas te/ /bcom ldan bdag pos bstan par mdzod/ /phag mo ci yis yongs su byung / /skyed pa gang gis bskyed pa yin/ /rang bzhin ji ltar du ni 'dod/ /bdag byung
ba yi rgyu mtshan ci/ /'dir ni dgos pa ji ltar yin/ /dbang po dang ni yul thams cad/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du rab zhugs/ /spyi bo'i rdo rje gur du ni/ /steng du kha bltas
rlung 'bab bo/ /'dod chags nyi ma'i dbus su ni/ /skad cig gis ni sprul thim gyur/ /der skyes pa yi phag mo ni/ /b+ha ga ling ga yid las byung / /bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin
khams/ /de rnams las ni sngon du skyes/ /rang bzhin bdag med gcig pu ste/ /mkha' mnyam rnal 'byor gzugs can no/ /rgyu mtshan skye ba dgrol ba dang / /snying rje'i
gzugs rang bzhin du byung / /'dir ni dgos pa gnyis rig ste/ /phyag rgya sbyor ba rab bsgrub pa'o/ /khyod ni lha mo'i bdag po ste/ /kun tu spyod pa mang spyod pa'o/ /sngags
kyi phreng ba brje byas nas/ /a yig la sogs de'i khyab bdag /yang na phag mo'i rtsa ba dang / /go cha'i sngags rnams kyis ldan te/ /yi ge re re'i sngags kyi ni/ /spyod pa sdom
bar son pa'o/ /rnal 'byor ma mchog skye ba ni/ /rtsa yi mchog gi grong du ste/ /stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi/ /dbus ma a ba d+hU ti'o/ /dbu ma 'di ltar thams cad kyi/ /
khyab byed du ni rnam par gnas/ /de phyir phag mo gtso mo yin/ /go 'phang mchog bzhin shes par bya/ /rdo rje la sogs ming thog mar/ /a rdo rje dang ka rdo rje/ /sngags mthar de
la sogs pa ste/ /yang na so so tha dad du'o/ /gang gis dus su sngags zlos pa/ /de dus rnams su rnal 'byor ldan/ /lte ba'i spyi bo snying gyen du/ /'di ltar 'gro dang 'ong ba med/ /
@#/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma gtso mo/ /de ni bdag nyid rnam par 'phro/ /rang gi 'khor ldan rnal 'byor ma/ /zhing dang zhing rnams su ni 'gro /lha mo khyod ni
bdag po ste/ /nga dang lhan cig kha sbyor ro/ /dus dang dus ni ma yin par/ /nam mkha'i bu ga'i nang 'dug nas/ /de bzhin skye gnas lam 'thon nas/ /'chi ba med pa'i
sa bon 'dzag /der ni 'pho med ye shes bya/ /hig phyed yi ges bsgom bya ste/ /mi mo skyes bu'i dus su yang / /mchog tu zag med mngon par bya/ /de byung ba yi rig ma
che| |sgom pa'i bdag nyid kyis bri'o/ /thog mar rnam snang mgon po ste/ /ri mo sum skor lte 'og gnas/ /langs nas mgrin pa'i bar du 'gro /sa gsum sgron ma lta
bur son/ /gzhan pa'i sngags ni sa mtha' 'dra/ /de las zla 'bab g.yon nas so/ /sngags 'di thig les brgyan pa ste/ /sngags ni rnal 'byor ma bskyed pa'o/ /slar yang
sa bon gnyis pa brjod/ /g.yas pa nyi ma bskyed pa ste/ /logs su gnyis phye mgor thig le/ /ya sde'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/ /byang chub sems chen 'bab lam mo/ /'di
ni phag mo'i sa bon yin/ /a yi yi ges mthar brgyan pa/ /bcu drug zla phyed nyi mas brgyan/ /ya sde'i dang bo'i sa bon ni/ /sbyor bas sa gsum rlung yon tan/ /dbyangs
kyi bcu gsum pas rgyas gdab/ /dkar po'i phyogs kyis mgo bor brgyan/ /thig le dang ni bcas pa 'bar/ /dga' ba bzhi bo dag pa'o/ /pa sde'i mtha' ma bde ba'i gzugs//
o yi yi ge zhon ldan pa/ /mgo bor zla phyed nyi mas mnan/ /sa yi pha rol gzhom med ma/ /nyi ma yi ni gdan la gnas/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pa rna drung bzung / /mgo bor zla
phyed thig les brgyan/ /'dod chags mtha' yi rang bzhin no/ /ye shes sa bon nyis 'gyur dbye/ /spro ba dang ni bsdu bas skyes/ /'og dang steng du gnas pa yi/ /mgon
po longs spyod rdzogs 'dzin pa/ /snying ga dang ni chu skyes su/ /don gyi cho ga yongs rdzogs pa'o/ /yongs su skrag byed ma sa bon/ /pa mtha'i yi ge gzung nas ni/ /slar
yang de bzhin brjod par bya/ /dbu rgyan 'bar ba 'dzin grong gi /bu gar gtum mo sbor ba'o/ /byang chub sems kyis sa gsum 'gengs/ /de ltar bshad pa'i sngags
gang ni/ /rim pas yi ge rnams mi mthun/ /rnal 'byor ma yi ming ldan par/ /las dus de ltar rtogs par bya/ /re re'i che ba'i bdag nyid ni/ /yi ge yi ni grangs kyis
so| |bdag nyid chen po rnam par 'phro/ /byang chub cha shas cha rgyu'o/ /thog mar rnam snang phyag 'tshal ba/ /chos kyi dbyings ni bya ba'i gzugs/ /ta sde'i lnga pa'i yi ge ni/ /
@#/ /lnga pa yi ni sde tshan no/ /rnal 'byor ma gzugs nam mkhar rten/ /pa mtha'i sa bon o dbyangs ldan/ /gti mug 'joms par byed ma ste/ /rnal 'byor
ma'i tshogs spro ba'o/ /de yi bzhi pa'i sa bon ni/ /sa gsum du ni khyab pa yi/ /rnal 'byor ma ni spro ba'o/ /thog ma'i sde yi gsum pa ste/ /'gro ba drug po nyams byed pa'i/ /
mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro/ /ya sde'i mtha' ma'i sa bon ni/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin no/ /lnga pa'i sde yi thog ma ste/ /de bzhin nyid kyi sa bon te/ /i yi dbyangs
kyis mgo la reg /chu yi yi ge yongs bsags pa/ /thams cad byed pa'i rang bzhin no/ /tsa sde'i dbus gnas bzung nas ni/ /nyi ma yi ni gdan ldan pa/ /las kyi dus
su khyad par ldan/ /phag mo yi ni sa bon ni/ /a yi yi ge rna bar reg /sa gsum ye shes rang bzhin mnyam/ /me yi sa bon dbyangs gnyis ldan/ /'khor ba'i las
kyi rang bzhin no/ /sa mtha'i mgo la a dbyangs reg /rtag tu tshangs pa'i rang bzhin blta/ /dbyangs kyi gnyis pa bzung nas ni/ /de ltar mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs//
sems can sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /ya yig gnas par dang ldan/ /slar yang i yi dbyangs sbyar ro/ /khams gsum rnal 'byor ma spro'o/ /drug pa'i sde yi dang po ni/ /
rnal 'byor ma sngags kun rang bzhin/ /ra gnas pa ni a dbyangs ldan/ /ldang ba'i sems can gsod byed 'gyur/ /dza yi yi ge yongs bzung ste/ /i yig dbyangs dang yang
dag ldan/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin yongs ldan pa'o/ /so yis bon rna ba la/ /e yi dbyangs kyis reg pas dbye/ /klu yi sngags ni sbyar bya ste/ /tre yi yi ge sa gsum kun/ /ye shes
kyi ni khyad par sngags/ /la yi yi ge o dang ldan/ /'jig rten rnams kyi rten yin te/ /byang chub byed pa'i chos yin no/ /thog ma'i ka ni ya stan ldan/ /'chi dang lhan skyes dbye
ba med/ /ba yi sde yi mtha' ma la/ /a yi yi ge'i dbyangs sbyar bya/ /sa gsum gyi ni ma rang bzhin/ /ta yig e yi yi ges brgyan/ /bde ba 'dzin par byed pa'o/ /slar yang pa
sde'i mtha' ma ste/ /chad med pa yi lhan skyes kyi/ /dbus na bzhugs pa'i rang bzhin no/ /sa yi mtha' ma A dang ldan/ /rdor sems ye shes gzhom med pa'o/ /ya sde'i mtha'
ma i dbyangs ldan/ /mi shes rang bzhin 'joms byed pa'o/ /t+ye sngags chos dbyings rang bzhin te/ /thams cad rang bzhin du khyab pa'o/ /bu ga rnams nas 'dzag
pas/ /'bab pa'i sa bon nyi ma ldan/ /chu srin dbang po yi ni sngags/ /pa sde'i bzhi pa'i sa bon ni/ /U dbyangs stan dang ldan pa ste/ /'khor ba'i 'jigs pa nyams byed
@#/ /pa| |ta yi sngags kyis dgra nyams byed/ /slar yang pa sde'i bzhi pa ni/ /sgra chen po ni sgrogs pa'o/ /rlung gi sa bon A yig reg /sngags ni nor
bur 'bab bzhin pa'o/ /chu yi sa bon rnar bzung ba/ /sgyu ma yi ni rang bzhin no/ /sa yi pha rol e yig ldan/ /sa gsum gyi ni 'khrul 'joms rgyu/ /pa sde'i mtha' ma
rkang rang bzhin/ /sa yi pha rol A dang ldan/ /ngo mtshar che ba yi ni chos/ /ya yi sde yi mtha' ma ni/ /pad+ma'i sa bon mchog yig go /tsa yi dbus ma'i sa bon ni/ /ra ni
mgo la gnas pa ste/ /e yig gis ni phye ba ni/ /lha dang lha min rang bzhin no/ /de ltar sngags tshig drug po ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs spro ba/ /las kun rang
bzhin 'khor lo'o/ /snying rje'i 'dod par gyur pa yi/ /de kho na nyid tshig rgya che/ /rnal 'byor thams cad rab 'gengs pa'i/ /bcom ldan mkha' 'gros 'di gsungs
so| |'khrul 'khor 'khor lo bshad bya ste/ /khyod kyi 'khrul 'khor chung rgya che/ /kun nas yongs su zlum por ni/ /ri mo bcu gsum bri bar bya/ /lha mo dum bu bcu gnyis
'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs kyis brgyan/ /rtsibs re re la'ang yi ge ni/ /rim pas yongs su gsal bar sbyin/ /lhag ma nyi shu bzhi yi ge /thams cad lte ba'i snying po
la'o| |de rnams kyis ni bskyed pa'i rtsa/ /stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so/ /so so re re yi ni 'khor/ /nor dang mda' dang zla ba'o/ /kun la lhag pas dman pa ni/ /nor dang rig
byed tshogs pa'o/ /der gnas pa la 'khrul 'khor btu/ /las gcig ji ltar mos pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i gzhon pa ni/ /rtsa thams cad du 'char dus su/ /der ni dbang
po dang ni yul/ /las kyi dus su gsad par bya/ /yid ces bya ba bskrad bya zhing / /sems ni dbang du bya ba ste/ /khams dang skye mched gzhan de bzhin/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas
par bya/ /phung po kun dang de bzhin srog /dgug pa dang ni sdang ba'o/ /lus dang ngag dang da bzhin sems/ /de rnams rengs par bya ba'o/ /las gzhan ji ltar rig pa
yis| |brgyad kyis lhag pa'i brgya yang ngo / /yang na sa bon ci 'dra ba/ /de yi tshad dang mnyam las so/ /de dus bdag nyid che ba yis/ /yi ges bskyed dang 'joms pa'o/ /
bag mo rdo rje gtso ma yi/ /'khrul 'khor gnyis pa bshad bya ste/ /ya sde'i mtha' yis bon ni/ /byang chub sa bon rang bzhin no/ /lce gnyis yi ge ra yig ldan/ /rnal 'byor
ma sngags A yig dgang / /sa gnas pa ni mi g.yo ba'o/ /na yi yi ge e dang ldan/ /sems can kun sprul rgyu mtshan no/ /thog gnas dbyangs ni thog ma'i mgon/ /lce gnyis
@#/ /e dbyangs mgo la reg /sa gsum khams kyi rang bzhin no/ /ta yi yi ge e dang ldan/ /lnga pa yi ni thog ma ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rang bzhin no//
ya ste gzhir gnas pa'i sa bon/ /kun gyi gtso mo'i rang bzhin no/ /brgyad pa'i sde yi thog sa bon/ /stong pa yis ni brgyan pa ste/ /khu ba'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid/ /gnyis par
gnas pa'i thog ma ni/ /keng rus thig le 'dzin pa'o/ /ya sde gnyis pa'i sa bon ni/ /i yi dbyangs dang ldan pa ste/ /rdo rje snying nas mgon po'o/ /ta mtha' e yi yi ges
brgyan| |skye gnas la ni spros pa'o/ /ta yig nyi ma dang ldan pa/ /rims 'joms pa yi rgyal po'o/ /b+ha ni nyi ldan a yig brgyan/ /lte ba'i thab tu gnas pa'o/ /pa sde'i
mtha' ma gnas rang bzhin/ /Ta mtha' i yis brgyan pa ni/ /'gugs pa yi ni rang bzhin no/ /bi sho Sha Shi sngags bzhi ste/ /dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin gyis/ /gter chen
po yi sa bon no/ /ra yig o yi yi ges brgyan/ /rtsa drag po yi rang bzhin no/ /sha yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni/ /snying po yi ni gzugs su'o/ /Ni yig rang bzhin gyis bzung
ba| |rnal 'byor ma yi de nyid do/ /ka yig ra yig o yig ldan/ /dbu ma rkyang ma ro rang bzhin/ /ta pa'i bar gnas gzung bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyi ni/ /rkang pa
brgyad pa bsgrub rang bzhin/ /ta sde'i mtha' ma i yig brgyan/ /thod pa'i dbus kyi rtsa rang bzhin/ /ka ru mngon brjod gzung bar bya/ /de yis las rnams zad par byed/ /ra yig
a yi yi ges gzung / /mgo bo'i dbus nas sgra chen 'dzag /sa yi sa bon i yig ldan/ /gru gsum gyi ni dbus su'o/ /ta yi mtha' ma is brgyan pa/ /sprul pa'i steng dang 'og
tu'o| |ta yig ra yig A yig sbyar/ /chos kyi dbyings ni gru gsum ste/ /de phyir sa gsum skyed pa'o/ /sa zung dbus ma bcas sa bon/ /na yig i dang ldan rang bzhin/ /
pa sde'i mtha' ma a yis brgyan/ /sgyu ma'i ngo bo pad+ma'i rtsa/ /ra gang gnas pa rna rang bzhin/ /Ta sde'i mtha' ma i dang ldan/ /ma lus dbyer med sems can gyi/ /khams 'dzin
pa yi mgon po'o/ /de ltar sngags tshig bcu brjod de/ /dus bzhi yi ni tshang can no/ /rnal 'byor ma kun las kyi ni/ /'khor los bsgyur ba longs spyod pa/ /dus kyi gzugs
kyi rang bzhin can/ /bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro ma gnas 'du ba ni/ /'khor lo 'khor lor shes pa'o/ /nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug gi /ye shes las
ni de bzhin byed/ /yon por smra ba rnams kyi ni/ /de'i rdul grangs las skyes par 'dod/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i ming bzung nas/ /phyi nas blo ldan gyis sngags sbyor/ /sngon
@#/ /du pa la ra ston no/ /thog ma yi ni chos gzugs so/ /de yi bzhi par gnas pa la/ /e yi yi ges rnar brgyan pa/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi
sngags so/ /ta sde'i dbus nas ci 'dod ster/ /na yig i yi yi ge ldan/ /sna tshogs sprul pa byed pa'o/ /pa yig spros pa dang bcas pa'o/ /ra yi yi ge a dang ldan/ /
rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor los bsgyur/ /tsa sde'i dbus gnas sa bon gzung / /gang la de lta'i rang bzhin no/ /rlung bsags pa ni e yig ldan/ /a haM yi ge'i rang
bzhin no/ /ya yi sde yi mtha' ma la/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pas mgo la brgyan/ /sna tshogs ye shes sdags rang bzhin/ /dza yi sa bon mtha' med par/ /'bar bar
'gyur ba yi ni gzugs/ /yi ge ya ni e yig ldan/ /theg pa kun gyi lta ba'i gzugs/ /tsa sde'i gsum pa'i sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs zhes bya/ /pa
mtha' de yi bzhi pa la'o/ /sngags thams cad kyi bla ma'o/ /ta sde'i mtha' ma dbyangs gsum ldan/ /ma lus sems can 'bod pa'i gzugs/ /dro ba'i gsum pa ta
stan can/ /'gro dang mi 'gro bcas 'gro sgrol/ /de bzhin m+b+ha'i yi ge bzung / /sa ni bcu bzhi pa'i gzugs so/ /ni sngags rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /brda yis su
ni 'jug pa'o/ /pa sde'i mtha' ma o yig reg/ /sna tshogs mi shes 'dzin pa'o/ /sa mthar rdor sems rang bzhin no/ /ni yi yi ge chos dang ni/ /chos min sun 'byin pa yin no/ /
ya yi sde yi mtha' ma ni/ /rnal 'byor ma ste nam mkha'i gzugs/ /dza yig ra yig stan can ni/ /khu ba'i rang bzhin shar ba'o/ /slar yang rlung gi mtha' ma ni/ /a yi yi ges gzi bskyed
pa| |tshangs pa pad+ma yi ni gzugs/ /ra yig a yi yi ge ldan/ /'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin no/ /sa mtha' dbyangs gsum mgo la gnas/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams 'bab
pa'i gzugs/ /ma ni dbus ma de nyid gzugs/ /sa mtha' a yis bkang ba ste/ /rnal 'byor ma gzugs kyi khar brjod/ /ya yig o yi cod pan gnas/ /lhan cig skyes
pa'i rang bzhin no/ /ka sde'i dbus gnas dbyangs gsum brgyan/ /de nyid med pa'i rang bzhin no/ /ni yi yi ge rang bzhin med/ /gnyis pa yi ni thog ma la/ /a yi yi ge gsal
bar byed/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no/ /pa sde'i mtha' ma e dang ldan/ /thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no/ /pa yi sa bon mthar sha ste/ /ya sde'i mtha' yig stan can ni/ /
khu ba dang ni rlung dbyer med/ /i dbyangs mgor brgyan me sa bon/ /grub pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no/ /ka yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni/ /nam mkha' rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs/ /sa bon
@#/ /de yi mtha'i yi ge /e yi yi ges rnar brgyan pa/ /dpa'o gcig pu mi bskyod pa'o/ /de ltar 'khor lo mkha' rang bzhin/ /de ltar rkang pa
dgu po ni/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs yi ge ste/ /khams gsum gyi ni sngags rang bzhin/ /sngags kun spyod pa'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la bzhugs nas/ /
dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'i/ /bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsungs so/ /'khor lo gsum pa'i nus pa yis/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bya'o/ /rnal 'byor rnams
kyi las dus su/ /sgyu mas thams cad rmongs par bya/ /rdo rje ma bdag slar langs nas/ /'khor lo gzhan gyi rnal 'byor ldan/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur gtso bo la/ /bdag
med ma yis dam 'khyung do/ /ta yi sngags kyis gnyis pa sbyor/ /d+ya gnas me dang rlung sa bon/ /bde ba chen po'i 'dod chags che/ /de yi gnyis pa sa bon ni/ /A yi yi
ges dbang ba'o/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi rang bzhin/ /pa yig ra yig o yig sbyar/ /gsum po rlung gi rang bzhin no/ /ta yi yi ge AM yig ldan/ /slar yang rnam
shes sa bon no/ /ka yi sde yi dbus gnas pa/ /e yi yi ges rnam par brgyan/ /rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgya rang bzhin/ /slar la yang ni brjod par bya'o/ /tshig 'di
thabs shes dbyer med dngos/ /sa mtha' dang ni na yi sngags/ /slar la yang ni brjod par bya/ /skyed cing sdud par byed gzugs so/ /pa ra a yig sa bon gcig /don dam pa yi
yi ge'o/ /Ta mtha' A yi yi ge ldan/ /gzhom du med las skyes pa'o/ /ta'i mtha' ma kun 'joms pa'o/ /ka ka dang ni Ni gnas la/ /dbyangs gsum sbyar zhing thig le
sbyin| |rnal 'byor ma kun 'bod pa'o/ /de bzhin du ni kha kha dang / /gsum pa Na ru gnas pa'o/ /dub pa sel bar byed pa'i rgyu/ /d+hu na yi ni sngags kyi tshig /lan gnyis
su ni brjod par bya/ /rtog pa thams cad 'joms par byed/ /ya sde'i mtha' ma yi ni sngags/ /rdo rje bu gar brgyan pa'o/ /ca sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni/ /ra yi stan la
yongs su gnas/ /gti mug za par byed pa'o/ /sa mtha' gzhom med dbus ma'o/ /sha sde'i gsum ba ha stan can/ /e yi yi ge rna bar brgyan/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro
ma yi gzugs/ /'bod par byed pa yi ni sngags/ /sho Sha ya yi sngags kyi tshig /lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya/ /ye shes can rlom nga rgyal 'joms/ /byang chub byang chub
med de nyid/ /de ltar rkang pa bcu gnyis ni/ /sa dang rnal 'byor las rang bzhin/ /bcu gnyis pa rnams khyab bdag gi /bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsungs so/ /yi ge rnams
@#/ /kyi gnas sogs kyi/ /brda yis de nyid pha rol 'gro/ /bdag las sems can thams cad skyes/ /sems can las kyang bdag byung ngo / /bdag de
rtag tu med gyur nas/ /sgyu ma rmi lam de bzhin gshegs/ /'khrul 'khor 'di ni stobs che ste/ /las rnams ji lta bar ni byung / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid du/ /dus
'dir thams cad 'gyur ba'o/ /'khor lo lnga pa 'di rnams su/ /mya ngan 'das pa'ang brjod par bya/ /lha sogs thams cad rgyun du gsod/ /de rnams thams cad rtag tu
'grol/ /bka' stsal pa/ ka yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs de nyid do/ /Ta bzung pa mtha'i stan can te/ /aM gis cod pan brgyan par bya/ /de la a
yi yi ges dgang / /'gro ba drug gi rang bzhin no/ /ka sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni/ /dug gis reg pa 'phrog par byed/ /ka yi sa bon stong rang bzhin/ /na yi mtha' ma
a yig ldan/ /me 'bar ba yi dbang ldan te/ /'dzin pa yi ni sa bon ni/ /bskyod pa'i khyab bdag chen po'o/ /ta yi sde yi bzhi pa ni/ /a yi dbyangs kyis brgyan pa'o//
srid pa dang bral ba yi gzugs/ /nyi ma e yig ldan ro langs/ /ta mtha'i sa bon gzung bar bya/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pas mgo la brgyan/ /sa gsum thams cad
gsod pa'o/ /pa sde mtha' yi sa bon ni/ /yid kyi sma ba rtog med byed/ /sa mtha'i A yi dag ldan pa/ /thar ba'i bshes ni rtog pa'o/ /ma gnyis ha gnyis brjod par bya/ /
rmongs pa'i rang bzhin 'phrog cing 'phrog /pa yi sa bon i yig brgyan/ /pha nags kun nyams gzung de nyid/ /sha yi yi ges i dang ldan/ /seng ge za ba yi ni sngags/ /ta'i sngags
slar yang 'chi med skye/ /pa mtha' i yi yi ges dgang / /thig le cod pan la reg pa'o/ /rgya la 'chi ba rtogs pa yin/ /sa yig dbyangs gnyis brjod phyir brgyan/ /sngon du
'phrog par byed pa'o/ /sha gnas sa bon dur khrod de/ /ta mtha' i dang ldan pa ni/ /thams cad rang bzhin med pa'o/ /pa sde'i mtha' ma i dbyangs ldan/ /sdang ba'i yin
ni 'dzin chen po/ /na yig u stan rtog kun sel/ /sha sde'i gnyis pa'i sa bon ni/ /A yig mgor reg thig le gnas/ /byang chub sgrub pa yi ni sngags/ /thur du sel ba'i rlung
gis so/ /ta dang ra yi yi ge gnyis/ /sa ni 'jigs par byed sngags so/ /pa ra a yi sa bon gcig /sum cu rtsa gsum skyo dub 'joms/ /ya sde'i mtha' ma ri mnan pa//
ye shes kyi ni dag byed do/ /Na yi 'gram gnas sa bon ni/ /e yi rna bar brgyan pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yi mi shes 'joms/ /sa yig e yi yi ge sa dgang / /dbugs 'chang
@#/ /pa ni nyams par byed/ /na sngags dbyangs gsum mgo la brgyan/ /chos dang chos min spong rang bzhin/ /d+ha yig ya dang sbyar ba ste/ /bsam gtan
sngags kyi rang bzhin no/ /ta sde'i mtha' ma gzung bya ste/ /grong khyer ltar snang dngos po med/ /ya sde'i gnyis pa'i sa bon ni/ /gti mug rang bzhin 'bar ba'o/ /sa yig
i yi yi ges dbye/ /seng ge ma he 'joms pa'o/ /nyi mar yang ni gnas pa ni/ /rnal 'byor ma kun rgyal po'o/ /pa sde'i mtha' ma A dbyangs brgyan/ /sgyu mar sems
can kun des 'dzin/ /'dzin pa'i sa bon a yig brgyan/ /de kho na yi ye shes thob/ /de ltar rkang pa bcu bzhi bo/ /sems can kun gyi mi shes gsod/ /dam pa'i sngags
dngos gzugs bdag nyid/ /'byin cing sdud par byed pa po/ /'byung po thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /bcom ldan lha yi 'di gsungs so/ /'khor lo rnam pa'i gzugs
bdag nyid/ /phag mo'i thugs kar brgyan pa ste/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med par/ /gsod pa dang ni mi gsod pa'o/ /ka sde'i dbus na ra stan can/ /gsum de'i
mgo la thig le sbyin/ /theg pa mchog gi chos can no/ /te sde'i gnyis ba'i yi ge ni/ /i yi dbyangs dang ldan pa'o/ /mu stegs rnal 'byor nyams byed pa'o/ /ta yig
rtogs par byed pa'o/ /ta sde'i gzhir gnas A dang ldan/ /byang chub mtha' med 'dzin pa'o/ /ra gnas ba la dbyangs gsum brgyan/ /rnal 'byor ma kun 'chad pa'o/ /na sngags
i yig gis brgyan pa'o/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi lam mo/ /sum b+ha na yi tshig rkang ste/ /lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya/ /tshig drug rtogs pa'i de nyid do/ /de bzhin du ni sum+b+ha'i
sngags/ /rnal 'byor ma yi mchod rang bzhin/ /ha na'i sngags ni lan gnyis brjod/ /sdang ba'i theg pa nyams par byed/ /pa ra a yi yi ge gcig /dbang po rang rang
ngo bo gzhan/ /Na a aM gi yi ges dgang / /sa bon 'di ni yon tan sngags/ /sa yig rtsa kun 'dzag pa'o/ /ba yig ra yi yig brgyan ri/ /ba gnas nam mkha' la 'jug pa'o/
sa yi yig gnas kun gyi gzugs/ /ya sde'i mtha' ma A yis dgang / /rlung ni srog gi ye shes so/ /na yig A yi yi ges dgang / /byang chub gang du 'ang mi rtog pa'o/ /thig le mgo
la blta bar bya/ /pa sde'i mtha' ma sbrang chen gzugs/ /sa mtha' A yis dgang bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yis tshogs srog go /pa mtha' a dang ldan pa la/ /aM gi chod pan la
brgyan pa'o/ /chos kun gyi ni sprin rang bzhin/ /sa yig dam chos mi shes gsod/ /ts+tshe sngags byang chub sems dpa'o/ /song ba 'khor bar skye ba med/ /ta sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni/ /
@#/ /nga ni don med pa snang ba'o/ /na la i dang ldan pa ste/ /'jig rten ma lus 'ching ba nyid/ /kro sngags gnon pas 'khor ba gcod/ /d+ha yi sa bon 'gro kun
'joms/ /spros pa med par byed pa'o/ /mU yi yi ge sa bon ni/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten kun gyi las/ /de ltar phyed bcas tshig bcu bzhi/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo yi ni mtha'o/ /bum pa
can la sogs pa'i las/ /rnal 'byor gang dang gang 'dod byed/ /'khor lo drug gi rab sbyor bas/ /ci 'dod las kyi rang bzhin te/ /bdag po sbyor ba 'grub nus can/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /gtsug tor la sogs skye gnas mthar/ /lus ngag sems shes nam mkha' las/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis/ /de nyid
byang chub rnams shes bya/ /'dir ni thabs kyi cha dang ni/ /shes rab kyi yang cha ru brjod/ /yang na yi ge re re yi/ /bar bar du ste slar yang ni/ d+hi sngags lhan skyes rang bzhin
te| |'khor lo yi ni khyad par gyi/ /nye ba'i las rnams byed pa'o/ /daMSh+T+rA ka rA li yi sngags/ /'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin no/ /ma sngags hA sngags mu dra'i sngags/ /rna ba yi
ni rang bzhin no/ /shrI he ru ka de ba s+yA gra ma hi Shi'i/ /sngags tshig sna yi rang bzhin no/ /sa ha sra shi re yi sngags/ /dbyangs kyi bdag po yi ni gzugs/ /sa ha sra bA ha be yi/ /
sngags kyi yi ge lus kyi gzugs/ /sha ta sa'i sngags 'khor lo gcig /mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags 'chi ba dang / /skye ba yi ni rang bzhin no/ /gnyis med rnam pa'i chos las ni/ /
gnyis su sems can 'dzin pa ste/ /shes rab la ni bde ster ba/ /bcom ldan bla mas 'di gsungs so/ /nyan thos la sogs mu stegs rnams/ /mi shes pa yi phyugs thams cad//
de rnams ye shes 'thob bya'i phyir/ /tshul lugs 'di ni bstan pa'o/ /ha srA na ne yi ni sngags/ /yul gyi gzugs la reg pa'o/ /dz+wa li ta te dza se'i sngags/ /sngags kyi tshig ni
yid kyi yul/ /dz+wa la mu khi'i tshig lus yul/ /ping ga lo tsa na yi sngags/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /badzra sha rI re'i sngags tshig /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /badzrA sa ne yi ni
sngags/ /sna yi yul la reg pa'o/ /mi li te yi sngags kyi tshig /sna yi rnam par shes pa'o/ /tsi li te yi sngags kyi tshig/ /dbyangs kyi bdag po yi ni yul/ /he sngags gnyis brjod sgra
yi yul/ /sgra dang dbyangs gnyis kyi rnam shes/ /de ltar sngags tshig phyed bcas bdun/ /'chi dang skye ba kun gyi gzugs/ /phag mo la ni bde dga' ba'i/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di
gsung ste/ /bo la ka ko sbyor bdag nyid/ /yul dang dbang po sogs gsod pa'o/ /sems can gang dang gang rnams kyi/ /yul gyi chu skyes las skyes te/ /sems can de dang de rnams kyi/ /
@#/ /rang rang las rnams kyis gsod pa'o/ /yul la sogs pa 'joms pas na/ /shes rab 'khor lor de bshad do/ /rgyu dang rgyud rnams kyi ni
las| |sgrub pa'i snying po'i ye shes so/ /sa mtha' drug pa'i dbyangs stan can/ /zla du ma thig les mgo la brgyan/ /lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i
gzugs/ /kha gnyis d+hu gnyis mu ru gnyis/ /las rnams kyi ni dngos po ste/ /srog dang mnyam du gnas pa'o/ /a de te ma hA yo gi nA/ /pa thi ta sid+d+hi'i sngags kyi tshig /de
yang lus mtha' yi ni gzugs/ /dre d+haM tshig gnyis gram tshig gnyis/ /he yi tshig gnyis ha tshig gnyis/ /khro bcu'i yi ge gshin rje ni/ /mthar byed la sogs kyi gor bya/ /
pa sde'i bzhi pa'i sa bon la/ /pa'i yig mgo la reg pa'o/ /me sa'i sngags ni tshig kun te/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rang bzhin no/ /de ltar sngags tshig bcu gnyis ni/ /rten
'brel bcu gnyis slu ba ste/ /ston pa dam tshig chen po gtso/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di gsungs so/ /rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis kyi/ /las kyi lhan cig rmugs
byed pa'o/ /pho nya rnams bskyed pa'i yi ge/ /'khor lo'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin can/ /'khor lo yi ge min de ltar/ /pho nya'i rang bzhin med pa'o/ /rnam smin de las rnam skyes
pa| |so so'i ming du 'du shes te/ /'jam rdor la sogs dngos po yis/ /a ba d+hu tI'i mtshan nyid bya/ /hAs hA dpa' bo gcig sngags tshig /de bzhin gshegs drug sa bon te//
yon tan mtha' med 'chad pa'o/ /hA yi sa bon yi ge bzhi/ /ho gcig ho gnyis brjod par bya/ /yi ge bdun po lpags sog khams/ /trai lo kya bi nA sha'i sngags/ /sdang ba la ni cho ga'o//
sha ta sa ha sra ko tri/ /ta thA ga ta pa ri bA re/ /sa mtha' A yi dbyangs kyis spras/ /zla ba'i dum bu thig les brgyan/ /de ltar sngags kun nyer sdud pa'o/ /ha A aM sngags kyi rang
bzhin/ /de ltar sngags kyi tshig ni bzhi/ /rnal 'byor ma skyed dngos grub 'gyur/ /bkas gnang dngos grub rab 'jug pa/ /bcom ldan dpa' bos 'di gsungs so/ /mkha'
'gro sdom pa mngon brjod dang / /gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud dang / /rnal 'byor rgyud rnams su gsungs pa'i/ /las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub ster/ /bkas snang 'khor lo'i
rab sbyor bas/ /'grub 'gyur sbyor ba gzhan gyis min/ /slar yang sa mtha' dbyangs ldan pa'i/ /drung na gnas pa'i stan can la/ /zla dum thig les brgyan pa'o/ /cho gas de kho na'i sa
bon| |pa drung gnas pa rnal 'byor ma'i/ /tshogs ni bskyed par byed pa'o/ /Ta yig 'bar bar byed pa'i sngags/ /sing ha ru be khaHsngags tshig /bgegs kyi gtso bo rlag byed pa'o//
@#/ /ga dza ru pa gaHyi sngags/ /sems can kun gyi bgegs byed pa'o/ /trai lo kyo da re yi tshig /rab mchog pho nya kun bskyed pa'o/ /sa mu dra me kha le gra ha
gnyis kyi tshig /rgya mtsho lta bu'i ska rags spras/ /de ni sngags kyi ska rags so/ /hUM dang phaT gyi yi ge ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi khyab bdag go/ /bI rA dwe te hUM sngags tshig /thabs dang
shes rab gnyis med las/ /tha mal 'dus byas skyes pa'o/ /de ltar rkang pa bdun sngags te/ /ye shes sa yi rang bzhin gyis/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes 'di gsungs te/ /sems can
las las grub pa'i mthar/ /de yi go 'phang mchog tu 'gro/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba'i ming / /slar yang skye zhing lam la gnas/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa sgyu ma yin/ /rang gi bdag
nyid so sor rig /hUM hA gnyis ma hA pa shu mo hA ni/ /tshig ni 'khor ba'i rmongs pa'o/ /yo gA+e shwa rI twaM gi sngags/ /zhi ba yi ni gzugs su'o/ /DA ki nI lo ka nAM ban+d+ha ni'i tshig /
'jig rten byang chub tu 'jug byed/ /sa t+ya me hUM phaTa'i sngags kyi tshig /mtha' bzhi po ni ston pa'o/ /b+hU ta trA sa ni yi tshig /mu stegs ye shes 'joms pa'o/ /de ltar
sngags tshig bdun pos ni/ /las kyi dbye ba byed pa ste/ /pad lte'i 'dab ma re re la/ /sngags kyi yi ga rnam gnas pa'o/ /dpa' bo'i sngags kyi gzugs gnas pa'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /'khrul 'khor chen po bcu gnyis de/ /bdag gi mdza' po yis ni gsungs/ /las thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor ni/ /bcu gnyis rnams
kyis lhan gcig bya/ /'khor lo chen po re re ru/ /nges par so so'i las bya'o/ /phrad pa rnams ni bcu gnyis su/ /bsgrub bya'i ming gis bsgrub par bya/ /pa mtha' sa mtha' a dang
ldan| |ya mtha' pa'i yi dbyangs dang bcas/ /re yig na mtha' ra yig dang / /pha mtha' dang ni shing d+hi'i tshig/ bid d+ye'i tshig dang shwa ri'i sngags/ /pa'i drung ma dang Ta sa bon//
hUM la zla du ma thig les brgyan/ /bskyar la yang ni brjod par bya/ /pa'i drung gnas dang Ta yig ste/ /hUM phaT dang ni swAhA bcas/ /sngags 'di lte bar cho ga yis/ /bsgrub bya ming
dang bcas par brjod/ /bcu gnyis rnams dang lte bcas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas 'di gsungs so/ /sa bon yi ge nyi shu bzhi/ /pu l+li ra sogs bsres pa'o/ /dpal
he ru ka rdor phag mo/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sngags 'di yi ni mthu stobs ni/ /bye ba stong phrag gsungs pa yi/ /mtha' med gzhung las dpa' ba yis/ /de bzhin snying
po bsdus pa yin/ /rgyud gzhan du ni gsungs pa'i sngags/ /sngags 'di yi ni sgrub thabs so/ /bzlas med grangs med yi ge med/ /gzugs med bsam gtan de bzhin med//
@#/ /lha dran pa yi ye shes kyis/ /dngos grub thams cad skyed pa'o/ /dbugs 'jug pa yi dus su ni/ /yi ge thams cad gsad par bya/ /'byin pa rnams
kyi sbyor kun skye/ /'byung ba'i dus su shes par bya/ /gnas dus rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni 'dod mi bya/ /dbugs rgyud de ltar shes bya ste/ /byis pa'i
rnal 'byor pas mi rtogs/ /gang gi slob ma dbang bskur ba/ /de nyid gzhi rnams bcas pas so/ /theg pa chen por yongs smin la/ /phyi nas sngags ni rab bstan bya/ /
sngon du phag mo'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /pri bya de nas he ru ka'i'o/ /rdo rje'i bu mo 'am de nas gzhan/ /der ni shes rab gzhug par bya/ /rgyud gzhan du ni dbang bskur la/ /tshul
'di bstan par mi bya'o/ /ye shes bya ba'i rang bzhin can/ /a ba d+hU tI ra dkyil 'khor bya/ /ye shes rnam pa phag mo yis/ /shes bya dpal he ru kar 'khyud/ /spyan gsum
drag po'i gzugs can ma/ /zhal bzhi mche ba gcigs pa ste/ /phyag ni bcu gnyis rnams dang ldan/ /dkar mo dang ni 'jigs byed gnon/ /sku la phyag rgya lnga la sogs//
'jigs dus me lta'i 'od zer can/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje dang gri gug /dgra sta Da ma ru de bzhin/ /rtse gsum lus med pags pa ste/ /phyag g.yon pas kyang de bzhin no/ /
g.yon du dril bu thod pa dang / /zhags pa kha T+wAM ga dang mgo /dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ma/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa mo/ /sgeg pa'i rgyan rnams dang ni ldan/ /dbu la thod pa'i
phreng ba can/ /'dod chags rdo rjes rgyas btab ste/ /yang na he ru ka yis so/ /yan lag lha rdzas dris nyer byugs/ /zhabs gdub dpung rgyan rnams dang ldan/ /lha rdzas me tog
phreng bas klubs/ /rtse phran zla gnas rdo rje ni/ /dpral bar rtag tu 'dzin pa mo/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs dang ldan/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs mdun du/ /sku las 'bar ba'i
phreng ba spro/ /he ru ka mig sman nag po 'dra/ /ral ba'i cod pan mdun du'o/ /stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par klubs/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i
phreng ba can/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed ldan/ /spyan gsum mche ba gcigs pa ste/ /zhal bzhi pa la 'jigs par byed/ /phyag bcu gnyis par rig par bya/ /brgya phyed mgo bos
brgyan pa ste/ /mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba dang / /'bar ba'i phreng can gtsigs pa po/ /skye gnas phyag rgya phyag gnyis kyis/ /lhag ma rdo rje phag mo'i'o/ /gal te he ru ka
gtso bo/ /de tshe phag mo'i phyag gnyis su'o/ /glang po'i pags pa 'dzin pa po/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid de/ /zag med rnal 'byor bde chen bzang / /srid dang mya ngan
@#/ /'das pa'i gzugs/ /gnyis po snying por spyin par bya/ /lhag ma rnal 'byor ma rnams ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs rim ji ltar/ /thod du ma la sogs
sngags rig pas/ /dpa' bo kun kyang sbyin par bya/ /re re yi yang de yi rgyud/ /ji ltar sngon gyi rjes su'o/ /rkyang ma dang ni ro ma'i rtsa/ /shes rab dang ni thabs 'du ba'i/ /rten
ni a ba d+hU tI ste/ /gang der ro mnyam son pa'o/ /'khor lo gsum gnyis 'gyur zhes bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs rim ji bzhin/ /he ru ka dang rdor phag mo/ /'bum tsho
stong phrag phyag can te/ /phyag gnyis la sogs nas brtsams nas/ /gzhan ni gang rnams de rnams so/ /dbang po'i yul ni mi lta zhing / /phyag dang bzhugs tshul la/
sogs min/ /bsgoms pas spros pa kun bzung ste/ gti mug de ni spang bar gyis/ /skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor bdag /skad cig la sogs de sbyor can/ /snying gar
sa bon rnam par dgod/ /spro dang bsdu ba la sogs bya/ /dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs te/ /stong nyid la sogs ri rab mthar/ /
ra ba dang ni gur la sogs/ /sa yi char ni rdo rje'i thig/ 'khor lo drug tu bri ba'o/ /ji lta'i mngon rtogs mtshan nyid kyi/ /rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad bya/ /thabs dang man
dag thams cad ni/ /mdzes ma bdag gis kun bshad do/ /der ni gtor ma spyin bya ste/ /sa sogs lnga rnams kyis mchod bya/ /yi ge 'bar ba'i yig rnams kyis/ /sngags kyi bzlas
pa yang bya'o/ /'bar ba'i gnyis 'phel yig rnams kyis/ /srog gis gtum mo 'bar bar bya/ /steng du kha bltas rtsa bsreg ste/ /de bzhin ye shes mkha' 'gro skyes/ /mkha'
'gro ma sogs ma lus dang / /rnam par shes la sogs thim pas/ /bsregs pas ri bong can haM 'dzag /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/
rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje phag mo bskyed
pa dang / gtso mo dang / 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang / /dkyil 'khor sgom pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te 'di ni le'u gnyis pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma
sogs kyi/ /ji ltar bskyed pa rab bshad bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi sbyor brten nas/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mchog tu rtsen/ /phag mo'i gzugs ni mtha' yas pa'ang / /spros pa dra ba'i
sdom pa'o/ /lus kyi dngos po'i dbye ba yis/ /mtha' yas gzugs can mkha' 'gro ma/ /lus kyi bde ba la brten nas/ /'dod pa rnams pa gsum du 'gyur/ /dga' ba gsum
@#/ /dang rtsa gsum ste/ /bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par 'dod/ /sangs rgyas sku yi nyams chen po/ /de'i rang bzhin las sna tshogs 'phro/ /mkha' 'gro ma
yi gnas brten nas/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rang bzhin no/ /'dzam bu'i gling ni chen po yi/ /dum bu bcu gnyis kyi dbus su/ /shar gyi yul du gnas pa mo/ /dus sbyor ro
hi ta chu srin dang / /rgyal dang nyi ma dga' bskyed dang / /rtsa yi dngos po srog 'bab pa'o/ /lha mo phyi nang bdag nyid du/ /bcom ldan gzugs can ma gnas te/ /phyag bzhi ma la kha dog
gnag /spyan gsum pa la zhal gcig ma/ /mche ba gtsigs shing drag pa ste/ /phyag rgya lnga mngon 'dzin pa mo/ /rol zhon ma skra grol ma/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs dang ldan pa mo//
drag mo thod pa'i phred can ma/ /g.yas pa DA ru gri gug can/ /g.yon par thod pa kha T+wAM ga /spro zhing sdud pa'i sku can ma/ /sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid kyi/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su

gzhag par bya/ /snying po yi ge nyi shu gnyis/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas kha sbyor/ /oM shrI oM badzra badzra he DA he ki ru nI ru ye kaM hUM DA hUM ki pha nI Ta dza pha la Ta saM swA b+ha hA ra hUM hUM phaT
swAhA/ dkyil 'khor pa yi lha mo rnams/ /yi ge rdo rje can du 'dod/ /mkha' 'gro ma thog 'joms pa'i mthar/ /rigs kyi rtsa ra ni rab tu grags/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas bsgrubs
nas su/ /der ni phag mo gnas par 'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa bdun lha rnams ni/ /rang 'dra'i thabs dang gnyis med bde/ /ming gi sbyor bas shes bya ba/ /dgos pa rnams mang man ngag go /
sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ni rgyud/ /bde ba che las bskyed par 'gyur/ /gang phyir bdag po mkha' 'gro ma/ /rgyud de mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs so/ /bdag po khyod la bdag 'dri'o/ /ji ltar bdag gi
bskyed 'gyur ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma la bde ster ba'i/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mnyes byas nas/ /khyod bskyed pa ni bshad kyi nyon/ /rang gi rgyud ni ma nyams pa/ /DA yig gsang ba'i bug
bdag nyid/ /gzhu yi rnam pa srog dang ldan/ /lus kyi gzugs can yang dag pa/ /yul dang dbang po'i bdag nyid can/ /byang chub sems kyi thig le che/ /rgyud i zhes bya'i ming can
te| |'gro dang 'ong ba'i pad chen du/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo la khyab gyur/ /ka yig ka gzugs kyang de bzhin/ /'od gsal sprul bya sprul pa'o/ /'phrin las kyi ni khams kun gyi/ /zhi ba'i
gzugs kyis 'gro ba che/ /dga' ba med mdzes mi 'gyur kyang / /brjod min lhan skyes tshon gyis mdzes/ /mi gzugs rtag tu bde chen pos/ /sgyu 'phrul nges pas 'phro bar 'gyur/ /I ni
'byung po che kun dang / /dbang phyug la sogs su nu ston/ /lug dang dmar ser yid bzang gis/ /de yi gzhi ni skyed par 'gyur/ /'di ni mkha' 'gro ma yi ming / /las kyi dus bzhin
@#/ /mtshon par bya/ /klu rnams yang dag dgug bya dang / /char 'phebs gzhug phyir bzhu ba dang / /lha rnams dang ni 'byung po kun/ /rgyal po rnams kyi 'ang 'phrul
chen dang / /dbang dang mngon spyod rengs pa dang / /bsad dang bskrad pa la sogs pa/ /mngon spyod dus las shas par bya/ /rang rang gling du bskyed pa ste/ /shes rab thabs kyi
snyoms 'jug pas/ /stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid kyi/ /rnal 'byor dbang pos sems phra zhing / /shin tu phra bas der 'jug 'gyur/ /sems can don du de dang der/ /rang bdag
sbyor bas mdzad par 'gyur/ /stong gsum stong ni chen por/ /gang du khyab bdag kun spyod 'gyur/ /der ni dum bu bcu gnyis su/ /rang rang gtso mo rnal 'byor ma/ /thim dang longs
spyod spyod rnams su/ /rdzu 'phrul che rnams kun spyod 'gyur/ /nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug gi/ dbugs rgyu bar ni shes par bya/ /brgya phrag bco brgyad srog rnams kyis/ /'phro bar
'dir ni brjod par bya/ /bcu gnyis rnams ni nyin zhag 'gyur/ /dus sbyor bcu gnyis rem las so/ /dus sbyor gsum bsgyur byas nas kyang / /dus kyi pho nya mo kun spyod/ /dus
brgya'i phyed kyis pho nya mo/ /re re rnam par shes par bya/ /lnga bcu gsum gyis yang dag par/ /nyin zhag gcig la spyod pa'o/ /de rnams yi ger yang dag bshad/ /
a yig la sogs k+Sha mtha' can/ /yon tan 'phar ma yin bstan pas/ /gsum bsgyur brgya phrag phyed dang bcas/ /de rnams pho nya mor nges bshad/ /'di ni mkha'
'gro ma phyag rgya/ /mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod gzhan/ /sa 'og rnams na'ang gnas pa mo/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams rnam gsum ni/ /zhing sngags lhan cig skyes rang ngo / /gang zhig
gang gis lhag gnas pa/ /de ni de yir gsal mthong 'gyur/ /rigs kyi khyad par la brten nas/ /'dod pa'i sbyor skyes gnas pa can/ /tsa ru'i bza' ba de rnams su/ /ye shes
gzugs can phyugs chen po/ /bza' min bza' bya der yang ni/ /mtshon min gsal bar mtshon par bya/ /mtshan nyid mtshan nyid min pa spong / /de ni spong bar rab spong ba'o//
rjes 'dzin tshar gcad la chags pa'ang / /gang zhig gang gis rang rang dngos/ /sangs rgyas dang ni chos gnas par/ /byas te mngon spyod sbyor ba yis/ /a ba d+hU tI'i srog
gi rlung / /brtan pa phag sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /ma brtan srog gi rlung rnams kyi/ /dngos grub gsal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lha mo rnam snang gis rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje 'dzin
bdag mi bskyod pas/ /pho nya mo sngags sum cu drug /dus las rang dang rang gi rigs/ /ji ltar bdag mo'i rigs dang ni/ /phyag dang mtshan ma rim ji ltar/ /yang na nges
@#/ /bar brjod pa ru/ /mngon rtogs mtshan nyid las shes bya/ /po l+la ka k+ko la sbyor las/ /lha mo rang nyid zhu bar zhugs/ /skad cig de la ma lus pa'i/ /dkyil
'khor thams cad ro mnyam lta/ /lha mo nam mkha'i nang snang bas/ /'di yis mnga' bdag bskul bar bya/ /mchog tu bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rol cig rol/ /shes rab thabs kyis
dgongs pa rab tu grub par mdzod/ /'jig rten rnams la khyod kyi thugs rje bsgoms pa yis/ /ji ltar lha dang lha min ma lus sangs rgyas mdzod/ /byang chub rdo rje 'dzin pas bde
chen gyis ni mnyes par mdzod/ /khyod ni stong nyid ting nge 'dzin la zhugs sam ci/ /rdo rje pad+ma rol pas deng ni nges rtogs mdzod/ /gang gis lhan cig stong nyid ting 'dzin la
khyod bzhugs/ /mnga' bdag khyod kyis khams bzhi'i sa bon 'dzag par mdzod/ /a ba d+hU tI'i rang bzhin gtum mo ldang bar 'gyur/ /sa gsum sreg par byed de gang du'ang mi
mthong ngo / /mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bos 'bar zhing 'bar bar 'gyur/ /lhan skyes rang bzhin gyis ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams dga' bar mdzod/ /rga ba dang ni 'chi bar snang ba ma mthong
ngo| |thugs kyi rgyal ba mgon po yis ni 'di dag sad par mdzod/ /sgyu ma yis ni sems can khams ni bsgral bar mdzod/ /glu chen po ni 'di gsan nas/ /rnal 'byor 'khor
lo can rab sad/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i 'gro ba kun/ /brtan pa la sogs 'gro ba ni/ /mthong bzhin rang gi 'khor lo can/ /nam mkhar thim pa sku cher 'gyur/ /lhan skyes sogs kyis sprul
pa can/ /gnyis po gcig pa'i sku chen po/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas rang bzhin can/ /thams cad kyi ni chos kyi sku/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud thob nas/ /rnal 'byor rgyud rnams la yid ches//
slob dpon sems kyi rdo rje yang / /dbu ma'i tshul gyi spyod yul lo/ /de nyid phyir bstan thob pa las/ /dbu ma chen po'i mtshan nyid do/ /grub mtha'i man ngag spyod yul ni/ /
mkhas pa rnams kyi'ang spyod yul min/ /grub mtha' mngon sum las shes bya/ /man ngag kyang ni rjes dpag las/ /shes bya bla ma'i zhal las kun/ /de mkhas sangs rgyas spyod
yul lo/ /byis pa'i rigs kyi rnam shes kyi/ /mngon nga rgyal can spyod yul min/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin
gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ /mkha' 'gro ma bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang //
bde ba la kun tu spyod pa'i las kyi de kho na nyid kyi rnam par gzhag pa'i cho ga ste 'di ni le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /lA ma ji ltar gnas pa ni//
@#/ /ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis/ /gsungs pa bdag gis gsal bya tsam/ /rdo rje sdom pa bcom ldan 'das/ /phag mo rnal 'byor sdom pa ste/ /'khor lo
sdom pa mkha' 'gro ma/ /de bzhin dam tshig sdom pa ni/ /lA ma yis ni yang dag bstan/ /pad+ma'i sdom par 'dod pa ni/ /dum skyes ma can gzugs can ma/ /rin chen sdom pa'o
khyab bdag la/ /lA ma rang nyid kyis zhus pa/ /rdo rje sdom sogs ji lta bu/ /ngo mtshar bdag gi bdag po kye/ /rdo rje dam tshig de bzhin sbyor/ /pad 'khor de bzhin rin chen gyi//
sdom pa yang ni ji ltar lags/ /de nas rdo rje can mchod nas/ /mnyes pa bdag la yang dag gsungs/ /rdo rje bug 'pho med ye shes/ /rtogs nas rdo rje gsum rnams su//
sdom pa rdo rje gsum rnams la/ /skyes pa rdo rje sdom pa ni/ /dam tshig rtsa rnams thams cad kyir/ /shes bya lam gyi rjes skyob pa'i/ /sdom pa'o 'khor lo mchod pa ni/ /dam
tshig sdom par 'dod pa yin/ /rnal 'byor rnam pa drug po ni/ /sbyor drug nam mkha'i bu ga ru/ /sdom pa bden pa'i dngos po kun/ /bdag gi rnal 'byor sdom pa'o/ /pad+ma a
ba d+hU tI'i rtsa/ /'khor lo bzhi la gnas pa ni/ /sdom pa'o 'khor lo de rnams su/ /pad+ma'i sdom par brjod par bya/ /'khor lo bde bar gshegs pa'i lam/ /dbang sogs
rnams su bskyed pa yis/ /sdom pa'o chos de rnams su ni/ /'khor lo sdom pa yin par bshad/ /rin chen rdo rje mgo bo yis/ /nor bur 'bab pa 'ongs pa yis/ /sdom pa'o srog gi thig
le yang / /rin chen sdom pa yin par 'dod/ /ma bshad pa las de rnams kyis/ /mkha' 'gro bdun pa ye shes mchog /khwa gdong la sogs brgyad dang ni/ /'dren pa gnyis med mtshan
nyid phyir/ /de ltar thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /gcig tu sdom pa'i mkha' 'gro yin/ /gtum mo 'bar ma la ni gzugs/ /rtsa so so dang dbu ma ste/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro de las bskyed//
rnam pa kun rig skad cig las/ /byang chub sems kyi dbus su ni/ /bdud rtsi gsang ba'i gzugs can gang / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bshad do/ /nam mkhar 'gro ba yi ni mchog /
glo bur byung ba bdag med pa/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po chu skyes gzugs/ /rnal 'byor rang sems sems med kyang / /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid do/ /'khor lo nang gi bdag
nyid gzugs/ /thig le kun tu sbyar ba yis/ /mtshan nyid gnad dang mtshams la ni/ /kun tu sangs rgyas skye bar 'gyur/ /'du ba phyi dang nang bdag nyid/ /ye shes dngos rang bzhin las
so| |dam tshig sems dpa' gsum rig pa/ /skye dang 'chi dang bar rnams kyi/ /srid pa kun las shes par bya/ /spong bas dam tshig mkha' 'gro skye/ /bdag nyid kun gyis mi
@#/ /shes kyang / /'gro ba mkhas pa'i lam gyis 'gyur/ /'dod chags sgyu ma bcas nam mkha'/ /pad+ma mkha' 'gro rang nyid gtso/ /dbyangs yig de bzhin
rnal 'byor dang / /phyag rgya lhan skyes 'dod rnams kyi/ /bgrod bzhin du ni rtag tu skye/ /'bar ba rin chen dbang mkha' 'gro /de bzhin khams ni rnam pa bdun/ /rnam shes
bdun gyi mtshan nyid do/ /chu gter ri dang gling rnams kyang / /rgya mtsho che der rab tu zhugs/ /de nyid nyi shu lnga bdag nyid/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgyus/ /khor yug la
sogs stong nyid dang / /rang bzhin skyes bu de bzhin du/ /'od gsal ba dang thams cad ming / /chos kyi dbyings dang rang mtshan nyid/ /thar dang sangs rgyas de bzhin du/ /ye shes rdo
rje sems lam bdag /chos 'byung dang ni theg chen dang / /gsang ba sngags tshul khyab bdag dang / /lhan skyes dang ni 'dus de bzhin/ /thugs rje chen po'ang rang nyid dang / /
bdag med ma dang kun de nyid/ /rang bzhin can stong yang nas yang / /de phyir rgya mtsho'i ming dang yang / /rgya mtsho chen po'i gzugs can ni/ /A kun 'jigs gzir sems
can rnams/ /ngang gis sangs rgyas yon tan ldan/ /r+N+Na| de rnams dge ba mngon 'dod la/ /dub dang yongs su ngal ba med/ /wa| rtog pa thams cad spangs pa las/ /
thob pa sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid/ /ma| gsang sngags tshul gyi bdag nyid kun/ /hA/ skyed pa yi ni gzugs can no/ /sa/ de yi chos ni mi bden te/ /mu/ dngos po skad cig 'jig phyir
ro| |dra| rdzas dang sna tshogs rang bstan chos/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i mtshan nyid do/ /lA| ma yi rang gi mtshan nyid sa/ /ji lta ba bzhin rim gyis te/ /rol pa'i myos las bskyed pa ni/ /
rnal 'byor ma kun shes par bya/ /ma sogs kun gyi 'khor lo yi/ /rtsa yi lam nas rjes 'gro ma'o/ /yang na sgyu ma 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de ni sgyu ma che rang bzhin/ /bum pa'i rA si spyod
pa yis/ /'pho ba'i grangs kyang gnyis pa'o/ /rdo rje phag mo can lha mo/ /kun tu spyod pa lA mar gnas/ /kha dog ljang snang lha mo ste/ /lhag ma mkha' 'gro ma dang mtshungs/ /sred pa
dang ni snang ba'i dngos/ /thams cad de yi steng du gnas/ /he ru ka yi mdog dang gzugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro rnams/ /lhag ma 'khor drug rnal 'byor ma/ /dpa' bo
rnams dang thams cad 'byung / /'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi dbus su sbyin/ /thugs sogs kha dog drug tu grangs/ /'khor lo cha mnyam la bri bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'khor de bzhin/ /ral gri rin
chen gri gug gi /phreng ba rtag tu rim shes bya/ /phyi rol sna tshog rdo rje'i phreng / /mgo bo'i phreng ba thams cad du'o/ /lA ma byung gi sems las bskyed/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs gtso ma
@#/ /ste| |dus kyis rjes mthun sems can don/ /smon lam gyi ni mtshan nyid do/ /bskal pa bzang po'i dbus su yang / /rdzogs ldan la ni rnam gzigs sogs//
de yi dus su shes bya ba/ /de bzhin rnam gzigs byang gling du'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling ni chung dun du'ang / /bdag ni shAkya'i rigs rjes 'gro/ /lhag ma'i gling lnga rnams su ni/ /de
bzhin gshegs rigs rim pas so/ /de phyir lA ma 'gro ba kun/ /sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas mtha' len/ /ma ni rnal 'byor thams cad kyi/ /snying stobs bya ba byed pa gsal//
sa yi dbang phyug zhag la ni/ /mchu yi zla ba can du 'dod/ /thur sel zhes bya'i rlung dang ni/ /'gro dang zla ba zhes bya'i rtsa/ /ji srid 'chi ba'i dus nyid bar/ /'dzin bzhin du ni mi nyams
so| |de ltar rnal 'byor ma bcu gnyis/ /zla ba nyin zhag rlung rnams so/ /rtsa dang rtsa nas 'bab pa ste/ /mi ni skyed pa rnal 'byor ma/ /rtsa yi tshogs ni thams cad la/ /skad cig
las ni srog 'pho 'gyur/ /rang bzhin de la shes byas nas/ /sdang sogs yon tan gyis rim pas/ /des ni sna tshogs sprul bdag dang / /las kyi gnas ni mang po'o/ /rnal
'byor pa yi dngos gcig ni/ /lA ma mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid/ /mya ngan 'das dang mtshon pa na 'ang / /gnyis po zhugs gyur ming med pa/ /ji ltar mi shes de la ni/ /bdag
gis mchog tu 'du shes so/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems med 'gyur/ /chos kyi sku sogs dngos po'o/ /dbang po rnams kyi drin gyis ni/ /skye ba can kun thob par 'gyur/ /dbang po'i
dngos po bden min yang / /de tshe mi bden pas thob 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis kyi dngos nyid ci/ /grib ma yi ni skyes bu mtshungs/ /grib ma'i dngos po de bden kyang / /skyes bu'i gzugs ni
bden ma yin/ /de bzhin dbang po mi bden kyang / /de dngos bden pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /man ngag rnam pa mang po gzhan/ /mchog tu bsngags par shes par bya/ /btung ba la sogs bdog
pa kun/ /bla ma la ni 'bul ba bden/ /de ni mi bden pas spyad bya/ /de la brnyas par mi bya'o/ /'di la sngags kyang bshad bya ste/ /lha mo kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dir/ /nye ba'i snying po sngags
rnams la/ /kha sbyor mdzes pas brgyan pa'o/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ /nye snying rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis/ /de bzhin dbus su lugs

'byung min/ /oM oM ba hrIH/ dzra he lA he mA hUM yai hUM hUM pha hUM Ta phaT pha hUM Ta hUM swAhA ha hrIH/ oM oM hUM he hUM he hrIH/ phaT oM zhes bya ba'o/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnams kyis ni/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma
rim las/ /rtsa dang tshigs ni shes bya ste/ /yi ge brjod pa'i bdag nyid kyi/ /gnyis dang gsum gyi rtsa bskyed de/ /yi ge re re yi yang ngo / /yang na thams cad bsdus pa yis/ /bdag
@#/ /nyid chen po'i dus 'di'o/ /de phyir sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma rtag re re skye/ /gal te sems dpa' che khras na/ /spros ba'i khro bo rnal 'byor ma//
de bzhin gti mug 'dod chags sogs/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rtag tu spros/ /tshogs chung ba yis las 'grub pa/ /yum mchog lA ma 'ang 'thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan bdag pos
'di gsungs te/ /yi ge re re rnal 'byor ma/ /ming ni de dang mnyam zhes bya/ /khyod la rdo rje mchog bsres pa'o/ /de ltar de nyid rtag brten nas/ /rnal 'byor phyag rgya dang lhan cig /rtsen
cing rgya cher rol par bya/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das dbus su/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /
bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ lA ma bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sngags dgod
pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba drug la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par bzhag pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o// //de nas
mchog tu rab bshad bya/ /sems can rnams la phan brtse bas/ /khaN+Da ro hi'i gnas bzhugs nas/ /mnga' bdag rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / /'khor lo bzhi yi pad+mo ru/ /rtsa ni brgya dang nyi
shu'o| |de rnams ming ni ci rigs par/ /de kho na nyid snod la bshang / /yul dgu sa me dang ka ling ka ma dang / /oM Da ma dang kar+N+Na Ta mo ma ru mo/ /so so raSh+Ta mo ma la ya ma bing ga ma/ /
'gro lding ma dang ta li ga ka mo/ /mA la wa mo ma hA raSh+Thi ma/ /ba ren+d+ra mo kA ma ru pi ma/ /DA hA li mo a Ta li yul ma/ /b+ha Da ri mo lA DA dbus 'gyur ma/ /ti ra hu da ti mo dang dad da ra
Na Ta ma dang bal yul ma/ /mnyan yod ma dang rA D+ha mo dang Di ka ki ri ma dang / /b+hang ga lA mo khA Da ma dang ha ri ke la ma/ /gser gling ma dang sing ga li mo dang / /Da ma Da mo kan+to ra ka

mo| |sin d+hu kha pa'i gnas ma tsUM Di mo/ /ku lu ta mo dza Da ra mo pa tha ma/ /dza dz+dza yu ta ma dang pa ru Na ma dang / /o Ti mA NA ma dang lam pa ka ma dang / /dzA lan+d+ha ra ma dang ar bu da ma dang / /kha

che ma dang ko sa la mo kAny+tsi ma/ /dza yan+ta mo tri shak+ta mo tsam b+ha ma/ /lu ha ra ma pu ra ho ri ka mo dang / /mu mu na ma kA ma po dza ma dang / /b+ha T+To ma la gri ha de ba mo/ /pre ta pu ri ma dang
bab b+ha ra ma dang / /pi la mo dang nye ba'i pi la mo/ /dur khrod ma dang nye ba'i dur khrod ma/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram mkhas mo/ /kla klo ma dang thams cad yul ma ste/ /rim pa drug cu bzhi
lha mo| |lte ba'i 'khor lo rnal 'byor ma/ /rigs kyi rtsar ni shes par bya/ /snying ga'i 'khor lo de bzhin brgyad/ /pho nya mo kun 'gro ma ste/ /pra ya ga mo de bi ko Ta ma/ /'phags
@#/ /rgyal ma dang dpal chen mo/ /'bar ba'i gdong ma grub pa srim ba li mo dang / /ma hi la ma kau ma ri mo so ra ma/ /de ltar thams cad snying gnas su/ /sgyu
ma'i rnam par rang zhing ma'o/ /mgrin par 'khor lo'i lha mo yang / /gtso mo mchog ni bshad par bya/ /cha chen bcu drug nyid yin te/ /khams rnams bcu drug de bzhin no/ /khrag
dang khu ba rkang dang ni/ /rngul dang tshil dang pags pa dang / /sha dang rus pa rgyus pa dang / /rang dang rgyu ma rang byung dang / /bshang gci mkhris pa mchil ma'o/ /ra ha s+ya
sogs tshil gyi khams/ /de rnams myos byed 'bab ma'o/ /mgo bo ru ni lha mo che/ /'khor lo sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsa/ /zhag gi rim pa thams cad du/ /mtshams kun
rmad byung chen mo'o/ /nag mo gtsigs ma 'jigs rung ma/ /dga' ma 'das ma log 'dren ma/ /tsA muN+Da dang drag gzugs ma/ /lha mo dka' zlog dbyangs can ma/ /nag
bzang mo dang nag chen mo/ /nag sbom ma dang gzhan mi thub/ /rgyal ma dang ni rnam rgyal ma/ /mi pham ma dang rgyal ba mo/ /drag mo sdang ma dbang mo dang / /zla ba lam gyi
bzhi mdo ma/ /grong gnas ma dang drag mig ma/ /kaM po dza ma DoM bi ma/ /gtum mo dang ni gdol pa mo/ /bram ze mo dang dmangs rigs mo/ /rgyal po'i bu me 'phrul chen
mo| |lha rdzas chang gis 'gengs byed ma'o/ /de ltar rtsa yi 'khor lo ru/ /khaN+Da ro hI nang 'gro ma'o/ /bdag 'dir 'gro ba mo yin ci/ /rang gi bdag pos bka' stsol cig /lus
rnams thams cad la ni khams/ /mkha' 'dra dngos po gcig tu 'gyur/ /sa gzhi cha bzhin shes bya ste/ /yul gyi phyi yang sa gzhi gcig /dum bu dum bur gyur pa'i khams/ /yang
na yul dang zhag dag 'gyur/ /Da yi yi ge bstan de'i phyir/ /sgo nga mngal gyi mtshan nyid las/ /'dir ni rnam shes bskyed par 'gyur/ /gang 'dra'i gang gi khams rnams la/ /
bzhir ni rnam par shes bya ste/ /las la dum skyes ma rang nyid/ /sdig pa chen po 'phrog bzhin ma/ /bsad pa khams ni thams cad do/ /des ni sems can bral du ma
skyes| |shin tu las kun mdzad pa mo/ /gtso mo mchog gi rnal 'byor ma/ /rang gi 'pho ba las bzhengs mchog /nyi ni 'char ba'i dus dang ni/ /'dod dang rgyu skar gre mchog dang //
nub kyi ba lang spyod gling du/ /'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin ma/ /dngos med byed pa min lha mo/ /gnyis med go 'phang la brten ma/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su/ /bskyed

'gyur rang gi sngags las skye/ /oM ba sa dzra rba kha buN+Da d+ha ro ba hi dzra kA DA ye ke hUM nI hUM yai phaT pa phaT r+N+Na swA nI hA ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM/ sngags 'di rab tu sbyor bar byed/ /dkyil
@#/ /'khor 'dod pa thams cad la/ /lha mo re re rnams kyi ni/ /dbus su 'khor lo bzhi skyes ma/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can/ /thams cad chos
'byung dbus su ste/ /sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rta babs kyis ni de rnams brgyan/ /sha chen po ni za bzhin du/ /'jigs byed sgra ni bsgrags pa'o/ /lA ma'i 'khor lo ba lang sha/
mkha' 'gro ma la glang chen sha/ phag mo la ni sha thams cad/ /dam tshig sdom pa'i sbyor bas so/ /gsang sngags bden par shes byas nas/ /sngags kyi yi ge brjod pa min/ /sems
can kun gyi ngag gang de/ /sngags ni rnal 'byor ma ru grags/ /gal te yi ge pa sngags yin/ /go Di'i yi ge pa dang mtshungs/ /rtsa yi bu gu bu ga ru/ /dbugs ni yi ger 'du
shes pa'o/ /sngags kyi btung bas sems la ni/ /ji srid rkang mthar 'gog pa las/ /yul dang yul du kun tu spyod/ /yul dbus su yang 'ongs pa las/ /tshim bya rang gi
'khrul 'khor du/ /bum pa bzhin du btung ba 'bab/ /dkyil 'khor rang gi stan gnas nas/ /srog gi 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/ /sems dpas 'khor bzhin pa ru ni/ nor
bu'i bu gar btsir bar bya/ /bu ga dgu ru sa bon kyang / /rdo rje sogs pas bsgom par bya/ /yang na rtsa rnams thams cad du/ /sngags kyi yi ge 'di dgod bya/ /ma ka oM kA ma sau ma

bi dra ta mA ma b+ha kA DA a b+ha lA ma ti da ne sA rA Di ba khA ha su si DA ka si hi tsu ku dza pa dza pa au lam dza a kA ko kAM dza tri tsa lu bu muM/ kAM b+ha gr-i pre pi u sma u kha m+le zhes bya ba ni lte bar ro//

pri de u ma dz+wa su ma kau zhes bya ba ni snying gar ro/ /ra shu ma swA me tsa mAM a snA pU a swa bi mU pe sh+le zhes bya ba ni mgrin pa'i 'o/ /kr-i ka b+hI nA tI bi tsA kau o sa b+ha ma s+thu a dza bi a dza go dra i tsa tsa
grA rau kAM Dau tsa mA brA sU rA zhes bya ba ni mgo bo'i 'khor lo la'o/ /yang na mi phyed ma la sogs pa'i ming can te/ /de rnams kyi yang yig dang po/ /thams cad mgo bo'i 'khor lor sbyin/ /'khrul
'khor 'di ni blo chen po/ /srog gi rlung ni rnam 'dzin 'gyur/ /pad+ma bzhi yi 'dab ma'i dbyibs/ /re'u mig 'khor lo rim thig gdab/ /thams cad zlum po'i rnam par ni/ /thig lnga
rnams ni gdab par bya/ /brgyad dang bcu drug cu bzhi/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis re'u mig 'dod/ /lte ba'i gnas ni thob nas su/ /srog gi nus pa rnams kyis 'khor/ /ji srid a ba d+hU tI'i
rlung | |de srid 'khrul 'khor 'dir brjod do/ /gal te ngag gis de ltar byed/ /sngags ni 'jam snyan gyis glu len/ /sgras ni srog nges phur btab nas/ /rtsa dgu po ni dgug par bya//
nad med mi rgas mdze med cing / /rtag tu bkres dang skom pa med/ /de ltar la sogs mtha' yas pa/ /nad dang 'chi ba'i mthar thug med/ /dkyil 'khor lngar ram yang na ni/ /
@#/ /'khrul 'khor can kun 'bab par bya/ khams dang skye mched gzhan la sogs/ /bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor ldan bas bza'/ /mdog dmar 'du shes lhag ma
ni| |lA ma'i phyag dang gzugs can no/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs
so| |zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ dum skyes ma'i mtshan nyid dang / bskyed pa dang / 'khor lo'i bzhi'i rtsa'i rnam par gzhag pa'i ming
mdor bstan pa dang / sngags dgod pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ste le'u lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan mchog bshad par bya/ /mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min/ /
dpal he ru ka'i kun sbyor las/ /gzugs can ma yi mtshan nyid dge /lus ldan dang ni las dang tshigs/ /sngon du gzugs can ma la brten/ /phyi nang bdag nyid can gzugs
su| |bde la gnas pas 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni rkang lag thams cad la/ /tshigs ni bcu gnyis nyid yin no/ /lnga lnga ru ni shes bya ste/ /bcu gnyis la rtsa drug cu'o/ /dkyil 'khor
rnams la'ang 'bab pa mo/ /'pho ba bcu gnyis su 'dod do/ /g.yon pa dang ni g.yas pa la'ang / /sngon du lug sogs sngags rig pas/ /lhag ma bu ga bzhi rnams so/ /
lte ba 'doms dang rtsib logs gnyis/ /gru gsum de bzhin shes bya ste/ /de yi sgo rnams rtsa drug cu/ /mtshams ni rnam pa lnga rab gsungs/ /nyi ma rgyu bar gang 'gro ba/ /de 'gro zla ba
zla ba rnams/ /drug lnga sum cu'i cha rnams su/ /snying gar grags pa de bzhin gsungs/ /rtsa dgu ji ltar 'gro ba'o/ /mig la sogs pa'i bug rnams su/ /sgo la brten nas gnas par
'gyur/ /mgrin par gang 'dra ba yi khams/ /de ru gyur nas gnas pa'o/ /mi phyed ma sogs sum cu gnyis/ /rgyud mang pos ni bsngags pa'o/ /de yi gzugs su gnas lha mo/ /gzugs
can ma de'i rnam rtog pas/ /bcom ldan 'das la bdag 'dri'o/ /gzugs can ma yi ming ci gsungs/ /'gro ba thams cad gzugs med mdzod/ /rtsa yi bde sogs ming gis so/ /
'gro ba 'ang dbang po'i lam rnams su/ /gang 'dra'i gzugs kyi gzugs can ma/ /pha las thob pa'i bde ba ni/ /dbang gnyis rnam pa'i sbyor las so/ /gang dang gang gi rigs gang
ni| |de dang de yi 'gro bar bshad/ /bden pa kun las 'dren par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi tshul las gzhan mi 'gro/ /de phyir gzugs can ma 'grogs las/ /lhan skyes rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tshol/ /lha mo chen mo kha dog ser/ /lha mo dum skyes ma dang mtshungs/ /'du byed phung po'i gzugs dang ni/ /ming dang bud med sogs gzugs can/ /mnyam med sems
@#/ /can don las phyir/ /gling 'di ru ni skyes 'gyur ro/ /lug dang bya ku la nag pa'i/ /zla ba rA sa'i rang bzhin can/ /thabs dang shes rab bde bas kyang / /dkyil
'khor dbus su bzhugs pa'o/ /yang dag sum cu bdun bdag nyid/ /ji lta'i rim pas dpa' rnal 'byor/ /gsang sngags kha dog sbyor ba ru/ /gzugs can gtso mo'i shes
par bya/ /oM badzra graM rU pi maH nI hi yi oM ke swA hUM hA hUM hA/ pha oM Ta bau pha Sha Ta Ta he swA hA hUM hUM hoH oM phaT phaT haM/ de ltar rang bzhin las shes bya/ /sngon gyi cho ga'i las
kyis ni/ /dbu ma'i bu gar phyin nas ni/ /dbugs ni rnam shes ngo bo can/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med pa/ /ma lus skad cig de la mthong / /ma lus rang bdag ngo bo can/ /bsgoms dang
thos dang mthong ba yang / /bgrod bzhin pa na rtogs mi 'gyur/ /'di ni sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid/ /gzugs kyi sku yang rnam gsum ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid de/ /de ni 'dod dang gzugs
gzugs med/ /me long du ni gdod rdzogs pa/ /ji bzhin khams gsum la gnas su/ /de yi gzugs dang gzhan gzugs can/ /gzugs dang gzugs las gzugs
brnyan te/ /grangs med pa yi 'jig rten khams/ /gzugs can sgyu mas bud med dang / /thabs ni skyes bu'i las can gyi/ /gnyis med bud med skyes bu gcig/ gcig min
gcig min min gzugs can/ /gzugs kyi lus la sogs dngos la/ /mtshon byed mtshon bya med gzugs can/ /mtshon dka' mtshon bya'o mtshon bya la/ /mtshon bya gzugs
med mtshan nyid ma/ /mtshon med spyod yul de yang ni/ /mtshon pa po de'i spyod yul lo/ /ji ltar la lar rmi lam mthong / /rang nyid shi ba mthong 'gyur na'ang / /mthong bzhin du yang du
par byed/ /gzugs dang gzhan gyi gzugs can no/ /de ltar kun gyi rang bzhin du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi dang / /sems dpa' chen po'i rang bzhin dang / /dam tshig sems
dpa' chen po pa/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul sems dpa'/ /brtan dang 'gro ba sna tshogs so/ /de lta'i gzugs ni ji ltar sngon/ /rtog ge pa rnams kyis mi shes/ /
byis pa'i rnal 'byor rtogs bya min/ /rnal 'byor ma yi mchog thob pas/ /skye ba 'di nyid la shes 'gyur/ /skye bo thams cad byang chub rang bzhin te/ /rmongs pa'i byis pas shes
pa ma yin no/ /sems can thams cad rnal 'byor ma'i de nyid/ /mi gang yin pa de ni rdo rje 'chang / /glu 'di blangs pas thams cad ni/ /skrag ste sa la brgyal bar 'gyur/ /rnal
'byor ma rnams 'gyel nas kyang / /chos kyi spyod yul ngo mtshar to/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs gtso/ /dpa' bo rnams kyis bskul mdzad nas/ /gson cig gson cig sring
@#/ /mo khyed/ /sems can khams kyi rang bzhin grol byed ma/ /khyed dang sems can rnams la dbye ba med/ /dpa' bo thams cad sgrol bar mdzad pa mo//
slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ni/ /sku la thams cad rab tu zhugs/ /slar yang spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /gtso bo'i zhal nas spros par 'gyur/ /rnam snang mdzad la sogs pa'i
rgyud| |slar yang zhal nas spro bar mdzad/ /bcom ldan thams cad bsdu mdzad nas/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud la ni/ /ched du brjod pas ched brjod mdzad/ /rnal 'byor rgyud
kun la yang ngo / /rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen dbang / /'dir ni 'dod chags don yod grub/ /mi bskyod pa dang spyan ma'i rgyud/ /mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo/ /sgrol
ma dang ni gzugs rdo rje/ /sgra dang dri dang ro de bzhin/ /reg dang chos dbyings su grags dang / /sa snying nam mkha'i snying po dang / /phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten dbang / /sgrib
kun sel dang bzang po dang / /'jam dpal dang ni byams pa dang / /gshin rje'i sgra dang shes mthar mdzad/ /pad+ma mthar mdzad bgegs mthar mdzad/ /mi g.yo ba
dang dbyug sngon can/ /'dod dang stobs chen gnod mdzes dang / /gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / /khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma can/ /lhag ma rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /de
ltar rgyud kyi ming 'di ni/ /thabs kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid do/ /shes rab rgyud ni rang 'byung nyid/ /rang gi rang bzhin rtag tu gnas/ /byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams su/ /mi
'jig go 'phang rjes 'gro ba/ /bskal ba sreg pa'i dus su ni/ /gzhan du song nas yang dag gnas/ /thod pa'i dum la sogs dpa' bo/ /ming ni mi bskyod la sogs so/ /dngos po'i
dbye ba'i rnam grangs kyis/ /rigs ni du ma 'byung ba'o/ /gzugs can ma yi gnas brten nas/ /dpa' bo sa la bsgyings par 'gyur/ /gzugs ni gzugs med gyur pa'i
gzugs/ /bde mchog dang ni mnyam par 'khyer/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom
ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ gzugs can ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin rtsa'i 'khor
lo'i rang bzhin dang / gnas kyi rnam par gzhag pa dang / rgyud kyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga ste le'u drug pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor mchog gi sa/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las
kyis te/ /gang gis khwa gdong ma byung ba/ /de yis cho gas thar 'gro ma/ /nye ba'i gling du gnas ma ste/ /khyu mchog 'pho dang bzang po ma/ /sa ga'i zla bar shes bya ste/ /sa lnga par ni
@#/ /'dod pa yin/ /lha mo sgo na gnas pa mo/ /kA ni chos dbyings mar 'du shes/ /gnyis pa chos kyi sku dang ni/ /de las longs spyod rdzogs 'byung ba/ /
