s+yA ni sbrul pa'i sku yin te/ /lte snying mgrin pa mgo bo las/ /bu ga bzhi rnams shes bya ste/ /bya rog 'dra ba'i srog gdong can/ /de la rtag tu mngon spyod ni/ /srog chags rnams
ni skad cig gsod/ /klu rnams dgug par bya ba dang / /char dbab pa dang rengs pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings dang byang chub che/ /rnal 'byor ma kun rang bzhin ma/ /chos dang longs
spyod sprul pa la/ /bde ba 'dod pas 'gro ba mo/ /sngags bden las kyi bdag nyid can/ /bya rog gtso mo de la brten/ /rdo rje phag mo de la ni/ /bya rog ma ni gnas su son/ /
sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor ma/ /sngags 'di las ni byung ba yin/ /oM ba na dzra mo kA b+ha kA ga s+yA ba ya te ke bI hUM de hUM shA pha ya Ta hUM pha hUM Ta pha swA Ta hA pha oM Ta swA hUM ha hUM/
'dir ni ring thung dbye ba las/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can/ /thung du thabs kyis rang bzhin dang / /ring po shes rab mngon par brjod/ /kha dog nag mo drag chen mo//
lhag ma mkha' 'gro ma dang mtshungs/ /gang phyir byang chub sems zhu ba/ /de tshe bya rog las rgyal mo/ /nam mkhar bya rog bzhin 'khor ba/ /bya rog gdong ma'i rlung gis
so| |gang phyir 'phur zhing steng 'phur ba/ /de phyir 'og dang steng du lta/ /bya rog bzhin du ring 'phur nas/ /bya rog gling du slar 'ong ba'o/ /der son pa ni bde chen po/ /lus kyis
nyams su myong ba'o/ /bsod nams las kyis skye bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor gong nas gong du'o/ /bsod nams min ldan de bzhin 'dir/ /dmyal ba bya rog dum bu can/ /pha rol phyin
tshul rnams kyi yang / /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par 'dod/ /ma byin len pas dmyal ba pa/ /bya rog bzhin du rtag tu bkris/ /de yi de ltar las dus su/ /mi gang ngang gis 'chi bar
'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma ni de bsgoms nas/ /bde chen nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma yi spyod kun kyang / /rang gis rang ni thob par 'gyur/ /las ma byas na gang gi ni/ /
las can med cing las byed med/ /rang sems 'pho ba las yin te/ /las de las byed pa yang de/ /lus kyi dbyibs dang gzugs bdag nyid/ /sems med pa ni sems pa mchog/
lag pa rkang pa thams cad kyis/ /gang byas las byed pa rang ngo / /de kun gyi nar khyer ba ni/ /yang dag las mtha'i mtshan nyid do/ /las kyang dge ba rgyu don gnyer/ /mi dge
rang gis spang bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi mchod pa'am/ /de bzhin bza' ba 'du ba ni/ /grong dang grong khyer gnas pa dang / /ri la sogs pa'i rtse chen du/ /dam tshig don
@#/ /du mchod par bya/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub 'bras rab ster/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs brnyan kyang / /khyab gnas rlung gi ming can te/ /srog dang
thur sel mnyam gnas dang / /khyab byed ji lta'i rim gnyis kyis/ /mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang / /du ma skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /'ug gdong khyi dang phag gdong
ma| |rim pas klu dang rus spal rtsangs/ /lha sbyin dang ni nor las rgyal/ /rtag tu brtan ma pho nya gnyis/ /dga' dang skyo ba zhes bya ba/ /mche ma dang ni 'joms ma mchog /
mdor bstan pa yi tshig 'di yang / /rgyas bshad kun nas brjod par bya/ /phag mos mchod pa byas nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa/ /ji srid srog sogs rlung rnams
kyi| |so so re re'i ming 'du shes/ /bdag gi ston pa ngo mtshar che/ /dus kun du ni skye bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang por gtso bo can 'dzin
pa| |stong pa'i ngo bos grol bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje lta bu'i rlung dgod bya/ /rten ni snod kyi 'jig rten la'o/ /gang phyir 'jig pa thim 'gyur ba/ /de yi dbyibs tshul kyang med pa//
de phyir thur sel zhes bya yang / /'gro ba dang ni 'ong bar bstan/ /mnyam gnas rigs su song nas ni/ /sngon du gang dang gang rnams kyis/ /ngag tu brjod pa smra bar
'gyur/ /sngon du bag chags ma lus pa'o/ /khyab byed 'gro ba thams cad la/ /rgyas 'debs pas na las kyi rlung / /klu ni khro bo'i ngo bo nyid/ /khyab byed de bzhin tshig gnyis te/ /
rus sbal ser sna'i ngo bo ni/ /smra ba yi ni mtshan nyid do/ /rtsangs pa 'dod chags mnyam gnas so/ /thur sel phrag dog lha sbyin no/ /nor rgyal gti mug bdag nyid do/ /srog
gi rlung ni grangs gnyis las/ /dga' ba'i ye shes can shes bya/ /skyo ba de yis btags pa'o/ /de phyir mkhas pas so sor shes pa yis/ /gang phyir srog gi rlung ni thams cad
bdag nyid skye/ /ji ltar sa ni bcu gnyis las/ /thog ma de nyid bcu gnyis pa'o/ /bcu po rnams kyis de shes bya/ /gang phyir sa bcu'i dbang phyug go /sa gcig rang bzhin rnams kyis ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin
ma chen mor 'dod/ /sbyin sogs pha rol phyin pa gang / /lhan skyes yang dag byang chub nyid/ /thams cad kyi ni nang son pas/ /rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug ma mchog /bshad dang
ma bshad gang ci'ang rung / /de kun byang chub tshul can no/ /slar yang bya rog dbyibs lha mo/ /de nas byed pa'i gzugs can ma'o/ /byed pa phyogs kyi gnas la ste/ /rtsa gnas
kun gyi bu ga 'o/ /thim dang de las langs bsam gtan/ /khwa gdong ming du 'du shes so/ /de ltar rnal 'byor gter thams cad/ /bla ma'i zhal las gsal 'thob 'gyur/ /bla ma
@#/ /gang de mi brnyas shing / /ston byed de nyid 'dod par bya/ /'phags pa'i go 'phang ma thob na/ /mnar med la sogs rnams su 'tshed/ /kun nas bla
ma gus pa las/ /byang chub rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom
ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ /khwa gdong ma la sogs pa'i srog bskyed pa'i mtshan
nyid kyi cho ga ste le'u bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan gyi mtshan nyid mchog /'ug gdong la sogs gang gsal ba/ /byed pa yang dag bya ba dang / /thams cad
mtshams ni bshad par bya/ /'khrig pa sdig pa snon rnams ni/ /zla ba'i sbyor bas rtag tu gnas/ /'ug gdong ye shes thob nas ni/ /rtsa ni lam gsum 'gro ba mo/ /u|
drag shul gzi brjid gtsigs pa mo/ /ye shes lam dbang bza' ba las/ /lU| 'dod la dga' ba sgyu 'phrul che/ /lha min la sogs skye rnams la/ /rkang pa'i mtheb
mthar bcu gnyis su/ /ka| mda' yi shugs kyis 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'ug gdong ma yi ming la yang / /u ni uD+yan bu gar 'dod/ /la| pul+lI ra ma la yar grags/ /U
ni muM mu ni zhing ngo / /kA nI kA ma rU pa ste/ /de bzhin s+yA 'dir zhing kun 'dod/ /zhing kun dbugs su gyur pa ni/ /gru gsum rnam pa'i bde ba'i mtha'/ /gang phyir gnas lnga'i
bdag nyid kyi/ /mi zad he ru ka'i go 'phang / /yang na bdag gi gdan sogs su/ /dpal he ru ka rdo rje rang / /skye gnas gnas lnga'i bdag nyid de/ /snying lte rkan dang mgo bo dang /
gsang ba ru yang rtsa kun gyi/ /skye gnas bu ga lnga'i bdag nyid/ /sgong skyes dang ni drod gsher skyes/ /mngal skyes rdzus te skyes pa rnams/ /sems can sangs rgyas yon tan
bdag /rigs lnga rab tu ston pa'o/ /nye ba'i gling du gnas ma yang / /gtso mo'i gzugs can yang dag gnas/ /sngags kyi phreng ba las skyes rnams/ /sum cu rtsa bdun bdag
nyid skyes/ /oM ba ma dzra hA u ka lU wa kA a s+yA g+ni ya saM ke ni hUM b+hA hUM ya pha hUM Ta hUM pha pha Ta Ta swA pha hA Ta oM swA hUM hA/ de ltar sngags de kho na'i bdag /shes rab thabs kyi rang
bzhin can/ /kha dog ljang ser drag chen mo/ /lhag ma lA ma dang ni mtshungs/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom byas nas/ /dur khrod gnas dang gnyis med pa/ /kun spyod rtsa rnams
thams cad kyi/ /rgyas pa'i dga' ba'i spyod yul lo/ /'di ni 'tsho ba'i ting 'dzin dang / /'od gsal rnam pa'i chos nyid do/ /bskrad pa'i las dang rnal 'byor ma/ /'jig rten
@#/ /gyi ni 'dren pa mo/ /rang bstan chos las gsungs pa yi/ /sna tshogs las kyang bya ba 'o/ /kun gyi rnal 'byor yongs rdzogs nas/ /rgyud 'di yi ni
spyod yul lo/ /'on kyang rnal 'byor de kun kyang / /mdor bsdus tshul ni tshig 'di yin/ /so sor sdud dang de bzhin du/ /bsam gtan srog rtsol 'dzin pa dang / /rjes
su dran dang ting 'dzin te/ /sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rnam dag go /so sor sdud pa khwa gdong ma/ /'ug gdong ma ni bsam gtan 'dod/ /srog rtsol du ni gnas pa khyi/ /'dzin
pa la ni phag mo 'o/ /rjes dran gnas pa pho nya mo/ /ting nge 'dzin ni brtan mar 'dod/ /mche ba ma ni rgyas bstan thob/ /'jams ma 'bras bu kun bdag skyes/ /'khor ba
las ni grol gyur pa/ /rang gi sku ni sgyu ma mnyam/ /bdag byin rlabs 'di phra mo dang / /rdo rje bzlas rang mtshan nyid do/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi gter/ /de las
lhag ma zung 'jug go /mya ngan 'das zhes bya ba rang 'di/ /lam thams cad kyi mya ngan 'das/ /theg chen kun la rab 'jug pa/ /sngags kyi theg pa ru ni byed/ /bya ba bstan
bcos dag sna tshogs/ /snying rje mnyes gshin pa yis byad/ /gang 'dra'i dngos dang dngos po la/ /ye shes rnam pa'i rang 'byung gis/ /de 'dra ba yi sems rgyun las/ /bdag
nyid rnal 'byor rnams kyis mthong / /lus kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa/ /rtsa yi gur ni bshad par bya/ /spyi gtsug nas ni nor bu'i mtha'/ /mtshams dang mgrin pa rnam gnyis 'dod/ /
rkang pa'i mthe bong mtshams mtha' dang / /smin dbus de bzhin sgro ba ste/ /mtshan ma'i rtsa ba dpral ba dag /mig dang rkang pa'i sor mo gnyis/ /ming med pas ni pus mos
shes| |byin pa rna ba gnyis dag dang / /rkang pa'i mthil dang snying ga dag /lte ba dang ni rgyab gzhung dang / /bshang lam dang ni rkan shes bya/ /rkang pa'i tshig dang mchu dag dang //
mkhur ba mkhur tshos dag dang ni/ /'doms dang mchan khung gnyis dang ni/ /lag pa'i tshigs dang rkang pa dag /dpung pa'i tshigs dang nu ma gnyis/ /mjing pa thal gong 'dir
mtshams so/ /mjug ma nor bu gnyis dag dang / /rked pa'i tshigs dang mgrin pa dang / /dpral ba dang ni tshigs gnyis dag /rna bug dag dang rtsa ba dang / /brang dag gnyis kyi
mtshams su 'dod/ /stan dag dag ni smin khugs dang / /lce dang mi yi sna gang dag /de bzhin du ni rkan dang lce/ /bol+la kak+ko la gnyis dag /de la sogs pa du ma ni/ /rtsa dang tshigs
kyi gnad du 'gyur/ /rang rang spyod pa btsir bya ste/ /byang sems bdag nyid che rnams kyi/ /btsan thabs sbyor ba'i cho ga ru/ /shes bya bla ma'i gsung gis so/ /zla ba zla ba'i
@#/ /tshes gang du/ /tshes grangs de la rtse ba'i rtse/ /dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs nas/ /ji srid nag po'i mthar thug par/ /shes bya byang chub 'bab
pa'i rtsa/ /'ug mo sgo la spyod pa mo/ /gang dang 'dra ba'i gdong de yi/ /de 'dra'i sor mo'i phyag rgya ni/ /dbugs ni de dang 'dre bar bya/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod/ /yang
na rtsa rnams thams cad ni/ /btsir bya bcu gnyis kyis lhag pa'i/ /brgya yi tshigs rnams thams cad ni/ /ji ltar gdong gis rim pas so/ /de dang der ni A li 'bar/ /
drag mo'i sgyu ma dus kun du/ /de phyir a zhes bya ba'i sgo/ /tshig tu rtog pas brtags pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung bar/ /rdo rje 'chang ltar brtag
pa'o| |gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba/ /rtsa ni gti mug chen por 'gyur/ /de yis de yi rang bzhin gyur/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin/ /rmongs dang
mkhas rnams kyi dag la/ /mnga' bdag thar pa chen por bzhugs/ /byed pa 'byung po thams cad kyi/ /dbang phyug skye bo sna tshogs rnams/ /de phyir rtag tu las nyams pa/ /sngon
byas sdig pa'i las kyis te/ /nyams 'gyur bstan pa 'di la ni/ /bgrod bya sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog
rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'ug gdong ma'i
nges pa'i tshul dang / yang dag pa'i cho ga las bskyed pa dang / srog la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de le'u brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan ni don che ba/ /khyi gdong rgyu yi dbye
bshad bya/ /gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi mchog 'grub 'gyur/ /shA/ khyi ni rnal 'byor ma dbugs 'byin/ /rang gis 'jug dang 'byung bar
'gyur/ /dus kun du ni gnyid log dang / /sad pa bde ba yon tan che/ /na| sna tshogs gnas su song nas ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bde reg 'gyur/ /brgya la nyi shus lhag pa ni//
nges tshig bstan bya'i mtshan nyid do/ /de ltar khyi yi ming du ni/ /bde ba sbyin pa por shes bya/ /pad+ma'i skye gnas de rnams su/ /A s+ya/ pad+ma'i kha ni rab rgyas pa/ /gtong dang
longs spyod gar chen po/ /glu dang rol mo gnyid log dang / /reg dang gos dang rgyan dag dang / /me tog la sogs bsrung can 'dod/ /mthun par lte ba'i ma la sogs/ /mdzes
ma rnams kyis ngag can te/ /sangs rgyas mchod sogs thams cad du/ /su ra'i btung la 'thung 'gyur dang / /skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu'i 'gram/ /bsti gnas 'gro ba la sogs
@#/ /kyis| |tshim dang ston mo 'dod pa ltar/ /bla ma'i gsung ni bde chen po/ /mi dang mi mo'i sgeg pa dang / /rgod dang sgeg pa'i bya ba gang / /mkhas pa
rnams kyi yid dam pa/ /skye bo dbang phyug nyid du'o/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /mchod dang phyag byed la sogs pas/ /bla ma gus las bde ba ste/ /yon dbul
ba dang bud med do/ /spyod lam la sogs chos rnams la/ /las thams cad la mi 'jug go /rgol ba rnams ni gzhom pa dang / /sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhag pa dang / /
rnal 'byor ma dang bza' btung dang / /sgom dang dga' ba bskyed pa dang / /dbang po gnyis kyi bdag nyid skyes/ /sbyin sogs pha rol phyin rnams kyi/ /las kyis skyid pa
btsal bya dang / /byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang / /kun gyi tha mar btang snyoms dang / /ye shes rnam shes smra ba dang / /dbu ma'i tshul ni gzhag pa las/ /kun la
dbugs dbyung sbyin pa dang / /skur pa 'debs pa dgag pa dang / /dge ba bcu yi las dang ni/ /klog dang kha ton byed mchog las/ /byang chub lam la gnas pa yi/ /dpa'
bo gnyis med pa lta ba'i phyir/ /lus la ltos pa med pa yis/ /grong dang grong du gnas rnams kyi/ /de ltar gnas skabs gcig pa'o/ /gnyis pa slar yang bshad par bya//
sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyud la dga'/ /don dam rnams la gsal ba yis/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gnas su/ /dngos grub gtam rnams brjod pa dang / /chos ni don chen 'du shes
la| |dus su 'du shes sgom pa po/ /'gro drug spong ba'i 'du shes ni/ /de nyid rtogs pa'i ming can no/ /dngos rnams sgyu ma'i 'du shes dang / /zhi sogs las kyi bde ba dang / /pha
dang bu las gcig min dang / /gnas sogs 'gro bar spro ba can/ /nyon mongs phung po yongs gtong dang / /ye shes phung po bskyed pa dang / /slar yang 'khor bar mi 'ong dang //
'khor lo sdom pa'i rnal 'byor ldan/ /rtog pa po yi tshig bzung nas/ /rtog ldan min pa'i tshig spang bya/ /dbang po rnams kyi mi mthun min/ /rang bzhin gyis ni mdzes pa
yi| |lhan cig skyes dang longs spyod rdzogs/ /sprul pa dang ni chos sku'i yang / /'du shes sad pa la sogs su/ /gang phyir srid mtshor kun spang bya/ /lhag ma dga' ba bzhi bo
ni| |smon lam rdzogs ldan la sogs la/ /rdzogs ldan dus su rang bzhin skye/ /dga' ba sangs rgyas rdzogs ldan gang / /sems can gsum ldan la phra skyes/ /rig pa des la
sbom bo skyes/ /gnyis ldan la ni bde ba med/ /rtsod dus cha yi rags pa'o/ /thams cad sangs rgyas yon tan thob/ /smon lam gyis ni rang gi 'bras/ /de ltar bde skabs rnams kyis
@#/ /ni| |sum cu rtsa gnyis rmad byung che/ /gnas skabs gsum pa'i bde ba la/ /dga' ba bcu drug rtag brtags pas/ khams bcu drug tu shes par bya/ /
rang bzhin skyes par gyur pa gsal/ /sman dang 'dra bar shes par bya/ /bdud rtsi zos pas pha rol 'gro /pad can dung dang sna tshogs can/ /glang po ma dang bung ba'i ming / /
'khor lo rdo rje skya snar ma/ /du ba mo dang bu skye tshe/ /nyang rtsi spras dang ngo tsha dang / /glog dang tsan+dan nyi ma skyes/ /dmar po de bzhin sprul gyi mig /sman mchog tu ni shes par
bya| |bde bas dga' ba'i dus su ni/ khab sogs byed pa'i skad cig las/ /bya ba de dag zhar la dran/ /sgom pa'i skad cig mthar 'gro ba'o/ /gnas skabs bzhi la bshad pa
ni| |yid can rnams kyi grangs brgyad de/ /'gro dang 'pho 'gyur de bzhin du/ /skyug 'gyur gnyid yur 'gyur de bzhin/ /ltung 'gyur 'dzag 'gyur dang ni 'dir/ /g.yo 'gyur
'gyel bar 'gyur ba nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad dkar mo sogs/ /bde ba'i rgyu yi gnas skabs so/ /de ltar gnas skabs rnam bzhi la/ khyi gdong ming gis 'du shes gyur//
yang dag dran pa'i go 'phang 'dir/ /gang dang su yir gnas par 'gyur/ /yang dag rtsol ba la gnas nas/ khyi ni gzhan gyi grong du'o/ /sngags 'dren sbyor ba bdag nyid de/ /dkyil
'khor dbus su bsgom pa'o/ /oM ba dza dzra TA shwA ma na ta A ku s+yA Ta ya u ke ta hUM kA hUM TA pha ya Ta hUM pha hUM Ta pha swA Ta hA pha oM Ta swAhA/ sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid sngags/ /shes rab
thabs te dngos grub ster/ kha dog dmar po drag chen mo/ /lhag ma dum skyes ma dang mtshungs/ /chu stod kar ka Ta yugs sa/ /rang gi bdag po rab gnas ma/ /nye ba'i gling du
gnas ma ste/ /sems can rang rang bzhin du skyes/ /dbang gi las la lha mo ste/ /lha dang lha min sogs sngags rig /bdud rtsi lnga dang sgrol ma che/ /mchod pa las rnams thams
cad la'o/ /snying ga'i pad+mar yongs bkug nas/ /bdud rtsi tshig kun las skyes pa/ /rdo rje sbu gu'i rab sbyor bas/ /spar dang bsro ba la sogs pas/ /sku rdo rje sogs sngags kyis ni/ /
byin gyis brlab par byas pa la'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di
gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ /khyi gdong ma'i mtshan nyid dang / bde ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi cho ga ste
le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas bag gdong ma yi ni/ /nyung ba rgya cher bshad par bya/ /dngos po kun la rab 'jug dang / /dngos po de las ldog pa'o/ /phag mo rengs
@#/ /pa'i las rnams la/ /mi shes ri bo 'joms ma'o/ /sU|khab ni rdo rje'i gdong de yang / /skud pa bzhin du kun 'gro ma/ /byang chub sems kyi dga' chen
po| |ka| keng rus bdud rtsi 'byin pa mo/ /de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags sogs kun/ /bzhi pa las 'das mi 'gyur ma/ /de nas lha mo chen mo brgyad/ /mngal sogs bskyed
pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /thog mar bya rog bzhin sa bon/ /ma yi pad+ma la ltung ba'o/ /nub gcig gis ni phye ba yis/ /phye nas 'ug par gnas dang 'dra/ /zla ba gcig tu gnas nas ni//
khyi yi dbugs ni 'phel ba las/ /phag tu'ang yan lag bdag nyid can/ /brtan mas skye gnas dral ba las/ /pho nya byis pa dang 'che phyis/ /mche ba mo ni las bcom pas//
'joms ma byang chub yan lag dgyes/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'byung ma/ /yang dag pa yi rtsol ba 'di/ /gzhan gyi lta ba nya sogs kyi/ /'jug pa thams cad bden pa
ste| |'jug med de dngos spyod yul lo/ /rkang gnyis rkang bzhi la sogs pa'i/ /rtsol ba'i yan lag 'jog ma 'o/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pas kyang / /'jug med de nyid rtag
tu'o| |kha dog ser mo drag chen mo/ /lhag ma gzugs can ma dang mtshungs/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can/ /seng ge gro bzhin chu

srin la/ /nye ba'i gling du gnas pa mo/ /sngags las bzhengs pa'i lha mo rnams/ /rang rang zhing dang nye zhing ma'o/ /oM ba daM dzra Sh+TA sU ka ka rA rA lo s+yA gra ye mu hUM kha hUM b+hi pha Sha Ta NA pha ya Ta hUM swA
hUM hA pha oM Ta phaT swAhA/ sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid kyis/ /gtso mo mchog gi rnal 'byor ma/ /dkyil 'khor thig gdab la sogs ni/ /bsgoms pa'i sbyar ba'i ma yi ste/ /thig
chen gnyis ni btab nas su/ /shar dang so sor 'dod thig dang / /zur gyi thig gnyis btab byas nas/ /phur bu'ang gdab par bya ba ste/ /tshangs pa'i thig gi logs nas ni/ /sum
cu rtsa gnyis pa gnyis gdab/ /sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste/ /ste ba'i pad+ma de dang mnyam/ /snying po'i 'dab ma'i ngos nas ni/ /cha gsum du yang de shes bya/ /de yi cha gcig
'khor lo gsum/ /lhag ma mtshon gyi sa gzhi'o/ /de yi sum cha phreng ba ste/ /rdo rje pad+ma dang 'khor lo/ /rtsibs rnams 'khor lo dbus ma las/ /dman te gnyis gcig bsdoms
pas sbom/ /ka pa rnams ni kun tu sbyin/ /brgyad gsum 'khor lo gsum du'o/ /sgo las sum 'gyur rta babs te/ /sgo khyud sgo yi cha can no/ /stegs bu rnams ni de'i phyed de/ /
'gram du logs ni de bzhin no/ /gzungs kyi snam bu dang ni 'dir/ /rin chen phreng phyed snam bu'o/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba de yi phyed/ /mun pa'i snam bu de bzhin no/ /ka ba'i rtse las
@#/ /'thon rtse mo/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'od chen po'o/ /dril chung dra ba gos rnams dang / /ba dan dril bu sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /de'i phyi chu skyes thams cad du/ /snying po
la sogs yang dag bri/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng dang 'dir/ /lhag mar 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o/ /de yi phyi rol khor yug ni/ /sa gzhi'i rim pas bri bar bya/ /gri gug phreng ba sbyin
bya zhing / /mgo dang lag pa dag de bzhin/ /snying po'i pad+ma'i phyi rol du/ /rin chen phreng ba yang dag bri/ /dur khrod brgyad po bri bya ste/ /kun nas gtum drag la sogs so/ /sa
bon rnam par dgod par bya/ /thams cad gri gug las byung ba'o/ /yang na sku sogs rnams kyi ni/ /yi ge rnams kyi dkyil 'khor kun/ /de bzhin skad cig rnam pas kyang / /sa
bon gyis ni dkyil 'khor dbyung / /mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi thod pa ni/ /bum pa'i steng du sbyin bya ste/ /sum cu rtsa bdun gzhan bya'o/ /gang dang
rtsa ba spangs pa ste/ /mchu ni 'phyang zhing mgrin pa mtho/ /mgrin pa rnams su gos zung ste/ /rin chen lnga dang 'bru dang sman/ /dri yi chu dang 'dab ma'i rtse/ /bdud rtsi lnga rnams
kyis dgang bya/ /gtor ma las rnams kun la ste/ /kun nas bsgoms pa la sogs pa'o/ /rdo rje lha mo rnams dang ni/ /zhing skyong dang ni khro rnams la/ /bdud rtsi lnga sogs
rdzas rnams dbul/ /tshim bya phyi la sogs rnams kyis/ /bgegs med yang dag 'phel bar 'gyur/ /phyi nas las ni yang dag brtsam/ /du ma'i dud 'gro'i zhal lha mo/ /sum cu rtsa
bdun gzugs can rnams/ /las kyi rdo rje 'joms byas nas/ /ting 'dzin gsum gyi rnal 'byor ldan/ /bdun cu gnyis phyag drag mo ste/ /zhabs bco brgyad ni rnams kyis ldan/ /rtsa
ba'i zhal ni phag zhal te/ /ngos gnyis dag tu dgu dgu 'o/ /de yi steng du bdun bdun te/ /phyi nas gsum ni gzhag par bya/ /g.yas su khyi dang lce spyang dang / /byi la stag dang seng ge
dang | |'jigs phyed mche can rta bong bu/ /de ltar ji ltar rim pas so/ /g.yon du ba lang ma he spyang / /rus sbal chu srin ri bong dang / /bse dang g.yag dang mun dza dang / /ji lta'i rim
pas mtshon par bya/ /sbrul dang sre mo rtsangs pa dang / /sram dang byi ba dang ni dom/ /mkha' lding bya rgod bya rog dang / /'ug pa bya gar khra ngang ni/ /srin bya dang ni ngur ba dang / /rma
bya zangs kyi gtsug phud can/ /phug ron 'di rnams thams cad la/ /rang bzhin mdog tu 'dod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyis bya nges par ni/ /rang bzhin gang gi khams la'o/ /yon
tan sum cu gsum bdag ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de yi gzugs brnyan gyi ni zhal/ /'gro la byang chub byed bdag nyid/ /zhabs rnams kyis ni 'byung po'i
@#/ /tshogs/ /me yi dbus su son pa gnon/ /g.yas pas khyab 'jug drag po dang / /tshangs pa nyi ma me dang ni/ /dbang po rlung dang bden bral dang / /
gnod sbyin ji lta'i rim pa'o/ /g.yon pa gshin rje 'dod pa dang / /zla ba chu lha nor rgyas dang / /sa dang tshogs kyi bdag po dang / /smin drug bu dang 'khor bsgyur te/ /de ltar bco
brgyad dbyibs rnams ni/ /'dus pa rmad byung ba sngags pa'o/ /'dzin 'gyur rang gi sems kyis ni/ /lha mo'i zhabs ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /g.yas par mtshon cha'i tshogs kyang ni/ /
rdo rje ral gri mdung dbal can/ /dgra sta gri gug mda' dang ni/ /gsal shing phub dang tho ba dang / /'khor lo Da ru chu gri dang / /dbyug pa dang ni mtshon rtse gcig /dung dang
zangs dung dbyug gu dang / /rma bya'i mjug ma de bzhin te/ /bya rog sgro dang pir dang ni/ /me yi thab dang ri bo dang / /dbyug pa me long pi wang dang / /rkang mgo lag pa glo ba
dang | |sgyu ma sgra gcan lcags sgrog dang / /gdos dang sgrog dang nya rgya dang / /mgo bcad 'bar ba mar nag dang / /'jigs byed gzugs te rim pas so/ /g.yon par dril bu
phub rings mche/ /tho ba zhags pa thod pa dang / /gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga po ti/ /phub chung yu can sdigs mdzub dang / /g.yer ka'i phreng dang lcags sgrog dang / /brag dang dur khrod
rdul dang ni/ /b+ho kaM Da ka lpags rlon dang / /skra yi thag pa 'phyang ba dang / /skul byed ro yi shing bu dang / /brag dang phub dang mgo bo dang / /keng rus zor pa de bzhin te/ /mig
dang mkhal ma gnye ma dang / /spen pa dang ni phur pa dang / /sa bon gang dang sog le dang / /khab dang lus kyi pags pa dang / /sprin cher 'bab dang shing ral gri /de ltar rim pas
shes byas pas/ /bdun cu rtsa gnyis rgyud kyi rtsa'o/ /gnyis lhag pa yi phyag gnyis kyis/ /glang po'i pags pa steng bgos pa'o/ /khams gsum glang po la bzhugs pa/ /
dral ba bgegs ni bcom pa'o/ /kun gyi kha dog rang bzhin te/ /yang na gtso mo'i kha dog bzhin/ /mgo bo'i phreng sogs thams cad dang / /gos dang rgyan rnams lus skyes
pa'o| |de ltar yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'i/ /gzugs brnyan can mar shes par bya/ /yang dag dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /dngos dbye rkang gnyis bdag nyid do/ /ting 'dzin dra bas
kun bkang nas/ /'od gsal ba la kun thim byos/ /rtogs nas sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur/ /sna tshogs dud 'gro sogs skye'o/ /rang rang skad kyis chos kyang ni/ /rang rig
skyes la ston par 'gyur/ /sU yi yi ges 'gro kun rgyas btab ste/ /lhan skyes rang bzhin de nyid dran par bya/ /slar yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'ong ngo / /phyugs gang yin
@#/ /pa'i skye bo rnams sangs rgyas/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin
gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ phag gdong ma bskyed pa dang / dkyil 'khor
la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas brtan pa'i sbyor ba 'dir/ /bshad kyi sgom pa po rnams nyon/ /kun nas dus ni bzhi rnams su/ /
zla ba gsum gsum pa ni bzhi/ /bgrod dang mnyam pas bcings pa yi/ /mtshams de rnams ni rab bshad bya/ /byang du bgrod pa la sogs pa/ /brtan ma la sogs mtshams
gnas ma/ /nye ba'i gling du gnas pa mo/ /mgo yi zla ba dang ni gzhu/ /mo hi ta ni rtag tu de'i/ /las gnyis dag tu shes bya ste/ /sgom po rnams kyi dus min pa'i/ /'chi ba
mche bas gcod ma gang / /de yis gshin rje'i mcher shes bya/ /thog mar yi ge gnyis can no/ /bcom ldan dus min 'chi ba ni/ /mi rnams la ni ji ltar 'byung / /gang
gis drin gyis bdag rig 'gyur/ /su zhig bdag la sprul par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /brtan ma dus min 'chi ba ni/ /sems can rang rang las
kyis so/ /skye bo kun la 'tshe ba yi/ /sdig gang bdag nyid kyis byas pa/ /de yis de ni dus min 'chi/ /khams dang dbugs ni 'chad par 'gyur/ /gzhan rnams kyis ni bcad
pa yis/ /bza' btung phyin ci log tu 'gyur/ /sbyin pa rnyed pa dang bcas sbyin/ /dus min gyis ni nyams mi 'gyur/ /sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis su bshad/ /lus dang bsam pa las
kyang ngo / /g.yon gyi sna yi sgo ru ni/ /zla ba rgyu ba'i rim pa yis/ /bgrod pa'i srog ni nyi ma'i ste/ /a ba d+hU tI'i rlung rim pas/ /de yis ya yi yi ge bshad/ /ma yi yi ge dbus
'bab ma'o/ /hA yig g.yas su song nas ni/ /re zhig dbus ma rgyu bar 'gyur/ /a yi yi ges gnas pa 'thob/ /slu ba nam mkhar 'gro ba mo/ /rtsa ni bde kun bdag nyid rnams/ /
d+hi yi yi ge'i ming du shes/ /mdor bsdus pa yi yi ge ni/ /dkyil 'khor lnga rnams su ni brjod/ /de rnams dngos las khyab bskyed de/ /dus min blu bar rig par bya/ /de ltar
bsod nams gcig nyid po/ /gnas gnas bgrod pa'i lus can no/ /'chi ba zhes 'di rnam rtog ste/ /mkha' spyod go 'phang 'khrid par 'gyur/ /'dir ni kha dog gnyis su
'gyur/ /lus sgom pa ni de bzhin no/ /ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma'i rim pas/ /mtshan ma mtshon cha sogs 'gyur ro/ /spong ba'i chos zhes bya bar gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor
@#/ /dbus kyi gtso mo'o/ /rnal 'byor sum cu bdun bdag nyid/ /sngags las byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /oM AHsa hUM ha ba sra dzra b+hu ya dza ma b+hA dA su D+hi rA
kA ya yai hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA swA hA hA hA oM/ 'di ni shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i gtso/ /gshin rje mche ba'i rab sbyor bas/ /
skye ba mthar byed bza' bar bya/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag
pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ /gshin rje brtan ma'i rnam par gzhag pa dang / /bskyed pa'i
mtshan nyid zhes bya ba ste/ le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas gshin rje pho nya 'chang / /gang gis 'chi ba dbang 'gyur ba'o/ /bri sh+tsi ka ru yang dag byung / /
smin drug can dang bzang por ldan/ /dpyid kyis mnyam pa'i dus kyis ni/ /pho nya ma bskyed mtshan nyid do/ /gshin rje gsod pa de yi ni/ /'chi ba blu ba'i 'khor lo la/ /
rtsi bas bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo cher/ /lan gsum du ni bskor bar bya/ /lnga rnams nyi shu rtsa lngar ni/ /bcu gsum par ni bri bar bya/ /slar yang sum cu gnyis rnams su//
gsum gnyis gcig ni lo yin no/ /dus tshod me dang gnyis zla ba/ /zla ba'o tshes phyogs de bzhin mnga'/ /gsum gnyis gcig gi skabs su ni/ /rim pas phyi nas nyi phyed
sogs/ /nyi ma gcig dang zhag dang gnyis/ /gsum bzhi sa dang nyi ma phyogs/ /nor ro chu phyogs rim pas te/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid gsal ba'o/ /srog gi nus par shes bya
ba| |bcu dgu yi ni bdag nyid do/ /bcu dgu slar yang 'di ru ni/ /'joms pa'i bdag nyid nus can no/ /nyi mar bdun po mnyam son par/ /skye ba'i skar ma dang zla ba/ /gcig
tu spyod par rtag rgyu las/ /rgyas pa'i dus ni yang dag 'thob/ /bar gyi nyi ma rnams nyid ni/ /bcu drug grangs su shes bya la/ /bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa yis/ /lo yi rim pas
yang dag sbyor/ /de phyir pho nya'i lha mo yang / /dkyil 'khor bdag nyid can bsgom bya/ /gang du rtsa ni srog spangs pa/ /der ni 'di de 'bab par bya/ /steng du yal 'dab steng rtsa ba/ /
gsang ba yis ni dbugs bya ba'o/ /de ni mnyam pa mtshams kun te/ /mnyam pa ya yig gis 'gugs ma'o/ /de nas gnad bcings pas nyams pa/ /ma yi yi ges thams
cad bshad/ /'og dang steng du bskyod byas nas/ /rnon po'i me ni rab sbar bya/ /nad rnams dang ni sdig mang rnams/ /las kyi rang nyid nyams par 'gyur/ /der ni sbyin pa sbyin bya
@#/ /ste| |ba lang ma he zhon sogs so/ /byang chub sems kyis lam du ni/ /mdzes ma rnams kyi de tshe btung / /der yang rang gi yan lag las/ /byung ba'i
sna sman btang bar bya/ /'o ma dang mnyam bza' bya ste/ /glo ba la sogs ma tshos pa'o/ /g.yul ngo rang nyid 'gyel ba yi/ /gal te rnyed na khrag chen po/ /the tshom spangs nas
btung bya zhing / /de yi sha yang bza' bar bya/ /yang na gang gi sa gnas su/ /'chi ltas zad nas song bar du/ /bza' ba'o mas byas na bde/ /yang na sha rnams thams
cad do/ /gos 'jam rnams kyis yongs g.yogs nas/ /bdag nyid la ni dus kun tu/ /der ni gnas pa bsre bya zhing / /me dang lhan cig nges gnas bya/ /der ni chu
dron kyang btung zhing / /bza' ba chung ngu nyung ngu'o/ /gshin rje'i pho nya bsgom bya ste/ /sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid rang / /gsang sngags kha sbyor bdag nyid can/ /ser dmar
gnyis kyi kha dog can/ /ser pos 'chi ba rengs par byed/ /dmar pos dbang du 'gugs par byed/ /lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub dngos kyi/ /lte 'og mgrin pa rkan 'gro
rnams/ /zab pas srog ni gzhan 'gro ba/ /phan tshun bug rnams su 'du 'gyur/ /de phyir kha T+wAM ga sgom ste/ /yan lag kha T+wAM sbyor bas so/ /snying ga'i pad dbus su sems
kyis| |dkyil 'khor sngon cha'i cha can no/ /lha mo'i mdog ni sngon can te/ /dbyibs sogs gzugs can ma dang mtshungs/ /oM ba badzra ra ya shu ma pA dU shwa tI d+ya ye tA hUM shU hUM la phaT
kha phaT T+wAM swA ga hA d+hA ni Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA oM hUM/ shes rab thabs bdag nyid du skyes/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rang bzhin can/ /rnal 'byor ma ni 'di rnams kun/ /bdud rtsi'i
gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /de rnams snying gar dkar ba ni/ /'khor lo thams cad rnam bsgom bya/ /de rnams nang du rang ming yang / /kha dog dkar mo 'od bcas pa/ /
rtsa yi bu ga so so yi/ /nang du'ang rnam par bsgom par bya/ /rlon dang btsos pa'i ra'i 'o ma/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang rang byung ni/ /rdo rje'i rtse mos 'thungs pas kyang / /dus su 'chi ba
nyams par 'gyur/ /zag med de nyid thob pas na/ /de la dus min 'chi ming ci/ /de phyir yang dag rab spong ba'i/ /chos nyid gshin rje'i pho nyar shes/ /rdo rje btung byas rab
bshad pa/ /las kyis rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/ /gcig ni phyi rol gyir bshad de/ /gnyis po nang gi bdag nyid 'dod/ /rdo rje rtse gsum bsgom bya ba/ /rtsa drug dus ni rgyu ba mo//
dang pa'i rgyu bar 'dzin pa'i srog /'og gi chu ni 'thung ba yi/ /bdud rtsi lnga sogs gang cung zad/ /de yi dbus su rab tu zhugs/ /'thungs pas rgas dang 'chi ba 'bros/ /rdo rje 'chang
@#/ /gi gdams ngag go /gshin rje pho nya ma yi rnal 'byor ma khyod bzhugs/ /de yis slar yang rgas dang 'chi ba med pa 'thob/ /'chi ba slong bar byed pa'i rnal
'byor ma bla med/ /rnal 'byor ma la sdig dang bsod nams mi ldan no/ /de ni mnyam pa'o mnyam srog las/ /g.yon dang g.yas dang dbu ma yi/ /rtsol ba g.yo med dngos po
las| |slar yang ya ma'i yi ge 'dod/ /pho nya phyogs gnyis kyi ngang pa/ /dbu mar zad pa'i go 'phang ngo / /de ltar rnam pa mang po ni/ /brtan pa'i blo ldan gyis mtshon bya/ /'dir
mang bshad pas ci bya ste/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin sogs pa/ /dge ba'i las kyang bsnyen bya ste/ /lus gcig lus mang po can no/ /rnal 'byor ma la mchod bya zhing / /dpa' bo
rnams la rjed par bya/ /gang zhig gang slong la yang dag /de phyir de rnams la nges sbyin/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo
rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las /gshin
rje pho nya mo bskyed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'chi ba blu ba'i 'khor lo sgom pa'i man ngag mdor bsdus pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas gshin
rje mche gtsigs ma/ /bshad kyi da ni mnyan par gyis/ /sems can rnams kyi bag chags kyi/ /skyon gyis gur la 'bigs dang sreg /gang zhig gang la las byas pas/ /de yi
dus su 'bigs par 'dod/ /brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnad rnams ni/ /gang dang der ni gnas rnams kyang / /'di rnams dbus su bya ba ste/ /dge dang dman pa mtshon par bya/ /mi
dge ba ni 'chir dogs pas/ /gnad du na bas mtshon par bya/ /gal te dus ni gcig la ni/ /rkan gsum du ni gzer pa na/ /de tshe zhag gsum na 'chi bar/ /rig bya 'di la the tshom
med| |rkang pa'i brang bar gzer ba dang / /gal te lte bar gzer ba ni/ /lha mo zhag gnyis na 'chi bar/ /skye bo rnams ni 'gyur ba 'o/ /rkang pa gnyis kyi brang mthil dang / /gal te mig tu
gzer ba na/ /de tshe zla ba gsum na yang / /'chi byed kyi ni dbang du 'gro /rkang pa'i mthil ni gzer ba dang / /gal te sna ni gzer ba na/ /zhag gsum na ni 'chi 'gyur bar/ /'di
la yang ni the tshom med/ /bshang dang gci ba'i dus su ni/ /gal te sprid par byung ba na/ /de yi de ltar dus tshod kyi/ /lo na nges par 'chi ba 'o/ /snga dro yi ni nyin lnga dang / /dbus
ma'i gung la bcu de bzhin/ /gzhan gyi gung la zla phyed gcig /nam phyed la yang zla ba ste/ /'di tshe'i de ltar dus su ni/ /gal te sprid byung sngon bzhin te/ /dus kyi nges par 'tsho
@#/ /'gyur bas/ /'di la the tshom med pa 'o/ /ltag pa yi ni mdud khung du/ /gzer na lo ni lnga rnams na/ /de ni 'chi bar 'gyur bar ni/ /zhes bya 'di
la the tshom med/ /lha mo lce rtse ma mthong na/ /de phyir zhag ni gsum na 'chi/ /nyan pha yi ni rtse mor gzer/ /'chi ba zla ba bzhi na 'o/ /mig g.yon pa yi 'bras bu ni/ /me long la
ni ma mthong na/ /de tshe zhag bdun na 'chi bar/ /sngon gyi skye bar bshad pa 'o/ /dkar po yi ni tshes gcig la/ /gal te khu ba dkar min 'gyur/ /zla ba drug na de 'chi ste/ /dmar
pos nang du nges par 'gyur/ /b+ha ga ling ga yongs sbyar ba'i/ /mtha' ru gal te sprid pa ni/ /byung na zla ba lnga na ni/ /de tshe ltung bar 'gyur ba 'o/ /sbyor ba'i dus su dril bu'i sgra//
rna dag la byung 'chi gsal bar/ /gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur pa/ /zla ba lnga na the tshom med/ /de bzhin dus ni gcig gi tshe/ /gal te zla ba nyi ma dag /gang gi sems can
la gzer ba/ /zla ba gcig tu 'tsho bcas pa 'o/ /rkang lag dag gi tshigs bzhi dang / /mthe'u chung gi ni sor mo la/ /gang gi dus gcig la gzer ba/ /nges par zla ba gcig
na 'chi/ /bsnun pa gsum gyis gzer ba ni/ /gal te nus stobs bdag mnyam pa/ /rkang pa'i mthe bong dag las dpa'/ /sa gsum du ni skye bo rnams/ /mdud pa'i rgyal po lta
bu'i tshul/ /dpe des rtag tu bshad pa 'o/ /de tshe zla drug na 'chi bar/ /gal te drag po mnyam kyang 'gyur/ /snying ga'i dbus dang de bzhin sngon/ /'dir yang mgrin pa'i
spyod yul te/ /zla phyed gsum na 'chi bar ni/ /rnam spyad spyod yul 'di la med/ /slar yang mgo bo'i rtse mor gzer/ /grong khyer gsum gyi rgya mtsho sreg /'phral du 'chi
bar shes bya bar/ /lus kyi gur du bshad pa 'o/ /rna ba'i rtsa bar de bzhin gzer/ /'phral du 'chi bar nges par bshad/ /smin ma'i dbus su de bzhin gzer/ /de yi skad
cig la 'chi 'gyur/ /sna yi rtse mor rlung grang mor/ /gyur na yongs rdzogs dus yin no/ /de ltar 'chi ba thams cad ni/ /mche gtsigs go 'phang gis blu 'o/ /kang gi dus su 'di
'gyur bar/ /gzer ni de tshe'i dus 'dir 'gyur/ /gzer ba'i gnas ni gsal mtshon nas/ /rtsa ba bcu yi mnye bar bya/ /khyab 'jug zhes bya'i mar khu ni/ /mgo bor rtag tu
gzung bar bya/ /sna nas rnam snang mar khu dang / /mar dang khrag tu yongs ldan pa 'o/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis mi gdung ste/ /skye bo dang bral khyim dron por/ /sbyor ba'i rgya mtsho che gzung
bas| |rnal 'byor ma de yang bsgom bya/ /ya| gang gi dkyil 'khor chen por ni/ /ma| dbu ma'i mtha' yi mtshan nyid las/ /g.yas su bgrod pa'i dus su ni/ /daM
@#/ /yig tshig mtshams kun tu 'o/ /bu ga gzer byed phug nas ni/ /de'i skad cig la dbyug gu dbyug /Ta| hril hril por ni 'gyur bzhin pa/ /Sha| snying
ga'i rdzing bu la sogs pa/ /shes bya mtshams kun tu yang ste/ /gzer ba'i 'chi ba blu ba la/ /i| dbang po yis ni thams cad la'ang / /yid ni de bzhin nges par gnas//
Sh+Ti yi yi ge zhes bya ba/ /de ltar tshigs bcad gnyis kyis gsungs/ /deng ni ting 'dzin zhes bya ba/ /dbang po sbyangs pas thob par gyis/ /pad snal skud phas nor bu dang / /spyi
gtsug kyang ni gcig tu bya/ /rnam shes brgyad po der gnas par/ /bsgom bya myos byed 'bab pa mo/ /kun tu skud pa de btang bas/ /gshin rje'i mche ba 'joms pa mo/ /de
yis nI yi yig bshad de/ /gzer ba thams cad rnam 'joms ma 'o/ /kha dog dmar dang sngo ba ste/ /'chi ba 'joms ma byang chub 'gro/ /de yis mtshon char 'gyur ba ni/ /
dum skyes rnal 'byor ma yi 'o/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid mchog /oM ba byA dzra g+h+ra ya dzi ma na daM aSh+Ti m+ba NI ra ya d+ha ke rA hUM ya hUM hUM pha hUM Ta
pha phaT Ta phaT swA swA hA hA/ oM| |shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin du'ang / /skud pa'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /tha skar zla ba de bzhin du/ /srang dang khyu mchog rA si'i
'o| |'dis ni byed bzhin pa yis ni/ /'chi ba blu ba dge ba 'o/ /gzhan ni de la de ltar bya/ /pho nya ma ni gsal bar brjod/ /gzhan gyi 'chi ba blu ba yang / /brgya phrag 'bum
rnams shes bar bya/ /'on kyang kun stong gnas byas nas/ /bla mchog mnyes pas byas pas so/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog
rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ /
gshin rje mche ba ma'i rab tu sbyor ba la 'jug pa'i 'chi ba blu ba la sogs pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas 'joms ma'i 'jug pa ni/ /gang gis pha
rol 'gro bshad bya/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams 'dus byas nas/ /gzhi las 'dri bar byed pa ste/ /'jug pa zhes bya ci ru bshad/ /khyab bdag pha rol ming ni ci/ /shin tu ngo
mtshar ston pas gsungs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin mdzod/ /nyon cig sgyu ma'i 'jug pa yang / /mi bden pa ni bden btags ste/ /lha mo dbang po'i dra ba ltar/ /'joms ma
yi yang 'jug pa ste/ /mthong ba na yang de la med/ /chu yi zla ba lta bu mchog /rang gi rang bzhin la 'jug 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor de nyid 'dzin rnams kyi'o/ /dus kyi 'chi ba'i
@#/ /dngos po yang / /las kyis su ni blu ba ste/ /'khor ba las ni pha rol 'gro/ /'chi med blu ba yang ni med/ /ston gyi nam nyin mnyam dus su/ /sna yi
nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rlung ni rnam par 'dzin bzhin pas/ /'chi ba'i dus ni blu ba 'o/ /brgya phrag drug dang nyi shu gcig /stong phrag rnams kyi srog rnams ni/ /
a ba d+hU tir rab zhugs pa/ /de ni 'joms mar mngon brjod pa'o/ /byis pa'i mkhas pa rmongs pa yi/ /slu ba bshad pa de ma yin/ /de min blu ba rab bshad pa/ /
'di ni bdag gi rang mtshan nyid/ /slar yang lha mo des gsungs pa/ /ya sogs de ltar don bstan pas/ /gang gang ting 'dzin dmigs nas ni/ /nam mkha' mnyam
sogs 'dus pa'i mtha'/ /rgyud ni de bzhin srog chen po/ /rdo rje lta bur yang ni bshad/ /dal gyis dal gyis 'gro bdag nyid/ /tshigs rnams kun tu thim pa 'o/ /zhi
gnas lhag mthong dag gis ni/ /byang chub 'chi ba'i spyod yul min/ /rdo rje'i sar ni 'khrid par grags/ /go 'phang chen po 'dzin mchog go /de ltar yon tan khyad
'phags pas/ /mi rnams kyi ni mi dge mdzad/ /nor chen go 'phang thob pa ni/ /yang dag spong ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /srog ni yang dag rgyu byas nas/ /dus kun tu ni nye bar
bya| |rtag tu 'chi ltas 'chi ba blu/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis lhan cig /rnal 'byor ma rnams dang mjal ba/ /bsod nams dbang gis brgyal mi 'thob/ /de rnams dang byas
dga' chen po/ /myangs pas 'chi ba blu ba yin/ /de phyir rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /mchod pa rnal 'byor pa yis bya/ /rdo rje 'chang chen go 'phang ni/ /de rnams mnyes pas thob
par 'gyur/ /rmongs pa gang zhig smod byed pa/ /de yi dngos grub mchog med do/ /de rnams la ni smad pa las/ /mnar med dmyal pa chen por 'gyur/ /de yis bsod nams
byas pas ci/ /smyung bar gnas pa'am dka' thub ci/ /rnal 'byor ma la rtag gus pa/ /skad cig yud tsam sogs kyis so/ /lha mo kha dog gnyis ma ste/ /srid dang mya
ngan 'das gzugs can/ /dkyil 'khor pa rnams dbus su ni/ /bsgom bya mtshan ma lA ma bzhin/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i sbyor ba yis/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor mas/ /

bskyed bya thabs dang bcas pa ste/ /lhan skyes sbyor pas rdo rje 'dzin/ /oM ba ma dzra hA ya d+hu ma mrAn+d+ha tha kA nI ra ye ba hUM pu hUM ShA pha ya Ta hUM pha hUM Ta pha swA Ta hA pha oM Ta swA hA/ de ltar
yungs kar tsam gyi ni/ /thig le'i dbus ma bsgom par bya/ /snying ga la sogs 'khor lo ru/ /gang du yid ni yongs sbyor gyis/ /bu mo rus sbal zla ba yang / /khrums can nye ba'i
@#/ /gling ma 'o/ /sems can don byed de nyid du/ /thim dang longs spyod sogs byed ma/ /phag mo'i sprul pa'i bdag nyid du/ /skyes pa srid pa 'joms byed
ma 'o| |bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ches/ /lha rnams thams cad gzhug pa dang / /'khor lo sgyur chen ngo bo las/ /thams cad kun ni sprul pa dang / /sangs rgyas nyid bdag
'du shes kyis/ /de'i bdag nyid du sdug par 'gyur/ /bsdu de de ltar yod min pa/ /'byin pa ru ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /'di kun sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/ /sgyu ma med cing stong nyid
med| |ngo bo kun tu sbyor ba tsam/ /sangs rgyas nyid sogs 'du bcas pa 'o/ /rdzogs ldan gsum ldan sogs dngos gnyis/ /rang gi rang bzhin mtshan nyid do/ /rnam gzhag
tsam du gsungs pa ni/ /dngos po ma 'khrul ngo bo nyid/ /rnam par rtog pas brtag par bya/ /rtog pa med par gyur pa na/ /brtag pa nyid du mi bya 'o/ /rtog dang rtog med las
grol 'gyur/ /thams cad gzigs pa rnams kyis bstan/ /gang zhig gang dngos skad cig mthong / /de mthong ri bong rwa bzhin no/ /'di yis 'gog pa med par ni/ /skye ba la
sogs yongs rtogs bya/ /sna tshogs lung dang rgyud rnams la'ang / /rig pa can 'dir rnam par dpyod/ /rnam dpyad gyur pas rigs pa ni/ /de rigs bdag gi che ba 'o/ /sems
ni de yi gzhi rtogs par/ /rna ba'i drung du brjod pa 'o/ /slob ma'i phyir dang bla ma la/ /gus phyir 'di ni gzung bar gyis/ /deng sang skye bo tshe thung la/ /rigs pa gzhan dag la yod min/ /
g.yo can rtsod pa'i dus su ni/ /blo chung bsod nams shin tu chung / /de phyir bsod nams ldan rnams kyi/ /ye shes sangs rgyas spyod yul min/ /yun ring dus nas snying rje ni/ /bsten 'gyur
rtog pa ma byed cig /bsod nams grangs med ma byas par/ /slar yang ye shes smra ba ci/ /byang chub sems ci sangs rgyas ci/ /'di la khyad par yod mi 'gyur/ /dngos po rtogs phyir
sangs rgyas dang / /de dngos byang chub sems dpa' rang / /dbang po rnams ni byang chub sems dpar bskyed/ /yul rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid du gyis/ /phung po dang ni sangs
rgyas lhan cig zungs/ /khams rnams rdo rje 'dzin par gzung bar byos/ /srid par slar yang ldog par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /thams cad 'chi ba med pa'i ngo bor zungs/ /snying rje yi
ni sbyor bas khyod bzhugs shig /gang dang gang gis gzhan gyi dgos pa gyis/ /brjod med kun la'ang nan tan byos/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'joms mtha' yi/ /'joms ma
'dus pa thams cad dang / /bgegs sogs 'byung po 'dus pa ma/ /'jig rten sdang ba thams cad dang / /yi dwags sogs dang dmyal ba'ang rung / /gshin rje la sogs khro ba
@#/ /'dir/ /sngon gyi thag chags 'joms ma 'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de
bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ gshin rje 'joms ma
'jug pa bskyed pa dang / dus su 'chi ba blu ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin te le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas
'di las gsang chen bshad/ /yang dag ting 'dzin mtshan nyid do/ /dpal he ru kar gnas gang gis/ /gus bcas las gzhan la yod min/ /'jig pa la sogs
chags pa'i mthar/ /bstan pa sprul pa'i sku gsal ba'o/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sogs 'dir/ /thams cad bsdus pa byas par 'gyur/ /thog mar gnas ni
kun bsgrub bya/ /skye bo med dang ri sogs dang / /dur khrod du bya de ru ni/ /gtor ma zhing skyong rnams la 'o/ /rnal 'byor kha yi gtsang sbra sogs/ /sngon song mchod yon la
sogs dbul/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi skur dmigs nas/ /ngas bris sogs bsgom bshad ldan par/ /yi dwags gdan can drag chen po/ /bsgom pa 'gro ba'i don dang ldan/ /
kun nas kun tu skad cig gis/ /ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs par bya/ /shrI yig 'byung ba kun gyi don/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod/ /'di dag kun rdzob gzugs dang ni/ /
'jug med bde ba'i mtha' can dang / /e waM la sogs gnyis med pa'ang / /shrI zhes bya ba'i yig des brjod/ /he yig snying ga nas kun tu/ /he ru ka sogs rang 'khor 'gro/
sgom pa kun gyi 'byung gnas las/ /'dzin pa la sogs rnam bskyed 'gyur/ /de ni rgyu stong bdag nyid de/ /rgyu bdag nyid du mi rtog pa'o/ /rang bzhin chos bdag med
pa nyid/ /de ni stong pa'i rnal 'byor gnas/ /bkod pa gang zag bdag med pa/ /rtog pa'i dra ba chen po ni/ /ru yig rkyen gyi bdag nyid can/ /de ni bdag gi bkod bral
ba'o| |slar brjod ka ni ma lus pa'i/ /bdag gis gnyis byar med shes gang / /gang phyir ci la'ang mi gnas pa/ /de phyir ka zhes bya bar brjod/ /dngos po mngon sum stong pa
min| |dngos po tsam gyi rang bzhin can/ /dpal he ru ka gnas lha mo/ /snga nas sgom pa kun 'gro ba'o/ /snying la pad+ma'i nyi dbus su/ /ye shes sa bon rang 'byung las/ /'od
zer kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /nam mkha' gang bar spro bar bya/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs/ /lha yi tshogs ni spyan drangs nas/ /nam mkha'i khongs kyi dbus su ni//
@#/ /'gro ba'i bdag po bzhag byas la/ /zla nyi shar bdag nyid skyes pa'i/ /bdud rtsi sogs kyis mchod byas nas/ /sdig pa bshags sogs
byas nas ni/ /snying rje las sogs rjes dran bya/ /stong nyid rang bzhin bdag nyid kyi/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsgom bya/ /sa bon lnga yi rang bzhin las/ /khang pa
brtsegs pa rnam sprul bya/ /rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang ba phyis/ /ri rab pad+ma'i steng du gsal/ /sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /
shes rab kha sbyor sbyor bdag nyid/ /byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'o/ /dkar dang ljang gu dmar ba dang / /ser po g.yon nas bskor bas so/ /zhal gyi ral pa'i cod
pan la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed 'dzin/ /'phrog byed dkar mo mnyam par mnan/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje dril bu glang chen gyi/ /pags
pa cang te'u gri gug dang / /dag sta rtse gsum de bzhin du/ /kha T+wAM ga snod zhags pa dang / /mgo ste g.yon dang g.yas par ro/ /'dam skyes kha dog sna tshogs la/ /
'dab ma bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang / /'khor lo'ang bcu gnyis bdag nyid can/ /sgo ni bcu drug bdag nyid dang / /nyams dga' dur khrod so gnyis na'o/ /gri gug rin
chen rdo rje dang / /pad+ma 'khor lo ral gri dang / /sna tshogs rdo rje thod pa dang / /mgo bo keng rus 'di rnams dang / /zhags pa'am lcags kyur shes bya ste/ /'khor lo 'khor
lor phreng ba 'o/ /re rer rtsibs ni sum cu drug /rdo rje pad+ma nyi ma can/ /rgyu yi rdo rje yongs gyur pa/ /lnga brgya bzhi yis lhag pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rdzogs pa 'o/ /rtag
tu glu ma'i sgra yis so/ /mnga' bdag nyi ma re rer 'gro ba mgron 'bod na/ /khyod ni ci yi phyir na stong pa nyid du bzhugs/ /bzhengs shig bzhengs shig bdag ni snying rje'i rang
bzhin te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bde chen bdag la 'dod pa mdzod/ /gson cig gson cig gzhan gyi dgos pa nub/ /'jig rten phyugs gang shi ba bzhin du 'gyur/ /bdag
gi pad+ma rgyas pa la 'dod mdzod/ /de ltar 'jig rten kun bder 'gyur bar byos/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas bdag la rol cig rol/ /lhan skyes rang bzhin brjod du med pa
thob| |sems can 'jig rten gzhan ni rmongs gyur pas/ /ji ltar khyod kyi stong pa don med 'gyur/ /khyod ni chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ste/ /ci phyir lhan skyes rang bzhin
'gro med bzhugs/ /bdag la mchog gi don gyis 'dod pa mdzod/ /de ltar khyod ni 'jig rten rnams mthun bzhud/ /glu 'dis rjes su bskul ba yis/ /rang nyid
@#/ /he ru ka rab sad/ /oM AH kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra hUM phaT hoH/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'don pa na/ /skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ldan/ /skad cig
sngags las byung bdag nyid/ /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'o/ /'jigs byed mtshan mo nag mo dang / /lte ba nyi ma che mchog la/ /gang du mdzad pa yi ni sku/ /gnag
dang ljang gu phyed phyed do/ /bdun cu rtsa drug phyag dang ni/ /zhal bcu bdun la spyan gsum pa/ /dpa' bo ral pa'i cod pa na 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdor je zla phyed can/ mche ba chen po
gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa rtag tu ni/ /ser ba dang ni ljang gu grags/ /nub ni dmar po de bzhin te/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /mche ba
gtsigs pa 'jigs par byed/ /rim pa ji lta'i mtshon cha'i mchog /g.yas dang g.yon par shes par bya/ /glang chen pags pas phyag gnyis kyis/ /skye gnas
phyag rgya de bzhin gzhan/ /rdo rje ral gri mdung ring dang / /rtse gsum ji lta'i rim pas g.yas/ /dgra sta gri gug mda' dang ni/ /gsal shing phub dang tho ba dang / /
'khor lo cang te'u chu gri dang / /dbyug to dang ni mtshon rtse gcig /dung dang zangs dung dbyig gu dang / /rma bya'i mjug ma de bzhin du/ /bya rog sgro dang pir dang ni/ /me
yi thabs dang ri bo dang / /dbyug pa me long pi wang dang / /rkang mgo lag pa glo ba dang / /rgyu ma sgra gcan lcags sgrog dang / /gdos dang du b+hu sa nya rgya/ /mgo med 'bar ba'i
mar nag dang / /'jigs byed gzugs te rim pas so/ /g.yon pa dril bu phub ring mtsho/ /gtun shing zhags pa thod pa dang / /gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga po ti/ /phub chung yu can
sdigs mdzub dang / /g.yer ka'i phreng dang lcags sgrog dang / /brag dang dur khrod rdul dang ni/ /b+ho kaM rnga dang pags rlon dang / /skra yi thag pa 'phyang ba dang / /ro srag skul
ba'i shing bu dang / /'phongs dang phub ring mgo bo dang / /keng rus zor ba de bzhin du/ /mig dang mkhal ma gnye ma dang / /spen pa yi ni phur bu dang / /sa bon gang ba sog le
dang | |khab dang slud bshus pags pa dang / /sprin char 'bab dang shing lcags kyu/ /phyag gi mtshon chang dun cu gnyis/ /de lta'i rim pas shes par bya/ /mgo po lnga yis
rgyan du byas/ /phyag rgya drug dang ldan pas klubs/ /de bzhin mgo brgya'i phreng ba dang / /dpung rgyan zhabs gdub sgra sgrogs dang / /sku la ba spu'i phreng bar ldan/ /de yi mdun
du lha mo che/ /rdo rje phag mo sngar dang mtshungs/ /shes rab thabs kyi bde bas brlan/ /sku yi tshigs skabs kun la'o/ /sna tshogs he ru ka 'bar bas/ /rnam par 'phro
@#/ /bas rnam ba sgom bya/ /dbu rnams kun la dar dbyangs kyi/ /phreng ba brtul zhugs can gyis bya/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mar shar sogs kyi/ /bar
bar du ni rnal 'byor ma/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i grangs nyid ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs drug drug go /shar la sogs nas byang gi mthar/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs drug
de bzhin/ /dang po byang nas nub kyi mthar/ /slar yang lA ma la sogs drug /nub la sogs nas lho yi mthar/ /dum skyes ma la sogs pa'i rigs/ /dang po lho
nas shar gyi mthar/ /de nas gzugs can ma sogs drug /mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can nyid/ /'o byed ma dang gzhan sgyur ma/ /byis bcas ma dang rjes 'jug
ma| |phyed gnag phyed sngon can rnams so/ /lA ma rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang / /bzang mo thod pa can nag mo/ /rgyal ma skor ma phyed ljang gu/ /gang phyir phyed dmar
rim pas so/ /dum skye ma dang dur khrod ma/ /rnam par zhum ku ru ku la ma/ /du ma gar mar grags ma rnams/ /phyed dmar pa la phyed ser mo/ /gzugs can 'jigs
byed gtsugs phud ma/ /thor tshugs ral pa can drag mo/ /lha mo phyed ser phyed nag ma'o/ /phyag mtshan la sogs phag mo bzhin/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la ni//
bdud rtsi lnga yi snod rnams so/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis de bzhin du/ /thod pa'i phreng ba sogs 'dzin ma/ /g.yon skor du ni shes bya ste/ /ri rab steng gi char skyes ma'o//
de rgyab rdo rje'i 'khor lo ni/ /sngo gnag pa yi dbus su ni/ /mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /rab gtum mo dang gtum mig ma/ /'od ldan ma
dang sna chen mo/ /dpa' blo mo dang mi'u thung ma/ /lang ka'i bdag mo shing grib ma/ /sa srung ma dang de bzhin 'dir/ /'jigs byed chen mo ru ni dran/ /rlung shugs ma dang chang
za mo| |sngo bsangs lha mo rab bzang ma/ /rta rnam dang bya gdong ma/ /'khor lo'i shugs ma dum skyes ma/ /chang 'tshong 'khor lo'i go cham/ /shin tu dpa' mo stobs chen ma//
'khor los bsgyur ma brtson chen mo/ /gshin rje ma skyes gshin rje ma/ /de bzhin g.yo byed skrag byed ma/ /gtum mo dang ni dbyangs can ma/ /'dod 'grub ma dang 'bar chen mo//
kha dog 'khor lo ji lta ba'o/ /phyag bzhi ma la zhal gcig ma/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /cang te'u gri gug de bzhin no/ /skra grol phyogs kyi gos can ma/ /sku la phyag rgya lnga sogs
te| |rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /yi dwags gdan can drag chen mo/ /'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan pa dang / /de bzhin shes rab thabs ldan
@#/ /pa'o| |de ltar gzugs med khams dang ni/ /de yang gnas su nges par brjod/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sar grags pa'o/ /slar yang gnas dang
nye gnas sogs/ /de ltar sa yi dbus su yang / /sa bcu gnyis su 'dod pa yin/ /de ltar thams cad du shes bya/ /khams gcig 'dir ni thams cad de/ /sum cu rtsa drug
bshad pa rnams/ /gtso bo yon tan kun rang bzhin/ /de ltar khams ni dpa' bo dang / /rnal 'byor ma rnams rang bzhin can/ /khor yug du ni sems can rnams/ /rdzus skyes
rigs kyi rim pas so/ /de yang sum cu rtsa drug gi /yul dang rim pas phye ba 'o/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo'o/ /de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /slar yang snying po'i 'khor lo
'di| |dmar ser kha dog la de bzhin/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi dbus su ni/ /rdo rje 'chang ma mi bskyod ma/ /rnam snang rin chen dbang mo dang / /pad+ma gar ma don yod ma/ /spyan
ma dang ni mA ma kI/ /gos dkar sgrol ma gzugs rdo rje/ /sgra dang de bzhin dri dang ro/ /reg dang chos dbyings rdo rje ma/ /sa snying ma dang mkha' snying mo/ /phyag ma 'jig rten mgon po ma//
sgrib kun sel ma kun bzang mo/ /rin chen sgron ma bdag med ma/ /khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma can/ /gshin mthar byed ma shes mtha' ma/ /phad mtha' ma bgegs mthar byed ma//
mi g.yo ma dang dbyug sngon ma/ /'dod rgyal ma dang stobs chen mo/ /gtsug tor ma dang gnod mdzes ma/ /kha dog 'khor lo ji bzhin te/ /zhal la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kun//
lhag ma rdo rje'i 'khor lo bzhin/ /nye ba'i gnas su lha mo rnams/ /rang 'dra'i thabs dang bsam par bya/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis kyang / /gzugs kyi khams dang dri med
dang | |gling dang po ru 'dod pa yin/ /'dren par rnam par shes bya dang / /chung ngu'i he ru kar 'dod dang / /gsum par pad+ma'i he ru ka /bzhi pa nam mkha' bar 'dod dang / /lnga par
'thor rlung he ru ka/ /drug par sa yi he ru ka /bdun par 'bar ba'i he ru ka /brgyad par gsher ba'i he ru ka /dgu par ye shes he ru ka /bcu par thugs kyi he ru ka /bcu gcig
gsung gi he ru ka /bcu gnyis par ni sku yir 'dod/ /bcu gnyis de rnams rdo rje che/ /he ru ka ste rgyud gzhan med/ /'khor lo gsum sdom he ru ka /de rnams dbyibs ni ci 'dra
ba| |sku mdog rang rang 'khor lo las/ /blo ldan rnams kyis mtshon par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni snying po'i 'khor lo ste/ gnyis pa'o/ /de nas de rgyab yon tan kun/ /zhes bya'i
'khor lo dkar dmar ba/ /rdo rje'i rtsibs kyi dbus sbyin pa/ /pho nya mchog sum cu drug /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs mo/ /dmangs mo gtum mo khyi 'tshong ma
@#/ /g.yung mo gar ma thod pa can/ /nya pa po dang smyig dkar ma/ /dung mkhan mo dang tha ga mo/ /khur ba mkhan mo shing bzo ma/ /phreng ma kha ma tshos ma
dang | |srin bal byed ma pho nya mo/ /bshang 'phyag ma dang rtsi mkhan ma/ /chang 'tshong ldum ra'i gnyer pa mo/ /rgyal pos bkrabs ma shan pa mo/ /so rtsi 'tshong bar byed ma
dang | |gser mgar mo dang lcags mgar mo/ /nor bu rgyud ma nags pa mo/ /kla klo o Di tshong pa mo/ /rdo bzo ma dang zhing las ma/ /ko lpags mo ste rnal 'byor ma/ /
'di rnams 'khor lo'i kha dog go/ /lhag ma thams cad snying po yi/ /'khor lo ji bzhin shes par bya/ /'dir ni zhing du shes bya ste/ /'dod khams rigs kun bdag nyid dang / /
gnyis pa'i gling zhes bya bar bshad/ /rang gi shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /'od byed pa yis de bzhin/ /bla ma rang nyid mchod par bya/ /rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni/ /thog mar
phyag 'tshal rab tu grags/ /hUM hUM phaT kyi yi ge mthar/ /de ltar 'khor lo kun la bya/ /de yi phyi rol zlum por sbyin/ /re mo gnyis ni gnag dang sngo/ /sgo dang rta babs
kha khyer dang / /dra ba dra ba phyed pas mdzes/ /shar gyi sgo yi dbus su yang / /mkha' 'gro ma 'dra'i khwa gdong ma/ /byang du 'ug pa'i gdong can ma/ /nub tu khyi gdong can
ma dang / /lho ru phag gi gdong can te/ /kha dog lA ma sogs 'dra mchog /me dang bden bral rlung dang ni/ /dbang ldan mtshams na gnas pa mo/ /gshin rje brtan ma pho nya mo/ /
mche gcigs 'joms ma rim ji bzhin/ /kha dog gnyis gnyis mnyam par bya/ /zhal ni rjes su mthun rim pas/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho yi sa gzhi rtag
pa ru/ /gnag dang sngo dang ljang dang dmar/ /ser po yi ni mdog tu bya/ /lhan skyes dkyil 'khor de bzhin du/ /gang phyir 'khor lo rim pa bzhi/ /chos dang longs spyod
rdzogs sprul pa/ /mjug tu bya'o rim ji bzhin/ /'khor lo gnyis par ri mo gsum/ /gsum pa la ni ri mo bzhi/ /bzhi pa ri mo lnga'i bdag nyid/ /dur khrod kun
nas rim pas te/ /phyi rol la sogs sa gzhi ni/ /zlum po'i dbyibs su bya bar 'dod/ /'khor lo ri mo lnga'i bdag nyid/ /grwa bzhi pa la kun tu 'bar/ /de la lhan
skyes 'khor lo yi/ /dur khrod rnams ni bshad bya ste/ /gtum drag tshang tshing de bzhin du/ /'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i keng rus can/ /'jigs sde shar la sogs pa yi//
phyogs su g.yon skor yongs su gnas/ /aT+Ta T+Tar rgod dbang ldan du/ /dpal gyi nags ni sreg zar te/ /mun pa drag po bden bral du/ /rlung du ki li ki li sgrogs/ /
@#/ /dur khrod drag po'i gzugs rnams ni/ /ro langs 'byung po ce sbyang sgra/ /rim pa 'di yis gnas pa ste/ /dur khrod brgyad po rnams su
yang | |shing dang phyogs skyong klu dbang ste/ /shir shing khyab nas kaM ka li/ /tsu ta'i shing dang n+ya gro d+ha/ /de bzhin ka rany+dza ka nyid/ /la tA par ka Ti dang pi tha ba/ /dbang
po nor sbyin de bzhin du/ /klu dbang dang ni gshin rje'i bdag /dbang ldan de nas sreg za dang / /srin po'i dbang po rlung bdag po/ /nor rgyas 'jog po de bzhin du/ /stobs kyi
rgyu dang pad+ma nyid/ /pad chen hu lu hu lu dang / /rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong ngo / /sgrogs pa dang ni 'ur sgrogs dang / /drag po 'khyil pa mthug de bzhin/ /gang pa char 'bebs
gtum po ste/ /'di rnams sprin gyi bdag po 'o/ /'dir ni dur khrod thams cad la/ /rdo rje phreng ba rnam par sbyin/ /thams cad kyang 'dir de bzhin bya/ /phyi dang nang du 'dod pa yin/ /
zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yon tan gyi 'khor lo'o/ /de nas phyi rol nam mkha' yi/ /'khor lo 'dam skyes sngon po mtshungs/ /sum cu drug rtsibs dbus su yang / /mkha'
spyod rnal 'byor ma 'di rnams/ /mi'am ci mo dri za mo/ /hu Tu ka ma pA Ta ba ma de bzhin du/ /pi wang gling bu mu kun da ma dang / /rdza rnga ma dang nges par gag ga ri/ /cha yang
ma dang shA+e lan dri ki ma/ /glu ma ka ra Da dang ta ma DA mchog dang / /gar ma sgeg mo Ta ka ka ma dang ni/ /tA li shar Na mo rnga chen mo/ /mau dri rgyud can ma dang ma ru ma/ /na la ba mo
de bzhin D+ha ma pa ki /DaM ru ma dang DUn DU ki de bzhin/ /zangs dung ma dang rwa dung ma de bzhin/ /b+hu ki ma dang dril bu ma dang dril chung ma/ /g.yer kha ma dang de bzhin Da ko li ka
ma dang / /gdung ma dang ni dbyangs ldan ma de bzhin/ /'khor ma mchog gi dbang phyug mo/ /kha dog sna tshogs bkra ba 'am/ /yang na 'khor lo'i kha dog go/ /nye ba'i zhing na gnas ba
mo| |gling ni gsum pa mo mchog go /mkha' la spyod ma'i rigs su byon/ /gling 'di la ni yang dag gnas/ /sa ni 'od 'phro can de dang / /rang rang gnas sogs zhing ba 'o/ /yang
na DaM ru kha T+wAM ga /'dir ni slar yang spangs nas su/ /rang rang mtshan ma so so'i tshul/ /ji ltar 'dod par bya ba'o/ /'khor lo kun gyi cod pan la/ /rang gi bdag pos bya ba 'o//
'dir ni shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /rigs ldan bdag nyid rigs can ma'o/ /ji lta rgyan la sogs mang po/ /lhag ma sngon bzhin bya ba'o/ /'khor lo kun tu spyan gsum
dang | |phyogs kyi gos 'chang rdzas 'gro ma'o/ /zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i 'khor lo ste dang po'o/ /de nas phyi rol rlung 'khor lo/ /sngon po sna tshogs pa yi mdog /rdo rje'i rtsibs
@#/ /dbus sbyin bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams rim ji bzhin/ /nam mkha'i snying po las gzhan ming / /blo dang ldan pas shes par bya/ /mkha' ldong dang
ma bkra ba mo/ /bya rog bya gar sreg pa mo/ /rma bya zangs kyi gtsug phud ma/ /gu dbu li 'jam pa mo/ /phug ron bya rog chen mo dang / /ga Di ni dang gong ma sreg /ne tso sngags ma
bzhad mo dang / /bya rgod 'ug pa mchil pa mo/ /shing bye'u mo dang ngur pa ma/ /brik+Sha ra NI ka k+ka'i/ /so bya mo dang byi la mo/ /lcug ma'i mgrin dang sA ri mo/ /khra mo gur gum lce
can ma/ /bA Ti rI kA kaM dzaM g+ha mo/ /hor mo kaM ka mo de bzhin/ /dat+da ri mo ri dwags dgra /de ltar rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo/ /'khor lo'i sa gzhi gang 'dra'i mdog /yang na rang rang
las shes bya/ /phyag sogs de bzhin sngon dang mtshungs/ /thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /'dun sa ni la gnas ma mchog /sbyong dka'i sar ni shes bya ste/ /gling ni
bzhi pa mar 'dod do/ /'khor lo 'di ni sgong skyes dang / /yon tan gsum gyi dbye ba can/ /gsum gyi bdag nyid gsum pa yi/ /'khor lo drod gsher skyes gzugs can/ /
bzhi pa mngal skyes zhes bya ba/ /'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid 'dod/ /zhes bya ba ni rlung gi 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi bshad bya/ /'khor los yi ming
can mchog/ kha dog ser po'i rang bzhin la/ /sum cu drug rtsibs rnams kyis spras/ /rnal 'byor ma ni sum cu drug /sa spyod ma rnams rim ji bzhin/ /seng mo stag mo b+him+b+ha ri bod ma//

glang che ri dwags byi la mo/ /ba dang ma he mo rta mo/ /ce sbyang mo dang bse mo 'bri/ /byi ba bong mo b+hi Di ma/ /ra mo lug mo rim pa bzhin/ /khyi mo phag mo dom mo dang / /daN+Da ri mo mau dz+nyA ka/
dred mo dang ni sgeg mo dang / /nags ma dang ni khyi chen mo/ /bya rog chen mo kha sgo ma/ /sbrul mo bkra mo rnga mo dang / /sre mo rtsangs mo phug pa mo/ /grong na gnas pa ma mchog go /de
ltar 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin ma/ /yang na rang rang kha dog go /lha mo shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /nye ba'i 'dun sar gnas pa mo/ /mngon du gyur pa'i sa nyid dang / /de ni shes
rab pha rol phyin/ /lnga pa'i gling du gnas pa mo/ /mtshon cha la sogs sngon bzhin no/ /lus ni bud med rnam pa'i gzugs/ /gdong pa rang gi dngos por 'dod/ /shar dang
byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho yi sgo ru shes bya ba/ /tshangs ma dbang phyug chen po ma/ /gzhon nu khyab 'jug ma de bzhin/ /phag mo dbang mo gtum mo dang / /dpal chen mo ni grwa
rnams su/ /sgo ru gzugs dang mtshan ma ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhin du grags/ /grwa ru brtan ma la sogs bzhir/ /shes bya 'dir ni ri mo gsum/ /
@#/ /sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnams so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu mdzes/ /dur khrod rnams ni brjod bya ste/ /me yi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /gsod dang kun
tu skrag byed dang / /'jigs pa che dang 'jigs byed do/ /drag po'i dung khrod de bzhin du/ /g.yon skor du ni rnam par dgod/ /skrod byed dang ni sdang byed dang / /lkugs byed dang ni
rengs byed slar/ /dbang ldan la sogs grwa la'o/ /shing ni rim pas sbyin bya ste/ /go yu ltar ka nA li ra/ /se 'bru pil ba'i shing de nas/ /skyu ru bi dz+nyA rak+sha'i shing / /rim
pa ji bzhin rnam par dgod/ /dbang po gshin rje mchu mo/ /gnod sbyin 'byung mo drang srong ma/ /srin mo rlung gi chung ma ste/ /'jig rten skyong ma sbyin par bya/ /klu mo srin
mo thams cad ni/ /'dir ni rnam pa kun tu sbyin/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor bshad la/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sbyin/ /las kyi rjes mthun sku mdog can/ /
der ni gtso bo bsgom par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum pa sa'i dkyil 'khor la rim pa gnyis dang bcas pa'o/ /de nas phyi rol slar yang 'dir/ /me yi 'khor lo
bdag gis bshad/ /kha dog dmar po 'bar chen mo/ /sum cu drug rtsibs rnams mchog la/ /rnal 'byor ma slar dgod bya ba/ /lha sogs rigs las byung ma
ste| |lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /'byung mo ngo bo tsam po'o/ /de kun gsungs pa 'di ni ci/ /lha yi rigs 'byung bshad par bya/ /ma dang chung ma sring mo dang / /bu mo sring
mo'i bu mo dang / /pha yi sring mo de dang ni/ /zhang po yi ni chung ma dang / /chung ma'i spun zla ma dang ni/ /de nyid kyi ni pha yi ma/ /chung ma yi ni phyi mo dang / /ma yi ma dang
gnyen mo dang / /ma yi spun zla'i bu mo dang / /rang gi phyi mo'i spun zla dang / /spun zla'i bu mo de'i bu mo/ /pha yi ma dang phyi mo dang / /khu bo yi ni chung ma dang / /bu mo'i bu yi chung
ma dang / /slar yang chung ma'i spun zla dang / /rang pa'i sring mo'i bu mo dang / /de nyid kyi ni rang rigs skyes/ /spun zla'i chung ma bu mo dang / /bu nyid kyi ni chung ma dang / /bu mo'i khyo yi
ma yi ni/ /bu nyid kyi ni sgyug mo dang / /bu mo'i bu mor yang dag bshad/ /pho nya sum cu drug rnams so/ /kha dog dmar por yang dag grags/ /mtshon cha la sogs sngar dang
mtshungs/ /sa ni ring du song nyid dang / /drug pa'i gling du gnas pa mo/ /'du bar rtag tu shes bya ste/ /shes rab thabs bdag ngo bo can/ /nus pa'i 'khor lo 'di rtag tu/ /
shes bya rang 'dra'i mdzes ma'o/ /kun tu rdo rje'i phreng la sogs/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i lag pa yis/ /'dir ni mchod pa byed pa
@#/ /yin| |phyugs rnams kyi ni sha thams cad/ /kun tu son par dbul par bya/ /btung ba rnams pa sna tshogs dbul/ /bldag bya sna tshogs nyid de yis
rang rang stan las langs nas ni/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog /slar yang 'ongs nas 'khor lo yi/ /mchod pa bcu gnyis rnams la'o/ /zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
'phar ma'i me'i 'khor lo dang po'o/ /de nas de yi phyi rol bshad/ /chu yi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul che/ /mdog dkar sum cu drug rtsibs la/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rim pas bsgom/ /ma ka
ra mo rus sbal nya/ /sbal mo rus sbal chu sram mo/ /sdig nag gag+ga ra ma shI li ma/ /chu yi phug ma srin bu'i gdong ma dang / /cha ga ba mo ka ka ru mo su ya mo/ /chu byi mo dang grog mo'i
gdong ma dang / /chu yi mi mo dang ni rgod ma dang / /glang chen mo dang stag mo ci spyang mo/ /chu sbrul mo dang dung mo 'gron bu ma/ /nya phyis ma dang nor bu jang gur ma dang / /li sa mo dang
dud du ra ma kar+N+Na TA/ /pha Ta ka mo dA pa ka ma kri ma mo/ /dzu Sha dzu ShI ma dang sha sbrang ma ka lA ma/ /lha yi gtso mo mchog rnams so/ /de ltar kha dog rang bzhin no/ /dkar mo'am rang rang
rigs skyes pa mo/ /gdong ni rang rang gzugs kyis te/ /rnal 'byor ma'i rim ji bzhin no/ /nye ba'i 'du ba nyid dang ni/ /sa ni mi g.yo ba mchog go /bdun pa'i gling du gnas
pa ni/ /shes bya mtshon cha sngon bzhin no/ /yang na gang ba'i ri sogs kyis/ /mi rnams sum cu drug la'o/ /gnas sogs rim pas de rnams su/ /mi mo dngos su yang dag
bya| |'dzam bu'i gling 'di de yis ni/ /dum bu bcu gnyis kyis brgyan pa'o/ /ba tsha zhes bya'i rgya mtshor ni/ /de ru gtogs pa'i skye bo rnams/ /drod gsher skyes dang 'du 'phrod las//
skyes pa'am mngal nas skyes par bsam/ /'khor lo 'di ni drod gsher skyes/ /me yi 'khor lo mngal skyes so/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /shes rab thabs
bdag nyid rang ngo / /zhes bya ba ni chu'i 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o/ /de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /kun nas ye shes 'khor lo'o/ /sum cu drug rtsibs sna tshogs mdog /lha min mo yi
rigs rim pas/ /til mchog ma dang phul du bde/ /lha yis bu mo dga' chen ma/ /dga' dang dgar grags pad+ma can/ /dung can sna tshogs glang chen ma/ /gzugs chen ma dang
gzugs mdzes ma/ /'od chags rnam sgeg bde ba mo/ /me tog 'dod ma ut+pal dkar/ /ut+pal sngo dang mdzes ma dang / /'dod chags ma dang 'dod chags che/ /rol grags
ma dang ral chen ma/ /myos ma dang ni myos dga' ma/ /'dod pa mo dang 'dod chen ma/ /bde las 'byung dang bde ldan ma/ /mthun mchog ma dang byams pa mo/ /skal bzang ldan
@#/ /ma skal bzang mo/ /dma' ba mo dang zhum pa mo/ /skye gzugs mar ni grags pa ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gtso ma mchog /thams cad shes rab thabs
bdag nyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdog de bzhin/ /phyag dang mtshon cha sngon bzhin shes/ /legs pa'i blo gros sa de bzhin/ /dur khrod rin po cher snang ba/ /rang 'byung bde ba
byed pa po/ /de phyir longs spyod rdzogs sku dang / /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsum pa la/ /dga' ba bzhi ni dag pa yis/ /kun nas ri mo bzhi can no/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo
bzhi ru/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams rim ji bzhin/ /dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma/ /za phod ma yang rnam par dgod/ /grwa la gnas pa'i lha mo bzhi/ /spos mo ri khrod ma de bzhin/ /
gtum mo dang ni g.yung mo ste/ /rim pas sngon bzhin rtag shes bya/ /phyi rol dur khrod 'khor la ni/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ste/ /byis pa 'chi dang lhag ma za/ /g.yul drag
mo dang mche ba kun/ /shar la sogs par g.yon skor du/ /de ltar brtse ba chen pos bsam/ /du ba mun nag dang ni me/ /hA ha'i sgra dang sgra chen no/ /shing ni tsan+dan ga pur
dang / /dzA ti pha la dang e la/ /nA ga ge sar tsam pa dang / /kun tu ru dang lha'i shing ngo / /phyogs skyong rnams ni mtshon bya ba/ /nyi ma bsil ba sa yi bu/ /ri bong can skyes bla ma
nyid| |ngan spong nyi ma'i bu de bzhin/ /lha min mgo bor shes bya ste/ /drag po'i gdong rnams su bya'o/ /'bar ba ral gri chu gri dang / /mdung ring spu gri brag da bzhin/ /glog dang sna
tshogs mtshon 'bebs par/ /dur khrod kyi ni dbus su bya/ /ral gri mig sman ri lu dang / /rkang pa byug dang bcud len dang / /mtshal lham dngul chu sa 'og gi /dngos grub sgrub pa
mkhas pas bya/ /zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid do/ /de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo 'di
gsal ba'o/ /mdog gnag sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs/ /thams cad rang bzhin skyes pa mchog /klu mo gnod sbyin mo 'byung mo/ /yi dwags dmyal mo mnar med ma/ /ltung ba mo dang bar
med ma/ /bum mo gshin rje mo de bzhin/ /thig nag ma dang me mdag mo/ /tsha ba mo dang rab tsha ba/ /du 'bod ma dang ngu 'bod che/ /mar nag tu 'tshed ri gnyis 'tshir/ /sdang ma rmongs
ma phrag dog ma/ /chags myos ser sna skud pa ma/ /grangs ma ral gi'i nags ma nyid/ /du ma dang ni mu ge ma/ /nad dgon ma dang mtshon gyi dang / /chu yi dgon pa ma dang ni/ /ral gri sen
mo rab med ma/ /spu gri'i so ma 'khor lo ma/ /grul bum mo ste lha mo che/ /mdog ni 'khor lo ci 'dra ba'o/ /phyag dang mtshon cha sngon bzhin du/ /shes bya rang gi gzugs can no/ /de la
@#/ /nye ba'i dur khrod dang / /de nas sa ni chos kyi sprin/ /sems kyi rang bzhin dag pa nyid/ /kun 'gro 'khor lo can du 'dod/ /rang bzhin spangs pa bdag
med pa/ /'khor lo can sar bzhugs pa'o/ /'khor lo rnams ni rim ji bzhin/ /thams cad de ltar shes par bya/ /sgo skyong ma ni thams cad kyi/ /gnas bzhi rnams ni bcu
gnyis so/ /de ltar bcu drug shes bya ba/ /stong pa nyid ni mkhas pa yi/ /ye shes rnam shes ngo bo'i phyir/ /dur khrod bcom ldan 'das rang nyid/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'di
la ni/ /gsum gyi bdag nyid ming gis so/ /phyi nas gzhan 'di thams cad ni/ /'khor lo gnyis su bshad par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dang po'o/ /de nas
phyi rol du gzhan pa/ /gsung gi 'khor lo de bshad bya/ /dmar po btsod kyi kha dog ste/ /sum cu drug rtsibs bdag nyid gtso/ /mchod ma za ma nyid ma dang / /le lo ma chos sems
sgom mo/ /khyim sems bud med sems ma dang / /don sems ma dang sbyor bral ma/ /bu sems rnams dang mya ngan ma/ /bsam gtan ma dang sngags zlos ma/ /ngo tsha nga rgyal
gdung ba mo/ /sems can don byed brtson ma dang / /rgyal po sems ma gzhan gnod ma/ /ye shes thob ma bka' thub ma/ /rgas ma 'chi ba'i bsam can ma/ /bde ma sdug ma mi
dge ma/ /yod dang med ma nyid dang ni/ /bla ma sems ma 'gro ba mo/ /bzod ma mi bzod ma ngal ma/ /ngal sos ma dang bkres ma mchog /las ni thams cad byed lha mo/ /rang bzhin
'khor lo 'di che'o/ /kha dog rang gi 'khor lor grags/ /lhag ma 'di ni sngon bzhin no/ /shes rab thabs bdag nyid lha mo/ /rang bzhin gyi ni dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /gdan bzhi pa'i
rgyud stong phrag ni/ /bcu gnyis pa la bshad pa ste/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma sogs kyi/ /mchod sogs lha mor 'dod pa yin/ /grong mtha'i gnas ni 'di lta bu/ /kun tu 'od kyi sa
yin no/ /de ltar ye shes sogs sku'i mtha'/ /chu me rlung dang nam mkha' yis/ /bskor ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya bar/ /rdo rje mchog ma shes par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni gsung gi 'khor
lo'i gnyis pa sprul pa'i 'khor lo'o/ /de nas sku yi 'khor lo bshad/ /sku gsung thugs kyi kha dog can/ /sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs dbus su/ /rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor sgyur ma'o/ /rgyal
chen bzhi yi ris ma dang / /sum cu rtsa gsum 'khor sgyur ma/ /'thab bral dga' ldan 'khor sgyur ma/ /'phrul dga' ma dang de bzhin du/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ma dang ni/ /tshangs
ris ma yi 'khor lo ma/ /tshangs pa mdun 'don ma de bzhin/ /tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor sgyur ma/ /'od chung chad med 'od ma dang / /'od gsal ma dang dge chung ma/ /tshad med dge
@#/ /ba'i 'khor sgyur ma/ /dge rgyas ma dang sprin med ma/ /bsod nams skyes ma'i 'khor lo dang / /'bras bu che ba'i 'khor sgyur ma/ /mi che mi gdung 'khor lo
ma| |shin tu mthong ma bzang snang ma/ /'og min ma yi 'khor sgyur ma/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ma/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ma/ /ci yang med pa'i skye mched ma//
'du shes 'du shes med min ma/ /dmyal mo yi dwags ma de bzhin/ /dud 'gro mi mo lha min mo/ /gzhal med khang spyod ma de bzhin/ /zla ba nyi ma gshin rje mo/ /dbang mo 'khor
sgyur mar shes bya/ /rang gi 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin bya/ /phyag dang mtshon cha sngar bzhin no/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin te/ /nye ba'i grong mthar yang dag gnas/ /sa ni mos
pa spyod pa ste/ /'di rnams 'khor lo bcu gnyis so/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni gru bzhi ste/ /sprul pa'i skur ni 'du shes so/ /ri mo lnga ni me long sogs/ /thams cad mtshan nyid
kyis mtshan pa'o/ /brgyad gnyis lha mos byas pa yi/ /mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi la'o/ /phyi rol dur khrod brgyad rnam ste/ /sgo skyong ma ni rim ji bzhin/ /shar du chu
skyes dkar mo bsgom/ /byang du gan+d+ha ri ma 'o/ /nub tu rdo rje gar ma ste/ /lho ru rta rgod ma yi kha/ /grwa yi char ni lha mo bzhi/ /dbang ldan la sogs rim ji bzhin/ /lha mo rdo rje 'bar
zhal dang / /rdo rje khro gnyer ma'i zhal dang / /rdo rje 'thub ma gtum mo ste/ /kha dog la sogs sngon bzhin no/ /drag mo chen mo gtsigs ba'i zhal/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam mdzes
ma'o| |dpa' bo rnams kyi mdog dang gzugs/ /rnal 'byor ma kun ji lta ba'o/ /kun la mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan/ /dpa' bo rnams la dar phreng can/ /ral pa'i cod paN pa da
rnams/ /yan lag kun la thal bas bskus/ /rnal 'byor ma yi mtho zhing phreng / /lag gdub spyi gtsug brgyan pa dang / /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /phag mo'i rigs
las byung ba'o/ /dpa' bo kun gyi ming rnams ni/ /thog ma'i 'khor lo la sogs mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin du/ /sna tshogs pad+ma mkha' 'gro dang / /rin chen thod pa'i dum
bu dang / /keng rus chen po'i keng rus dang / /mche ba rnam gtsigs lha dgra dang / /'od dpag med dang rdo rje 'od/ /rdo rje sku dang myu gu can/ /rdo rje ral pa can de bzhin/ /dpa' chen
rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / /shin tu bzang dang rdo rje bzang / /'jigs byed chen po mig mi bzang / /stobs chen rin chen rdo rje dang / /rta mgrin nam mkha'i snying po dang / /he ru ka dang /
pad gar can/ /rnam snang mdzad dang rdo rje sems/ /stobs chen ye shes mkha' 'gro dang / /blo brtan thar dang ye shes dang / /thabs dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o/ /lhag ma'i ming ni
@#/ /lha mo bzhin/ /skyes bu'i rtags rnams su bya 'o/ /'khor lo bcu gcig rnams kyi ni/ /sgo la sogs pa'ang de bzhin no/ /snying po'i pad+ma'i lha mo rnams/ /gtso
bos bdag po bzhin du bya/ /'on kyang bdag po sogs 'khor lor/ /ji ltar bskal bzang rgyal ba ni/ /bzhi yis dman pa'i stong phrag gcig /de rnams thams cad rnam bsgom bya/ /
mtshan ni yon tan dbye bas phye/ /sprul pa'i sku can bdag nyid do/ /gang zhig gang gi 'khor lo yi/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thog mar 'byung / /de yi bcu gnyis shes par bya/ /kun spyod
gnas dang nye gnas ma'o/ /lhag ma sa ni bcu gsum pa/ /sgo dang grwa la sogs gnas ma'o/ /mchod dang bstod sogs dus su ni/ /thog mar rdo rje'i ming shes bya/ /dpa' bo
rnams la'ang de bzhin no/ /phyi rol dur khrod bshad bya ba/ /dang por tshig par shes bya ste/ /gnyis par yang ni ma tshig pa/ /gsum pa dum bur gyur pa nyid/ /bzhi pa yang ni
ma gtugs pa/ /lnga pa 'jigs su rung bar bshad/ /drug pa yang ni 'jigs byed pa/ /bdun pa gsal shing phug pa ste/ /steng nas btags pas brgyad pa'o/ /dur khrod brgyad
por rtag tu ni/ /dmyal srung chen po brgyad rnams so/ /shal ma li shing mya ngan med/ /yongs 'du u dum par de bzhin/ /Do m+bi ra dang gam+b+ha ri/ /rgya shug dang ni ba ru ra'o/ /
sna tshogs ro langs tshogs dang ni/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i tshogs/ /mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod gzhan/ /gang yin de las rdzu 'phrul che/ /mgo med rgyug dang gzhan yang ni/ /
mgo bo med pa gar byed dang / /nyal ba dang ni rkang med dang / /mgo dang lus sogs gtubs pa ste/ /ting 'dzin chen po'i rgyu yis ni/ /de rnams dga' byas gar byed pa'o/ /de ltar
de bzhin dbus su ni/ /sgyu skar sna tshogs bya ba yin/ /kha dog sna tshogs shes bya ste/ /gzhon pa gang gi yin pa 'o/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu'i bdag nyid/ /yongs rdzogs dkyil
'khor bsgom par bya/ /rgyu yi rdo rje ci 'dra ba/ /yang ni de 'dra spro bar bya/ /dud 'gro'i zhal can lha mo ni/ /las thams cad mas khyer nas 'ong / /khro bo'i tshogs kyis mnyam bkug
nas| |sngon du bgegs ni bsal bar bya/ /suM b+has bka' bsgo rdo rje can/ /brtul zhugs can gyis phur gdab bya/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha kA ya kAM hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na pA kA

tsi kAM hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-i h+nA la ya tsit+ta si kAM hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya hoH/ b+ha ga wA na badzra dz+nyA ni kAM hUM hUM phaT/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gzhag /rdo rje gur gyi dbus
su ni/ /'og tu rdo rje sa gzhir 'gyur/ /steng du mda' yi dra ba can/ /rdo rje'i ra ba bla re'o/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas nang du yang / /de yang gsum bzhi lnga dang ni/ /grwa drug pa ru bsgom
@#/ /par bya/ /'phar ma bzhi yi rim ji bzhin/ /rim pa thams cad 'dir dgod bya/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+Ta na phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba

pA pAM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha rod A dz+nyA pa ya ti sarba big+h+nan kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ phur bu gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra mung+ga ra badzra kI lA ko Ta ya hUM
phaT| brdungs pa'i sngags so/ /de ltar 'khor lo kun dpa' bo/ /bcom ldan rdo rje'i rigs 'byung ba'o/ /sprul pa'i sku ni ma lus pa/ /rnal 'byor ma ni byang chub snod/ /'di
ni sku'i 'khor lo sku gsum gyi bdag nyid dang / sprul pa dang / lhan cig pa ste gsum pa'o/ /de nas gnas dang nye gnas sogs/ /ji lta'i rim pa rnams gsungs pa/ /gnas ni
gang ba'i ri nyid dang / /dra ba 'dzin dang uD+yaN dang / /ar bu da yang de bzhin gnas/ /go dA ba ri nye gnas te/ /dga' ba'i dbang phyug lha mo'i mkhar/ /gyad yul yang ni nye
gnas so/ /'dod gzugs de bzhin o tre dang / /tri sha ku ne ko sal zhing / /ka ling ka dang lam pa ka /kA ny+tsi kha pa'i gnas nye zhing / /yi dwags grong dang khyim lha mo/ /sau
rASh+Ta dang gser gling ni/ /'dun sa'o nye ba'i 'dun sa ni/ /grong khyer sin+d+hu ma ru dang / /ku lu tA yang nye 'dun sa/ /'du ba chu klung 'gram dang ni/ /skyed tshal rgya mtshor rab bshad
dang | |lam gyi bzhi mdo'i nye 'du ba/ /ri yi spyi bo grong dbus dang / /tshogs can gzhon nu'i ri dang ni/ /rigs kyi zhing yang nye 'du ba'o/ /dur khrod mu mu ni ya nas/ /spyod dang hi ri ki
la dang / /sgyu ma'i grong khyer dur khrod do/ /nye ba'i dur khrod ri mtha' dang / /sngags kyi zhing dang lha yi grong / /kar+Na Ta dang paT yang / /de bzhin grong mthar bshad pa'o/ /grong mtha' kong
ka na nyid dang / /khyab bdag las kyi yul ljongs dang / /rnal 'byor ma ni stug po'i grong / /de bzhin 'dir ni nye grong mtha'o/ /pa yi nags dang khyim gyi logs/ /lteng ka dang ni rdzing
bu ste/ /gnas 'di rnams su bu mo gang / /lhan skyes rang gi skye gnas skyes/ /yul dang yul du shes bya ba/ /ye shes ldan dang gnyis med gnas/ /'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams
kyis ni/ /mda' yi dbye bas gnas skyes rnams/ /bcu gnyis gnas sogs rab bshad pa/ /sum cu drug khams rgyu yis so/ /re re yi ni khams rnams la'ang / /mig la sogs
pa'i skye mched rnams so/ /bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis su/ /shes bya lhan skyes rnal 'byor ma'o/ /sngon gyi tshigs bcad 'di yis ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni nong bar bya/ /ji
ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams khrus gsol gyur/ /de bzhin bdag la khrus byed 'gyur/ /lha yi chu yis dag par bya/ /rdo rje dang ni mkha' bar du/ /sangs
@#/ /rgyas thams cad son 'di ni/ /ye shes 'od zer byung de rnams/ /rab byung bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis ni/ /dbang bskur rdo rje mgon po yi/ /lhan skyes chus ni dgang /
phyir ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/ /'khor lo gang dang gang gi ni/ /de dang de yi rgyas gdab la/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams
bdag pos te/ /khyab bdag gzhan gyis rgyas mi gdab/ /ye shes ting 'dzin sems dpa' yang / /'khor lo kun la bsgom par bya/ /de las byung ba'i 'od tshogs kyis/ /ye
shes 'khor lo dgug par bya/ /dzaH hUM baM hoH 'i yig rnams kyis/ /bla ma'i man ngag las shes bya/ /sna tshogs dpa' bo rnal 'byor mas/ /gtso bo la ni mchod byed gzhug /
thig le dang ni phra mo che'i/ /rnal 'byor gnyis ni yongs dmigs bya/ /'khor lo bcu gnyis thig le yang / /rdo rje'i rnam pa rnams su mtshon/ /lte ba'i 'og steng rtsa rnams ni/ /stong
phrag gcig ni thig le can/ /rtse mo bcu yi thig le rnams/ /ji lta'i rim pa rnams su mtshon/ /du ba la sogs brgya phrag gcig /thig le'i gnas su 'bab par bya/ /de phyir phra mo
gang ci la'ang rung / /sangs rgyas spyod yul min de bsgom/ /rdo rje'i srog rnams la bltas pas/ /phyag rgya che de sangs rgyas de/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa bya ba ni/ /rkang pa brgyad
lhag rtsa ba ni/ /bzhi bcu la sogs 'di rnams kyis/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa dang / /bde chen sogs dang bzang po dang / /gnyis kun rnam par spangs pa dang / /mchod
