ba srog dang thur sel la'o/ /Sh+Ta yig tshigs pa thams cad du/ /shes par byed par the tshom med/ /yan lag rab tu rnam 'byed des/ /chos bdag med pa'i byang chub rtogs/ /
'di dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /dbye ba dang ni gsad pa ste/ /dbang po dang ni yul thams cad/ /mi bskyod pa yi 'jig rten spyod/ /brtse bas de rnams bsad pa yis/ /bdag
nyid kyis ni grol rgyu can/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /mchog gi gtso mo bsgom pa yin/ /smin dbus phyogs su gzugs rnams ni/ /dkar ba'am dmar dang
mtshon cha rnams/ /de'i dus nyid du yang dag byung / /sum cu rtsa bdun yig rnams su/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid gzugs/ /mchog gi gtso bo shes par bya/ /oM sa dz+nyA rba nA

ka mr-i rma ta pra pa baR+ShA rta pa nA NA ya ya ne hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA swA hA hA/ oM shauN+Di nI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ bsgom bdag nyid can rnal 'byor ches/ /ji ltar yid 'dod las bya
@#/ /ste| |dur khrod sol ba'i snag che yis/ /mi yi rus pas bri bar bya/ /sman thams cad kyi rgyu skar ni/ /rgyal sogs khams rnam sa mnyam pas so/ /
'khor lo sngon du brjod pa ste/ /dum bu'ang gcig sman lnga bcu'o/ /phan tshun zung gi gsang sngags su/ /yi ge'ang mkhas pas dgod par bya/ /grwa bzhir rnam par snang
mdzad de/ /sgo bzhi rnams ni stong pa'o/ /lhag ma thog ma'i phreng la ni/ /dum bzhi rnams su rim pas gang / /h+Na sum+b+ha gri dgod par bya/ /de la gnyis pa'i dum bdun la/ /
gr-i ya hoH gr-i b+ha ga pa ya/ /bA na bi phaT rim bzhin bri/ /gsum pa dbus ma'i logs su ni/ /gsum gsum rnams ni sbyin bya ste/ /phaT h+Na hUM hUM h+NA sbyin bya/ /bzhi par
dbus las thams cad du/ /phyogs su re re dor ba dang / /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sgo gnyis kyi/ /dbus su yi ge gnyis gnyis te/ /pa ya d+yA rA sbyin par bya/ /phreng lnga pa
la dgod bya ba/ /dbus ma'i logs su gsum gsum ste/ /hUM pa ya hUM hUM gr-i su dgod de/ /'di rnams ji lta'i 'dir rim pas/ /drug pa'i phreng la shes bya'o/ /h+Na an hUM
hUM hUM phaT de bzhin/ /phaT dza hUM phaT rim ji ltar/ /sngags thams cad ni sbyin bya ba/ /dum bu bdun pa rnams la bshad/ /sgo spangs pa la rim pa yis/ /sbyin bya hUM hUM m+b+ha
hUM| |'khrul 'khor chen po'i chen po'o/ /dbus kyi dum bu lnga rnams dang / /de bzhin du ni sgo bzhi ru/ /bsgrub bya'i ming nang bcug pa yi/ /rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags bcas
pa'o| |ro langs 'thab par 'gyur ba ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bya'o/ /de dag lta bar 'khrul 'khor te/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor
las| |rdo rje sams dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor
ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ chang 'tshong ma'i rab tu sbyor bas dbye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ste/ le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi
pa'o|| ||de nas 'khor lo'i go cha ma'i/ /ting 'dzin gsal bar bshad bya ste/ /'khor lo'i go cha ma'i sbyor bas/ /lkugs par bcing ba'i sbyor ba'o/ /gser
gling gi ni gnas dang ni/ /de nas dran byang chub yan lag /srin po'i rnam pa'i 'khrul 'khor te/ /cho ga gzhan du rab 'jug 'gyur/ /spyi gtsug mthil gyi sa gzhi la/ /mkhas pa
yis ni bya ba yin/ /lha dang lha min 'thab mo cher/ /mi smrar gyur to de'i 'jug pa/ /de yi dus su gzugs chen po/ /'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bltas/ /yi ge gnyis kyis
@#/ /'chad pa ni/ /g.yo ba'i sems ni 'ching ba ste/ /gnon pa rnam par shes pa'i chos/ /gzugs kyi dbus su thim par gyis/ /rgyud du dam pa'i chos
bstan pa/ /'dir ni phyag rgya gnyis kyis bshad/ /de bzhin sngon gyi spyod pas kyang / /sbyor ba'i phyag rgya spyod par 'gyur/ /thams cad man ngag le'u ru/ /de yi rgyu can bsgoms pa
yis| |rim pa 'di kun zab mor ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsrung byas te/ /nam mkha' mkha' med nam mkha' che/ /shin tu nam mkha' nam mkha'i min/ /gyen du phyogs pa'i
rtsar 'bab ste/ /ji srid ri mo mi mthong bar/ /de srid rgyun mi 'chad pa 'thob/ /dga' skyes bde ba'ang cis mi 'bab/ /dngos dang dngos med 'dres pa yis/ /skye bo kun
nas byung ba yis/ /dngos med gzugs bdag nyid ma yin/ /dngos med thams cad las skyes bde/ /lam la gnas pa 'khyer 'gyur te/ /gang der ji ltar de bzhin no//
ye shes lkugs pa bzhin du gnas/ /'ching bas rang gi phyag rgya skyes/ /'di yis lkugs par 'gro ba ste/ /dgra bzhin du ni kun la 'bigs/ /rdo rje 'dzin kyang lkugs
nyid na/ /skye 'gro phra mo slar ci dgos/ /thams cad rig pas byed po byed/ /byed bo gzhan ni srid ma yin/ /yid bzang ma dang gang zag nyid/ /bdag med rig 'gyur skad cig las/ /
rdo rje theg par de tshe gnas/ /rang bzhin bdag med par 'dod do/ /brjod pa bdag med brjod pa yang / /rnal 'byor mthong bas 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de las langs pa'i rnal 'byor che/ /
h+Na yig gzhan dngos rnams kyis min/ /gnyis bdag bsrub cing bsrub pa ni/ /dang po spyi gtsug rkang mthar ro/ /rnam gnyis rjes su sbyor ba yis/ /dbus kyi mda' ni sngags skyes
so| |mtshon bya mtshon pas gang mtshon pa/ /mtshon par bya dang mtshon byed min/ /pad snal lta bu'i skud pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mtha'i gnas phyin/ /mda' dang gzhu ni mi
mthong ste/ /gang du btang zhing 'gro bar bya/ /de tshe srog kun lkugs par ni/ /'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i bsgom pa ste/ /de yi dbus su 'di dgod
pa| |'khor lo'i go cha ma lha mo/ /mdog dang dbyibs ni spon gyi can/ /sngags yig rnams las byung ba ni/ /shes rab thabs bdag nyid can mchog /oM sa barban+d+ha bin ka ka

la rA pa ya b+ha hUM dz+nya hUM na pha ka Ta rA pha ya Ta hUM swA hUM hA phaT phaT swAhA/ oM tsakra barmi Ni ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes bya sngags rab sbyor bdag nyid/ /lkugs pa'i rnam shes bsgrub
par bya/ /sngon gyi 'khrul 'khor bris nas ni/ /gsang sngags phreng ba 'di dgod bya/ /thog mar rnam par snang mdzad de/ /gnyis par wan ni rnam par sbyin/ /baM yig gsum par
@#/ /sbyin par bya/ /bzhi par hUM gi yi ge'o/ /lnga par d+yA yig yi ge ste/ /dum bu drug par rA sbyin bya/ /bdun par gr-i yi yi ge ste/ /brgyad par ga yi yi
ge'o| |dgu par m+b+ha yi yig sbyin bya/ /bcu par h+Na yig slar dgod do/ /gr-i yig bcu gcig pa ru te/ /hUM yig bcu gnyis par dgod bya/ /bcu gsum pa ru gr-i yig ste/ /bcu bzhi pa
la dza yig go/ /bco lnga pa la b+ha yig ste/ /pa ya gnyis dgod bcu drug par/ /bcu bdun pa la su yig ste/ /pha yig bco brgyad par dgod bya/ /gcig nyung nyi shur hUM sbyin no/ /nyi shu
pa la Ta'i yi ge/ /nyi shu gcig par yi ge hUM/ /nyi shu gnyis par hUM 'gyur ro/ /nyi shu gsum par gr-i yig ste/ /hUM yig nyi shu bzhi par ro/ /nyi shu drug par Ta yig sbyin/ /nyi shu
bdun par pa'i yi ge/ /hUM yig nyi shu brgyad par te/ /hoH yig nyi shu rtsa dgu pa dang / /sum cu pa la h+NA yig sbyin/ /sum cu gcig par h+Na dgod bya/ /hUM yig sum cu gnyis par
sbyin| |sum cu gsum 'dir m+b+ha yig go /sum cu bzhi par hUM yig ste/ /de nyid sum cu lnga par ro/ /sum cu drug par ya yig sbyin/ /h+Na yig sum cu bdun par te/ /sum cu
brgyad par pa ya gnyis/ /gcig dman bzhi bcu pa la hUM/ /bzhi bcu pa la hUM sbyin bya/ /bzhi bcu gcig par ni b+ha yi ga'o/ /hUM yig bzhi bcu gnyis par sbyin/ /bzhi bcu rtsa
gsum par la oM/ /ya na'i yig gnyis sbyin bya ba/ /dum bu bzhi bcu bzhi par ro/ /bzhi bcu lnga par A na ste/ /bzhi bcu drug par phaT de bzhin/ /bzhi bcu bdun pa la ni oM/ /
bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa la phaT/ /bzhi bcu dgu par su sbyin bya/ /thams cad ji lta'i rim pas so/ /dum bu dbus mar bsgrub bya'i ming / /ka ra ka ra sogs nang bcug /thams cad
bsdus nas shes byas nas/ /lkugs par bcing bar bya ba ni/ /bye ba steng du 'gro ba'i sgor/ /'khrul 'khor glang mig bcas par sba/ /a ba d+hU tI ra yid byas nas/ /de yi dbus
su rab tu gzhug /phyogs thams cad du srin po ni/ /byas nas 'khrul 'khor sgrub pa'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha'
'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'khor lo'i go cha ma'i
lkugs par bya ba'i rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang / 'khor lo sgom pa dang / dpa' bo dang gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor srin po'i rnam pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo
zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas shin tu dpa' mo'i las/ /zhi bar byed pa gsal bshad bya/ /rab sbyor de rnams kyis bya ste/ /na ga rar ni yang dag
@#/ /bzhugs/ /btang snyoms byang chub yan lag ste/ /lha yi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul che/ /dpral ba'i gnas su lha mo ni/ /skye 'gro'i bdag mo bsgom par
bya| |dbang gnyis yang dag 'dus pa las/ /rtsa chen po ni bde bas gang / /bcu gnyis mtha' ru bskyod pa las/ /'dir ni sa bon g.yo ba med/ /dbang po la sogs thams
cad ni/ /'dod chags bral ba nyid 'thob 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po mnyam pa'i bde/ /slar yang bde ba'i rang bzhin med/ /'dod chags zhe sdang mun dri ma/ /rnam bral pha
rol son pa che/ /'thob bo dga' ba de yis ni/ /skyes bu dang ni gnyis med rtse/ /theg pa gsum pas gzhan med de/ /de rnams kyi ni blta dus kun/ /'gro dang nyal dang za ba
na| |rnal 'byor sgrub pas spangs pa yin/ /dga' rol rtsed mo rtse ba dang / /glu len pa yis gos pa med/ /de phyir btang snyoms byang yan lag /gnas skabs kun rjes
spangs pas so/ /de ltar zhi don du byas pas/ /don yod mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang dang gang gi sems can ni/ /nad pa la sogs la bltas pas/ /de dang de yi
sems can ni/ /zhi ba'i las can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang myur du na/ /phra mo'i las ni smos ci dgos/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbus su/ /shin tu dpa' mo
bsgom par bya/ /lha mo rtag tu mdog dkar mo/ /lhag ma sngon ma lta bu mchog /gsang sngags phreng ba'i rab sbyor bas/ /shes rab dang ni thabs byung ba'o/ /gtor ma sbyin sreg cho ga
yis| |blo ldan zhi rdzas rnams kyis te/ /zho mar 'o ma zas rnams kyis/ /'dir ni dgang blugs dbul bar bya/ /ga bur tsan+dan la sogs pas/ /'khrul 'khor sngon gyi bri bar bya/ /

oM pa mu raN+DA kri ba ta lI ya lan+t+ra ga ma nAn+t+ra sha nA rI sha rA nA ya ya hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA swA hA hA/ oM su bI rI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes bya sngags yig sa bon te/ /
skye ba dang ni gnas pa'i rgyu/ /ye shes sa bon thams cad rnams/ /sngags pas dpral ba sogs par ro/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams rtse dus las/ /bskyed par 'gyur zhing 'gag par
'gyur/ /dum bu bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ru/ /sngags kyi phreng ba 'di dgod bya/ /dum dbus phyi rol brgyad rnams su/ /phyogs mtshams ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /rnam par snang mdzad
sa bon bzhi/ /hUM gi yi ge bzhi rnams so/ /de phyi dum bu bcu drug tu/ /phyogs mtshams rim pa ji bzhin pas/ /hUM yig brgyad ni dgod bya zhing / /de nas gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na'i tshig /sum+b+ha
ni su 'o dum lhag ma/ /de yi phyi rol nyi shur bzhir/ /m+b+ha grih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya/ /'dir ni bri bar bya ba ste/ /A na ya A na ya ho'i tshig /b+ha ga wan bi d+yA rA dza dang / /phaT yig de
@#/ /nas bri bar bya/ /dbus ma'i dum bur bsgrub bya ni/ /gnod mdzes sngags kyi nang bcug pa'o/ /lha yi gzugs kyi khar bri bya/ /de ltar lha yi 'khrul
'khor ni/ /ling ge'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ /kun tu spyod kun shes par bya/ /gzhan gyi dus su mi 'grub bo/ /thig le sgra yi dus su ni/ /rlung gi dbyibs ni brtan pa yis//
sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi/ /zhi ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ni/ /slar yang sa gzhi'i 'jig rten pa'i/ /zhi ba'i dgos byed smos ci dgos/ /de byed rnal 'byor dbang
phyug ni/ /lha dang lha min rnams kyis mchod/ /de yang sangs rgyas nyid thob na/ /de zhabs 'bring byed smos ci dgos/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas sogs chen pos/ /de ni phyag
'os mchod 'os so/ /bsam gtan sngags kyi bzlas pa dang / /sbyin sreg ya ga sogs mchog tu/ /zhi dang byang chub kyi ni sems/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /rtsa ba'i
sngags ni bzlas pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pas/ /kun mkhyen skye ba 'di la'o/ /dpal he ru ka gnyis med lhan
cig pa'i/ /rdo rje phag mo mthong bar 'gyur/ /de yis mchog ni ster byed de/ /rang gi 'khor los bsgyur thim pa'o/ /de rnams phyag rgya'i grub byed par/ /mchog tu rmad du byung
bar 'gro/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang gnas pa/ /gnas dang gnas rnams su 'thob bo/ /he ru ka sngags 'khrul 'khor dang / /las rnams thams cad mi shes na/ /de ni
don med yongs ngal te/ /'gro ba drug tu 'khyam 'gyur zhing / /skye ba bye ba brgya phrag tu'ang / /'jig rten 'gro kun grol ba min/ /dpal he ru ka'i go 'phang gnas pa yi/ /sngags
kyi nus pas grol ba'o/ /brtse ba chen pos phag mo sogs/ /rnal 'byor ma bsnyen shes par bya/ /gnyis sbyor bde ba'i rnam pa ni/ /bud med skyes pa ma ning min/ /dngos po
tsam du sems can la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de
bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ shin tu dpa' mo'i zhi
ba'i las kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo bsgom pa dang / gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyi las kyi tshogs zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa
drug pa'o// //de nas lha mos mchod byas nas/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig dris so/ /thams cad bsrung ba'i las chen po/ /khyab bdag bdag gis mi 'tshal lo/ /
@#/ /phag mo lha rdzas pad can gyi/ /lha mo nyon cig rab bshad bya/ /stobs chen ma yi rab sbyor bas/ /sin d+hu yi ni gnas bsgrubs te/ /yang dag lta ba'i rang
bzhin du/ /mchog gi ma mo shes par bya/ /de ltar de nyid nges par byed/ /mchog gi bsgom par 'jug par bya/ /ma mo'i 'khor lo'i grong nyams dgar/ /dpa' bo'i gtso
bo bsgom par bya/ /lhan skyes byang chub rigs pa yis/ /de'i bdag nyid du gar mtshon cha/ /sngon du hA ste bgrod pa bzhin/ /drag shul sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /rnal 'byor
thams cad yongs dmigs nas/ /phung po'i rtsa ba las gzhon can/ /spyi bo yi ni thod par bzung / /oD+yan bu gar son pa ste/ /lte ba yi ni gnas thob nas/ /byang chub sa
bon rnams kyis 'dzin/ /mtshan ma yis ni bzung bar ni/ /khams thams cad kyis gang bar byas/ /la la nA yi lam son nas/ /sngon gyi gnas su yang dag rig /me yis
bzhu ba'i khams kyis ni/ /rtsa sbugs thams cad dgang bar bya/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /skad cig la ni lta zhing mthong / /zla ba 'gro ba'i dbus su ni/ /
sgor 'phyang ba ni blta bar bya/ /sbyor mchog shes byas bsgrub byas la/ /de yi rang bzhin can bsam bya/ /mdzod spur son pa'i bu ga ru/ /rlung gi lce ni gzhug par bya/ /rnal
'byor rnams kyi sgom rim pas/ /yang dag lta ba shes par bya/ /sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid mchog /shes rab rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya/ /sngags kyi yi ge las byung ba/ /shes

rab thabs bdag nyid mchog go /oM du ma Sha hA TA ra nAM k+ShA bi ka dA rA la ya ne hUM hUM hUM hUM pha pha Ta Ta pha pha Ta Ta swA swA hA hA/ dzaH hUM baM hoH oM mahA ba le hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes
bya'i sngags las lha mo che/ /ye shes sku ni yang dag byung / /gra bzhi zlum po dang bcas pa'i/ /byang chub 'khrul 'khor rtag bri ste/ /dum bu bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la/ /gsang sngags bzhi po
yang dag pa/ /dum bu re rer bri bar bya/ /dum bu lnga ru sgrub po ste/ /g+ha g+ha la sogs nang bcug pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag tu ni/ /gi waM'am ni yang na ni/ /gi waM chen
pos bri bya ba/ /gro gar 'khrul 'khor thams cad ni/ /las kyi khyad par gyis bri ste/ /g.yul ngo chen po'i ras la ni/ /las thams cad pa bya ba yin/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyan
sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal
'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ stobs chen ma'i sbyor bas srung ba chen po phur bu'i sngags kyi las byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul 'khor sgom pa'i man ngag gi cho
@#/ /ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste/ le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas las mchog thams cad ni/ /sems can kun la 'byung
bshad bya/ /'khor los bsgyur ma'i rab sbyor bar/ /ma ru'i gnas su bsgrub par bya/ /yang dag rtog pa byang chub kyi/ /phyogs su gnas bzhin par bya'o/ /rgyas pa bsgrub bya phyi
nas ni/ /mkhas pas las ni bya ba yin/ /gtum mo lte bar sbar ba yis/ /tshigs thams cad ni sreg pa ste/ /mig la sogs pa bsregs nas ni/ /bsregs pas rkan
las thig le 'dzag /'gro'o de ni mtshams kun tu/ /pad snal skud pa'i dra ba'o/ /'bigs shing 'gro bas ro myang ba/ /stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis la'o/ /'thob dang
rmugs pa'i ye shes ni/ /'gro ba med dang 'ong bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di yi rnal 'byor pa/ /lo yi sbyor bas de 'grub 'gyur/ /de dang 'di yis yang dag ldan/ /las rnams
thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /dga' ba 'jig rten thams cad du/ /zhes bya 'gro 'gyur de'i bdag nyid/ /rnam par rtog pa de khyer te/ /gom pa gcig ni 'gro mi 'gyur/ /tshigs
kun ngo bor gyur nas ni/ /bdag gi gdan ni de mthong 'gyur/ /'chi bas mi 'jigs 'di yi phyir/ /gzhan gyi gdan du yang dag gnas/ /gang gang las la bltas rnams kyis/ /
de de thams cad du byed do/ /'chi ba'i dus las shes byas pa/ /de ni rnal 'byor gdan du 'dod/ /kun mkhyen thams cad las can ni/ /gang phyir gsang ba'i gdan mchog
yin| |yang dag rtog pa'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /byang chub phyogs su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ba lang rta dang mi dang khyi/ /glang po ma he bong bu dang / /rnga mo byi chung byi la dang / /phag pa dang
ni spre'u rnams kyi/ /sha ni skyur po la btags pa/ /dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin bsreg bya/ /rang bzhin dngos grub 'thob 'gyur na/ /dngos grub brgyad po slar cis min/ /ral gri
mig sman rkang byug dang / /ril bu dngul chu mchil lham dang / /bcud len dang ni sa 'og dang / /dgug pa yang ni 'grub pa'o/ /ro langs bslang ba'i dngos grub ni/ /khyim nag mo
yi 'o ma dang / /ma Sha nag po'i thug pa yi/ /yi dwags bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo 'am/ /sngags pas tshes brgyad la ro yi/ kha ru sbyin bsreg bya de bzhin/ /dur khrod kyi ni yungs kar
ram| |mar khu 'bad pas bzung nas ni/ /des kyang dpa' bos phyug bya ste/ /de'i tshe nub mor rnam par brjod/ /yi dwags chen po de langs nas/ /dbang chen mthil la phye mar
byed| |de rtag 'jigs par mi bya ste/ /rang rkyen sbyor bas bskyed pa yin/ /til lam til mar gzhan yang ni/ /gang rung ci ru bzung byas nas/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi sems can
@#/ /sgyur| |byin pas thams cad du 'gro 'o/ /sgron ma tsun da 'od zer can/ /khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma dang / /gshin mthar bcas sogs khro bo che/ /sgom
dang sngags kyi bzlas pa ni/ /'bum phrag gcig gis sdig 'joms te/ /bye bas mjal ba 'thob par byed/ /dngos grub ci 'dra ba 'dod pa/ /stsal nas rgyun du zhugs pa yin/ /
yang na snyan ngag rig pa ste/ /lung gi don ni 'chad pa'o/ /kun shes gang thams cad kyi skad/ /ma mthong ba rnams shes par 'gyur/ /tshar bcad rjes bzung thams cad ni/ /
chos bya chos can thams cad byed/ /sgrol sogs rnal 'byor ma mchog rnams/ /rang bdag gzugs gzhan shes bya nyid/ /'di rnams kun bsdus gzugs nyid pas/ /
'khor los bsgyur ma sgom par gyis/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs 'dzin de/ /de rnams kyis ni 'khor bsgyur ma'o/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ oM tsun+de swAhA/ oM mA ri ts+yai
swAhA/ oM b+hi ku TI swAhA/ oM par+N+Na sha pa rI swAhA/ de ltar kun gyi 'khrul 'khor kyang / /sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyis bya/ /bskyed pa dang ni gnas pa'i rgyur/ /ji lta'i rig pas
bsgrub par bya/ /'od zer phreng bas kun 'khrigs pa/ /snying ga'i 'khor lor gzung bar bya/ /'di yis 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'joms te/ /rgas dang 'chi ba med 'thob byed/ /
'khor los bsgyur ma'i lha mo ni/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid mchog /mdog dang dbyibs ni rang gi ste/ /sngags yig rnams las yang dag byung / /oM kro d+ha d+ha rmo

s+phA rA rA ya s+phA ka ra rA NA ya ya huM hUM huM hUM pha pha Ta Ta pha pha Ta Ta swA swA hA hA/ oM tsakra bar+t+ti nI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de ltar sngags las yang dag byung / /mkha' 'gro ma yis
'khor los bsgyur/ /lha min 'khrul 'khor bri bya ste/ /gcig dman lnga bcu'i dum bu la/ /ji ltar lha rnams kyi ni sngags/ /bsgrub bya'i ming nang bcug pa yi/ /phag mo
yi ni snying po yang / /dum bu so so la bri 'o/ /phyi rol du ni sngags kun gyis/ /'dir ni rtag tu bskor bar bya/ /g.yul ngo yi ni ras la ni/ /rdzas kun gyis ni yongs bris
nas| |'khrul 'khor las ni thams cad la/ /lha ma yin gyi khar sbyin bya/ /lo yi nyin zhag sbyor pa can/ /thun mtshams so sor bsgom par bya/ /gshin dgra'i 'khrul
'khor bri bya ste/ /dum bu bcu bdun pa la ni/ /phyi rol bcu drug sbyin bya ba/ /hrIH Sh+TIH 'i sngags 'di dgod par bya/ /ya ma med k+She rA dzA sa do/ /ru Na yo ni rA yats+tsha ni/ /de
ltar sngags chen bris nas ni/ /las thams cad ni sgrub par bya/ /yi ge re re'i gtso bo yis/ /las rnams kyang ni bcu bdun no/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni nang bcug nas/ /
@#/ /gshin rje'i snying po'i sngags rnams ni/ /lugs bzlog yi ge phyi rol tu/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bri bar bya/ /'jigs dang rgyal po'i rigs dang ni/ /
dgra thams cad ni rnam par 'joms/ /gzhan yang rdza rnga bcing ba yi/ /khyab bdag rang gis sngags btu ba/ /sa gzhi cha mnyam nyams dga' bar/ /tsan+dan na la sogs byug
pa ru/ /sgrub pa po yis yang bya ste/ /ri mo dgu pa legs zlum por/ /gcig dman lnga bcu'i dum bu la/ /gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi yi khar/ /lugs 'byung lugs
las bzlog pa yis/ /sngags kyi yi ge rnams bzhag bya/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po yi ni sngags/ /sngags pas de nas yang dag btu/ /de ni tshigs kun tu shes bya/ /rgyud
gzhan du ni ma bshad do/ /de yi yi ge rtsa rnams su/ /re re yi ni tshigs mtshams ni/ /gcig dman lnga bcu yi ni mtshams/ /mkha' dus me yi tshogs can no/ /gang gang
tshes su yongs bshad pa/ /mnyam par bzhag pas de de'i tshigs/ /gang du yi ge gcig blangs nas/ /der ni yi ge thams cad de/ /rtsis kyi rims rnams kyis btu bar/ /
bde mchog 'bum par gsungs pa yin/ /phyi dang nang bdag nyid 'khrul 'khor/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi kun bsgrub pa'o/ /gsang sngags bde bas bsgrub par bya/ /khyad
par du yang 'khrul 'khor ro/ /de yis dngos grub thob 'gyur bar/ /'dir ni so ma nyi srid ma yin/ /rten dang brten pa'i gzugs can te/ /ji lta'i rim par ming dang gnas/ /
gnas ni rten gyi gzugs su te/ /brten pa'i ming ni rnal 'byor ma/ /'di dag mnyam par snyoms 'jug pa/ /las thams cad par mngon par brjod/ /de yis rnal 'byor
ma rgyud ni/ /brten pa thabs kyi spyod yul lo/ /gang phyir sa gzhi rten yin pas/ /de phyir thabs ni rnal 'byor ma/ /yang na thams cad thabs yin la/ /yang na thams cad shes rab
bo| |shes rab thabs bral de rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas sku ni mya ngan 'das/ /theg pa mchog 'di'i shes rab dang / /bral bas thams cad srid bar 'gro /srid dang mya
ngan 'das gang chos/ /de rnams spangs pas chos med do/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /
bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'khor los bsgyur ma'i rab tu sbyor ba la sogs
pa las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo sgom pa'i lam dang / rdza rnga'i sngags mdor bstan pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste/ le'u bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad
pa'o|| ||de nas gzhan yang mchog gtso bo/ /'khor los bsgyur sogs rgyas pa ni/ /phan pa thams cad ster ba'i las/ /mdor
bsdus pa yis bshad par bya/ /brtson chen ma yi rab sbyor bas/ /ku lu tAr ni yongs su bzhugs/ /byang chub phyogs ni yang dag ngag /'khrul 'khor mi yi gzugs can no/ /
'phyang ba la ni yongs brten nas/ /bsam med byang chub 'thob par byed/ /de ni las kun gtso bo ste/ /rang byung phyag rgya chen po'o/ /khams thams cad las yang dag
byung | |de ni 'phyang bar mngon par brjod/ /dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi rnams la/ /re re la ni rnam pa brgyad/ /khams thams cad la'ang shes bya ba/ /mig dang bu ga zla ba 'o/ /
dpa' bo thams cad so so yi/ /re re'i ming du'ang brjod par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa bdun du/ /dpa' bo re re bsgom par bya/ /khams brgyad po ni thams cad du/ /
rnam pa gsum du'ang mtshon par bya/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs kyi/ /rab sbyor ming mdor bstan pas te/ /phag mo sogs su yongs gnas pa'i/ /brtson chen ma'i nang
shes par bya/ /dal gyis khams la bsnun pa yis/ /gnyid log pa las sad par bya/ /dpa' bo'i ral gri gang 'dra bas/ /stobs po che la 'bigs par 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i
'phyang ba'i ral gri ni/ /khams thams cad la 'bigs par 'gyur/ /hA yi mdor bstan shes byas nas/ /tshigs mtshams kun tu gnas par gyis/ /de las bskyed pa'i
dpa' bo rnams/ /bye ba 'bum tsho stong phrag go /byang chub sa bon rang bzhin can/ /rnal 'byor ma ni de'i rigs grags/ /khams thams cad du rgyas 'debs pa/ /nges 'byung
dus su yang dag byung / /'phyang bzhin par ni de shes bya/ /rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs/ /rigs ni khams rnams thams cad de/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rigs can yin//
gnyis po yang dag sbyor ba ru/ /'phyang ba lto bar rab zhugs bya/ /khams thams cad kyi ro'i bar du/ /de ni chad pa nyid du 'gyur/ /bcud kyis len ni bsgrubs pa yis/ /skye
bo kun la rgyas pa yin/ /de rnams kun tu gnas pa med/ /mkha' spyod nyid du nye bar 'gro /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams ni/ /dbus su zag pa med par bzhugs/ /
de ltar yon tan gter thams cad/ /yang dag ngag gi go 'phang gnas/ /brjod min pa yi sngags chen po/ /bsnams zhing skye bo kun la sgrogs/ /gzhom du med par de
zhes bya/ /sa ni rdo rje 'dzin ma rang / /khams rnams kyi dngos ma lus pa/ /ming gis dpa' bor yang dag gnas/ /thod pa'i dum bu yi ni khams/ /rang nyid so sor bshad
@#/ /par bya/ /sen mo dang ni so 'bab pa/ /re re'i brgyad du phye ba can/ /sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi dang / /de bzhin dngos po bzhi dag go /de ltar
gnas ni gsum gsum du/ /dpa' bo thams cad sbyar bar bya/ /skra dang ba spu 'bab pa dang / /pags pa dang ni gri ma 'bab/ /sha dang sha red 'bab pa dang / /chu rgyus
dang ni rtsa 'bab dang / /rus pa dang ni pags 'bab dang / /mkhal ma dang ni stobs 'bab dang / /snying dang dra ba 'bab pa dang / /mig dang chu ser 'bab pa dang / /mkhris pa
dang ni rlung 'bab dang / /glo ba dang ni rtsa 'bab dang / /der 'bab pa yi dngos po ni/ /gnye ma dang ni mchin pa 'bab/ /lto ba dang ni dbugs 'bab dang / /bshang dang
gci ba 'bab pa dang / /mtshams kyis mtha' dang dri ma 'bab/ /rgyu shun dang ni mchil ma 'bab/ /rang dang chu ser 'bab pa dang / /khrag dang me tog 'bab pa dang / /
rdul dang rlangs pa 'bab pa dang / /tshil dang lto tshil 'bab pa dang / /mchi ma dang ni khu ba 'bab/ /lud pa dang ni rims med 'bab/ /snabs dang rkang mar 'bab pa
ste| |dpa' rnams khams kyi mtshan nyid do/ /de ltar dum bu dum bu nyid/ /khams ni gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur/ /re re yi yang rang bzhin kyang / /zad pa'i rlung gis thod
pa can/ /bde ba kun gyi nang thim par/ /keng rus chen po 'gro ba yin/ /sems dang bsam pa de yi phyir/ /keng rus kun tu stong pa nyid/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa yin/ /
thams cad gnyis med lhan skyes gsal/ /lha yi dgra ni chen po'i gzugs/ /rnam shes lha dang lhan cig go /'od dpag med dang tshig med pa/ /rdo rje'i 'od zer rang bzhin can//
rdo rje rang bzhin gyi ni sku/ /rdo rje'i sku ni der shes bya/ /myu gu can ni dngos po kun/ /mthong ba tsam gyis dga' byed pa'o/ /rnam shes bem por 'ching bar ni/ /rdo rje ral pa can 'gro 'o//
sa gsum zas kyi mchog tu ni/ /dpa' bo chen po'i bgrod pas byas/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas sdod bar/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad 'gro ba 'o/ /shin tu bzang po thob med pa/ /'jig rten
'jig rten pa spangs pa'o/ /skye 'gro kun tu rang byung ba/ /rdo rje bzang po de grags pa'o/ /'jigs byed chen po'i go 'phang gis/ /las kyi bag chags thal bas bsgos/ /mig mi
bzang gis ma bltas kyang / /thams cad mtshan nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ /stobs po che ni sngags thams cad/ /rnam pa gsum gyi bdag nyid do/ /rin chen rdo rje smra bcad che/ /zag med
khams ni thams cad du'o/ /rta mgrin sa gzhi chen po la/ /srog son kun la sbyar bar bya/ /srog kun dgang bar bya ba ste/ /de yis nam mkha'i snying por bshad/ /dpal he ru ka rtag tu
@#/ /stong | |sku bzhi yi ni rang bzhin can/ /pad+ma gar dbang phyug dang gzugs/ /gzugs med rnal 'byor du 'gro ba'o/ /bde ba chen pos snang byed pas/ /
rnam snang mdzad du mngon par brjod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgyings byas pa/ /mchog tu bde bar brjod pa yin/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /khams thams cad kyi
nang du'o/ /skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu/ /ro myang mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /khams 'di rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /zas nyid mchog tu ngo mtshar che/ /rang bzhin khams
kyi rnam grangs ni/ /dus tshod dang ni klu dang mda'/ /de rnams rnal 'byor mar yongs grags/ /brgyud ma'i rim pa las 'ongs pa'o/ /khams kyang rnam bar dpyad bzhin
pas| |thams cad bdag nyid kyis 'byung min/ /rnam shes ma yin ye shes min/ /thams cad stong pa'o yod pa min/ /gser 'gyur rtsi ni ma rig pas/ /mchog tu bde
ba rig pa min/ /rang gis dgos pa byed pa ni/ /spar sha'i rigs lha'i mtshan nyid do/ /brtson 'grus chen por mngon brjod pa'i/ /de phyir rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya/ /khams
thams cad du rgyas 'debs pa/ /rnal 'byor gdan du yang dag byung / /gang zhig kun nas kun tu ni/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs par mthong / /mkha' 'gro dang ni sdom rgyud dang //
nges par brjod pa phyi ma dang / /kun spyod 'byung ba'i rgyud rnams su/ /dngos po las ni rab tu bstan/ /de yis rgyud ni chen po 'di/ /thub pa skyes bu mchog gis gsungs/ /dum
bu dum bur yongs gnas pa'i/ /las chen po ni der drang bya/ /phra mo'i bya ba mngon brjod pa/ /khams rnams kyi ni gnas la 'o/ /ji lta'i rim pas khams blang ste/ /yongs bsdus
spyod yul bar du'o/ /tshigs bcad thog ma sogs pas kyang / /ji srid rdzogs pa'i spyod yul du/ /rgyud 'di rnal 'byor gtso bo ste/ /las rnams rgya che ba min no/ /yang na rnal
'byor thams cad ni/ /las kyi tshogs su 'dod par bya/ /bdag gi de nyin rtag tu las/ /byas pa'am gal te ma byas pa'o/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi sbyor mtshan nyid/ /rang
bzhin las su yang dag bshad/ /de ltar rgyud rnams thams cad du/ /sngags pas mchog tu shes par bya/ /yang na gang dang 'dra'i rnal 'byor/ /de dang 'dra bar khams
gnas te/ /bcud kyis len gyi rdzas rnams ni/ /sman chen nyi shu rtsa bzhi por/ /sbyar byas dpa' bo nyid rnams kyis/ /grol bar bgrod pa gsungs pa yin/ /gsang ba mchog
tu dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /bcu drug de rnams rdzas chen te/ /brgyad gnyis tshigs bcad phyed kyis so/ /sgra dang gzugs su yang dag byung / /
@#/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed pa dka'/ /srub dang bsrub pa'i kun sbyor ba'i/ /dbus ma bla na med pa'i gzugs/ /ril bu rtag tu mchod bya ste/ /pho
nya lhan cig skyes bdag nyid/ /yid ni nang du son pa yis/ /rang khu sangs rgyas thig le can/ /sbrang rtsi khrag dang ga bur bcas/ /tshogs kyi dbus su rab tu zhugs/ /ming
med mthe bong dag gi khar/ /zla ba'i btung ba myang bar gyis/ /bdud rtsi lngar gyur 'di rnams kyis/ /mchod pa bzhi ni de bzhin bya/ /lha dang mi rnams bde ba bas/ /bcu drug
cha shas rin che 'o/ /de ltar tshigs bcad 'di kun gyis/ /khams lnga rab tu bshad bar 'gyur/ /ra yi yi ges khrag gi khams/ /hA yig ri skyes su 'dod do/ /s+ya yig dri yi lo
ma ste/ /pa yig pags pa ru ni 'dod/ /ra yig b+han d+ha kar rab bshad/ /me yig me tog tu dran bya/ /ra yig rA pi Na de bzhin/ /slar yang me yi yi ge sha /sa yig kun
tu du las skyes/ /rba yig yi ge rtsar 'dod do/ /t+ma'i yi ge sbug skyes bshad/ /na yig dri yi mar khu'o/ /sa yi yi ge so yi rdul/ /dA yi yi ge rgya mtsho skyes/ /s+thi yig ba mo
de bzhin du/ /ta yig snying po'i ga bur ro/ /sgra dang gzugs su yongs byung ba/ /khrag khu nor bu'i bar dag tu'o/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /rang rig pad+mar son
pa'o| |srub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor rnams kyis/ /rang 'byung gis ni rnam bsres pa'o/ /dbus ma'i mchog gi dbugs kyang ni/ /skad cig dbu mar bzung ba 'o/ /ril bu rtag tu mchod
pa ni/ /bdud rtsi gsang ba'i chu yin no/ /pho nya lhan skyes bdag nyid ni/ /dbang gnyis sbyor las rtse ba 'o/ /yid ni nang du song ba ni/ /khams rnams kyang ni zhu ba 'o/ /rang khu
thig le sangs rgyas rnams/ /zhu gang sbyor ba las byung ba'o/ /sbrang rtsi khrag dang ga bur bcas/ /bcu drug 'dod ma las byung ba'o/ /tshogs dbus rab tu zhugs rnams
kyis| |'di kun lhan skyes la sbyar ba'o/ /ming med mthe bos khar gzhug pa/ /snyoms par 'jug las khrag byung ba'o/ /zhi ba'i btung ba myang ba ni/ /'pho ba'i dus las ma
lus gang / /'di rnams bdud rtsi lngar 'gyur ba/ /'phos las byung ba'i mi'i mar khu/ /mchod bzhi de bzhin bya ba ni/ /bzhi mnyam ga bur bcas pa'o/ /lha dang mi rnams bde
ba ni/ /dga' ba kun las byung ba 'o/ /bcu drug cha shas rin che ba/ /thams cad bde ba'i rang bzhin can/ /de ltar dpa' bo thams cad ni/ /khams kyi rdzas rnams su sbyar bya/ /
bcud len de las byung ba ste/ /gtso bo ye shes me rlung gis/ /'dzad pa dang ni bsad byas nas/ /'pho ba dang ni gzag de bzhin/ /'dzad pa byang chub 'dzag pa ste/ /bsad pa
@#/ /yis kyang 'pho med 'gyur/ /'pho ba rtsa rnams kun tu ste/ /gzag pa lte ba'i pad+mar ro/ /de rnams bcing ba byas pa yis/ /khams thams cad du
gzag par bya/ /bsad pa dngos po gzhom pa ste/ /rgyas pa 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /sbyin sreg cho ga der shes nas/ /'khor los bsgyur nyid 'thob par gyis/ /thab tu
bdud rtsi bsreg bya ste/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje mngon sum du/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas mthong bar 'gyur/ /sa thams cad la 'khyer bar byed/ /srog ni gang gi chos can che/ /chos ni kun
tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yis rang bzhin brtson chen ma/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid mchog tu/ /dkyil 'khor sngags las des rdzogs pa/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid
mchog /lha mo chen mo kha dog dkar/ /kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ma/ /sems can thams cad dbang 'gyur dang / /'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /oM ga

i ra n+d+ra sa dzA ta la bA sa da rba pra sa bA twA dat+ma ma ne hA hUM ma hUM te phaT hUM hUM phaT swA phaT hA phaT swAhA/ oM mahA biR+ya yai hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de ltar sngags kyi de nyid bdag /lha thams
cad kyi sa bon no/ /'khrul 'khor 'khor lo'i de'i tshe ni/ /re'u mig gcig dman lnga bcu ste/ /kha ches yang dag bri byas nas/ /gsang sngags phreng ba 'di dgos bya/ /lugs
las bzlog pas gnod mdzes sngags/ /ji lta'i rim pas dgod par bya/ /de tshe mi yi gzugs byas nas/ /slar yang zlum po sbyin par bya/ /de la rtsa ba'i sngags bris nas/ /
bsgrub bya'i ming ni nang bcug pa'o/ /dbus kyi dum bur bsgrub bya ni/ /de yi sngags kyi nang bcug pa'o/ /gro ga sogs su sngags pas bri/ /phyi dang gsang bar mtshon par bya/ /de
lta'i 'khrul 'khor rab sbyar bas/ /sa gsum po la bsgom par bya/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin
gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ brtson 'grus chen mo'i rab tu sbyor ba'i
cho ga'i mtshan nyid gsang ba'i bcud len la sogs pa dang / rgyas ba'i las dpal yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin he ru ka'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi
bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas dpa' bo phyag rdor sogs/ /sngags pa thams cad bzhengs rnams kyis/ /bstod dang mchod dang phyag bcas pas/ /phag
mo rab tu sad par byed/ /bdag gi ma yi lha mo kye/ /lha mo kun gyis rab mchod ma/ /khyod ni 'di rnams kun gyi ma/ /ye shes snying po phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sems can kun la snying
@#/ /rje yi/ /gzugs su rang gis sprul pa mo/ /bdag la kun tu thugs rje yi/ /bka' drin chen po mdzad par rigs/ /bde ba chen po yongs bzhugs
pa'i| |bcom ldan bdag po la 'dri'o/ /rgyud thams cad kyi las tshogs kyi/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni mi 'tshal to/ /gal te ji srid rgyud rgyud du/ /las thams cad ni bstan
pa ni| |rnam dag ye shes thob rnams kyi/ /de tshe der 'di ci'i phyir gsungs/ /rgyud de nyid du 'jug 'gyur bar/ /skye po thams cad mi rigs so/ /slar yang bshad pa
skyon dang bcas/ /bdag gis ma shes the tshom mchis/ /phag mo ci yang mi gsung bas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zhugs nas/ /de yi ye shes su 'gyur te/ /de yis
lan ni gsung bar mdzad/ /bcom ldan chos kun bdag nyid kyi/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi yid du ni/ /byas nas gsung ni rjod byed pa/ /phag mo'i ris thams cad kyis so/ /
kye kye dpa' bo thams cad rnams/ /ye shes shes bya gnyis 'dres pa'i/ /khyed kyi ye shes gang mthong ba/ /de ni de dang de ru thim/ /'on kyang so sor 'jug byed pa/ /
sems can sna tshogs bsam pas so/ /dbye ba med nyid rgyud chen por/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro sdom pa dang / /gzhan yang rnal 'byor rgyud rnams ni/ /'dus pa la sogs don
chen po/ /de rnams kyis ni rgyud 'di yis/ /sna tshogs don ni mngon brjod pa/ /de thams cad kyis las kyi tshogs/ /ldan pas rab tu gsal bar byed/ /rgyud du brjod bya rjod pa
por| |de yis phra mor 'jug par byed/ /re re'i mtshan nyid bdag nyid can/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs ldan/ /de la rnam par shes pa'i chos/ /thod pa yi ni dum bur bshad/
sems can kun gyi las dang ni/ /nyon mongs bde bar shes par bya/ /gzhan du kun mkhyen rgyud la ni/ /yi ge skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lo gcig gi ni bar gyi ni/ /zla ba bcu
gnyis de shes bya/ /dus tshod drug gi 'khor los bsgyur/ /sems can rmi lam lta bu mchog /mi shes dri mas bsgos pa yis/ /de rnams kyis ni bde mi rig /hA ra do la'i
rim pa yis/ /rnam par shes pa shes bzhin par/ /khri phrag gnyis la stong dang ni/ /drug brgya yis ni lhag pa 'o/ /dbugs kyi chu tshod drug cu la/ /zhag gcig tu ni rab tu
grags/ /hA ra do la'i dbugs rnams kyis/ /bsgyur bas do la la mtshan pa'o/ /gnyis kyi dbugs ni blo ldan gyis/ /phyir 'byung nang 'jug thim par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa yis
dgongs 'gyur te/ /kun mkhyen nyid du nyer 'ong min/ /phra zhing phra ba'i rnal 'byor du/ /gnas nas thams cad rnam par spyad/ /de yis ang ka phyi rol du/ /sa la bcu gnyis gzhag
@#/ /par bya/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i dbye bshad pa/ /yan lag bcu gnyis kyang de bzhin/ /rgyu skar dang ni gza' rnams kyi/ /'char ba dus thams cad du 'o//
re re yi ni khams kyi ni/ /rang gi dus su'ang 'char bar 'gyur/ /dus su 'chi dang de bzhin gzhan/ /rim pa 'di yis 'chad par 'gyur/ /da t+r+ya la sogs sbyor shes pas//
'di ni sbyor ba phyi mo la'o/ /nyi ma byang du bgrod pa yi/ /rgyal gyi zla ba sogs brtsams nas/ /zla ba bcu gnyis de ltar du/ /rim pa rim pas gzhag par bya/ /shar la
sogs pa'i phyogs brtsams nas/ /snga gro nas brtsi blo ldan gyis/ /gsum la bcu gsum de bzhin te/ /bzhi pa yang ni bcu bzhi pa/ /lnga pa bco lnga pa ru ni/ /bshad par
bya yi da lta nyon/ /'di rnams mnyam zhing mnyam ldan par/ /sgrub pos mthun par bya ba yin/ /de la ma rig 'du byed dang / /rnam par shes dang ming dang gzugs/ /skye
mched drug dang reg pa dang / /tshor ba dang ni sred de bzhin/ /nye bar len dang srid pa dang / /skye ba dang ni rga shi 'o/ /de bzhin ro hi ta sogs kyis/ /chu srin la sogs rA si
rnams/ /bcu gnyis nyid du 'dod par bya/ /thog mar ma yig chu srin dang / /ro hi ta 'o de bzhin gzhan/ /gnyis par mo hi ta bum pa/ /'du byed du ni gsal bar 'gro /
gsum par bzang po dang ni nya/ /rnam par shes par de rig bya/ /bzhi par khyu mchog dang ni lug /ming dang gzugs su 'dod par bya/ /lnga pa ru ni rus sprul te/ /br-i Sha skye
mched drug mchog go /drug par chu srin dang 'khrig pa/ /rtag tu reg pa ru ni 'gro /bdun par ra Na Da kar+k+ka Ta/ /de bzhin du ni tshor ba mchog /brgyad par mi ki ra seng+ge /mchog
tu mthun ma sred pa 'o/ /dgu par b+hi dri dang bu mo/ /nye bar len pa ru ni 'dod/ /bcu par sems g.yengs pa dang srang / /srid pa ru ni rab tu brjod/ /bcu gcig pa ru rmi lam
dang | |bri sh+tsi ka dang skye de bzhin/ /bcu gnyis pa ru sa'i dbang phyug /gzhu dang rgas shing shi ba'o/ /de ltar sa'i dbang phyug sogs dang / /rmi lam la sogs de bzhin gzhan//
g.yang sogs b+hi dri ka la sogs/ /de bzhin mi ki ra sogs dang / /raN+Da sogs dang chu srin sogs/ /rus sbal sogs dang khyu mchog sogs/ /bzang po sogs dang rmongs pa
sogs/ /de phyir zla ba rnams bcu gnyis/ /'di rnams nyi mar gang skyes pa/ /de yi mtshan nyid du ni 'dod/ /skad cig thang cig yud tsam du/ /chad pa'i shing du mtshon par bya//
mig bye btsums par son pas kyang / /shin tu phra ba'i dus las so/ /gal te sems ni ting 'dzin gnas/ /rim gyis sa bcu gnyis par ro/ /yang na ting 'dzin mi gnas
@#/ /pa| |bar ma yi ni 'gro bar 'dod/ /dman pas dmyal ba la sogs ba'i/ /skye bo thams cad 'gro ba'o/ /'dren ma rnams kyi bde sdug bsngal/ /
las kyi kun tu longs spyod do/ /gnyis su med pa'i dus can gyis/ /thams cad rang bzhin sa la skye/ /de ltar yin kyang der skyes pa'i/ /rang gi las kyis 'bras bu za/ /
de ltar rnam par bzung tsam gyis/ /thod pa'i dum bu'i rnal 'byor ldan/ /sngon du bshad pa'i rigs pa yis/ /khams kyi dbus su 'bab pa'o/ /rlung gi kun spyod dus
su ni| |rnal 'byor pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma dgu dang zla ba dang / /lo na mkhas pas 'chi shes bya/ /de la rgyal srid rtsom par 'gyur/ /de lta nyid du the tshom med/ /ro hi
ta yi nyi ma skyes/ /sa yi dbang phyug la 'chi 'gyur/ /sa yi kun spyod dus skyes pa/ /nyi ma brgyad dang zla ba dang / /lo gcig na ni ma shin/ /byang chub sems dpar the tshom med/ /
rmi lam kun spyod dus su ni/ /dpa' zhing rtul phod pha rol gnon/ /bsod nams dang ni sdig nyid 'dres/ /lnga bcu rtsa bzhin 'chi 'o/ /sems g.yeng ba la dgra yis gsod/ /
de yi nyi mar skyes pa po/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi'o zla bcu na/ /gal te shi bar ma gyur na/ /de ni 'byor chung phyi nas ni/ /phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba ste/ /b+hi d+hi'i nyin mo 'chi ba
yin| |de'i tshe'i nyi ma la skyes pa/ /lnga pa gnyis dang gsum gcig gi /lo ni shi bar ma gyur na/ /de la 'dod don kun dman zhing / /pa dang ma ni gsod pa ste/ /dka' thub
dang ni 'dres pa yis/ /mi ki ra la rang khyim 'chi/ /gang zhig de nyid 'dir skyes pa/ /gnyis lnga gsum dgu'i lo na ni/ /de ltar gal te ma shin/ /de ni thams cad mkhyen pa mnyam/ /
yugs sa mo la chur 'chi'o/ /gang zhig de'i tshe nyi mar skyes/ /gnyis dang gsum gyi lo na ni/ /ma shin ni blo ldan te/ /sdig pa byed po nad dang ldan/ /mi dang mi mo rnams skal
bzang / /chu srin la 'chi de nyid la/ /skyes pa bco lnga gsum lnga yi/ /nyi ma zla ba lo rnams la/ /ma shi na ni mdor na yang / /yon tan thams cad yongs rdzogs te/ /mtha'
skyong ba yi rgyal por 'gro /rus sbal dang ni 'khrig par 'chi/ /de'i tshe nyi ma la skyes pa/ /gnyis brgyad dgu yi lo na 'chi/ /de ni shi bar ma gyur na/ /tha mal sems can du shes bya//
dman dang gtso bor 'gro ba 'o/ /khyu mchog la ni rang khyim 'chi/ /de yi nyi ma la skyes pa/ /gnyis dang brgyad dang dgu yi ni/ /lo na mkhas pas ma shi na/ /dbang phyug thams cad
phun tshogs shing / /khro sogs dang ni lta ba ngan/ /bzang bo la ni bsad nas 'chi/ /de nyid nyi ma la skyes pa/ /lnga dang dgu dang bcun ni/ /skye bo 'dir ni ma shi na/ /phongs shing
@#/ /chos ni phun sum tshogs/ /thams cad kyis ni brgyan pa ste/ /gti mug la ni chur 'pho 'o/ /de yi nyi ma la skyes pa/ /gnyis dgu'i zla ba dang po
la| |gal te de tshe ma shi na/ /thams cad dman zhing dmyal bar te/ /bsam ngan sdig pa'i bdag nyid can/ /rkun mo la sogs pas bsad nas/ /ro hi ta yi nyi mar 'chi/ /
de ltar mdor bsdus shes bya ste/ /gal te ting 'dzin ma thob na'o/ /skye rnams mngon sum byed pa yi/ /las rnams gzhan du 'thob pa yin/ /de nyid nye bar gang zhig na/ /de ni
legs par bsrung bya ste/ /bshad pa'i rim pa'i nyi ma la/ /'grol bar 'di la the tshom med/ /thod pa'i dum bu rang nyid ni/ /'di rnams shis byed bsgom par bya/ /mkha'
'gror bgrod pa'i gang zhig rtsa/ /de'i dbus bdag nyid spyod par byed/ /de ni sgo nga'i rigs shes bya/ /gtong ba bskyod pas bsrung bar bya/ /rnal 'byor pa lus 'dzin par 'gyur/ /
'dir ni mthe'u chung bskyod par bya/ /rkang mthil dang ni spyi bo'i sgo/ /mtshams rnams kun tu bsrung bar bya/ /A li kA li mnyam byas nas/ /khams rnams la ni thim par bya//
rnam par shes pa mi g.yo ste/ /thams cad de'i rang bzhin du bya/ /mgo bo'i dbus las nges par yang / /'og tu kha bltas 'bab 'gyur 'gro /de yi dbus phyogs phun
tshogs pa/ /rnal 'byor pa de srid mthar 'gro /a ba d+hU tI dus grangs su/ /ji ltar gsal bar bshad par 'gyur/ /zla phyed lo gsum shes bya ba/ /skye ba'i dus su 'chi ba yin/ /lo
brgya rnams kyi gang zhig tshad/ /de rnams dbus su brtag par bya/ /ro ma rkyang ma gnyis dag gi'ang / /skye ba'i zla ba nyid mtshon bya/ /zla ba zla bar 'joms 'gyur ba/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i cha
can no/ /dbugs ni gcig gi grangs kyang ni/ /de phyir lo gnyis las gnyis 'gyur/ /sum 'gyur sogs pas thams cad rnams/ /de nas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i 'gyur/ /mkha' bug
mig tu shes par bya/ /phyi nas chu tshod rnams su 'gro /lo ni bcu gnyis bar du ni/ /lnga lnga yi yang chu tshod do/ /drug cu'i lo nas nyi ma 'phel/ /sum cu rtsa bdun zla phyed gsum/ /lnga lnga
ru ni 'phel ba rnams/ /nyin mo'i chu tshod ang ka bya/ /skye bo kun gyi 'chi ba ni/ /zla phyed gsum dang lo na shes/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i lo rnams kyis/ /gang phyir mi rnams spyod ldan 'gro/
sa yi khyim du zhugs nas ni/ /yid kyis 'chi ba blu ba ste/ /dpal he ru ka gnas zhugs pa yi/ /thod pa'i dum bu bsam par bya/ /bgrang ba'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /nyin
zhag chu tshod mtshon par bya/ /ji lta'i dus su mtshan pa yis/ /rim gyi rim gyis bya ba yin/ /byang du bgrod pa'i dus tshod du/ /lha mo rgyas sogs rim pa'o/ /bcu la gnyis kyis
@#/ /bsgyur dang bzhi/ /mkhas pas nyin mo'i chu tshod do/ /mnyam ba'i dus su shes bya ba/ /rang gi dus sbyor du 'chad 'gyur/ /bcu po gsum dang drug
po ste/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod rtsom par byed/ /brgya la dus kyi bye brag gis/ /de yi dbus las shes par bya/ /bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang drug /nyin rnams chu tshod ang ka bya/ /bcu
la gsum gyis bsgyur dang bzhi/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag /bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang brgyad/ /nyi ma rnams kyi chu tshod bzhin/ /bcu la gsum bsgyur gnyis gcig
pu| |mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtags/ /mnyam dus dbus su gnyis sbyar nas/ /sum cu gcig pur rab tu brtags/ /sum cu rnam pa gnyis rnams kyis/ /nyin re dag gi chu
tshod 'byed/ /bcu po rnam gsum gnyis gcig pu/ /nyin mo rnams kyi nyi mar brtags/ /bcu po gnyis rnams dang ni brgyad/ /mtshan mo yi ni ang ka bya/ /bcu po rnam gsum
ang ka la/ /bzhi dang yang dag ldan pa'o/ /bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang drug /mtshan mo'i chu tshod ang ka bya/ /bcu la gsum gyis bsgyur dang drug /nyin dag ye shes can
gyi'ang nyin/ /bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang bzhi/ /rdul can rnams kyi chu tshod grags/ /lho ru bgrod par rab bshad de/ /nam zla'i dus kyis shes par 'gyur/ /bcu la gsum
gyis bsgyur dang bzhi/ /nyin phyed chu tshod yongs su bshad/ /bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang drug /mtshan mo'i de bzhin mtshon par bya/ /bcu la gsum bsgyur gnyis gcig pu//
nyin rnams chu tshod de bzhin no/ /bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang drug /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni grags/ /bcu la gsum bsgyur pas mtshon pa/ /mnyam sogs chu tshod de bzhin te//
bcu la gsum bsgyur mtshan rnams kyi/ /bi shu'i dbus su gnyis de bzhin/ /bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang brgyad/ /nyin rnams kyi ni nyin mor sems/ /bcu po gsum bsgyur
gnyis gcig pu/ /rdul can chu tshod du brtags so/ /bcu po gnyis 'gyur dang ni drug /nyin rnams chu tshod rim pas so/ /bcu po gsum 'gyur dang ni bzhi/ /rdul can chu tshod
rnams de bzhin/ /sum brgya de bzhin drug cu ni/ /chu tshod rnams kyi dbugs bkang ngo / /chu tshod grangs ni drug cu ni/ /zhag gcig tu ni rnam par brjod/ /zla rnams rim pa ji lta bas//
de bzhin rim rnams kyis mtshan no/ /chu tshod dbugs sogs yongs rdzogs pa/ /rim pas 'phel dang 'chad pa ste/ /las dang las min khyad par gyis/ /dbugs ni rim pas
yongs su bzung / /de ltar nam mkha' mkha' de bzhin/ /zla mig chu tshod de bzhin du/ /lo gcig gir ni shes par bya/ /zhag rnams chu tshod mtshon pas so/ /de ltar byas pas rnal
@#/ /'byor pa/ /dus kyi 'chi ba blu bar 'gyur/ /lte ba'i dbus su pad+ma che/ /ji ltar rdo rje phag mo'o/ /mtshams kun son pa'i pad+ma la/ /ba mo dang 'dra 'jag
par bya/ /lte ba'i dbus mtha' bcu gnyis su/ /'gro ba 'ong ba byed pa nyid/ /srog gi thig le de bgrod pa'ang / /mtshams kun du ni 'bab pa can/ /blo ldan lo gcig sbyor
ba yis/ /de nyid du ni thim par bya/ /til mar me ni 'bar ba yi/ /gzugs can kha ni 'og tu bltas/ /chu shing me tog dang 'dra ba/ /mkhas pa yis ni 'phyang bzhin pa'o/ /
lte bar AM yi rnam pa'i gzugs/ /thung dang ring po 'bar ma'i bdag /phyag rgya lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs/ /dbyangs dang phyi mo gnyis med gnas/ /sgom dang sgrub
pa mo bshad pa/ /rtul po bar ma rnon po dang / /lhag par rno dang shin lhag rno/ /thams cad de rnams su brtags so/ /gang phyir rang bdag nyid kyis sgrub/ /de phyir gzhan
gyis kyang bsgrub bya/ /nus mthu 'jig rten 'di nyid la/ /skye bo kun la yid ches byed/ /phyi nas gdul byar 'gro ba yin/ /rang bzhin don gyis sems brnyan pas/ /dbyangs
bcu gnyis ni thob byas nas/ /dge dang mi dge bshad par bya/ /'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams su ni/ /dbyangs kyi bdag po mtshon par bya/ /a yig gis ni ye shes dang / /mkhas
pa chos don thams cad 'thob/ /A yi yig ges 'tshir ba dang / /rgas dang 'chi bar rnam nges bshad/ /sred pa'i 'jigs pa ma lus pa/ /mthong 'gyur lam las nyams
par 'gyur/ /i yi yi ge yongs thob pas/ /sa yi dbang phyug tu ni 'gro/ I yi yi ge yang dag 'thob/ /myur ba nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /u yi yi ge thob pa yis/ /skye ba dran
par 'gyur 'gro ba'o/ /U yi yi ge gal te 'thob/ /yul la zhen pa can du 'gro/ /e yi yi ge yang dag 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'gro /ai yi yi ge sems rmongs
shing | |'gro ba drug sogs 'jigs par 'gyur/ /o yig pha rol phyin pa yi/ /der ni sa 'thob rnam nges ston/ /au yig ang ka thob pa yis/ /dam tshig nyams par 'gro
pa yin/ /aM yig byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /mthong bas skad cig la dgrol 'gyur/ /AHyig yang dag thob pa yis/ /phung po khams la the tshom za/ /de la sogs
pa ma lus pa/ /ma gsungs kyang ni bsgrub par bya/ /bla ma bstan bcos rang nyid de/ /rnam gsum chos kyis yid ches bya/ /zhes bya ba ni thod pa'i dum bu can gyi rnal 'byor gyi
mtshan nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs kyi ming can te thog ma'i tshig go/ /rab tu byed pa dang po'o// //de nas keng rus chen
@#/ /po yi/ /mtshan nyid bdag gis bshad bya ste/ /bod 'dra'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis/ /yid kyi shugs ni 'jug med bya/ /khams mnyam pa yi
ri bo ni/ /spyi bo'i gnas su bsgoms pa nyid/ /pad snal skud pa kha 'og bltas/ /glog ni kun tu 'gro ba mo/ /de yi dbus su dpa' mo che/ /bong bu'i dbyibs can bsgom par
bya| |dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag tshogs/ /mchod pa chen po bsam par bya/ /de yi dbus su dpa' chen po/ /keng rus chen po'i sbyor bas so/ /skud pa rnams kyis lte
dbus su/ /srub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /hA yig rnam pa yi ni gzugs/ /mgo las skud pa gcig po ste/ /me long rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /thod pa'i dbus su
ngal bso bya/ /bum pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun rnams kyis/ /khung bu'i dbus su'ang 'dzag par 'gyur/ /thim dang longs spyod sogs dngos pos/ /sems kyi bgrod pa bstan par
bya| |khung der bong bu'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /skye ba bdun yang mthong bar 'gyur/ /ma las byung ba'i dbyibs gsum dang / /pha las byung ba gsum de bzhin/ /khams thams
cad dang bdun po de/ /rnal 'byor sgom pas mthong bar 'gyur/ /bde ba'i rang bzhin khams kun gyis/ /keng rus chen po yang dag byung / /lA ma la sogs bsgoms pa yis/
de la gnas pa'i gzugs mthong 'gyur/ /bong bu'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du/ /khrag gi zhal can rtse gsum du/ /tshe son pa yang rnam par shes/ /tshe ring pa yang mthong bar
'gyur/ /snga mar glang po che sogs pa/ /dpa' rang bdag nyid kyis de mthong / /chen po'i rtsa rnams thams cad du/ /keng rus srog ni nges 'gro bya/ /de bskyod bong bur shes bya ste//
sna tshogs rang bzhin de mthong 'gyur/ /sA lu la sogs bza' ba'i dngos/ /de dang 'dra bar dngos po kun/ /mthong ste de na yod pa min/ /khams thams cad kyang 'khrul pa'o//
ji ltar skyes bur dus rnams kyis/ /glang chen khams kyis shes par bya/ /de bzhin keng rus che rnams kyis/ /sA li la sogs khams rkyen gyis/ /rang bzhin 'jig rten pa
dmigs pas/ /rang bdag nyid kyi gzugs de mthong / /rnam pa sna tshogs rigs de rnams/ /rnal 'byor 'dzin rnams kyis shes bya/ /ma rig sogs nyin so so la/ /de
rnams kyis ni nad du grags/ /rims la sogs pa'i nad tsam gyis/ /nad chen rnam par mtshon par bya/ /de la ma rig nyi ma'i nad/ /legs pa rnams kyis de bsrung bya/ /'pho
ba bco lnga pa la ni/ /'chi 'am las ni dge mi dge /ye shes me yi bdag nyid ches/ /nub lnga rnams ni grol bar 'gyur/ /rga shi yi ni dus su ni/ /'pho ba gsum na 'chi ba ste/ /
@#/ /yang na dge dang mi dge ba'i/ /las kyi bag chags mthong bar 'gyur/ /rang rig bde ba bzung ba yis/ /nub bdun na ni grol bar 'gyur/ /skye ba'i nyi
ma'i 'chi ba ni/ /'pho ba gsum phan yang ste/ /las ni dge mi dger 'gro ba/ /nub bdun na ni grol bar 'gyur/ /srid pa yi ni 'pho gsum na/ /'chi bar 'gyur ro mtshan mo
ni| |lnga na de rnams grol bar 'gyur/ /yang na de ni mi grol te/ /'das pa bzhi pa'i dus rnams su/ /bde ba de kun rtogs par gyis/ /de lta'i rigs 'gyur de rnams su/ /
ji lta'i rim pas shes par bya/ /len pa'i 'chi ba'i 'pho ba ni/ /gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa na'o/ /gal te las ni dge mi dges/ /mtshan mo bcu na grol bar 'gyur/ /bsod
nams phun sum tshogs kun dang / /blo dang ldan pas 'pho med sgrub/ /sred pa'i 'pho ba gsum na 'chi/ /las ni dge dang mi dge ste/ /nor bu'i nang son la blta bya/ /
mtshan mo bdun na nges grol te/ /nga yi ngag la the tshom med/ /tshor ba'i 'pho ba lnga na ni/ /'chi 'gyur las kyang ngo de bzhin/ /dgu dang bcu dag na grol te/ /rdo rje pad
dbus son pas so/ /reg pa'i nyen mo'i 'pho ba ni/ /brgyad na 'chi bar shes par bya/ /de ltar las dag mi dge srid/ /yan lag drug gis thim par bya/ /gcig dman nyi
shu'i nyi ma na/ /grol ba'am yang na mi grol lo/ /skye mched drug gi 'chi ba ni/ /las dge mi dges blta bya ste/ /'pho ba brgyad na shes par bya/ /khams kyi nad rnams de mthong 'gyur//
nub bcu na ni grel 'gyur te/ /'khor lo bzhi ru thim par bya/ /ming dang gzugs la 'chi ba'i las/ /gsum pa'am ni lnga pa yi/ /'pho ba dag ni shes par bya/ /mtshan mo brgyad na
'grol ba'o/ /sems ni thig le'i gnas son par/ /rten par gyur pa'i cho ga bya/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'chi ba'i las/ /slar yang brgyad dang bcu pa yi/ /'pho bar sa la shes
par bya/ /yang na de nyid la 'grol te/ /bcu drug phyed phyed kyi gzugs can/ /ye shes rlung gis gzung bar bya/ /'du byed kyi ni 'chi ba'i las/ /gsum dang bdun gyi de bzhin du/ /
bltas par gyur pas 'pho ba yin/ /de yi lta bas grol bar 'gyur/ /thig le gnyis ni shes byas nas/ /steng du 'gro bas thim par bya/ /'di yis nad dang 'chi med 'gyur/ /de phyir
sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang / /sum cu bdun bdag nyid dge ba/ /slar yang dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /keng rus chen po'i gtso bo yi/ /rnal 'byor pa yis thams cad mthong / /zhes
bya ba ni bong bu'i rnal 'byor la keng rus chen po sgom pa po'i man dag de kho na nyid dang ldan pa ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// //de nas keng rus kyi sbyor bas/ /yul
@#/ /yul rang gi skye gnas skyes/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' gtso mo/ /ye shes ldan pas shes par bya/ /aT+Ta ra dgod par rdul lha mo/ /rnal 'byor ma ni
kun gyi gtso/ /de yi gnas su gnas lha mo/ /ka dam shing la dril chen ma/ /lha mo de yi rtag dpa' bo/ /zhing skyong zhal chen po yin no/ /keng rus bde ba'i sgyu ma yi/ /bdag nyid che
las de 'byung 'gyur/ /de rnams keng rus kyis rgyas btab/ /oD+yan bu ga las steng son/ /rang khams las bzhengs rnam par shes/ /rim gyis yul thams cad du 'gro /ko

l+la'i ri dang pa ru N+ya/ /de bi ko Ta bir dza kaM /e ru N+ya dang de nas grong / /e la'i grong dang kha che dang / /ma ru'i grong dang de bzhin du/ /puN+Da ba d+ha na yi zhing / /dza yan+ti dang priShA'i
grong | |sau pa re dang spyod de bzhin/ /oD+yan dang ni 'bar ba 'dzin/ /k+Shi re ke dang sgyu ma'i grong / /aM bu ke dang rgyal po'i khab/ /bod kyi yul dang de bzhin du/ /mA la be dang pu
lir sogs/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas yin no/ /ri yi rtse dang tA la'i shing / /b+ha Ta a mra gser de bzhin/ /ral pa'i shing dang gzhan gnon dang / /ri yi rtse mor yang dag
rten| |thang chen po dang rtsa khung dang / /a shwat+tha dang khang pa brtsegs/ /u dum bA ra shal ma li/ /ka rany+dza bya ngan med la rten/ /gser shing dang ni sA la dang / /tsu ta d+hA tu di la la
ki /brag brtsegs pa dang sbrang rtsi'i shing / /sngon du yang dag rten pa 'o/ /rdul gyi skye gnas tshol pa'i lus/ /stobs chen dang ni rnal 'byor gnas/ /thod pa las dang rdul rab gtun//
skye gnas dpa' bo tshol pa'i lus/ /stobs chen rnams dang khrag de bzhin/ /dpa' bo'i skye gnas nus las byung / /skye gnas zla ba las byung dang / /stobs chen rigs las byung ba
dang | |'jigs byed khrag las byung de bzhin/ /tshil dang g.yul ngo che las skyes/ /me tog skye gnas gnyis de bzhin/ /slar yang de nyid tshig dran bya/ /'di rnams rigs las
byung lha mo/ /lhan cig skyes gzugs bu mo yin/ /dpal chen mo dang me yi kha/ /zhing skyong mchog gi zhal can te/ /me yi gdong can zhes grags pa/ /keng rus bde ba rigs pa
po| |de yi 'pho ba 'dzin pa ni/ /rnal 'byor ma gnyis spro bar byed/ /de yi de 'dod sbyor ba yis/ /dpa' bo gnyis med yang dag rten/ /sems can rnams la phan don du/ /rdo rje
dkyil 'khor du gnas te/ /kun tu spyod pa'i bgrod gzugs kyis/ /yul thams cad du 'gro ba yin/ /lang dbang phyug ma gyen brjes skra/ /zhing skyong gtsigs pa chen po ste/ /gyen
brjes skra zhes bshad pa ni/ /keng rus bde ba'i rgyu can te/ /rnal 'byor ma mchog khyad par ni/ /lhag ma sngon gsungs bzhin shes bya/ /rna ba gcus dang drag mo ste/ /zhing skyong pa ni
@#/ /lus chen no/ /de nas yang na rgyu can dang / /mchog dbang phyug ma dag chen mo/ /keng rus bde ba'i stong pa yis/ /go 'phang mchog tu shes par bya/ /zhi
ba'i gzugs dang me dang ni/ /zhing skyong aT+Tar dgod pa'o/ /me dang 'phrul chen dag dang ni/ /sgra chen por yang shes par bya/ /keng rus kyi ni gtum mo ni/ /'bar ba'i dbus
su bde ba che/ /me yi gdong dang brtson chen ma/ /zhing skyong ba ni dril bu'i sgra/ /brtson 'grus chen mo zhes grags pa/ /keng rus bde ba'i 'byung gnas yin/ /dmar ser grags
dang 'jigs mig ma/ /zhing skyong byin pa chen po ste/ /'jigs byed ma dang spyan ma 'am/ /keng rus bde bas 'gengs byed pa'o/ /'jigs chen ma dang stobs chen ma/ /zhing

skyong glang po chen po ste/ /yang na glang po'i rna ma dang / /zhing skyong glang po'i rna can te/ /keng rus bde ba la zhon pa/ /rtsa thams cad du de'i rang bzhin/ /pa lang rna ma ri'i rtse ma/ /zhing
skyong 'jigs byed chen po ste/ /de nas slar yang sbug ma'i byin/ /keng rus bde ba la thim pa'o/ /bgrod pa mo dang 'jigs zhal ma/ /zhing skyong ba ni gtsigs pa ste/ /rmongs
par byed ma zhal chen po/ /keng rus bde ba la chags pa'o/ /ro langs ma dang bzhin bzang mo/ /zhing skyong ba spu'i byin pa can/ /yang na gyen gtsigs chen po ste/ /keng rus
bde ba la za ba'o/ /tsA muN+Da dang lha chen mo/ /zhing skyong bum pa'i rlig pa can/ /yang na lha mo chen mo dang / /zhing skyong bum pa'i grul can te/ /yang na lha chen po yin no/ /keng rus
bde bar gar byed pa'o/ /rab gus ma dang ral gsum ma/ /zhing skyong gtsigs pa chen po ste/ /yang na ral pa gsum zhes bya/ /keng rus bde ba'i pha rol phyin/ /glog gi gdong
ma dril sgra ma/ /zhing skyong 'ug pa'i gdong can te/ /dril bu'i sgra ru nges grags pa/ /'dir ni keng rus bde za ba'o/ /me zhal ma dang lha chen mo/ /zhing skyong 'jigs par byed pa ste//
yang na lha chen por shes bya/ /keng rus bde ba'i gzi can no/ /ka rany+dza gnas ma de bzhin/ /gzhan yang dril bu chen mor grags/ /zhing skyong ba ni stobs chen te/ /keng rus bde bas
mdzes pa yin/ /gsang grags ma dang lha chen mo/ /drag gzugs ma dang stobs chen ma/ /zhing skyong sgra chen po dang ni/ /drag po'i gzugs dang stobs chen te/ /keng rus bde
las yongs byung ba'i/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur rnal 'byor ldan/ /gtum mo dang ni drag mo dang / /zhing skyong ba ni 'bar bar grags/ /de nas yang na drag po'i gzugs/ /keng
rus bde ba'i cha lugs can/ /'jigs rten gyi ma gyen skra mo/ /zhing skyong ri rab chen po ste/ /de nas yang na gyen brdzes skra/ /keng rus bde ba sgom pa po'o/ /'jigs pa mo dang stobs
@#/ /chen ma/ /zhing skyong 'jigs pa de bzhin te/ /stobs po che dang 'jigs gzugs ma/ /keng rus bde ba'i snying po can/ /srul mo dang ni lha chen mo/ /zhing
skyong brtul zhugs chen po ste/ /keng rus bde ba'i nus pa yis/ /de phyir dbang po kun bde ba'o/ /pi pan sa ma ril li sgra/ /zhing skyong rna ba chen po can/ /yang na dril li sgrogs
pa ste| |keng rus bde ba 'dzag pa'o/ /lhan skyes grags ma 'byor grags ma/ /dpa' bo chen po de bzhin mchog /zhing skyong shin tu thub dka' ste/ /keng rus bde ba dpog byed
pa'o| |dbang bskur mnyam ma skyes dbang phyug /zhing skyong sna tshogs dbang phyug ste/ /keng rus bde ba la gnas pas/ /rang nyid 'dod pa'i bde bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje mgo bo rtse
gsum dang / /dar dang rdo rje mdung thung dang / /gtun shing zhags pa de bzhin du/ /rdo rje'i lcag sgrog lcags kyu dang / /zhags pa gshol dang kha T+wAM ga /rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag
can dang / /dbyug pa mdung thung gri gug dang / /mdung thung rdo rje lcags sgrog can/ /gri gug ral gri de bzhin du/ /rdo rje dang ni mdung thung gshol/ /ga da rdo rje kyo de bzhin/ /chu
srin rgyal mtshan tho ba 'o/ /zhi ba'i zhal du shes bya dang / /gtsigs ma dang ni rab 'jigs ma/ /chos kyi dbang phyug rab ster ma/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun mchog ma/ /'dod
pa'i dbang phyug rab ster ma/ /yang dag rmongs pa'i zhing ster ma/ /gtsigs ma rmongs pa'i zhing ma dang / /'jigs chen ma dang de bzhin gzhan/ /gtum zhal ma dang dgra 'joms
ma| |rmongs pa'i zhing gi 'jigs byed ma/ /dpa' bo kun la mchog ster ma/ /longs spyod grol ba sdig 'joms ma/ /bde ba kun gyi mchog ster ma/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs
byed ma/ /gtsigs ma drag cing 'jigs pa mo/ /sha yi gdan can ma dang gzhan/ /bde ba'i dbang phyug mchog ster ma/ /mdzes shing thams cad dgos ma dang / /'jig rten
dngos grub ster ba mo/ /lha mo gtsigs ma 'jigs par byed/ /shin tu drag mo gzugs bzang ma/ /dbang phyug thams cad rab ster ma/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ma/ /
'jigs ma sgrub ma grags ster ma/ /nag mo'i gzugs dang drag chen mo/ /dgra thams cad kyi 'jigs pa zhon/ /thams cad dbang du byed ma dang / /sems can thams cad
'jigs byed ma/ /'khor lo kun rgyal ma nyid dang / /'jigs par byed dang de bzhin gzhan/ /zhi ba'i zhal ma gzugs bzang ma/ /sgrub po rnams la mthun byed ma/ /snyan grags
ma dang rab ston ma/ /de ltar thams cad rim bzhin no/ /aT+Tar dgod par 'khor lor bzhugs/ /ko la'i rir ni ro la bzhugs/ /pa ru N+ya sid+d+ha siM pa Da ri/ /lha mo'i mkhar du
@#/ /yi dwags gnas/ /bi ra dza ru shing leb bzhugs/ /e ra n+ya ru phag la bzhugs/ /de nas grong du yi dwags bzhugs/ /e le'i grong du bong bur
gnas/ /kha cher nor sbyin la ni gnas/ /ma ru'i yul du ma her gnas/ /grong du mgo yi rgyab tu ste/ /puN+Da ba d+har ro la gnas/ /dza yan t+ya ru keng rus gnas/ /priSh+Ta'i grong
du brtsegs par gnas/ /so pA red par ta la gnas/ /ka rany+dzar gnas tsa ri trer/ /oD+yan du ni bdud la bzhugs/ /'bar ba 'dzin par ro la gnas/ /k+Shi ri kar ni me la
gnas/ /sgyu ma'i grong du ro yi steng / /a ma bu ke ru seng ger gnas/ /rgyal po'i khab tu 'khor lor gnas/ /bod kyi yul du yi dwags gnas/ /ror gnas mA la bar de
bzhin/ /keng rus kyi ni rab sbyor bas/ /de lta'i zhing du dngos grub 'gyur/ /keng rus las byung bde ba ni/ /rtsa yi rtsa ba las yongs langs/ /mtshams rnams kun tu khyab par
ni| |ye shes khu ba de mthong 'gyur/ /mgo med las byung ba'i ngag 'di/ /khams de nyid ni za ba'o/ /dbang po gnyis kyi mkha' gnas las/ /de yis bde ba mthong bar
'gyur/ /thams cad dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /mkhas rnams cung zad med par 'gyur/ /de'i rang bzhin 'gro sgyu mar ni/ /lto ba bsdus pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /'phyang ba yis
ni thams cad du/ /bdud rtsi de ni 'gro dang 'ong / /'dzag bzhin pa yis rnal 'byor ma/ /rang gi zhing skyes rnam par spro/ /phyi nang bdag nyid gsang ba yi/ /de rnams la ni mchod
chen bya/ /mi shes ri bo gcod pa yis/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngon bshad dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /de nas keng rus bsgom par bya/ /skye 'gro'i gtso
bo'i dpa' bo yang / /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can/ /gsungs pa'i yul du rnal 'byor ma/ /de nas rab gtum sogs ming ste/ /sgrub pa pos ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /der
ni 'du ba yang bya'o/ /bza' dang btung sogs yang dag brtsams/ /nyer spyod lnga sogs mchod pa dang / /nyer spyod gtor ma'i snod rnams ni/ /rlon pa'i sha dang nya la sogs/ /
bza' dang rdzas rnams thams cad dang / /bdud rtsi lnga dang de bzhin gzhan/ /g.yon par snod rnams bzhag byas nas/ /g.yas su khro bo bstan par bya/ /shing gcig dang ni dur
khrod dam/ /ri dang khrod dang khyim dang ni/ /grong dang grong khyer ngos rnams dang / /khang stong lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / /chu la 'gro dang thang la rgyu/ /sa dang ma mo'i khyim dang 'gram/ /nag
mo drag mo drag chen mo/ /lha sbyin yang dag rten ma dang / /nag mo gtsigs dang 'jigs byed dang / /dga' las 'das dang log 'dren dang / /tsA muN+Di dang drag gzugs ma/ /lha
@#/ /mo dbu ma dang ni ma/ /rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang / /mi thub ma dang gzhan mi thub/ /bzang nag mo dang nag chen mo/ /sbom nag mo dang rnal 'byor
ma| |dbang po zla ba mo drag mo/ /sdang ma 'phyang ma sum cu'i dbang / /kam po dzam me ma 'jib ma/ /grong du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /drag gzugs ma dang gzugs chen
ma| |mche ma drag mo gtsigs pa mo/ /lha mo thod pa'i phreng can dang / /kha T+wAM ga ni 'dzin ma dang / /mi'u thung ma dang dgra sta'i phyag /rdo rje'i phyag can de bzhin gzhu/ /mkha'
'gro ma lnga de nyid che/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub ma/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mo dang / /rdor dbang phyug ma gtso de bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen
po| |rdul med rnal 'byor stong pa nyid/ /rdo rje'i dbang phyug bka' yis ni/ /kun nas 'dir ni spyan 'dren no/ /oM ka k+ka kan+d+ha na/ /ba b+ba ban+d+ha na/ /kha kh+kha khA da na/ sarba duSh+Ta
na| ha na ha na/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ che ge mo'i dgos pa mdzod cig hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT dzaHswAhA/ bdud rtsis kha ni yongs bkang nas/ /lha thams cad ni mnyes
par bya/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM b+hak+Sha sarba yo ge shwa rI hUM hUM dzaHswAhA/ ji lta'i las sogs yongs sbyor
ba| |gtor ma'i las sogs yongs sbyar bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/ /dgug dang bsad dang dbye ba dang / /rengs ba gtor ma'i de nyid kyi/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi
las rnams kun/ /bsgrub bya'o ye shes lcags kyu yis/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i lha tshim bya/ /zhing dang gnas dang de bzhin grong / /grong khyer ram ni ri bo ru/ /'byung po mang po rab
tu bsdu/ /de yi tshogs ni 'du ba'o/ /rtsa thams cad kyi kun spyod kyis/ /de yi srog kyang bsdu ba'o/ /rang gi mdud pa'i gnas 'dug pa/ /de ni lte ba snying gar 'dod/ /rnal
'byor ma la gus 'dud pas/ /sgrub pa pos ni mchog thob 'gyur/ /rtag tu gnas dang nye gnas su/ /sdod la lha yis mchog ster 'gyur/ /gnas der nyams pa dang ldan
pa| |sngon gyi cho gas bsgrub par bya/ /bug rdol dang ni rgas pa dang / /shu ba mdze sogs spang ba ni/ /'byung ba'i nyi ma thob byas nas/ /de ltar legs mnyam bzhag pas
sgrub| |lha yi chu yis khrus byas te/ /khyad par du yang bdud rtsi lngas/ /yan lag mar nag chen pos byug /de nyid kyis ni bdug spos sbyin/ /nges par gru bzhi gru gsum pa'i//
dbus su 'bad pas bya ba yin/ /ji lta bar ni sngon bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gsan du gzhug /gad mo rnam pa brgyad bya ste/ /hA hA hI hI hU hU he he/ zhes bya sgrub pa
@#/ /po yis so/ /me yi sa bon yang dag zhon/ /rlung gis su ni phye ba yi/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu sbyar byas nas/ /sa yi mthil du mchod byas nas/ /skye gnas
dbus su dgod bya ste/ /'bad pas zhu ba lta bar bya/ /skye gnas dbus su rim ji bzhin/ /bdag nyid bsam bya rnal 'byor pas/ /pho nya'i 'od zer kun nas 'khrigs/ /'bar ba'i
phreng ba rgya mtsho blta/ /de ltar rnam pa bsams gyur pas/ /rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba'i gnas/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs
so| /zhes bya ba ni keng rus kyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// //de nas mche ba rngam gtsigs pa'i/ /ting 'dzin sbyor gnas bshad bya ste//
gzhu 'gengs rim pa 'ong ba ni/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor pas yod de/ /srog gi thig le son bsam pa/ /mtshams thams cad du de brgyud de/ /gzhu dbyug mtshan mar bsam
par bya/ /sgra thams cad ni bskul ba yis/ /kun nas 'gengs bzhin pa yi mda'/ /dbus ma'i lte bar 'dzom pa yis/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'ben gzhom bya/ /'byung
gnas thams cad bsad pa yin/ /bgrod bzhin pa yi bde ba cher/ /der rig pa yis gzhan du 'gro /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa yi/ /rab sbyor rnams kyis nges 'byung
'gyur/ /mtshon cha zad pa med 'joms pa/ /skye bo kun la 'jug par 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i spyod yul las/ /gzhan gyi gong rnams su 'jug pa'o/ /sngon gyi sprul pa'i bag chags ni/ /
de la rgyun du 'joms par byed/ /rnam par zhu ba'i bdag nyid che/ /zhi ba'i gzugs su ster bar 'gyur/ /Sh+Ti zhes rkang pa'i mthil bar du/ /nor bu'i skud pa bzhin du bgrod/ /na de mtshams
kyi don dam par/ /sa gsum po la lta bar 'gyur/ /de phyir skye bo thams cad la/ /mtshon bya mtshan nyid kyis 'byed do/ /dbang po de rnams thams cad la/ /bdag nyid kyis dbugs
slar ci smos/ /'gro ba gzhan du rab 'jug par/ /mchog tu rmad byung 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bar yang dag gnas/ /skye bo kun la rnam par blta/ /mig sogs rnam par shes
pa ni/ /nang rnams su ni bskyed par byas/ /mkha' 'gro'i rnam par de shes bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs kyi gtso/ /dkyil 'khor sngon du sprul par ni/ /mche gtsigs la sogs
bsgom par bya/ /rang gi khams ni bde ba'i gzugs/ /rang rang gtso bor bya ba yin/ /de las skyes pa'i mkha' 'gro che/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pa'i gzugs/ /thams cad
chos 'byung sna tshogs pa'i/ /snying por gzhom du med zhi ba/ /chos kun gcig tu yongs bsdus pa/ /sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bri/ /A li kA li mnyam byas nas/ /sde tshan rnams
@#/ /kyis yongs brjes pa/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa/ /der gnas dpa' bos yang dag btu/ /ye shes la sogs sku bzhi po/ /zhes bya 'thob
'gyur the tshom med/ /steng 'og rtag tu dngos grub ster/ /bdag nyid pho nya kun 'gros so/ /yi ge lnga bcu sde tshan brgyad/ /de nyid mkha' 'gro mchog rmad byung / /sdom pa'i dkyil
'khor ram yang na/ /chung ngu'i rgyud dang 'dra ba mchog /yi ge thams cad kyi ni tshad/ /sdom pa sogs su mtshon par bya/ /yi ge rnams dang ming rnams dang / /sdom pa rnams
su de brjod do/ /dkyil 'khor rnams dang rgyud rnams dang / /le'u rnams dang ni de bzhin du/ /las tshogs rnams ni thams cad de/ /nyis 'gyur thung du ring ba'o/ /de nyid du ni kun
nges rgyal/ /'byin cing sdud par byed pa po/ /sems can rigs zhes 'dir de bshad/ /re re yi ni mtshan nyid do/ /re re yi ni sgom pa ni/ /ji lta'i rim pas shes par bya/ /yi ge
yi ni ming dang gzugs/ /de ni sems can gzugs su 'dod/ /gsang sngags de ni zlos bzhin pa/ /de nyid du ni rab gzhug bya/ /a yig thig le dang bral ba/ /dmar po phyi mo rnam par spangs//
a yig thig le dang bcas pa/ /de phyir 'tshal gyi rigs can no/ /guny+dza'i me tog dang mnyam par/ /a yig la ni brgyan par bya/ /A yig sin+d+hu ra yi mdog /bzang po lnga par shes
par bya/ /u yig dbang po'i gzhu yi 'od/ /U yig yi ge drug pa nyid/ /glog gnyis dang ni 'dra ba'o/ /r-i yig du ba'i kha dog ste/ /phra mo lus ni spangs pa'o/ /r-I yi yi ge mun pa'i gzugs/
l-i ni bya rog gshog pa mtshungs/ /l-I yi yi ge mtshal gyi mdog /e yi yi ge dmar skya ste/ /ai sin+d+hu ra dmar mdog ma/ /o yi yi ge nyi ma 'dra/ /'od zer stong phrag gyen du 'bar/
au yi yi ge rtag 'bar ba/ /nyi ma bye ba dang mnyam 'od/ /zla phyed de bzhin du thig le/ /aM yig sngon du bshad pa can/ /zla ba gnyis dang tsheg drag ste/ /AHyig rgyal po de bzhin
no| |de ltar stong pa nyid bcu drug /las rnams kyi ni dag pa'i rgyu/ /myos dang brlab gdol rmongs pa dang / /sems bral dang po'i stong nyid do/ /rmongs pa dang 'khrugs dbang dang ni/ /
myur du thams cad ster ba'o/ /bsam bral ba dang myos pa dang / /brlab gdol du ni gsal ba'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi las bsgoms pas/ /de ni rmugs dang dbang du 'ong / /yang dag
rmongs dang rnam rmongs 'gyur/ /lus brlan pa dang sems pa bral/ /dbang du 'ong dang dgug pa dang / /ye shes shes bya can mchog go /bskrad pa dang ni gzhu ba'i las/ /rnam pa
bdun du 'dod pa yin/ /sa yi zil gnon 'dzin bzhin dang / /sngags min pa dang rmongs pa'i sems/ /skye ba 'di la nam du yang / /de yi slar yang 'ong min pa'o/ /rnam par sdang dang
@#/ /thams cad kyi/ /'jig rten gyis ni smod pa'o/ /'jig rten kun dang mthun med la/ /skad cig gnas pa spangs pa'o/ /yid kyi las ni thams cad rnams/ /
de phyir 'jig rten gsum gang 'gyur/ /bde ba kha yis bkug byas nas/ /dbugs med ri mo 'dzag pa nub/ /phyi mo'i yal ga rnams kyis bya/ /dam tshig dbang phyug ma'i gnas
kyis| |phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin ni/ /gnyis stong mchog tu zag pa med/ /sangs rgyas ri mo stong 'og tu/ /pad+ma'i rnal can rab tu gnas/ /A li kA li mdor bsdus pa/ /bcud
len khams kyi lus las so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha/ /zhal du yongs su 'gyur ba'o/ /de yi 'og dang gang gzhan du/ /yi ge thams cad nges par gnas/ /so sor snang
ba ma byung bar/ /srung ba gyis zhes bdag gis bshad/ /sems ni rjes mthun dbyangs su 'gyur/ /sems ni stong pa'i rang bzhin tsan/ /zla gnyis yang dag sbyor ba ni/ /phyag rgya
mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar khams kyi rang bzhin kyang / /ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bya'o/ /slar yang thams cad byed pa yi/ /stong pa nyid ni so sor dgod/ /thog ma gnyis
ni rkang gnyis dgod/ /brla dang gsang ba rked pa dang / /lte ba snying ga steng dang ni/ /mgrin pa dang ni rkan de bzhin/ /kha dang sna dang rna dag dang / /dpral ba mgo bo rgyab tu ste/ /rang
gi khams ming 'du shes kyis/ /dbang la sogs pa'i las byed do/ /slar yang re re yi yang ni/ /las ni nyi shu lnga'i bdag nyid/ /stong nyid de nyid rig byed pa/ /rgyun du nang du bsgom
par bya/ /ka yig la sogs ma yig mthar/ /lha mo bdag nyid chen mos nyon/ /gang gis sa gsum gyi ni lha/ /thams cad lha ma yin dang mi/ /sgrub po'i legs par nges par
ni| |de rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /de nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/ /ka yig sogs su 'du shes so/ /bdag dang dkyil 'khor lus dang ni/ /lha dang bla ma dang ni sngags/ /
rnams shes ye shes snying po dang / /dus dang rgyu dang 'bras de bzhin/ /dbugs dang bcud len las dang ni/ /gtor ma sa dang phyag rgya gzhan/ /dbang po dbu ma sgyur ma dang / /mtshams
dang rigs rus de bzhin te/ /lung ni rjes su rig pa dang / /mig 'phrul 'dra ba rim ji ltar/ /de ltar de nyid las mdzes pa/ /shes rab chen pos shes par bya/ /rang bzhin gyis
ni brjod pa'i las/ /dus kyi me yi mdog can no/ /ji ltar dbang la sogs pa'i las/ /lnga lnga ru ni gsal ba yin/ /dmar dang gnag dang de bzhin dkar/ /ser dang ljang gu de
bzhin no/ /sgrub po'i bsgrub bya'i 'dod pa ni/ /de rnams de nyid 'gyur gyis 'ong / /ya yig la sogs dgu rnams kyis/ /ji lta'i cho gas yi ge rnams/ /phung po khams kyi rigs
@#/ /rnams dang / /yan lag dgu rnams brjod pa'o/ /ji lta'i rim pas blo ldan gyis/ /dgu dgu ru ni shes par bya/ /las ni de rnams shes bya ste/ /'dus pa
bde mchog bla ma dang / /bde mchog rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / /'byung ba de nyid 'dus pa dang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed sa ma pu Ta/ /ji lta'i cho gas gzhan du yang / /de ltar nges brjod
'bum gsum las/ /phyung ba bde mchog chung du ste/ /a yig la sogs k+ShaHyig mthar/ /le'u rnams ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /de kho na nyid ldan par bya/ /sdom pa rgya mtsho mkha'
'gro skyes/ /mkha' mnyam nang du rab bshad pa'i/ /de yi sgrub thabs bshad par bya/ /ji ltar dbus ma'i pad+mar ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni gsal bar bsgom/ /sku yi rgya mtsho
ser sna rgya mtsho dang / /'dod chags rgya mtsho phrag dog rgya mtsho ste/ /phyogs bzhi por ni bsgom par bya/ /pad 'dab rnams su rnal 'byor ma/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho rin chen rgya mtsho ma/ /pad+ma
rgya mtsho sna tshogs rgya mtsho ma/ /g.yon bskor du ni bsgom bya ste/ /'dab ma bzhi la thod pa ni/ /rgya mtsho bzhi po yi ni gzugs/ /dngos kun bdud rtsir son pa'o/ /slar yang grwa bzhi po
rnams su/ /ji lta'i rim pas dgod bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ye shes de kho na/ /thar pa'i rgya mtsho g.yon bskor du'o/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg dang chos dang yid dang sems/ /
kun kyang rgya mtshor shes bya ste/ /g.yon dang g.yas kyis dgod par bya/ /sa dang nam mkha' lce dang ni/ /rna ba thams cad rgya mtsho ste/ /ye shes zhes bya'i rgya mtsho dag /sngon gyi rim

pas dgod par bya/ /sgo skyong ma yi lha mo che/ /g.yon bskor du ni dgod bya ba/ /glang po rgya mtsho rta rgya mtsho/ /seng ge rgya mtsho ma he rgya mtsho'o/ /grwa la gnas pa'i lha mo ni/ /sgyu ma rgya
mtsho rmi lam rgya mtsho ma/ /gsang snang rgya mtsho snang ba'i rgya mtsho ma/ /kha dog 'khor lo gzhan gyi bzhin/ /byang chub chung du bdag nyid che'i/ /dkyil 'khor de yis shes par bya/ /
dur khrod brgyad kyi rim pas ni/ /sgrub thabs rim pas bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi zhal nas ni/ /pad+ma'i yu ba nges par 'thon/ /kha dog dkar po 'bar chen po/ /
pad+ma 'dab ma stong phrag can/ /de yi dbus su bsgom bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho bde mchog ste/ /phyag stong pa ni rnam par sgom/ /zhal ni sum cu rtsa bdun no/ /zhabs bco
brgyad kyis gar du mdzad/ /spyan gsum pa la sna tshogs mdog /ral pa'i cod pan can gyi gzugs/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed can/ /rgyab tu dbang phyug chen po 'dzin/ /lhag
mar dpa' bo dpa' dbang mo/ /bcu gnyis bdag nyid can 'khor lor/ /ji ltar bdag gis sngon bshad pa'o/ /shes rab phyag g.yon du bshad de/ /g.yas par rgyun du thabs
@#/ /yin no/ /khyab 'jug drag po de bzhin tshangs/ /gshin rje dang ni log 'dren dang / /bden bral dang ni thags zangs ris/ /dbang po tshogs bdag karti
ga |sgra gcan zla ba nyi ma dang / /bla ma skyob pa bla de bzhin/ /nor rgyas dang ni skyes bu me/ /myos pa zhabs kyis gnon pa ste/ /rang rang khyim thabs yang dag ldan/ /mdog dang
mtshon cha yang bya'o/ /phag mo yis ni 'khyud pa ste/ /de'i gzugs can nam phyag gnyis skyes/ /sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin rab myur ma/ /slar yang rang 'dra'i gzugs can
ma'o| |'dab ma stong du bsgom bya ba/ /rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma kun te/ /bcom ldan kha dog gang 'dra ba/ /de 'drar de rnams mtshon par bya/ /thung du ring po yon tan 'phar/ /
a yig la sogs sde brgyad de/ /phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis phye ba/ /stong phrag rnal 'byor ma'i yang ngo / /ka rdo rje sogs shes bya ste/ /khams kyi rkyen gyi yid kyis so/ /'khor lo
drug bdag rnal 'byor can/ /de thams cad ni gar du mdzad/ /thams cad kyis ni ro la gnon/ /phyag gnyis pa 'am mkha' 'gro'i bdag /thod pa kha T+wAM kha 'dzin ma/ /bde
chen rnam pa'i gzugs can ma'o/ /sangs rgyas thugs ka nas spro ba/ /'khor lo gsum spro 'od zer phreng / /srog ni 'og dang steng blta bas/ /sdom pa rgya mtsho dgug par
bya| |slar yang dbugs kyis dbyung ba ni/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho gnyis med bdag /thams cad sdom pa'i sgrub thabs su/ /ji lta'i rnal 'byor gzhan bya'o/ /de ltar byed bzhin pa nyid
kyis| |phyag rgya'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur/ /gzhung thams cad ni blta bar bya/ /gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor dmigs mi bya/ /dam tshig gi ni spyod pa tsam/ /sdom pa chung dur rab tu bshad/ /
thams cad sog ma bzhin dor la/ /thams cad sdom pa gzung bar gyis/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs rab sbyor bas/ /gzhu 'gengs rim pas 'ong bar gyis/ /de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor
lo yang / /sngon gyi sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /'og dang steng nyid mche ba gnyis/ /bde mchog mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dag /rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la/ /hUM phaT yi ge mthar
sbyar gyis/ /yang dag ting 'dzin rdo rje yi/ /gsang sngags thams cad la bya'o/ /thams cad rgyan ni rab bshad pa'ang / /sngags rig pa yis sngon bzhin no/ /bdag gis bdag
pos rgyud 'di ni/ /gsungs pas yang dag dga' bar 'gyur/ /nyid dang lhan cig bya ba byas/ /phyag rgya 'og ste ji ltar lags/ /khyod kyis 'og dang steng phyag rgya/ /rab bshad bya yi lha
mo nyon/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho shes rab che/ /thabs ni sdom pa rgya mtsho'o/ /'og dang steng du snyoms 'jug pas/ /de ni phyag rgyar sngon brjod 'gyur/ /zhal las nges par 'thon yu ba/ /
@#/ /ngag gis bsgos pa'i bdag nyid do/ /de ni mkha' 'gro spyod de yang / /rnam par shes dang thams cad 'ong / /zhu ba'i gzugs ni snying ga ru/ /'od kyis
thams cad sdom par gyis/ /de ni theg pa cher sdom pa/ /bdag nyid chen po ye shes gzugs/ /de ltar gnyis su byar med gzugs/ /de ni phyag rgyar mngon par brjod/ /dpa'
bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho che/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni mche ba rnam par
gtsigs pa'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// //de nas lha mos mchod byas nas/ /phyag byas nas ni 'di skad gsal/ /sems can rnams kyi sdom byung
ba| |bcom ldan bdag po nyid kyis gsungs/ /lha dgra yi ni rab sbyor bas/ /rab bshad bya yi lha mo nyin/ /byang chub sems kyi cha can gyi/ /bde ba 'ong ba'i gang zhig rtsa/ /sdom
pa sems can smin byed pa'i/ /rnal 'byor der ni rnam par spro/ /'dod chags chags bral rnam 'dres pa/ /sdom pa skye 'gro'i gzugs can no/ /gang phyir de nyid kyis sdom pa/ /
sngon gyi spyod pas sdom pa'o/ /bai yi nam mkha' nam mkhar te/ /sku gsum rnams kyi yang dag bzhugs/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /'thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom
med| |gang tshe sems ni 'gro bzhin pa/ /gzugs kyi dbus su thim par gyis/ /rang rig bdag nyid byang chub ldan/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i sku thob 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin skad cig rig med pa/ /gang
gi srid gsum la thim gyis/ /de ni 'byung bar shes bya ste/ /lus can gzhan rnams kyi sdom min/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi gsang sdom pa/ /de ltar de nyid nges shes bya/ /nang gi bdag nyid
nyin zhag gi'ang / /de yis sdom par bshad par 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs ldan pa'i/ /A li kA li sogs sde tshan/ /dang po'i yi ge'i cha la sogs/ /gang du ming ni nges par
mthong / /rigs ni de ru shes bya ste/ / ka'ang sems can yang dag ldan/ /mtha' yas la sogs klu gang dang / /nyi ma la sogs gza' de bzhin/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i ming thog
byas nas/ /ma mo de rnams su rab grags/ /lha rnams kun gyis bskyed pa dang / /sngags rnams kyi dang rgyud nyid kyi'ang / /'jig rten kun gyi ma yin te/ /de yis ma la yang dag brten/ /
rtsa ni dgu po 'gog pa las/ /srog rgyu rnams su shes par bya/ /a A ka tsa Ta ta pa dang / /ya sha'i sde tshan yi ge dgu /i I kha tsha Tha tha pha dang / /ra Sha gnyis par brjod pa 'o/ /u U
ga dza Da da ba dang / /la sa sde tshan gsum pa'o/ /e ai g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha dang / /wa ha sde tshan bzhi pa'o/ /o au aM aH nga nya Na dang / /na ma de ltar dgu'i bdag nyid/ /bzhi po yongs su
@#/ /grags pa ste/ /nyi can lnga rnams kyis de bzhin/ /de ltar 'jig rten kun gyi de/ /sdud pa dang ni 'byin par gnas/ /sgyu chen bcu gnyis de rnams kyis/ /sa bon
gzugs kyi tshogs dran bya/ /de rnams rA sir yang dag grags/ /rgyu skar kun dang yang dag ldan/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma'i chas/ /'og dang steng gi kha de bzhin/ /brtan pa dang ni
g.yo ba gnyis/ /rgyu skar dang ni rA sir bshad/ /srog zung du ni de bzhin gshegs/ /ring dang thung du rgyal dang pham/ /steng du de yi rgyal bar bshad/ /'og tu 'chi ba mnyam
mi mnyam/ /nyi ma'i rgyu bar son pa kun/ /rgyu skar rA si gza' de bzhin/ /rA si rnam gsum spyod gang phyir/ /nyi mar gnas par 'char bar 'gyur/ /srog 'char ba dang
yang dag ldan/ /rA si kun gyis shes bar bya/ /karka Ta seng bu mo dang / /bum pa ris drug yang dag ldan/ /'char bar 'gyur dang shar ba yang / /ji lta'i rim dag gza' can
