gyis| |brish+tsi ka dang rta nyid dang / /ri dgas bum par yang dag ldan/ /cha shas lnga yi tshad kyis ni/ /gza' shar ba yis 'char bar 'gyur/ /ri bong lug de bzhin nyid dang / /
skan da ru ni son de bzhin/ /cha shas kyang ni bzhi pa nyid/ /'char ba 'ong bar 'char bar 'gyur/ /zhag gi 'char ba ma lus pa'ang / /'bras bu'i ming dang yang dag ldan/ /nag
mo sogs nas 'jib ma'i mthar/ /yongs su rim pas nyi shu bzhi/ /gang dang 'dra ba'i ming de 'dra'i/ /de rnams 'bras bur shes par bya/ /nyis 'gyur longs spyod bris pa
dang | |dbang po rnams kyis cha dang ldan/ /thob pa zhag tu shes bya ste/ /bdag gi rtag tu zhag lha mo/ /bdag nyid kyis ni dgos kun dang / /gzhan rnams la yang de ltar sbyor/ /de phyir
phyi dang nang rnams su/ /dge dang mi dge'i las shes bya/ /sdom pa 'byung ba'i dus su ni/ /rnam rtog med pas mtshon par bya/ /gza' gang de rnams dbyangs shes bya/ /dbyangs
gang de rnams rA si'o/ /dbyangs dang rA si de bzhin skar/ /rang gi gzugs rnams kyang blta'o/ /dngos grub 'bras bu ster ba po/ /yang dag sbyor dang bral na med/ /g.yo ba'i
'char bas g.yo ba'i las/ /nges par brtan pas g.yo med 'gyur/ /'dren ma yis ni 'dren mar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyis/ /lha rnam grol ba'i rgyu
nyid pas/ /lha yi dgra ni bsgom par bya/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid 'khor lo/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub byed pa'i gtso/ /kha dog dang ni mtshan nyid dbyibs/ /las rjes 'brangs
pas bsgom par bya/ /lha 'am lha min sbyin byed kyi/ /dgra ni 'khor lo sdom pa'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad snyoms 'jug pas //rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha'
@#/ /'gro lha yi dgra /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni lha dgra yi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa lnga pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor
ma thams cad/ /'dus par byas nas 'dri ba ni/ /lha dang sbyin byed sems can gyi/ /sdug bsngal ster po ji ltar lags/ /gal te kun rang bzhin ston pa/ /dge dang mi
dge de 'dri ba/ /de nas bcom ldan lha la sogs/ /sems can kun ster po ci lags/ /'di la bdag ni the tshom ma chis/ /gtso bo gsal bar mdzod cig kye/ /phag
mo la sogs mang po yi/ /lha mo sgyu ma chen mo nyon/ /rang rang las kyi rjes 'brangs pas/ /lha dang sbyin byed sems can gyi/ /bdag gi rang bzhin du ni med/ /byang chub
chen por zhu las yod/ /rang gi rang bzhin yon tan nyid/ /bdag gi las kyi yang dag 'byung / /de phyir dge dang mi dge blta/ /sna tshogs kun rtog 'thob par byed/ /de
yis lha dang sbyin byed rnams/ /gza' dang rA si rgyu skar can/ /rang gi las 'bras la za ba/ /ster ro gzhan du ci yang med/ /ston pa ji ltar grol bar 'gyur/ /klu 'di yis

ni dgyes par byed/ /a mi tA b+ha dza ni tA sa mA d+h+ya mA ga mA ga mA d+hA nya ma pA nya rI pA ma nya ri ga mA sA nya mA rI gi ma b+hU ya te/ sa rI re sa ri re sa rI rI sA nI sA nya shru ta ni sa mAnya sa
nI| shrI rI b+ha ga mA d+ha m+mA d+ha m+mA sA ta pA ya ma pA pA ma da mi te/ 'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas/ /'di 'dra'i grol ba bsgrub par bya/ /a ba d+hU tI'i yang dbus su/ /rnam shes
grol ba la mtshon bya/ /srog la sogs pa'i rlung thams cad/ /rnam 'gyur byas pa'i bar thim bya/ /rnam par shes pa 'dres gyur pa'ang / /khams thams cad kyi bcud len te/ /'thungs
pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /dbang po rnams bgrod mtshan nyid las/ /rkan gyi phyogs su gnas pa'i lce/ /a ba d+hU tIr de rab bshad/ /cha shas can gyi tha ma yi/ /bdud
rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur/ /rtsa thams cad du bkang ba ste/ /yang dag rig pa'i gzugs su thim/ /mdor bsdus pas ni khams lnga ste/ /gzhan gyi dngos po 'dir ma brjod/ /
dbang chen la ni me yis sreg /chu yis dbus su rab tu thim/ /myur du zhu nas dro bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi nam mkha' la gnas so/ /chu yi tshogs ni skam byas pas/ /de nyid du ni thim
nas 'gro /sems ni stong nyid la son bya/ /stong nyid nam mkha'i khams la'o/ /nam mkha' ye shes la 'jug bya/ /ye shes sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid/ /mkhas pas ye shes
shes bya'i bdag /de ltar 'od dpag med par sgom/ /rtsibs brgyad legs par brgyan pa yi/ /shes bya'i 'khor lo 'di bsgom bya/ /bu med bri ba mi u ku/ /d+ha si mer ro ma ka
@#/ /'drer/ /rlung du tu ka bi mi ste/ /dbang ldan du ni rA si'o/ /de rnams 'khor lo rim ji bzhin/ /de bzhin 'di la 'di rnams dgod/ /a i u e o'i sa bon/ /bkra shis la
sogs gza' lnga ni/ /shar la sogs par dgod par bya/ /ring po de nyid du dgod bya/ /aM aH nyi ma zlar shes bya/ /nyi ma zla ba 'di grol ba/ /ku li re la nyi ma ste/ /gza' lhag
gdong lnga pa 'dir gnas/ /mthar ni gang zhig lhag ma yi/ /so so'i cho gas za bar 'gyur/ /rA si rnams kyis brgyan pa yi/ /'gro kun la phan 'khor lo de/ /de ltar do la'i
'khor lor 'gyur/ /rgyu skar rA si dus dang zhag /lug rnams ro hi ta sogs dang / /zla ba dang ni nyi ma rnams/ /'chi ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa ni/ /mdor bsdus pa yis
bshad par bya/ /rgyu skar dus tshod yang dag ldan/ /gza' dang nad ni de bzhin te/ /do la rA si'i tshad kyis ni/ /skye ba'i las su brjod pa yin/ /kA rti ka dang bzang po'i tshe/ /mig
dmar de bzhin smin drug ste/ /de la 'chi bar shes par bya/ /gal te rnal 'byor ba med na'o/ /mar ga shI ra Shi mgo dang ni/ /gza' lhag nyi ma la smyo ba/ /mgul pa'i nad kyis
nyin bzhi na/ /khyu mchog la ni rtag tu 'chi/ /rgyal bar mri ga'i rgyu skar dang / /gza' lhag 'khrig pa la 'chi'o/ /ku li ra chu'i tshes brgyad kyi/ /tho rangs pa sangs la 'chi'o/ /gre dang
mchu yi rgyu skar dang / /tshes bcu spen pa seng ge la/ /nub mo 'chi bar shes bya ste/ /gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur kyang / /bu mo nyi mar gul mas 'chi/ /sa ga dang ni bcu bzhi dang / /
gzhu dang phur bu'i ri mo dang / /gal te sangs rgyas mnyam gyur pa/ /srang la 'chi bar shes par bya/ /snron dang bcu gcig nag pa dang / /phur bu sdig pa la 'chi'o/ /chu stod chu smad
tshes dgu dang / /gro bzhin gzhu dang pa sangs 'chi/ /gro bzhin tshes bdun zla ba dang / /rgyal dang chu srin lag nor med/ /khrums stod khrums smad bcu gsum pa/ /zla ba mon gre
bum pas 'dzad/ /tha skar brgyad pa nam gru dang / /spen pa dang ni nya la 'chi/ /sems can kun gyi skye ba'i rtsis/ /dus smra bas ni shes par bya/ /sa bon gcig las skyes yon tan/ /
gnyis pa skye ba'i dus kyis so/ /rigs gnyis su ni shes byas nas/ /de'i dus skye rtsis brtsam par bya/ /sngon las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /mkhas pas de'i rigs su skye'o/ /de yi
'bras bu shes bya ste/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni rjes su gnas| |rA ri sogs 'khor 'brel pa de/ /rnam shes kun gyi mtshan nyid do/ /'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor
gsal bar bsgom par bya/ /dbus su 'od dpag med mgon po/ /lhag mar mkha' 'gro ma sogs so/ /de ni rnam shes skye gsal bar/ /las kyi 'bras bur de dran bya/ /thams cad
@#/ /bde ba kun sbyor las/ /de tshe gnyis med la brten pa'i/ /'od dpag med kyi sbyor ldan pa/ /bcom ldan ston pas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag
med kyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa drug pa'o// //rdo rje 'od kyi rab sbyor bas/ /ye shes de kho nyid bshad bya/ /lha mos slar yang mchod byas nas/ /de kho na nyid ye shes zhus/ /
sems can rnams kyi rnam nges pas/ /'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gang 'dra ba/ /de 'dra bdag gis bshad bya yi/ /rtse gcig pa yi yid kyis nyon/ /lus la rtsa rnams mtshan ma ni/ /de rnams
ji ltar gsal bar dbye/ /rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ /de rnams kyi ni gtso bo mchog /bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo/ /dbyangs rnams bgrod pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /dkar po nag po'i
phyogs kyis ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru ni brjod/ /der ni snying po dgu po mchog /lus kyi mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid do/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba'i dus lta bur gnas so/ /dbugs
ni rnam par spros tsam gyis/ /lus can 'pho ba drug gnyis ni/ /snga dro ro hi ta yi char/ /de yi rtags ni mtshon par bya/ /sna dang mig gi phyogs dang ni/ /'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsar/ /lce
dang mche ba'i mtshams dang ni/ /mgrin pa rtsib logs de bzhin du/ /snying gi gur dang lte ba dang / /brla dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan/ /'doms dang ling ga dag de bzhin/ /mgo bo
dang ni spyi bo'i phyogs/ /mtshams ni de rnams thams cad du/ /dbugs ni 'chad cing 'chad pa'o/ /lus kyi mtshan ma dgu rnams te/ /'chi ba'i dus ni bstan pa yin/ /nyi ma'i tshad kyi
grangs rnams ni/ /'khor lo dus bdag nyid can dga'/ /gang tshe nyi ma drug rnams zhon/ /gcig brjod pa ni brgyan pa yin/ /der ni lo gsum 'gyur can te/ /sum brgya drug cu rnams
de bzhin/ /cha shas de ltar gyi ni tshad/ /mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya/ /nyi ma bdun ni yongs su thob nas/ /gang tshe rlung ni 'bab pa na/ /lo gnyis yang dag brjod pa dang / /dus kyi
grangs can zla ba dang / /nyi ma rnams ni bco brgyad kyi/ /gang zhig tshad du yang dag brjod/ /zhag brgyad rnams su yongs gtong bas/ /rlung ni gang tshe 'bab pa na/ /lo gnyis su ni
yongs bshad par/ /de yi 'tsho ba yi ni grangs/ /nges par de'i tshe 'chi ba ni/ /de yi zla ba rig byed grangs/ /nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhir bshad/ /'tsho ba yi ni dus grangs so/ /lha mo nyi ma dgur
'bab na/ /lo gnyis su ni de 'tsho ste/ /zla gnyis nyi ma nyi ma yi/ /tshad ni sbyor ba'i lus can no/ /lha mo nyi ma bcu rnams kyis/ /lo gnyis su ni de 'tsho'o/ /nyi ma bcu gcig de bzhin
du| |gang tshe rtsa ni rab 'jug na/ /lo gcig gi ni lam bcas pas/ /zla ba yang ni dgu'i grangs kyis/ /nyi ma bco brgyad rab tu bshad/ /the tshom med par bshad pa'o/ /zhag ni bcu
@#/ /gnyis rab 'bab pas/ /lo gcig tu ni rab tu grags/ /zla ba yang ni lo'i grangs can/ /nyi ma rnams ni dus kyis mdzes/ /bcu gsum du ni gang tshe rtsa/ /
g.yas su bgrod par 'bab pa na/ /lo ni yang dag bshad pa ste/ /zla ba yang ni rig byed grangs/ /nyi ma rnams ni dgu'i grangs na/ /'chi ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o/ /lha mo gang
tshe bdun gnyis su/ /rtag tu rlung ni 'bab pa na/ /lo ni tshe ru yang dag bshad/ /zla ba'i tsher ni yang dag grags/ /nyi ma rnams ni bcu gnyis te/ /de yi 'tsho ba'i tshad yin no/ /gang tshe bco
lnga nyi mar ni/ /rlung ni de bzhin 'bab pa na/ /de tshe 'chi bar shes bya ba/ /lo gcig na ni the tshom med/ /nyi ma mchog ni phan pa yi/ /gang tshe brgyad gnyis su 'bab na/ /'tsho ba zla ba bcu dang
ni| |nyi ma rnams ni mchog grangs kyi/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i nyin rnams kyi/ /tshad du bdag gis bshad pa'o/ /nyi ma rnams ni bcu bdun du/ /nges par gang tshe rlung 'bab na/ /de tshe de yi
tshad kyis ni/ /zla ba rnams ni dgu dang ni/ /nyi ma bco brgyad na de bzhin/ /'chi ba'i dus la the tshom med/ /nyi ma bco brgyad rgyu ba yis/ /zla ba yang ni brgyad na dang / /nyi ma rnams
kyang nyi ma'i grangs/ /dus kyi grangs ni bshad pa'o/ /gang tshe gcig dman nyi shur ni/ /dri la zhon pa spyod pa na/ /nyi ma yang dag bshad bya ba/ /'tsho ba zla ba bdun dang ni/ /nyi ma
rnams ni dus grangs bshad/ /dus 'di rnams kyis mchog gdong can/ /gang tshe nyi shu ru ni spyod/ /zla ba drug na tshe dang 'bral/ /nyi ma nyi shu gcig rnams su/ /gang tshe nyi ma rab 'bab
na| |zla ba lnga ru yongs 'tsho ste/ /nyi ma rnams ni nyi ma'i grangs/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang tshe 'bab/ /zla ba'i rig byed na tshe 'gro /nyi ma rnams ni nyi shu bzhi/ /zla ba'i rig byed du bshad
do| |lha mo gang tshe nyi shu gsum/ /rlung ni rgyun du 'bab pa na/ /de ni zla ba bzhir 'tsho ste/ /nyi ma dus rnams su dran bya/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir rab 'bab pas/ /zla ba gsum du bshad pa ste/ /
nyin bcu gcig na de bzhin du/ /'chi ba'i dus su rnam par brjod/ /dus kyi grangs ni mdor bsdus nas/ /gong du sngon du bshad de'i phyir/ /bar gyi nyi ma ma bshad gang / /bcu gnyis
nyid kyi grangs kyis ni/ /cha yi rim pas de sbyangs nas/ /bar gyi gsal bar byas pa yin/ /blo dman rnams kyis rtogs don du/ /dus 'di rnams ni rab tu bstan/ /rnal 'byor ma
rnams shin phra mo'i/ /mthun ma dus ni bdag gis bshad/ /lha mo de rnams kyis yid ches/ /khams ni mnyam pa can du 'gro/ /sna yi sha ni rnam chad cing / /steng bltas ma ni de
bzhin 'bab/ /de yi 'tsho bar shes byas pa/ /nyi ma bdun na the tshom med/ /mig gis gos ni yang dag chad/ /gyen kha bltas ma mchog de bzhin/ /cha shas dgu la yang dag
@#/ /zhen| |lngas lhag pa na 'chad de bzhin/ /go dA paR+ya 'khur ba yi/ /ngos su steng du 'gro ba mo/ /nyi ma bcu ru shes bya ste/ /nub gcig gis lhag de bzhin no/ /rna ba
g.yas la yongs brten nas/ /bzang mo steng du yang dag brten/ /bcu gcig cha shas la zhon te/ /'chad pa bco brgyad na de bzhin/ /bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo/ /lce la ri mo nag po
can| |lus can kun gyi 'chi ba ni/ /nam zla'i mtshan mas shes par bya/ /bcu gsum so yi bar du ni/ /gdong nag mo ni reg de bzhin/ /nam zla'i grangs kyi nyi rnams kyis/ /'byung po
rnams kyi bgrod pa yin/ /rgyun du mchi ma 'bab gang rtsa/ /steng bltas mar ni rab tu grags/ /bcu bzhi pa yi dbyangs la zhon/ /bcu phyed kyis ni the tshom med/ /snying ga'i gzeb ni zhom pa
dang | |steng du lta ma de mchog ma/ /gsum dang lnga ru mdzes lha mo/ /zla ba phyed du the tshom med/ /lte ba'i dbus su son lha mo/ /bcu drug cha bdag can yongs rdzogs/ /sen mo'i khrag med de
bzhin zhag /nyin rnams bcu ru the tshom za/ /bcu bdun pa yi rtsa yang ni/ /brla yi steng du bskams pa ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir yang dag grags/ /nyin gzhan nyin la the tshom med/ /byin pa zung
gi gang zhig rtsa/ /steng du bltas ma de bzhin mchog /bco brgyad pa ru shes bya ste/ /nyi ma rnams kyang nyi grangs kyis/ /gcig gis dman pa'i nyi shu 'doms/ /'chi ba'o steng du kha bltas
mchog /mnyam pas 'chad par 'gyur ba la /'di yis 'tsho ba the tshom med/ /mtshan mar rol ldan mar grags ma/ /steng bgrod mchog gi dbang phyug ma/ /bcu gnyis su ni yang dag
grags/ /nyin rnams dus tshod the tshom za/ /bar gyi nyi ma gang bshad pa/ /bcu gnyis nyid la the tshom med/ /lo yi rim pas de sbyangs nas/ /bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa yis ni/ /drug dang sum cu
bco brgyad bcu/ /'di na zla bas rim ji ltar/ /shes bya de ltar lha chen mo/ /rim gyi rim gyis dbye ba'o/ /lhag ma nyid ni bsdus 'gyur bar/ /'tsho ba yir ni shes par bya/ /yang dag cho ga 'di
rnams kyis/ /rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya/ /rab tu sbyor bas srog bkang bas/ /sangs rgyas lus la 'chi ci smos/ /rab tu sbyor ba 'di brten nas/ /mdor bsdus pa yis 'chad par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i
lam nas son pa'i srog /snal ma bcu gnyis mtha' bar du'o/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran sbyor bas/ /'dod pa lnga can la za 'gyur/ /gsang sngags chen po'i 'di la ni/ /gnas nas kun du bgrod
par bya/ /sgyu ma'i bdag nyid 'chi med 'gyur/ /rnam pa dri za'i ris can no/ /rtsa yi kun nas 'gengs bzhin pa/ /dngos po kun la gnas pa yin/ /skye bo kun gyi khams rnams ni/ /ye
shes rnam par 'thob par byed/ /bdag med pa 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang zag rnams la rgod par 'gyur/ /gnyis ka sgyu ma chen po ste/ /snying rje'i dbang gis bzhugs pa yin/ /
@#/ /mthar thug pa yi sbyor bas sems/ /mtshams rnams kun du 'chi ba yin/ /'chi ba chen po sangs rgyas gzugs/ /rnal 'byor rnams la bde ster phyed/ /dkyil
'khor thams cad bzung ba yis/ /thams cad bde ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /'khor lo'i rim pa'i rab sbyor bas/ /bde ba dam pa yang dag myang / /rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyi gzugs mtshungs ma/ /lha ni mngon rtogs gzugs can te/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can/ /srog kun yang dag sbyor ba las/ /mchog tu zag med bzhugs

ldan pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dus 'khor grags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje'i 'od kyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bdun pa'o// //de nas phyag na rdo rje sogs/ /byang sems de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /mchod pa byas shing phyag byas te/ /'di skad du ni gsol ba'o/ /gtso bo lha rnams sgrub thabs dang / /de rnams
rang sngags bdag la gsungs/ /gang gi thams cad dbang gyur pa/ /gang gis rab sbyor nyid kyis lags/ /lha la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /rdo rje sku yi rgyal po nyon/ /gang gis
yang dag cho ga yis/ /myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug /dkyil 'khor bri ba byas nas ni/ /sku bsgom bya ba 'dir bshad de/ /de la ma mo lha rnams dang / /pho nya 'byung po gza' de
bzhin/ /lus srul po ni chen po dang / /rigs pa'i gsang sngags 'dir brjod bya/ /dbus ma yi ni nang gnas pa/ /srid pa dag pas bsgrubs pa yin/ /dus thams cad du bskyed pa
ni| |dkyil 'khor du ni rab 'bab can/ /ma mo dbang chen bsgrub bya dang / /lha ni chu yi dkyil 'khor du/ /'byung po me la bsgrub bya ba/ /gza' ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la/ /lus srul po
ni nam mkha' ste/ /rdo rje sku yi rab sbyor bar/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor cha yis ni/ /a pa d+hU tIr 'bab pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor lnga rnams kyi tha ma/ /de yi dus su shes par bya/ /de bltas
nas ni phyi rol du/ /ras bris la sogs dkyil 'khor dgod/ /nag pa'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi la/ /'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /'bum phrag bzlas pas de nas ni/ /ster
'gyur mdun du mngon sum du'o/ /tshangs ma bzhi pa mo da bzhin/ /gzhon nu ma dang phag mo dang / /dbang mo nyid dang tsA muN+Di/ /tshogs kyi dbang mo de gdan mo/ /gnyis pa'i dum bur
dbang po dang / /gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang / /yi dwags dbang dang me stan can/ /bden bral dang ni rlung de bzhin/ /dum bu gsum par dgod bya ba/ /nyi ma zla ba mig dmar dang / /gza'
lhag phur bu pa sangs dang / /spen pa dang ni rA hu 'o/ /bzhi par tshangs khyab 'jug de bzhin/ /drag po gzhon nu nges par bskor/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /'byung ba chen po'i khams rnams
@#/ /dang | |mkha' 'gro mar me 'jib ma dang / /kam po dzI khyab bdag de bzhin/ /'byung po 'byung po'i gzugs kyis ni/ /rtag tu cho ga bzhin bsgrub bya/ /dkyil 'khor
chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /kun nas phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri/ /ri mo sum bskor dbus byin pas/ /brtul zhugs can gyis mdzes par bya/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/ /lte ba zab pa'i
spyod yul can/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje sku/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa yi/ /bzhad pa'i zhal la khro dang bcas/ /kha dog sngon po drag chen po/ /thod pa'i
phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /nyi mar gar mdzad ro la bzhugs/ /sum cu pa rnams 'jigs par mdzad/ /stag gi pags pa'i na bza' 'dzin/ /bzang po'i gzugs can spyan gsum pa//
thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /cang te'u gri gug gis ni brgyan/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ /byang du rim pa ji lta bas/ /mkha' 'gro kam po dzI nyid ma/ /'jib ma dang ni mar me ma'o /de ltar
rdo rje sku yi don/ /mdor bsdus pa yis brjod par bya/ /lte bar rdo rje'i rnam par 'gyur/ /pho nya rkang pa drug bgrod ma'i/ /snying ga gsang ba mgrin pa ru/ /de nyid rnam pa slar dgod bya//
de nas srog ni 'dzin bzhin pas/ /bsam gtan sems te gzhan gyis min/ /lha rdzas 'od zer bskyed par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor pa rnams rang lus skyes/ /las dang po yi sbyor ba
yis| |phyogs bcur rnam par spro bar 'gyur/ /hrIHyig las byung ba'i lha mo/ /phag mo phyag ni bzhi pa ste/ /gzhu dang mda' nyid de bzhin du/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid/ /kha dog
sngon mo drag chen mo/ /phag gi gdong can 'jigs rung ma'o/ /pheM yig gis bris zhi ba mo/ /kha dog dmar mo 'od chen mo/ /thod pa dang ni lcags kyu nyid/ /kha T+wAM DA ma ru de bzhin/ /hrIHyi
yi ges gzhon nu ma/ /kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma/ /rtse gsum pa dang ba dan gsum/ /gzhu dang mda' nyid de bzhin no/ /hoHyi yi ges tsA muN+Di/ /kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma/ /kha T+wAM
ga nyid thod pa dang / /cang te'u chang snod de bzhin no/ /oM yig las ni tshangs pa mo/ /kha dog dkar mo phyag bzhi ma/ /pad+ma nyid dang thod pa dang / /gzhu dang mda' ni de bzhin mchog /gaM
yig las ni tshogs dbang mo/ /kha dog ljang gu phyag bzhi ma/ /rtse gsum pa dang thod pa dang / /bgrang phreng dang ni la du'o/ /bi yig las ni khyab 'jug ma/ /kha dog sngon mo phyag bzhi pa//
'khor lo dang ni thod pa dang / /zhags pa ral gri de bzhin mchog /I yig las byung ba dbang mo/ /kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma/ /rdo rje mdung thung thod pa dang / /sdigs mdzub bcas zhags
de bzhin no/ /thams cad 'bar bzhin gyen brdzes skra/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /ro la zhon ma spyan gsum ma/ /rked par stag gi pags pa dkris/ /shar sgor tshangs
@#/ /pa dri bya ba/ /kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi pa/ /thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang / /spyi blugs pad+ma de bzhin no/ /byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ni/ /kha dog nag po phyag bzhi
pa| |ral gri de bzhin 'khor lo dang / /thod pa dbyug pa de bzhin no/ /lho ru drag po bri bya ste/ /du ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi pa/ /rtse gsum thod pa de bzhin du/ /zhags pa phreng ba 'dzin
de bzhin/ /nub tu gzhon nu bri bar bya/ /kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa/ /dpa' bo mdung thung dbyug pa 'dzin/ /thod pa'i bgrang phreng 'dzin de bzhin/ /dbang ldan khyu mchog la zhon pa/ /
kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste/ /thod pa dang ni rtse gsum 'dzin/ /phyag gzhan thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /dbang po glang po la zhon pa/ /kha dog ser po phyag bzhi ste/ /rdo rje dang ni thod pa dang / /thal
mo sbyar ba byas pa mchog /me ru lug la zhon pa ni/ /kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi pa/ /me yi thab dang thod pa dang / /skrag nas de bzhin lag thal sbyar/ /gshin rjer ma he la zhon pa/ /kha
dog nag po phyag bzhi pa/ /dbyug pa de bzhin thod pa dang / /kun tu skrag nas thal sbyar 'dzin/ /bden bral mi la zhen pa ste/ /kha dog sngo skya phyag bzhi pa/ /ral gri dang ni thod pa 'dzin//
kun nas skrag pas thal sbyar mchog /chu lhar chu srin la zhon pa/ /kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste/ /zhags pa de bzhin thod pa dang / /thal mo sbyar ba de bzhin gzhan/ /rlung du ri dwags
la zhon pa/ /du ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi ste/ /ba dan dang ni thod pa dang / /de bzhin thal sbyar 'dzin pa mchog /lus ngan du ni gter la zhon/ /kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa/ /rin po che dang
thod pa 'dzin/ /thal sbyar byas pa'o de bzhin gzhan/ /thams cad rgyu skar dang ni gza'/ /rang dkyil 'khor la gnas pa sgom/ /rang gi dam tshig las byung ba/ /de rnams rdzu 'phrul ldan
stobs che/ /ma mo rnams dang kun gyi ma/ /'byung po rig ma de bzhin gzhan/ /de lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis/ /de phyir re re bsgom par bya/ /dur khrod la sogs gnas rnams su/ /sna tshogs dam
tshigs za rnams kyis/ /rnal 'byor longs spyod rtag dga' la/ /pho nya'i las ni yang dag brtsam/ /zla ba rdo rje'i cho ga yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bzhin no/ /sngags kyi rgyal pos
bskul ba yis/ /de thams cad ni bran bzhin byed/ /gnas sogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/ /de phyir rim pas mchod par bya/ /de nas dri sogs dbul bya zhing / /sngags kyi bzlas pa yang bya ste/ /
rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la/ /oM hUM phaT sogs nang bcug pa'o/ /dbus su bcom ldan 'das brjes nas/ /der ni thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas gzhan brjes pa'i nang du/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can te/ /ba dan gsum pa 'bar ba dang / /rdo rje thod pa rdul can mchog /gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'phyar/ /lhag
@#/ /ma sngon gyi gzugs can te/ /lus dang zhal sogs sngon gyi don/ /nges bar dbus ma'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /sku gsung thugs
kyi rdo rje bdag /thams cad lus kyi rang bzhin can/ /gzugs thams cad kyi nang bzhugs pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sku'i cho ga ste rab tu
byed pa brgyad pa'o// //de nas 'dir ni bde rgyal po/ /rnal 'byor ma yis sad mdzad nas/ /ngag 'di yis ni 'dri bar mdzad/ /blo gros chen po dus ci lags/ /kye/
rnal 'byor ma rnams khyed nyid dus/ /myu gu can gyis skyes pa'o/ /sna tshogs sa bon sems chen po/ /myu gu can gyi sbyor bas bshad/ /gza' dang sgyu skar tshes grangs ni/ /sems
kyi dus su mngon par brjod/ /gzugs med grangs ni de yi dus/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi bde ba'i rgyu/ /'jig rten gyi ni dus tsam du/ /thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs/ /de tshe myu
gu can bsgom pa/ /sa bon sa bon gyi mtshan nyid/ /myu gu sems kyi gzugs can te/ /sems las byung ba myu gu can/ /rgyu skar rA si gza' sogs pas/ /gang zhig tu ni myu gu skyes/ /de
yis myu gu can nges byas/ /rang bzhin rang bzhin du sbyang bya/ /dge ba'am ni mi dge kun/ /tshes grangs rgyu skar gza' 'char ba/ /de rnams thams cad dus rnams su/ /thams cad
bde bdag nyid skyes sgom/ /ro tri ma ni rnyed byed pa'o/ /ma b+ha ma nad 'joms pas spangs/ /ku swa A dus byad gzugs te/ /tshes grangs de ni yongs su spangs/ /mo bu mo bzang dang bkra shis so/ /
ra bu A 'joms par byed pa'o/ /b+ha bu b+ha dus kyi gzugs kyis so/ /b+ha pU gu rnyed pa byed pa po/ /mi gu d+ha nor la sogs par 'dzad/ /tra gu a dus kyis gzugs can no/ /bri shu pU dge ba rnams
byed do/ /b+hi shu pU nad dang 'joms pa yin/ /b+hu b+ha shu gshin rje'i mche can no/ /kU ma kri grags dang bsod nams 'thob/ /byA ma A gdung byed pa bo/ /pU ra ma 'chi ba'i dus can no/ /me'i
gdan can du mi ki ra/ /slar yang gshin rjer raN+Da spang / /srin por bco lnga pa nyid dang / /khyu mchog chu lhar spang bar bya/ /sems g.yengs rab tu 'joms nyid du/ /gter du rmi lam can
de bzhin/ /bzang po mig gsum pa nyid du/ 'byung po'i nyi ma shar de bzhin/ /zla ba dang ni nyi sogs tshes/ /de rnams res mo rab bshad bya/ /bzang po yugs sa mo de bzhin/ /sems
g.yengs 'byung po'i nyi mar gnas/ /skye bo kun gyi nyi ma yi/ /cha yi rgyu bar shes par bya/ /khyu mchog mi ki ra nyid dang / /rmi lam bco lnga pa de bzhin/ /zla ba'i rgyu bar yang dag grags/ /rim pa
'di rnams rnam par brjod/ /nya la me ru yang dag gnas/ /stong la rlung gi gnas su'o/ /de ltar de yi dbus gnas pa'i/ /phyogs su gdung byed yang dag gnas/ /zla ba nyi las byung ri mo//
@#/ /mnyam par lta bas mnyam par 'gro /zhi dang sdig pa bltas pa yis/ /shes rab can gyis des de spangs/ /mche ba dang 'phrad ma bltas pas/ /bden par
'chi bar byed pa yin/ /dus smra ba ni mdor bsdus pa/ /rA hu'i rgyu bar grags pa yin/ /dkar dang gcig shos cho ga yis/ /blo gros mthar thug pas shes 'gyur/ /rgyu skar sogs
dang mi mthun par/ /rmongs pa gang zhig smra bar byed/ /skye bo rang gis byas pa yi/ /las 'di shes par ma gyur to/ /las de yis ni dus rnams ni/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
lus kyi tshogs pa ji srid pa/ /de srid du ni dus rab 'jug /rnal 'byor pa rnams nyams su myong / /yang dag byang chub gnas 'thob 'gyur/ /de ni myu gu can du grags/ /kha dog dmar
po 'od chen po/ /myu gu myu gu'i gzugs can ni/ /lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas pa bsgom/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i nang son pa/ /gzugs de lha rdzas kyi ni gzugs/ /ye shes myu gu rnam
bsgoms las/ /las rnams thams cad mthong mi 'gyur/ /thams cad bdag nyid sbyor chen las/ /sngon las rnam par 'joms mdzad pa/ /rgyu rnams su ni rtag bzhugs pa'i/ /rdo
rje rgyu yis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje myu gu can gyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa dgu pa'o// //de nas rdo rje'i gar byas nas/ /rnal 'byor mas ni 'di bris so/ /ji ltar
ston pa sems dpa' che/ /las dang 'brel pas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sngon gyi las ni rnam nyams pas/ /rgyun nyams pas na 'ong med pa/ /'di la bdag ni the tshom mchis/ /snying rje mnyes
gshin pas bka' stsol/ /sems can chen po'i 'byung ba yang / /sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams gsungs pa/ /mdor bsdus pa yis bshad bya yi/ /khyod ni yid gcig pa yis nyon/ /rdo rje
ral pa can sbyor bas/ /las kyi nang du sgrub par 'gyur/ /re re yi ni sbyor ba yi/ /de ni rang 'byung du gnas so/ /shin tu dad pa la gnas pas/ /dbang po thams cad 'du bar bya/ /de yi ral
bas rtag 'jig rten/ /ral pa'i ming gis 'chid pa yin/ /dga' ba kun las khyad 'byed pa'i/ /rdo rje'i sku khyod 'thob par 'gyur/ /de phyir bag chags thams cad dang / /dge ba'i las
las zad par 'gyur/ /skye bo chen po de 'byung ba/ /gcig nyid lam gyis 'thob par 'gyur/ /rtog pa med las rtog par 'gyur/ /rtog pa yis ni rtog med 'byung / /dril bu'i sgra ni thob byas
nas| |de rnams mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /rtse dgu rtse mo gcig pa dang / /rtse lnga rtse mo gsum pa can/ /de ltar la sogs dril bu che/ /rtse mo stong gi bar du 'o/ /sgra brjod pa yi dngos po yis/ /
spros pa med cing yi ge med/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dag /de yi sgra las rtog pa yang dag byung / /de nyid kyis ni rtog pa med pa med pa'i bdag /gnas rnams gang la nges
@#/ /par zhugs pa yin/ /sngon bshad rtse can de rdo rje/ /gang du yid ni rnam 'phro ba/ /chos dang sprul pa'i ris sku can/ /de nyid du ni gsor bar bya/ /phyi yi dril bu'i mtshan
nyid ni/ /dpa' bos gsungs pa bshad par bya/ /dril bu rtag tu cha gsum can/ /lha yis yang dag brgyan par byas/ /re re yi ni lha'i bdag po/ /ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor du ji ltar/ /
rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag mos pas/ /de bzhin thams cad zhal bya'o/ /lha mo de rnams kyi ni gdan/ /dril bu de la pad sogs bya/ /ji ltar de rnams kyi ni rgyan/ /de bzhin dril
bu'i ska rags so/ /lha ni sgo dang grwa rnams su/ /phyogs brgyad rnams su bya ba nyid/ /ji ltar rnal 'byor ba'i mtshon bya/ /de rnams zhal nas rtse mo 'thon/ /bum pa sogs dang zhal gnyis
la'ang / /steng du rang rigs mtshan ma can/ /'di 'dra ba yi dril bu che/ /tshad ni gzhan du bshad pa yin/ /de ni nang gi gzugs can bdag /de phyir sgra ni rnam mtshon cha/ /thig le'i gzugs
ni khyab bdag che/ /rdo rje'ang de dang mnyam par bya/ /de ltar ral pa'i sbyor ba las/ /sems can thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /ral can dril bur yang dag grags/ /rdo rje rdo rjer brjod par
'gyur/ /rdo rje ral can bdag nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor du yang bsgom par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro kun/ /de tshe nang du mngon par gzhug /thams cad gnyis pa yongs sbyor
las| |rdo rje ral pa can byung ba/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag brten/ /bcom ldan dpa' bos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ral pa can gyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu pa'o// //de nas
gzhan gyi sbyor ba che/ /dpa' bo chen po'i rab sbyor bas/ /bdag gis mngon sum du bshad kyi/ /rnal 'byor ma kun mnyan par gyis/ /lus can kun gyi lus gang la/ /gdan ni stong phrag gnas
pa ste/ /de rnams la yig dgod pa ni/ /ka sogs ha yig mthar de bzhin/ /yon tan la sogs dbyangs rnams yig /khams re re la yi ge rnams/ /slar yang phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis/ /mkhas
pa rnams kyis dbye bar bya/ /gtum mo stong phrag bdag nyid can/ /mtshams kun du ni gnas pa 'bar/ /khams thams cad kyi bde gnas las/ /dpa' bo'i longs spyod thob par 'gyur/ /
'od zer de rnams kyis bkug pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs chen po/ /bdag med pa yi bdag tu bzhag /gnyis med chos 'byung nang du'o/ /de ltar stong phrag gi ni lce/ /dpa' bo chen po'i go
'phang gnas/ /sman thams cad dang nye ba yin/ /sbas pa'i bcud len gsungs pa'o/ /phyi rol rnams kyi'ang yi ge'i bdag /de'i ming nyid du shes par bya/ /me tog 'bras sogs sde tshan gyi/ /
dang po'i ming ni stong phrag can/ /de rnams kyi ni bcud len bsgrub/ /gzhan du 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /ji lta'i rim pas rigs sogs kyi/ /ka sogs thams cad sman chen te/ /las smra ba
@#/ /yi rgyud gzhan du/ /der ni nges par gsal rigs bya/ /dang po'i mgon po rnams bsgoms nas/ /rtags rnams thob par bya ba yin/ /yang na grub rnal 'byor rnams
kyis| |bcud kyis len ni gang mthong ba/ /des kyang mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /sde tshan rnam pas yongs sbyor las/ /bdud rtsi'i tshigs mtshams

gzugs ldan pa'i/ /grub pa'i sman rnams rang bzhin can/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo chen po'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo/ /'dres pas mchod pa byas nas ni/ /grong khyer gsum gyi nang byung ba/ /ston pa rdo rje che ci lags/ /gang gi gzugs kyis byon pa lags/ /sprul pa gang
du bzhud pa lags/ /chos nyan pa yi dus su yang / /ci zhig gis ni brtan par bya/ /lha dang lha ma yin dang mi/ /ci yi ngag gis 'gro dang 'ong / /mngon par tshigs mtshams mtshan nyid
ni| /sngon gyi ji bzhin bshad du gsol/ /mngon par tshigs mtshams mtshan nyid ni/ /ji ltar rim pas bshad kyi nyon/ /shin tu zab mo'i don chen po/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten
gyis ma shes/ /sems can rnams kyi rang snang can/ /bdag gi nges par mdor bsdus pas/ /rdo rje sems 'od gzhan nyid du/ /khams dang mtshan mar gnas min can/ /lus dang ngag
sems dag pa yi/ /grong khyer gsum rnams su byung ba'o/ /sngon gyi dngos por khyer nas 'ongs/ /nges par las chung par 'gro'o/ /yang na dus rnams thams cad du/ /ji ltar me long la bzhin
mthong / /sngon du nyan pa thob byas nas/ /sems kyang de yi gnas la 'o/ /rdo rje la sogs ting 'dzin gyis/ /lha la sogs pa de rnams rmongs/ /de yis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi/ /rab tu sbyor bas
rtag tu sprul/ /rdo rje'i rtse mor 'jig rten sprul/ /'od zer lcags kyu spro ba ste/ /hUM gi yi ge'i sgra yis ni/ /ston pas 'khor lo can ston byas/ /chos 'byung khang pa brtsegs pa ru/ /nyi shu'i
lhan cig skyes gdan du/ /ngag gi spyod pas mnyan par byed/ /der song nas ni de la thim/ /de ltar rnal 'byor dbang po yi/ /slob dpon khyab bdag ches shes bya/ /rdo rje la sogs de'i
ming nyid/ /de yi mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /sems can kun la phan bdag nyid/ /mi 'jigs pa ni ster nyid dang / /sngags dang rgyud kyis sbyor ba shes/ /sbyor ba bzo dang sgyu rtsal
sogs/ /mthun pa'i ngag dang thams cad la/ /bu gcig pa ltar mthun pa dang / /gtong pa sogs la rtag tu dga'/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin de mchog gzhol/ /ji ltar smras pa
de bzhin byed/ /'tshe ba med cing bden pa'i ngag /sems can kun la thugs brtse dang / /lam du 'dzud pa de mthar phyin/ /kun mkhyen yon tan dang mnyam dang / /bstan bcos
@#/ /kun gyi pha rol son/ /mgon med rnams kyi pha dang ma/ /phyag rgya brda yi byed pa po/ /de sogs yon tan rnams kyis gang / /skye ba 'di la de bzhin gshegs/ /
rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo dbus su/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad sgom pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor byang chub sems kyi ste/ /bde ba'i rgyal po rnal 'byor ma/ /sgra rnams su ni sgra yis shes/ /rdo rje hUM
mdzad can khyab bdag /'phos pa'i lhag mar gyur ye shes/ /dang po'i mgon po'i rgyu yin no/ /sems kyi nyams su myong ba ni/ /de phyir phra mo'i rang bzhin can/ /sbar sha'i khams su yang
dag grags/ /de nyid kyis ni khyer nas 'ongs/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtshor rtag nges par/ /sa gsum de yi rang bzhin byas/ /de ltar sbyor ba mchog gtso bo/ /shing srin gzhan ni sog ma
bzhin/ /'di yis bgrod pa ma shes pas/ /byis pa mi shes pa yis bcings/ /mtha' yi bde ba gsung ba 'o/ /bstan bya ston pa rdo rje 'chang / /lhan cig skyes gzugs ston pa po//
bcom ldan ye shes kyis 'di gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas gang gis sgrub pa po/ /'grub pa'i bsam
med sbyor bshad bya/ /de ni shin bzang rab sbyor bas/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs bshad par bya/ /lhun gyis grub 'gyur de'i spyod pa/ /dngos grub 'dod rnams kyis shes bya/ /phyi rol
gnyis med sbyor bdag nyid/ /spyod pa de ni rab tu bsngags/ /kun gyi bdag nyid yid bzang la/ /dbang po grong khyer yang dag rten/ /grong de rnams su spyod pa yang / /yid kyis brtul zhugs
bstan par bya/ /srid dang zhi ba'i gzugs rnams kyis/ /gang der bdag nyid kyis 'gro bya/ /bdag nyid gzugs kyi rang bzhin can/ /yang dag me long la mthong 'gyur/ /zhu ba'i sems
la brten byas nas/ /lus ni lus la thim par gyis/ /sdom par bdag nyid kyis bsdams pas/ /phyag rgya chen por yang dag grags/ /phyag rgya lnga sogs lus la gnas/ /thod pa dang ni kha
T+wAM 'dzin/ /bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa za/ /lhan cig rnal 'byor ma rol ldan/ /chags pa'i sems kyis sgom pa ste/ /mi 'dod kyang ni de phyir 'gro /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po yis/ /
yid 'di la ni gos pa med/ /'jigs med rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /mtshan mo dur khrod sogs par 'gro /sa gzhi gang du spyod pa na/ /rnam shes brgyad du shes par bya/ /blo
ldan spyod dang rtul zhugs ni/ /bde ba can du de rtsen to/ /dang po'i sbyor bar yongs brten nas/ /phyi nas yid kyis rab tu bshad/ /srog thams cad ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /dbang po'i grong khyer
bde ba yis/ /ye shes spyod pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni shin tu bzang po'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'o// //
@#/ /de nas skye bo'i rigs kyi ni/ /khyad par bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /rdo rje bzang po'i rab sbyor bas/ /de rigs 'dir ni nyams par 'gyur/ /de la dang po lnga dang
bdun/ /brgyad dang bcu gsum bco lnga dang / /bcu bdun dang ni nyi shu gnyis/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun de bzhin mchog /tha skar la sogs shes bya ste/ /lha rnams tshogs su dran par bya/ /
bzhi pa dang ni shar ba gsum/ /gnyis pa dang ni drug de bzhin/ /byang phyogs pa rnams de bzhin gsum/ /mi yi tshogs su dran par bya/ /gsum pa dang ni bcu nyid dang / /dgu pa dang
ni nyi shu gsum/ /bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa/ /bco brgyad pa dang bcu dgu pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi de grags pa/ /srin po'i rigs su dran par bya/ /ra'i rigs gsum dang brgyad pa dang //
klu ni bzhi dang lnga pa 'o/ /drug pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ /khyi yi dngos por bshad pa' / /bcu dang bcu gcig byi ba ste/ /byi lha de bzhin dgu pa'o/ /bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa/ /rtag tu de
ltar brjod pa 'o/ /bcu gnyis pa dang nyi shu lnga/ /khyu mchog gi ni rigs 'thob bo/ /thog ma tha ma bong bu yi/ /rigs su de rnams rab tu grags/ /bcu gsum pa dang bco lnga pa/ /de ni ma

her mngon par brjod/ /thog ma dang ni nyi shu drug /rta yi rigs su rab tu brjod/ /nyi shu pa dang nyi shu gnyis/ /spre'u zhes bya bar brjod pa'o/ /gnyis pa dang ni mtha' de bzhin/ /glang po yi ni rigs
su 'gro /nyi shu gsum dang nyi shu bzhi/ /mi ste stobs ni che ba yin/ /nyi shu gcig pa sre mo ste/ /mdor bsdus pa yis rab tu bshad/ /stobs dang bdag byed pa'i rgyu skar/ /bshad kyi da lta
mnyan par gyis/ /mi rnams srog ni rgyu skar te/ /gzhan du rab tu 'thob pa yin/ /skar mar dus kyi rtsa son par/ /'dzin pa po ni nges par 'chi/ /lug dang srang dang karka Ta/ /chu srin
mngon po la dran bya/ /kI Ta bum seng khyu mchog ni/ /brtan pa'i bya bar rab tu bstan/ /nya dang 'khrig pa de bzhin 'dir/ /gzhu dang bu mo 'dren ma la'o/ /bla ma nyi ma sa'i skyes bu/ /ngan spong
rA hu zla bud med/ /gza' lhag bkra shis ma ning te/ /mkha' dkyil 'khor la gza' gang yin/ /de ltar rigs rnams so gzhan du/ /byang chub sras bo mi 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje bzang por de
bshad de/ /rab sbyor rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /g.yon pa'i rtsa ru son pa'i sems/ /dbu ma'i tha ma'i sbyor bar ldan/ /byang chub sa bon rnams 'bab pa/ /byang chub sems rnams kyi
rigs so/ /snying rjer son pa'i yid kyis ni/ /las kyi nyi ma 'dzag pa yin/ /yang dag rab ster rtag tu ldan/ /rigs med rigs can kyang med do/ /srid par rtse mo tsam du ni/ /bsam
gtan rnam pa'i lus son pa/ /me long gi ni yul la zugs/ /gang 'dra mthong ste de med do/ /de 'drar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba'i gzugs can no/ /de yi
@#/ /nang du zhu ba'i sems/ /de dang mnyam pa gzhan yod ni/ /nges par dkyil 'khor rnams dbus su/ /rdo rje bzang po bsgom par bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi cho
ga yis/ /gsang sngags mchod pa sngon gyi can/ /dus dang dus min cha'i bdag nyid/ /dngos med ma yin byed por bzhugs/ /byang chub gzugs kyi bdag nyid che/ /bcom ldan sems
dpas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzang po'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas gsang ba'i sbyor gang gis/ /bde kun bdag nyid du skyed bshad/ /
don dam pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin nyid du rab 'jug bya/ /'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sngags kyi phreng bar rang nyid byon/ /bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni/ /sa rnams
la ni rab tu bshad/ /'khor lo drug dbyibs ri mo ni/ /sa yi dbus su bya ba yin/ /thams cad du ni gsang sngags tshig /bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bri bar bya/ /de rnams sngags kyi gzugs
rnams ni/ /srog ni yi ge'i rnam pa can/ /yi ge'i cha rnams bzang po ni/ /spangs nas dbus mar gnas pa yin/ /stong par nges par thim byas nas/ /'og dang steng du blta bar
bya| |rkang pa'i mtha' nas mgo bo ru/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug de srid byed/ /khams kun rab tu zhugs pa la/ /sems kyi spyod pa can ci smos/ /de ltar gsang ba gyen gnon pa/ /dpa'
bo chen po'i don can no/ /dbus mar rab tu zhugs pa yi/ /bsnun dang sgrub pa la sogs spangs/ /'thor rlung 'dzin bzhin pa yis ni/ /nyi ma dang po zad med can/ /rdo rje'i lam nas
langs pa'i sems/ /gang phyir brgyud pa'i rim pas so/ /de ltar sgyu ma'i bzlas pa 'dir/ /rtsa ba'i sngags sogs re'u mig can/ /dpa' bo kun gyi re'u mig rnams/ /sngags kyi 'khor
lo 'god par bya/ /ting 'dzin mgon po'i dpa' bo rnams/ /bcu gnyis rnams kyi 'ang 'khor lor son/ /gang zhig gang gi ming sngon gyis/ /de dang de yi gnas su bri/ /gzhan gyi sngags
kun 'di rnams la/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sku la sogs pa'i bzlas kun dang / /de bzhin ngag sogs bzlas pa can/ /sems sogs bzlas pa thams cad dang / /
de bzhin ye shes sogs bzlas can/ /sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis/ /de nas dpa' bo 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'jigs byed chen po dbus rnams su/ /me yi gzugs can bsgom
par bya/ /shes rab rigs kyi nus pa yis/ /'byung po'i tshogs de kun spyod bya/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas dang dbang / /drag po rengs par byed yi ge/ /las dang rjes mthun gzugs bsgoms
te| |'bar ba'i rnam pa sogs dgod bya/ /'chi ba blu zhing de nyid kyis/ /rnal 'byor dang ni ldan par 'gro /nA da nA dar 'joms bya zhing / /thig le thig ler thim par bya/ /de ltar cho ga'i bya ba
@#/ /yis| |gsang sngags bzlas nas phur bus gdab/ /'di rnams sngags kyi gtso bo yis/ /rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad de/ /oM hUM hUM phaT kyi yi ge mtha'/ /ji lta'i

rim pas 'di kun la'o/ /na maHshrI badzra DA ka mahA bi ra bi ra shwa rA ya/ tri b+hu wa na kam+pa kam+pa ba NA ya/ daMSh+T+ro t+ka ta b+hI Sha Na b+hai re bA ya/ sha ta sa ha sra ne ta ya/ bi d+yu da dzi hwA ya/ kaM kA la mA lA

b+hA ra NA ya/ ko Ti la k+Shi b+hu dzA ya/ dz+wA lA ba lI D+ha la ga nA ya/ par shu pA sho d+ya ta shU lA ya/ kalpAn ta d+hu mrU gra ba pu ShA ya/ pi ka Ta mu kha hA hA ra bA ya/ mA tri ga Na pa ri pU ri ta man+t+ra ya/ sa ha

dza sun da rI pal+la b+ha ka rA ya/ hUM hUM kA ro ts+tsha ra Na mu khA ya/ mahA sh+ma shA na pri yA ya/ sarba b+hu ta saM trA sa na ka rA ya/ mahA ka lpAn+tA g+ni te dzA ya/ dza TA ka lA pa/ mu ku TA ya/ kha T+wAM ga ka pA la

shU la b+hin na d+ha ri Na/ ma hA sa mu dra me kha lA ya/ byA g+ha tsa rmAM ba ra d+hA ri Ne/ be tA la saM g+ha marda na ka rA ya/ mahA big+h+naM ni bA ri Ne/ sha trU ni su m+b+ha na ka rA ya/ tri sa ha sra mahA sA ha srai ka ro mA ba

l+yAn+ta rbarti ne/ sha ta sa ha sra mu khA ya/ dz+nyA na sA ga ra phra b+hA ye/ mahA pi shi ta ru b+hi ro ba sa hA ri Ne/ sarba mA ra ba la d+haM saM ni/ shi Sh+Ti saM hA ra kA ra kA ya/ sarba nA gA ni sho Sha Na stam+b+ha na bi drA

ba NA ya/ an+t+ra mA la d+hA ri Ne/ su me ru kaM pi ta nA dA ya/ kro d+ha bi bra ha d+hA ra NA ya/ mahA kA sha ti la ka ta ma ne/ bud+d+ha ko Ti sa ha sra Sha NA ni Sh+pA da na ya/ dz+nyA nA mi ta paR+She pa NA ya/ sarba karma bra bar+t+ta nA

ya ne/ ban+d+ha na ka rA ya/ sarba bi kalpa b+hany+dza na ka rA ya/ muN+Da ba la lag+na sha rA rI ya/ pa ra kri ta yan+t+ra man+t+ra nA sha nA ya/ mahA rak+Sh+ya kA rA ya/ duSh+TA nI pi dA la ne/ d+harmo da ya ka rA ya/ kro d+ha s+phA ra s+phA ra nA ya/
in+d+ra dza la sarba satwa ta ma ne/ gra sta bA da pra bA/ da ma hA ma te/ de ltar la sogs gsang sngags gang / /rab tu mang ba rgya che 'o/ /sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i ming / /sems can ming gis
shes par ba/ /sngags rnams thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /khams gsum rnams su yongs bzhugs pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gtso/ /bcom ldan sngags pas 'di gsungs
so| |zhes bya ba ni 'jigs byed chen po'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bco lnga pa'o// //de nas mig la sogs dbang po/ /kun gyi mngon shes cho ga bshad/ /mig mi bzang gi
rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje gsum ni rab bsgrub bya/ /gang du byang chub sems gnas pas/ /der ni mig gis nges par blta/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi zag med mchog /sems ni mig tu shes
par bya/ /rtsa rnams kyi ni rab sbyor bas/ /so sor rlung ni dbab par bya/ /gang nyid du ni skyes dus su/ /de yi dus su thim nas 'gro /de ni mngon shes mig rnams kyi/ /sems 'di yis
ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /skye 'gro'i nong du son pa'i gzugs/ /yid kyis sgra ni nyan par 'gyur/ /'gro dang 'ong ba'i cho ga ni/ /lha rdzas dri ru rjes mtshon bya/ /lha rdzas ro yi rab sbyor bas/ /lce ni
@#/ /dga' ba dang bcas kyis/ /lce yi mngon shes la brten nas/ /dbu ma'i pho nya skyes pa yin/ /lus kyi reg pa'i rnam pa yis/ /mchog tu zag med de bsgrub bya/ /sngon
gyi bag chags dran pa la/ /de nyid rnal 'byor ldan par 'gro/ /nyin zhag mtshan mo mnyam byas nas/ /chu tshod drug cu nyid dang ni/ /chu'i srang drug cu tham pa dang / /g+ha Ti kar yang sbyar
bar bya/ /rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis la/ /dpangs su sor brgyad nyid yin te/ /guny+dza drug cu'i tshad la ni/ /sor bcu gnyis pa'i thur ma'o/ /skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang / /kASh+Ti
mig btsums phye ba dang / /se gol gtogs par shes bya ste/ /dbugs rgyu'i mngon par shes pas so/ /pha rol phyin drug tshul bdag gis/ /chos kyi dbyings ni mtshon par bya/ /dus
dang dus min sel ba'o/ /mig mi bzang ba bsgom par bya/ /mtshon cha chen nyid rnal 'byor ma'i/ /dkyil 'khor nang du byas pa nyid/ /sems 'di sna tshogs gzugs can te/ /srog
chags rnams kyis gar bgrod pa/ /bdag med rang bzhin 'thob par 'gyur/ /mdud pa rnams kyi phrad pas gnas/ /gzugs su byed 'gyur de'i dngos po/ /mchog gi dang po
bral mtha' can/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas gang gnas pa/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gror de shes bya/ /thur sel lam la rtag brten nas/ /slar yang re re'i nang du ste/ /srog la sogs
pa'i rlung lnga yis/ /mig ni lnga ru shes par bya/ /'dzag pa med pa'i sa bon 'dzag /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ldan/ /sa bon lnga rnams thig le yi/ /mngon shes byed po sogs
lnga pa/ /de lta'i rnal 'byor mchog yongs rdzogs/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi'ang mchog yin no/ /dngos po'i ye shes can ma lus/ /ring du yongs su spangs pa yin/ /thams cad
lus su mnyam sbyor las/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i spyan 'jug pa/ /dngos kun dngos po med mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan mig gi 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni mig mi bzang gi cho
ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'o// //de nas lha mos phyag byas nas/ /de bzhin mchod pa chen po byas/ /stobs po che yi sbyin sreg ni/ /bdag po chen pos bstan
du gsol/ /mkhas pas rgyun du nang bdag gi /sbyin sreg bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /stobs po che yi rab sbyor bas/ /khams rnams kun gyis dgang blugs te/ /bde ba thab tu yang
dag thob/ /nyi zla dgang gzar blugs gzar ro/ /slob dpon gnyis med de med la/ /yang dag rig pa'i gzugs su sreg /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnams 'di med/ /gsang sngags
rang bzhin mtshan nyid de/ /yam shing rtsa ru yang dag grags/ /gang phyir sA li las skyes 'bras/ /tshil ni rtag tu zho zan yin/ /'di ru mar ni byang chub sems/ /khrag ni sbrang rtsir shes
@#/ /par bya/ /srog sogs rlung rnams dUr ba 'o/ /gcin dang bshang ba dag de ltar/ /tsan+dan dang ni gla rtsi'o/ /me tog rtag tu khrag tu grags/ /
mchil ma lud pa 'bras thug yin/ /bud shing so sen rus pa'o/ /mdor bsdus pa yis pags pa gos/ /me yi thab kyi dbus su ni/ /skra dang ba spu lha ru 'gyur/ /sna
tshogs phra mo'i khams gzhan ni/ /sna tshogs 'bru ste de la sregs/ /rim gyis mkha' 'gro rdzogs son pa/ /gang ba'i bsreg blugs su shes bya/ /dbang po thams cad gar
byed de/ /de yis bag chags glu len no/ /sna tshogs sgra chen pos rol mo/ /snying rje sogs pas ston mo yin/ /srog rnams kun gyi bdag po yi/ /stobs po che ni bsgom par
bya| |las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg ni/ /des mnyes pa yis dngos grub 'gyur/ /'jig rten mchog gi khams kun tu/ /yid ni de ru yang dag rol/ /gang de'i dus su bde gyur
pa| |de'i tshe dus su rab tu gnas/ /sbyin sreg nang bdag nyid mthong bas/ /rmod dang rjes 'dzin byed pa yin/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das ye shes/ /de rnams dbus mar thob
par bya/ /mtshams rnams kun tu khong khro ba/ /sems chen po ni gsod par 'gyur/ /rtag pas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /de las byung ba bza' bar bya/ /mtshon bya mtshon
byed rab bcom pas/ /gnyis dag shes par 'os pa yin/ /sgyu ma'i bdag nyid mtshan nyid ni/ /de la thim par byed par 'gyur/ /khams kun yang dag sbyor ba las/ /ye shes gnyis

byar med mtshan nyid/ /me yi gzugs su rtag bzhugs pa'i/ /bcom ldan thab khung gis 'di gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni stobs po che'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas rdo rje pad 'du ba/ /ji bzhin bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /rin chen rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas/ /a ba d+hU tI can dngos grub/ /rnal 'byor ma la yang dag rol/ /don dam pa yi nyams la
gnas/ /de yi sbyor bas grol bar ni/ /gnyis med rgyu rnams kyis 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi nyams su myong bzhin pa/ /byis pa rnams kyi byang chub 'od/ /ha yig drug dang ldan pa yi/ /sa bon
rdo rje'i nor bur dgod/ /a ba d+hU ti'i rtsal 'bab ste/ /steng du kha bltas dpral bar son/ /srung ba'i dus su blo ldan gyis/ /rang gis lag pas rdo rje bzung / /byang chub sems la
rtsen byed la/ /rgas dang 'chi ba ring ba yin/ /srid pa'i skyon las 'goms pa yis/ /srid gsum de yi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i rab sbyor bas/ /nyi ma re re bsgrub par bya/ /
de yi dus su gang mthong ba/ /dngos po kun la ltung bar bya/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul bdag nyid/ /rtag tu bdag nyid la 'byung 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rgyu'i don du/ /bstan bya
@#/ /ston pa por 'gyur ro/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi ni/ /sems can don ni nges par bya/ /sku bzhi po yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bden min bdag gis
bshad mi bya/ /rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhin can/ /sbyor skyes ye shes gyen du bgrod/ /pho nya rnams kyi gtso nyid bya/ /'dod chags me yis dgyes par bya/ /byang chub sems ni
rtag gzung ba/ /lce yis bya yi lag pas min/ /lhan skyes 'phos pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /mkha' lding phyag rgya nyid kyis gzung / /phyag rgya'i kha nyid du sbyin te/ /de nas btung bar
bya ba yin/ /stobs thams cad kyang bza' bar bya/ /sA li skyos sogs 'bad pas so/ /sbyin sreg kun kyang de nyid kyis/ /dbang la sogs pa gang gang byed/ /de de'i thod par
bya ba ste/ /de nas sa bon gdab par bya/ /de rnams rdzas kyi spong ba dang / /gtor ma dang ni bsrung bar bya/ /de yis bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /de dang 'dra ba'i gzungs 'jug 'gyur
ril bu'am ni skud pa ni/ /dpa' bo rang nyid kyis gsungs pa'o/ /b+ha ga'i dbus rnams su bsgom pa'o/ /rin chen rdo rje can de sman/ /dkyil 'khor khams rnams kun gyi
ste| |spangs pa rab tu bstan pa yin/ /gang dang gang gi las kyi ni/ /de dang de yi ming can sngags/ /sa bon kun gyi yongs sbyor las/ /de ni rtag tu sman rnams te/ /bcom ldan
las kyi phyag rgya ni/ /rtag tu 'ching bas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rin che'i rdo rje'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas 'khor ba'i mthar gnas pa'i//
mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /rta mgrin gyi ni rab sbyor bas/ /pho nya'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya/ /ha yig skye gnas dbus su ste/ /ya yig mgo bor gnas pa 'o/ /gri
yig dbu ma'i pad+mar te/ /wa yi yi ge snying ga ru/ /rnal 'byor che la 'dzin bzhin la/ /dbyangs can ma dang 'dra bar byed/ /rmongs pa nyid ni thams cad 'phrog /gang yin gzhung ni
rjes 'jug 'gyur/ /mgrin par rtag tu tshigs bcad ni/ /mgrin par dag tu gnas pa nyid/ /'tsho ba rta yi dbyibs 'dir ni/ /gnas pa rnal 'byor lhag ma yin/ /de yi sbyor bas
'gro 'gyur ba/ /sngon du nyi ma'i gdan du'o/ /nyi de rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /khams gsum por ni bskor bar 'gyur/ /nam mkhar nyi mas mdzes byas nas/ /byang chub yid kyis 'gro
bar 'gyur/ /phyogs kyi 'khor lo ma lus rtogs/ /rnal 'byor ma yi chu skyes mchog /sems can kun gyi rmongs nyid dang / /lam mthong ba ni thams cad la/ /de nyid nyi ma rtag
snang bar/ /mtshan mo'i mun pa drag po 'phrog /rnal 'byor ma 'khor dbus son par/ /rta yi mgon po bsgoms pa yin/ /gang gi sangs rgyas su 'gro ba/ /sgrub thabs yan
@#/ /lag 'char bar 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams rnam par nyams 'gyur te/ /sprin la sogs pa'ang nyams par 'gyur/ /kun gyi sdig pa'ang 'phrog par
byed| |rang gi dga' ba shar mtshan nyid/ /mchod sbyin dus kyis 'jig rten du/ /thams cad skad cig la sgrub 'gyur/ /khams bdun rnam par bzung ba yis/ /de tshe sa 'og dngos
grub 'gyur/ /bdag med 'di rnams de lha mo/ /yan lag gcig gis rol bar byed/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya ste/ /sbyin sreg A ga sogs de bzhin/ /ji ltar bde bas rtog bya ste/ /
rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob 'gyur/ /'dod chags kyi ni 'dod chags bsgo/ /me yis tshig la gdung bar bya/ /de bzhin 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags/ /bsten par gyur pas
mi 'ching ngo / /de nyid thabs so yid kyi las/ /dge ba'i mtshan nyid can bya'o/ /nang du byed pa ma yin te/ /gus pa'i yid kyis dbu mar gnas/ /phyi rol ye shes can
rnams kyi ye shes/ /de nyid sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba sogs/ /sems can 'jig rten sogs 'byung ba/ /de rnams spangs pas sangs rgyas med/ /mu stegs can dang
sangs rgyas par/ /kun tu dbye ba yod ma yin/ /lung thams cad ni 'gal ba ste/ /tshad ma pa rnams tho co can/ /thams cad tshig ni rnam shes pas/ /ye shes can rnams
de'i phyir shes/ /mkha' 'gro thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /nam mkha' rnams su bzhugs pa yi/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten par/ /rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di gsungs
so| |zhes bya ba ni rta mgrin gyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas rab tu 'joms yon tan/ /bshad kyi sgrub pa po rnams nyon/ /nam mkha'i snying
po'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje rlung gi mtshan nyid de/ /'chags pa dang ni 'jig rnams su/ /gang zhig stong pa de srog chags/ /khams rnams de 'drar shes bya ste/ /dul ba'i sbyor
bar yang dag gnas/ /zla ba'i gzugs su yongs grags pa'i/ /rang gi rang bzhin las skyes 'dzag /rnal 'byor lhag ma'i ye shes kyang / /de ni rab 'joms la brjod do/ /
dus thams cad du g.yo ba med/ /g.yo ba'am 'dir ni mi mthong ngo / /de ni thams cad bdag nyid rlung / /bsam pa thams cad rab 'jug pa'o/ /do lA hA ra sogs sbyar bas/ /
rnal 'byor rnams kyi thar ster ro/ /sgra dang thig ler de shes bya/ /'od gsal ba dang snang ba gsum/ /de phyir nam mkha'i snying po yang / /mkha' 'gro'i sbyor rnams kyis shes
bya| |nang gi dbu ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /srog de'ang rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /de yang kun gzhi shes bya ste/ /me long du yang rab tu bshad/ /chos kyi sku la sogs pa'ang de/ /dmyal
@#/ /sogs 'gro ba de bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi/ /gnas ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /zla ba'i lam du gang tsho mkha'/ /rnal 'byor
rnams kyis lhag med 'pho/ /de'i dus rnam par bzhag med 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor byis pas bgrod bya min/ /nam mkha'i khams rnams thams cad kyi/ /de yi snying por rab
tu bstan/ /de dag shes rab thabs gnyis so/ /gnas skabs kyang ni gnyis nyid do/ /srid pa rnam par 'phrog pa nyid/ /dbang po'i dbus su sbyar bar bya/ /sangs rgyas
'jig rten mtha' yas rnams/ /sa yi nang du rtsen par 'gyur/ /de ltar rnam bcas de nyid dang / /rnam pa med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs/ /sems dang rnam par shes pa'i rgyun/ /
gnyis po nyid ni gnyis med 'gyur/ /dbu mar lta rnams kyis 'grub ste/ /ye shes der 'di rdzogs pa 'o/ /gal te sangs rgyas rjes chags yod/ /chos dge 'dun pa de
bzhin mchog /gal te mu stegs mkhas pa yi/ /tshul chen chos de 'dod pa dang / /gal te shes rab thabs rnal 'byor/ /stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /gal
te thams cad mi rtag bdag/ /tshul 'di bsgom par bya ba yin/ /'dir mang smras pas ci bya ste/ /chos dbyings gal te 'dod kyang po/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs can
gyi| |sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgom par bya/ /shan pa smyig ma mkhan la sogs/ /gsod pa'i don la yongs gnas pa/ /de kun de'i gnas nyams dga' bar/ /lam rjes skyobs rnams
kyi grol 'thob/ /nges par dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su/ /gzugs su bsgoms pa bsgom par bya/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /rmongs pa'i bdag nyid dngos grub/ /
'thob/ /rnam shes kun gyi sbyor bdag nyid/ /stong nyid snying po gcig pu ba/ /bcom ldan rab 'joms rnam pa yi/ /rnal 'byor la zhugs pas 'di gsungs/ /zhes bya ba
ni nam mkha'i snying po'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu pa'o// //de nas lha mos mchod byas te/ /phyag byas nas ni 'di gsol to/ /rang gi rig pa'i mtshan
nyid ni/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes gsung bar mdzod/ /rang rig ye shes las byung ba/ /ji lta'i rigs pas bshad par bya/ /dpal he ru ka'i rab sbyor bas/ /rnal 'byor zla
ba'i bgrod pa dang / /dkar po'i chos gcig la sogs nas/ /ye shes rgya mtsho 'phel bar 'gyur/ /thog mar ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /gnyis par nam mkhar 'gro ba'i
gzugs/ /gsum par mda' yi dbyibs dang 'dra/ /bzhi par 'ben gyi gzugs can no/ /lnga par rtse mo lnga'i bdag nyid/ /drug par khams drug 'byung ba yin/ /bdun
@#/ /par rgya mtsho yi ni gzugs/ /brgyad par pad+ma brjod pa yin/ /dgu pa ru ni bcud len te/ /bcu par lhan skyes gzugs kyis so/ /bcu gcig
pa la zhi ba'i gzugs/ /bcu gnyis pa la 'khor lo'i gzugs/ /bcu gsum pa la nyi ma ste/ /bcu bzhir zla ba de bzhin no/ /bco lnga pa nyid rA hu ste/ /thig le zhes
byas bcu drug pa/ /rnam pa bcu drug mtshan nyid ni/ /rang gi rig par shes par bya/ /dpal he ru ka'i spyod pa yis/ /'khor lo bzhi rnams su bsgrub bya/ /rgas pa med
cing 'chi ba med/ /nad dang mdze sogs spang ba yin/ /lte bar shrI yi yi ger gyur/ /he yig snying gar dgod par bya/ /ru yig mgrin pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /thod par
ka yi yi ge 'o/ /thig le bzhi yi rab sbyor bas/ /rang gis rig par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi mchog zag med/ /gnas
dang gnas su 'pho ba nyid/ /dbu ma'i nang du rab tu gzhug /'khor lo bzhi yi 'dab son nas/ /rang gis rig pa mtha' yas mchog /rigs de rnal 'byor ma
rnams kyi/ /byung bar rnam par shes par bya/ /sems chen po ni sad bzhin pas/ /don yod mthong bas 'thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu rmi lam du 'gyur te/ /dus thams
cad du nges par gnas/ /longs spyod sprul pa'i mtshan nyid du/ /gnyid log pa yis de tshe mthong / /bzhi pa rab mang bdag med de/ /de phyir de rnams mtha'i
longs spyod/ /de ltar 'khor lo bzhir gnas nas/ /nges par lam du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /shes rab de nyid rtogs byas nas/ /nyi mas thabs kyi de nyid can/ /
rdul gyi sbyor ba 'byung ba ste/ /nag po'i phyogs su gang 'dir yang / /bcu drug rnams kyi cha rnams kyi/ /nyi ma nyid ni bar bar du 'o/ /stong nyid snying rje'i sbyor ba las/ /rdo rje 'bar
ba 'bar zhing 'bar/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus rnams su/ /dpal he ru ka bsam par bya/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje'i dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
gnas skabs thams cad yang dag sbyor/ /gtso bo rang rigs bdag nyid can/ /bcom ldan 'das pa'i bzhi pa'i mthar/ /rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes
bya ba ni dpal he ru ka'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas lus sogs lha rnams kyis/ /ston mo mngon par bshad par bya/ /pad+ma gar
dbang phyug nyid kyi/ /rab tu sbyor ba 'di byung ngo / /rtsa ni pad+mar yang dag grags/ /srog gi rlung gis gar byed do/ /byang chub sems kyis dbang phyug ste/ /de rnams kyi ni nang
@#/ /du bzhugs/ /rang gis rig pa bza' bar bya/ /snying rje'i kha yis btung bar bya/ /gnyis med rnal 'byor ma dang rol/ /sgyu ma'i rjes su 'gro rnams
'grub/ /thams cad de yi rang bzhin du/ /bza' ba bza' ba med par bya/ /pad+ma gar dbang bsgom bya ste/ /ji lta'i rim pas mtshon par bya/ /pha yig gzhan gyi grong du
'gro| |brtan pa thams cad tat+ma yi yig /na yig g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor te/ /rte yig bde ba'i lha can yin/ /shwa yig rta la sogs pa'i stobs/ /ra yig dga' rol
rgyu can yin/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das kun la/ /de yis rab tu sbyor bar bya/ /mtshams kyi skad ni 'di rnams kun/ /bde mchog phyi mar shes par bya/ /bgrod pa 'di
rnams la brten nas/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rang / /he ru ka dang bde mchog nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sogs gtso bo/ /pad+ma gar dbang phyug de yang / /sbyor ba kun la
shes par bya/ /pad+ma ye shes yang dag grags/ /gar gyi dbang phug rnam shes can/ /gnyis po gnyis med yang dag byung / /lha kun 'dir ni byung ba yin/ /shes po
thams cad de la gnas/ /khams gsum du ni gar dbang phyug /gar byed pa yi sku chen la/ /de nas rtags ni mtshon par bya/ /nam mkhar zhen pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mchog
tu rmad du byung par 'gro /rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo dbus su/ /lhan skyes gzugs kyis rol bar gyis/ /'di yis rtag tu dbang gi las/ /de rnams kyis ni dga' bar byed/ /
gang dang gang gis las rnams la/ /de dang de yir bsgom par bya/ /sgrub po rnams kyi byang chub rtsar/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'ong / /de nas bdud ni bcom byas nas/ /gar
byed bzhin pas pad+ma 'dzin/ /sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms shing / /tshe son pa rnams gnas par byed/ /'dod pa thams cad 'grub 'gyur cing / /rnal 'byor rnams kyi
srid la sbyong / /rang gis sems kyis dngos grub 'thob/ /rnam rtog nyid du mi bya 'o/ /gzhan du srid pa'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /sems can thams cad rab 'jug pa/ /'khrul zhing
chud zos mu stegs rnams/ /bstan pa rnams la rab 'jug bya/ /bag chags ngan pa yongs spangs nas/ /phyi nas rang bzhin bstan par bya/ /bza' ba thams cad mnyam sbyor
las| |bza' ba med par rtag tu gnas/ /bcom ldan pad+ma gar mdzad pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni pad+ma gar dbang gi cho ga ste
rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ /mtshan nyid bshad kyi lha mo nyon/ /gzugs las 'das pa'i ye shes gang / /de
@#/ /ni ye shes chen por brjod/ /rnam par snang bzhin pa de bzhin/ /sems dpa' chen po'i ming can no/ /spu khung rtse mo thams cad las/ /de rnams nges
'thon stobs chen po/ /de rnams bu gar rab zhugs pa/ /'khor lo bzhi yi mtsho skyes son/ /ji ltar mar la mar zhugs pa/ /de bzhin du ni khams la zhugs/ /g.yo ba
'gog par byas pa yis/ /de 'drar thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang mthong ba ni de mthong nyid/ /gdong gis gdong ni blta bar gyis/ /mi dang mi mo lha sogs kyi/ /gzugs
ni pad+ma'i 'dab chu bzhin/ /srog chen po der shes bya ste/ /shi ba'i lus las nges par 'thon/ /aM gi yi ge yid la bya/ /dbugs rgyu ba yis mtshon par bya/ /bdag nyid kyis
ni hUM yig spro/ /gsor ba yi ni rnal 'byor ldan/ /sems la oM gyi yi ger 'gyur/ /lus la gnas par mtshon par bya/ /haM yig mchog gi dang po yis/ /ye shes dngos
po rnams su sprul/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams kyi dbus su/ /rnam snang mdzad kyi bsgom pa 'o/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag pa rnams kyis/ /sngags pa la ni 'bar bar bya/ /bye ba stong
phrag grangs kyi ni/ /rnal 'byor ma la 'dod spyod 'gyur/ /'dod pa rnams kyis mi 'pho ste/ /'dod na bde ba rnam par spro/ /de tshe rnal 'byor ma mnyes nas/ /dngos grub
thams cad ster bar byed/ /sdug dang mi sdug rnam spyod pa/ /rnal 'byor ma la mi bya 'o/ /myur bar stong phrag rnams kyi gzugs/ /rnam par snang mdzad du bsgrub bya/ /sna tshogs du ma'i
skad kyis chos/ /de rnams lus ris can gyis nyan/ /rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod dang / /rin chen dbang dang A ro lika /don yod rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang la
sogs/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sogs kyang / /de rnams rnal 'byor ma las rig /'gro drug grol bar byed nyid dang / /bde 'gro rnams su 'jug pa 'o/ /blo ldan so sor
sems can don/ /gnyis med dngos por byed par 'gyur/ /mi shes nyon mongs gzhom don du/ /tshul 'di yang ni bsgom par bya/ /khams thams cad kyi til mar ni/ /
dgos pa med pas bya ba yin/ /rnam snang sbyor bas btung bya 'am/ /byug pa'ang de nyid kyis bya 'o/ /de yis sna nas sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje'i lam du rtag tu 'o/ /rdo rje 'chang
gi gzugs su 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi yid 'ong / /gnyis pa thams cad kun sbyor las/ /rnal 'byor mas 'dod thar pa stsol/ /bcom ldan thams cad dag
pa'i sku/ /rab grol mdzad pa 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gsang chen bshad
@#/ /bya ste| |mdor bsdus pa yis rgyas par min/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rab sbyor bas/ /gnas thams cad du yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje mi phyed ye shes te/ /
sems dpa' snying po ston pa 'o/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /rdo rje sems dpar rab tu grags/ /zla ba rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas/ /gnas rnams bgrod pa bstan par bya/ /pul+lI
ra las lte bar 'bab/ /jo lan d+ha rar yang dag gnas/ /oD+yan du ni kun tu spyod pa 'grub/ /ar bu dar ni bza' dang btung can no/ /go dA ba ri'i gnas su rol pa ste//
ra me shwa rir rgyal dang pham pa 'o/ /de bi ko Tir rjes su 'dzin pa ste/ /mA la wa ru rnal 'byor ma yi gtso/ /kA ma ru par tshig ni 'grub pa'o/ /o Dir mngon sum dngos grub
ster ba ste/ /tri sha ku nar dbang po rnams kyi ni/ /myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug pa 'o/ /ko sa la ru rnal 'byor dngos grub ste/ /ka ling ka ru phra mo'i dngos grub skye/ /lam pa
ka ru rtag par 'grub par 'gyur/ /kAny+tsi ru ni bsang pa'i dngos grub bo/ /hi ma la yar mthun pa 'grub pa ste/ /pre ta pu rir rang gi lta ba 'o/ /gri ha de ba tAr ni bkas gnang ba/ /
lhan skyes 'pho med sau rASh+Tar ru/ /gser gling du ni rang gi don 'grub bo/ /nA ga rang gi gnas kyi dngos grub ster/ /sin+d+hu ra ru stobs 'grub de bzhin du/ /ma rur 'chi ba med pa'i dngos grub
bo| |ku lu tar ni rang bzhin dngos grub tu/ /de nyid rnal 'byor rnams la skye ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rtag bsgoms nas/ /thams cad dngos grub 'gro bar byos/ /gnas sogs rnal
'byor ma dbus su/ /khams su gyur pa'i ro chen po/ /gsang ba'i tshig tu shes par bya/ /mchog ni lhan cig skyes par dran/ /dgyes pa ye shes shes bya ste/ /thams cad bdag
nyid yon tan gnas/ /rtag bzhugs gnyis med rnam pa ste/ /sems can 'jig rten las la ni/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyi yang / /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis/ /nA
da'i dbus las yang dag byung / /de nyid du ni thims nas 'gro /gnas par de ni mngon par brjod/ /de ltar thams cad cho ga bzhin/ /dpa' bo mchog rnams kyis shes bya/ /de
nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag /de ni nus par rab tu bshad/ /skyes pa dang ni skye bzhin pa'i/ /nus pa thams cad rab 'jug gis/ /dngos med ma yin pa'i gzugs kyis/ /dbyangs
dang phyi mo gsum spangs pa/ /thig le'i gzugs ni sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje sems dpar rab tu grags/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi
gtso| |sgyu ma'i gnas kyi dngos grub ni/ /'jug mdzad bcom ldan gyis 'di gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni gnas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rab tu byed pa ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi
@#/ /pa'o// //de ltar dpa' bo gtso bo yi/ /las kyi tshogs rnams shes par bya/ /nyi shu bzhi bdag nyid nyams dga'/ /thams
cad gsang chen gyis gnas su/ /gsang chen rgyas par bshad pa can/ /kun spyod cho ga bshad par bya/ /sngon bshad khams kyi 'du shes ni/ /gsum gsum du ni bshad pa yin//
nyi shu rtsa bzhi gsum rnams can/ /de rnams brgyad brgyad shes par bya/ /dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi rnams kyi/ /re re'i nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ /zlum po'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du//
thig le nyid ni gzhag par bya/ /de rnams dkyil 'khor phyi rol tu/ /bskor bas ting 'dzin rdo rje 'gyur/ /shar la sogs pa rim bzhin du/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo sogs
par 'phro/ /dkyil 'khor du ni lha thams cad/ /rnal 'byor ma kun shes par bya/ /bdun cu drug lhag pa'i lnga brgya/ /nyin zhag rnams su yongs 'pho bya/ /re re yi ni srog
'gyur ba/ /sum cu rtsa bdun phyed bcas pa'i/ /nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug ni/ /nyin zhag la ni shes par bya/ /lus can kun gyi rang bsam pa/ /de rnams kyi dus rab tu
'jug /rnal 'byor de dngos bsgom rnams la/ /sangs rgyas bsam pa rab tu bskor/ /'di rnams kun nyid dpa' bo rnams/ /gnas sogs nyi shu bzhi can la/ /thim dang
longs spyod bdag bye bas/ /dus dang dus tshod za bar byed/ /'di lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis/ /kun tu gnas pa bdag ma yin/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs dang dpa' bo/ /de ni bdag dang
bdag gi rim bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad du/ /bdag dang bdag gi sbyod yul med/ /yid ches tsam du myang 'das pa/ /gzhung smra ba la bstan pa 'o/ /de kho na nyid
ma rig pa yis 'jig rten rmongs/ /de kho na nyid rnam par spangs pas dngos grub min/ /rnal 'byor rnams la rgyud rgyal du/ /de dang de yi mchog ye shes/ /'od gsal sgyu ma
bdag gis ni/ /sgyu ma'i 'jig rten la bshad do/ /kye| lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gcig pur bstan/ /lha dang lha min sa gsum 'joms pa la phyag 'tshol/ /dbang po
dang ni 'jig rten pa yis mi shes te/ /mchog tu bde ba chen po'i glu yis mchod par gyis/ /gang zhig las thams cad pa'i gzugs su bsgom par byos/ /srid dang mya
ngan 'das pa ston pa ga la ci/ /sgyu ma gti mug gis ni ri mor gnas/ /sems can theg pa da dung nyams byed ci/ /de ltar yongs su dgyes pa'i mgur/ /bcom ldan rang
nyid kyis gsungs so/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni/ /byang chub dus su blang bar gyis/ /dpa' mo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde pa'i mchog/
@#/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal
po las/ de kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid rgyud thams cad kyi don ston pa po gsang chen thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// //de nas rnal
'byor ma dpa' bo/ /rnam pa du ma'i 'khor gyis kyang / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro khyab pa'i bdag /bcom ldan bdag po la bstod pa/ /khyod ni 'dod chags chen po'i tshul/ /
dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin can/ /dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni gzugs/ /chos rnams bstan pas tshim par 'gyur/ /chos dang chos min pa yi gzugs/ /chos dang
chos pa khyod gnyis med/ /bdag gis sprul pa'i dngos po yis/ /'jig rten kun gyi 'ang don can te/ /bdag nyid chen po ster ba po/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'jug byed pa//
khyod kyis dam tshig bstan pa ste/ /gzhan min dam tshig nyid las byung / /bdag gis bsod nams rjes bsgoms pas/ /byang chub tu ni yid bsgrubs so/ /ston pa mchog tu
bde la bzhugs/ /de yis sems can don mdzad pa'o/ /hUM gi yi ge'i sgra sgrogs pas/ /nga rgyal can gyi bgegs skrag 'gyur/ /khyod kyis nye bar bsten pas ni/ /de rnams
la ni skye 'chi med/ /bde ba'i rgyal po nyid du rtse na/ /byang chub kyi ni yid du bgrod/ /khyod dang thabs gcig 'dres par 'gyur/ /gong bu gcig tu gnyis med bzhugs/ /da ltar
bstod pas rdo rje che/ /mchod pa bzhi ni rab ston mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor bdag dang gnyis med nyid/ /mchod pa rnams ni gnyis med byed/ /phyi dang nang bdag nyid can rdzas/ /
gnas pa yi ni mchod par bran/ /bza' dang btung sogs la rol pa/ /gnyis med mchod pa gsum pa 'o/ /bzhi pa chos dang rnal 'byor dag /'dzin pa yi ni mchod pa 'o/ /de
lta'i mchod pa la brten nas/ /thams cad byas pas las rgyal por/ /'gyur ro rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni/ /gru gsum du ni mnyes bya ste/ /sngon du dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/ /lag
pa g.yon pas thams cad du/ /pad+ma yi ni bskor nas snod/ /sngags pa rnams kyis gzung bar bya/ /sngon du rnal 'byor ma la ni/ /skra grol ba yis gtor ma byin/ /rnal 'byor
ma kun chu skyes ni/ /kha yis bzung nas dkrug par bya/ /de yi lag par son pa'i dpal/ /gang su yis kyang dbrog mi nus/ /ji ltar bde bas bde ba bzung / /rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas mchog mnyes bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bar bya/ /spun gyi spyod pa'ang bstan par bya/ /snying rje'i mchog dbang gyur bya zhing / /dbang bo rnams ni mi rtag par/ /bsgom bya
@#/ /snang ba med pa yis/ /rang bzhin dbang du gyur par gnas/ /rdo rje pad+ma snyoms 'jug pas/ /phyag rgya nang gi bdag nyid mchog /stong nyid gnyis med
rnal 'byor pas/ /dngos po thams cad spang bar bya/ /don dam can de nyid 'dir bya/ /rtag tu byang chub sems dran bya/ /man ngag gcig ni bsgoms pa yis/ /man ngag
thams cad mtshon par bya/ /ji ltar sa gcig thob pa yis/ /sa thams cad ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin man ngag thams cad kyang / /man ngag gcig gis 'thob par
'gyur/ /byis pa rnams dang rgan po dang / /rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad du/ /mnyam pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga yis/ /mkhas pa yis ni bya ba yin/ /mi mnyam pa yis
dngos grub 'joms/ /dmyal ba sogs par ltung bar 'gyur/ /rgan po yon tan kun gnas pa/ /de rnams mnyes pas byang chub ster/ /khyad par mchod pa nyid ni 'dir//
byis pa rnams dang de bzhin yang / /gnyis bcas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi/ /me tog bskor ba la sogs bya/ /kun tu smod pa'i ngag mi bya/ /'dod pa 'dod min sbyor
bral bya/ /ma byin par yang blang bya zhi pa/ /rtag tu srog chags gsad par bya/ /sems can rnams la brdzun smra zhing / /ma sogs rnal 'byor ma la bgrod/ /'khor lo
mchod pa rgyun du bya/ /bza' ba lnga la sogs pa sbyin/ /de yi bsod nams kyis 'thob pa/ /dus thams cad du bgegs med dang / /grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma mthong bas/ /bsam ba
gzhan ni rab tu 'jug /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos
'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bstod pa dang / mchod pa bzhi la sogs pa gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig bsten
pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //rgyud 'di rab tu byung ba ni/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /
mtshan nyid med pa thams cad spangs/ /sum cu bdun bdag nyid rnal 'byor/ /gnyis med mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dang / /rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rgyud chen po/ /'dus pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs
can te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi/ /dus thams cad du zhal na gnas/ /yi ge kun gyi za ma tog /'bum phrag sum cu drug dang po/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rab bshad
de| |chen por chung ngur gsungs pa 'o/ /ri rab kyi ni rdul tshad kyi/ /mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /mtha' yas shing ni mu med nyid/ /rtsod pa'i dus kyi sa'i nang du//
@#/ /bcom ldan mtha' yas pas 'di gsungs/ /shAkya seng ges gsungs pa'i rgyud/ /rnal 'byor pha rol son pa 'o/ /nyan pa ston pa rang nyid de/ /'chad
po skye bo gzhan kyang ngo / /legs par gsungs dang 'chad 'gyur ba'i/ /de'i rang bzhin du'ang bgrod par 'gyur/ /bsdu ba mdzad pa sogs rnams kyis/ /bdag las bgrod
pa de thob bo/ /ma mo thams cad 'dus rnams kyis/ /rdo rje'i gnas rnams su bsdus so/ /gcig la gcig gis bzhed pa ni/ /gsol ba 'debs shing gsol 'debs
mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi/ /tshig 'di la ni mngon par dga'/ /sdig pa rnams las grol bar 'gro /srid pa las ni 'gro bar byos/ /dpa' bo thams
cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho
rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ /rgya mtsho drug la sogs pa la rnal 'byor dang / yo shes dang / /sdom pa dang / bya ba dang / de kho na nyid rgya mtshor gyur pa dang / /
mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las 'di rnams dang mi mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo chen bo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //dpal bal yul grub pa'i gnas chen po yu tung lhun
gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po rdo rje slob dpon rtog ge pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu dus deng sang 'gran zla med pa/ snying rje chen pos thugs brlan
pa'i ngang tshul can/ phyogs sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i skye 'gro rnams la chos dang zang zing char gyis tshim par mdzad pa/ dpal rdo rje phag mo'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul la reg pa
shAkya'i sras po rgyal ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong d+harmA yon tan gyis mnyan cing bsgyur ba'o/ /phyis gang zag chos kyi spyan can dpal mchog dang
po'i rdo rje'i bka'i tshul dang yang bstun te zhus gtugs legs par byas so/ /mkha' mnyam bde rdzogs sna tshogs sprul pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku/ /des gsungs dri med sna tshogs
gdul bya'i bsam dbang gis/ /gsung gcig gis kyang sna tshogs don mang ston pas dpyad pa dka'/ /de ltar yin yang ji ltar mi bdag shing rta cher zhugs nas/ /g.yul ngor
'jug dus rkang gis bgrod rnams 'thab par mi brtson nam/ /de bzhin sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po rnams kyi rjes 'brang nas/ /kho bos gzhan don nus min na yang phan pa'i
bsams pas bsgyur/ /'di la gzhung dang bla ma'i ma yin rang gi blo gros skyon gyis ni/ /sgra don 'gal bar gyur pa bcom ldan dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / /mkha' 'gro
@#/ /chogs dang bstan dga'i lha rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par rigs/ /'di las thob pa'i dge ba dri med cung zad des/ /'gro kun rdo rje 'chang
gi go 'phang thob gyur cig /bdag gis srol gtod tsam 'di la/ /sgra don 'jug pa mkhyen rnams kyis/ /skad gnyis smra bas gzigs pa na/ /skyon du gyur snang bcos par
zhu| |phrag dog sgo nas mi 'phya zhing / /rjes su yi rang ba yang mdzod/ /rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ shrI he ru kA b+h+yu da ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal khrag 'thung
mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /mchog tu rmad byung gsang ba ni/ /gang zhig mis ni yang dag rig /
sgrub pa dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /tshes grangs med cing skar ma'ang med/ /snang ba med par brjod bya ste/ /dag pa dang ni mi gtsang med/ /mi smra chu yi bya ba med/ /dus dang
tshod las rnam par grol/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod pa rnam par spangs/ /de yis grong pa'i chos mi spyad/ /rtsod ldan dus su dngos grub 'gyur/ /rdzogs ldan yon tan gcig 'grub
ste| /de bzhin gsum ldan yon tan gnyis/ /gnyis ldan yon tan gsum du gsungs/ /rtsod ldan yon tan bzhi nyid de/ /dngos grub nyid du the tshom med/ /dpal khrag 'thung
'thung mngon par 'byung ba las/ 'jug pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// //de nas gzhan ni rab bshad bya/ /rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa ste/ /dpal ldan
khrag 'thung rgyud chen du/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed/ /sa yi cha mnyam yid 'ong bar/ /dri yi chu yis nyer byugs te/ /sna tshogs spos ni yid 'ong dang / /me tog sna tshogs
gcal du bkram/ /gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /sngags shes pas ni bsrung bar bya/ /phyogs ni bcing bar bya ba 'o/ /de ltar cho ga yang dag ldan/ /mkhas pas dgod bya
dgod par bya/ /sems ni shin tu dga' ba yis/ /kun nas kun tu cho ga bsam/ /bud med phyag rgya ge sar bcas/ /dang po tsheg drag rjes dbyangs dang / /ring dang thung bar rab tu
grags/ /gru gsum gnyis ni yang dag ldan/ /da bzhin ma ning bzhi po dang / /bud med skyes bu rnam pa bzhi/ /de bzhin gnyis pa dang po'i dbyangs/ /ring dang thung bar shes bya
ste| |dbyangs kyi phyi mo dgod par bya/ /dbyangs kyi sde ni dang por dgod/ /lce rtsa'i dbyangs ni gnyis par dgod/ /tsheg drag dbyangs ni gsum par ro/ /dbus su pad+ma bzhi
par ro/ /lnga pa ta yi sde tshan te/ /drug pa pa yi sde tshan yin/ /an+tas+tha ni bdun par 'dod/ /dro ba'i yi ge brgyad pa ste/ /mtha' ma ru ni bsdus pa yin/ /de ltar rig cing rnam
@#/ /shes pas/ /sngags kyi gtso bo nyid ni btu/ /bkod pa las ni sngags btus byas/ /myur du dngos grub 'bras bu 'thob/ /dpal khrag 'thung mngon
par 'byung ba las/ sngags dgod pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas sngags kyi cho ga bshad/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa 'o/ /gang gis
rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o/ /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /drug pa yi ni lnga pa nyid/ /de nyid kyi ni bzhi pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa
dang | |an+tas+tha yi bzhi pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po dang / /an+tas+tha yi bzhi pa nyid/ /de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang / /uSh+ma Na yi dang por brjod/ /an+tas+tha yi dang po nyid/ /drug pa
yi ni lnga pa dang / /uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa nyid/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /an+tas+tha yi gsum pa nyid/ /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /uSh+ma Na yi gsum pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi
ni lnga pa dang / /drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /an+tas+tha yi dang por brjod/ /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang por brjod/ /drug pa yi ni lnga pa nyid/ /de bzhin du ni
bcu bdun pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun pa ni mchog /de bzhin sum cu rtsa gnyis ba/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun mchog nyid dang / /an+tas+tha yi dang po brjod/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /
uSh+ma Na yi gnyis pa nyid/ /bcu bdun pa yi mchog nyid do/ /an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa dang / /de bzhin du yang gsum pa 'o/ /de nas bcu dgu pa yi mchog /drug pa yi ni gnyis pa nyid/ /
uSh+ma Na yi gnyis pa dang / /sum cu rtsa gcig de nas blang / /drug pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /yang na bco brgyad pa nyid dang / /an+tas+tha yi dang por brjod/ /uSh+ma Na yi gsum pa dang / /
de nyid kyi yang bzhi pa nyid/ /de bzhin du yang gsum pa nyid/ /drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa nyid/ /drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /uSh+ma Na yi gsum pa nyid/ /an+tas+tha
yi gnyis pa dang / /de nyid kyi ni dang po nyid/ /drug pa yi ni dang po dang / /an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa nyid/ /'di ltar drod kyi dang po dang / /drug pa'i dang por brjod par bya/ /uSh+ma Na yi dang po
nyid| |de bzhin d+h+ya yig rnal 'byor ma/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po dang / /usma Na yi dang por brjod/ /an+tas+tha yi gsum pa nyid/ /de bzhin du ni bco brgyad pa/ /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang //
gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa nyid/ /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /bya yi yi ge dang por brjod/ /de nas nyi shu pa nyid dang / /de bzhin
nyi shu rtsa bzhi mchog /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /drug pa yi ni lnga pa nyid/ /an+tas+tha yi gnyis par brjod/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi ba dang / /an+tas+tha yi de bzhin nyid/ /de bzhin gyi ni dang
@#/ /po dang / /drug pa yi ni lnga pa nyid/ /drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi ba nyid/ /'di ltar drug pa'i lnga pa dang / /lnga ba yi ni lnga ba dang / /de
bzhin mkhas pas bcu bdun pa/ /an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa dang / /de nyid kyi yang bzhi pa nyid/ /drug pa'i dang po'ang brjod par bya/ /drod kyi sde tshan gnyis pa dang / /an+tas+tha yi

dang po brjod/ /ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ hrauM hrauM/ hraHhraH pheM pheM/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+ha k+Sha b+ha k+Sha/ ba sa ru

d+hi ra| an+ta mA lA ba laM ba ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sap+ta pA tA la ga tA b+hu dzaM gaM sar+b+baM pA ta r+dz+dza ya ta r+dz+dza ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya/ hrIM hrIM/ dz+NauM dz+NauM/ k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mAM/ hAM hAM/ hIM hIM/ hUM hUM/ ki li ki li/
si li si li/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi li/ hUM hUM phaT/ oM gyi yi ge dang po ste/ /hUM phaT yi ge tha mar sbyar/ /rtsa ba'i sngags su rab tu grags/ /dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung
ba las/ yi ge btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o// //snying po 'dir ni bshad par bya/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'o/ /khams gsum rnam
rgyal zhes bya bas/ /chos don 'dod dang thar par skyel/ /drod kyi sde tshan gsum pa la/ /dbyangs kyi lnga pa sbyar bar bya/ /dang po ru ni yongs su grags/ /drug pa yi ni lnga pa
la| |de nyid kyi ni bzhi pas ni/ /'og gi char ni rnam par brtag /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /dbyangs yig gsum par sbyar ba yin/ /drod kyi sde tshan gsum pa la/ /dbyangs yig lnga
par yang dag ldan/ /bzhi pa ru ni yongs su grags/ /drug pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /de nyid kyi ni bzhi pas ni/ /'og gi char ni the tshom med/ /drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la/ /dbyangs yig
lnga pa yang dag ldan/ /steng du nA da sbyar ba ni/ /drug pa ru ni yongs su grags/ /drug pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /bzhi pa'i dang por brjod par bya/ /dang po yi ni tshig rkang ste/ /
dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bu ster/ /gcig ma tshang ba'i nyi shu la/ /me yi bus ni dbye bar bya/ /dbyangs yig gsum par yang dag ldan/ /dang po ru ni yongs su grags/ /drod
kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la/ /lnga pa'i lnga pa yang dag ldan/ /lan gnyis su ni yongs su grags/ /drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la/ /bco lnga pa yis brgyan byas te/ /bzhi pa'i mtha' dang
yang dag ldan/ /lnga pa ru ni yang dag grags/ /drug pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po ste/ /thams cad mtshan nyid yang dag ster/ /tshig rkang gnyis par brjod pa 'o//
gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /me yi sa bon yang dag gnas/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa yang dag ldan/ /dang po ru ni yongs su grags/ /drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la/ /lnga pa'i lnga pa
@#/ /yang dag ldan/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba ste/ /drug pa yi ni dang bo dang / /de ltar yang ni gnyis ldab bo/ /drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la/ /bzhi
ba'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ /de nas bco lnga pa yis brgyan/ /drug pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /tshig rkang gsum par brjod pa yin/ /'dod pa'i don
kun sgrub pa 'o/ /dang po yi ni gnyis pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /an+tas+tha yi dang po dang / /drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum yang dag ldan/ /
