gling rje ngar gnyis la'o/ /nye bar 'du ba can no/ /nA ga ra ni sor mor ro/ /sin+d+hu rkang pa'i bol gnyis la'o/ /dur khrod do/ /ma ru mthe bong gnyis la dgod/ /ku lu ta ni pus
@#/ /mor gnas/ /nye ba'i dur khrod de/ /pu dza o a go rA de ma/ /kA o tri ko ka la kA hi/ /bre gr-i sau su nA si ma ku/ /gnyid log ma log ldang pa dang / /bza'
'am 'gro ba'i chos spyod pa'am/ /gang yin der ni rnam bkod na/ /'jig rten gsum gyis mi g.yo 'o/ /ming gi rgyud ni 'bum sde las/ /snying po bsdus par gyur pa yin/ /
nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i rgyud/ /'bum gcig nang nas de bzhin bshad/ /shes rab rgyud ni gsang ba ste/ /ming 'byung ba la gnas pa yin/ /bstan pa yis ni sprul
pa yin/ /bshad pas longs spyod rdzogs par 'dod/ /so sor bstan pa ma lus nyid/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i de nyid bstan/ /sku gsum 'khor lo gsum du bshad/ /chos
sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs dag ni/ /bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yin/ /blo ngan glen zhing lkugs pa dang / /shes rab dman
zhing log lta can/ /phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'tshal ba/ /bla ma la ni sun 'byin yin/ /de dag kun kyang rnam spangs te/ /gus kyang bshad par mi bya 'o/ /cha dang cha yi
khyad par la/ /der ni gnyis su med par bshad/ /dag byed dbang gi lha mo dang / /bka' bsgo'i lha mo dpa' bo skyes/ /de 'og ma lus kun spyod pa/ /'khor ba las
grol gtso bo yin/ /ma lus rig byed las sprul pa/ /grub pa'i mthar ni de rab bsgrags/ /dpa' bo khyod kyi sa nga la bshad/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs can la sba/ /sgra dang sgra nyams
brda rnams kyi/ /lam 'di nyid kyi rjes su 'brang / /bsdus don yang dag blangs pa dang / /brda yi tshig ni rgyas pa yin/ /gang gis kun spyod mi shes par/ /rnal 'byor pa ni rnal
'byor ston/ /de yi ngal ba don med de/ /'bras bu de ni thob mi 'gyur/ /'gro la phan pas sngon gsungs pa/ /sbas te gzhan du gsungs pa yin/ /kun spyod 'dir ni bshad pa
las| |sgrub pa pos ni rab mnyam gzhag /rgyal bas sngon ni rgyud chen po'i/ /sngags kyi yi ge sgrub mdzad pa/ /las kyi bya ba gang yang rung / /dge dang mi dge brtags te bya/ /yi
ge mtha' dang dbus dag tu/ /der ni thams cad rab tu grub/ /rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ A li kA li dang / las thams cad kyi nges pa gnyis su med par bstan
pa ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas rgyud rnams thams cad du/ /sbas gsang cho ga bshad bya ste/ /sangs rgyas bzhi yi gdan bzhugs pa/ /rdo rje la sogs
dpa' rnal 'byor/ /mkha' 'gro la sogs rdo rje yi/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso/ /me long la sogs rnam pa bzhi/ /gnyis med gnyis su med sbyor nyid/ /gnyis
@#/ /med rdzas ni me tog sogs/ /re re nas ni dbul bar bya/ /phyag rgya lnga sogs mchog lus kyi/ /pha rol son pas phar phyin drug /lag pa'i mchod
sogs ye shes can/ /blo ldan dpa' bos shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma drug go rims bzhin/ /rdo rje sems sogs bcu gnyis dang / /dpa' bo chen por sbyar bya la/ /
lag pa'i mchod la sogs pas bstod/ /lnga po lnga dang yang dag bsre/ /'o ma dang yang bsre bar bya/ /mchod pa des ni legs gnas la/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'dod dang ldan//
lag pa'i mchod pas rnal 'byor pa/ /dbul ba'i 'dod don 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems ni gzhan du gyur pa dang / /bza' btung gos sogs thob par 'gyur/ /lha yi
mchod pa byas na ni/ /de la bsam pa rnam grub 'gyur/ /dpa' bo 'di ni dpa' chen po/ /sa steng rnal 'byor ma rnyed dka'/ /rnal 'byor pa yi spyod brtul zhugs/ /rnal
'byor dbang phyug kun gyi gtso/ /gang zhig rtag tu 'dir rang mchod/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab ster/ /rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ /dpa' bo bzhi dang
yang dag par sbyor ba'i lag pa'i mchod pa bstan pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /gnyis med spyod pa'i cho ga bshad/ /dang
por mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas/ /'bad de nus pa bskyed par bya/ /nus pa bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la/ /yid 'dod pa yi brtul zhugs spyad/ /sems can rjes su gzung don
phyir| |dpa' bo chen po 'gro bya zhing / /srog chags yan lag go bgos la/ /bde don gnyer bas bde ba srung / /mchod phyir thogs ni kun spangs la/ /he ru ka dpal gtsang
sbrar gnas/ /grol ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /rnal 'byor ma kun mnyes par bya/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyi dpa' bo gang / /tshangs pa'i skud pa la sogs brtag /lha yi snying po'i
gsang sngags kyi/ /brgya phyed phreng bas brgyan pa yi/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs kun/ /lus kyi khams su brtag par bya/ /dpa' bo'i go cha drug gi ni/ /rgya 'dis lus ni
mdzes pa yin/ /rdo rje phag mo sogs sngags gang / /mgur chus rked pa mdzes pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /pags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /
kha T+wAM ga ni lha yi sku/ /shes rab DA ma ru ru brtag /thod pa dril bu la sogs kun/ /lus kyi khams su brtag par bya/ /yi ge bdun gyi gsang sngags kyis/ /rna bcas snyan ni
mdzes pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma drug gsang sngags gang / /ska rags byas pa brgyan pa yin/ /'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma'i/ /sngags ni lag pa'i thod pa yin/ /rnam
@#/ /par snang mdzad yul sngags dang / /thod pas mgo bo brgyan pa yin/ /de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams nas/ /tsham ngam sngags kyis legs par srung //
rtag tu tshangs par spyod 'gyur ba/ /gsang sngags rkang pa brgyad mchod ba'o/ /nyin mo bcom ldan dpa' bo ste/ /mtshan mo bcom ldan ma brtag bya/ /mi bya ci yang yod min
te| |rtag tu mi bsam yod ma yin/ /mi bza' ci yang yod min la/ /dge dang mi dge mi smra med/ /bdag nyid ji bzhin 'gro de bzhin/ /bdag ci 'dra ba gzhan de bzhin/ /de
ltar rnam bsam rnal 'byor bdag /'jigs pa thams cad yongs spangs te/ /dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyod/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed yin/ /he ru ka dpal
gzhir gnas pa'i/ /yan lag bskyod pa ji snyed dang / /tshig tu brjod pa ji snyed pa/ /de snyed phyag rgya gsang sngags yin/ /rigs lnga'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ /rigs gcig
nyid du spyad par bya/ /de ltar shes pa'i bdag nyid can/ /go 'phang mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la/ /mi bya ba ni ci yang med/ /mi rtog
bdag nyid sems kyis ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams spyad/ /rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ gnyis su med pa'i brtul zhugs dang / /gsang sngags bstan pa ste/
bco lnga pa'o// //gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe/ /dus mthar dngos grub mi thob ste/ /blo ni gzhan du rnam 'khrugs pas/ /phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bzlas pa yis/ /bde
bar 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi/ /bkres dang skom gyi sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /'bad de 'dod bya dmigs nas ni/ /de nyid kyis bdag rnal 'byor ba/ /ji ltar he ru ka'i ye shes/ /ji
'dod par ni yongs su rgyu/ /rna bas ring nas thos pa dang / /skad cig gis mthong rnal 'byor pas/ /chos 'di de ltar shes nas ni/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed yin/ /
shes rab chen por byas pa nyid/ /gnyis med ye shes brtul zhugs bzang / /A li kA li ma gtogs par/ /gal te chos 'di 'dod na ni/ /de yi ngal ba don med de/ /'bras
bu thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /mdo dang bya ba'i spyod pa rnams/ /rnal 'byor gsang sogs dbye ba nyid/ /'jig rten kun la bshad pa ni/ /byang chub don gyi rgyu nyid yin/ /nga yis
'jug par bshad pa ni/ /tshogs gnyis gnyis su med pa yin/ /de nyid chos kyi rang bzhin zhes/ /mya ngan 'das pa 'ba' zhig 'dod/ /thams cad bden pa gnyis la ni//
brten par ngas ni sngon bshad pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dngos grub kyis/ /sgom pa mngon dgar gyur pa yin/ /spros pa kun la dmigs nas ni/ /spros pas spros pa med par
@#/ /bya| |rgyud rnams kun tu gsang ba gang / /sprul pa rnams kyi de nyid bstan/ /rgyu 'di yis ni rnal 'byor pa/ /bden pa gnyis la yang dag rten/ /sems
rnams thams cad gsal nas ni/ /longs spyod kun la nyer spyod bya/ /blo ldan chen po 'khor lo sdom/ /sdom pa la ni rnam par spyod/ /rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan ma gang / /
gzugs dang brda dang tha snyad dag /khyim lnga la sogs yul rnams su/ /rnal 'byor ma ni lnga nyid gnas/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i gnas kun tu/ /g.yon nas bskor ba la
rab brtson/ /ji ltar sngar bshad 'khor lo yi/ /grangs kyi cho gas brtul zhugs can/ /dpa' bo'i sngags sogs rnal 'byor ma'i/ /yid la 'dod pa dgod par bya/ /
shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma/ /bong bu'i rnam par bsgom par bya/ /he ru ka dpal zhes bya ba/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa yin/ /he ru ka dpal go 'phang
gnas/ /lus ngag yid kyi las rnams la/ /bshad dang ma bshad gang bsams pa/ /de dag thams cad myur du 'grub/ /rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ dngos
grub kyi nges pa dang / /dpal he ru ka'i mdzad pa bstan pa ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas he ru ka dpal rgyud/ /sems ni dri med yin par bshad/ /dag pa'i
chos kyi sprul pa ni/ /phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las/ /de nyid dang ni thams cad 'byung / /me long la sogs rnam pa bzhi/ /pad+ma'i
'dab gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /mkha' 'gro ma bzhi pad+mar gnas/ /mA ma kI sogs bzang mo yin/ /thod pa'i dum sogs 'khor lor gnas/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis med yin/ /
sems can 'khor ba las grol ba/ /dpa' bo nyid ni yin par brtag /khro bo rnam rgyal la sogs kun/ /sgo dang mtha' yi mtshams rnams su/ /sna tshogs gdul ba'i thabs
chen gyis/ /sems can don la brtson par mdzad/ /gsang ba'i gnas kyi rnam gnas pa/ /rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo yis/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i
dngos grub ster/ /rnal 'byor 'bras bu thob nas ni/ /srid mtshor ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba las ni sgrol ba'i thabs/ /rgyud kyi snying po bsdus pa yin/ /bla ma slob mas
rtogs sla'i phyir/ /cho ga rgya cher ma bshad de/ /sems ni ngal gso rnal 'byor pa/ /mya ngan 'das pa bstan mi bya/ /de ltar spyod pa'i skyes mchog 'di/ /sdig pa thams cad
rnam dag 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'di 'am pha rol tu/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas nyid mthong 'gyur/ /ji ltar sngar bshad sdig pa rnams/ /spang bar bya ba'i mtshan nyid yin/ /gang zhig
@#/ /'di sgom rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad ster/ /he ru ka dpal mtshan brjod pas/ /lha sogs kun gyi gsang gang dang / /mi la sogs la
gang zhig yod/ /de yi bsod nams des 'thob bo/ /bsam gtan gyis ni bsams tsam mam/ /'dod cing klog gam bris pa yis/ /mtho ris longs spyod 'thob 'gyur
te/ /yang na 'khor los bsgyur nyid 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa ni 'pho ba'i tshe/ /dpal ldan he ru ka la sogs/ /dpa' bo dag ni thams cad dang / /rnal 'byor ma ni ji snyed
pa/ /lag na sna tshogs me tog bsnams/ /ba dan rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / /rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs glus ni nye bar mchod/ /'chi ba zhes bya rnam rtog
ste/ /mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas su 'khyer/ /de lta'i dpa' po chen po dang / /rnal 'byor ma ni sa steng dkon/ /ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang / /kun smra bsten
pa'i gtam yang rjod par byed/ /lam yang bshad cing 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rnal 'byor lam ngan de dang 'dra bar bshad/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /
gnas sogs rnal 'byor ma yi gnas/ /he ru ka dpal sogs rnal 'byor/ /dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma/ /pUl+lI ma la yar rab gtum/ /dzA lan d+ha
rar gtum pa'i mig /oD+yan na ni 'od ldan ma/ /ar bu dar ni sna chen mo/ /go dA ba rir dpa' blo ma/ /rA me shwa rar mi'u thung ngam/ /de bi ko Tar lang dbang phyug /mA la bar
ni shing grib ma/ /kA ma rU par sa srung mo/ /o trer 'jigs byed chen mo yin/ /tri sha ku nir rlung shugs ma/ /ko sa lar ni chang 'thung ma/ /ka ling lha mo sngo bsang ma/ /lam
pa kar ni rab bzang mo/ /kany+tsi nar ni rta rna mo/ /hi ma la yar bya gdong ma/ /pre ta pu rir 'khor lo'i shugs/ /gr-i ha de bar dum skyes ma/ /sau raSh+Tar chang 'tshong ma/ /gser gling
'khor lo'i go cha mo/ /nA ga rar ni rab dpa' mo/ /sin+d+hu'i yul du stobs chen mo/ /mya ngan yul du 'khor bsgyur ma/ /ku lu tAr ni brtson chen mo/ /yul 'di rnams kyi bu mo
gang / /dpa' mo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma'o/ /gsang ba'i sngags la rtag gnas nas/ /rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma ni re re zhing / /bye ba grangs snyed dag
gis bskor/ /mtshan ma mtshan nyid phyag rgya sogs/ /g.yon pa'i sgrub pa po yis sba/ /mi bzad las ni gang gang gis/ /skye bo rnams ni 'chir 'gyur ba/ /thabs dang bcas na
de nyid kyis/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i pha rol brgal nas 'di/ /ci 'dod ye shes can du 'gyur/ /mgur chu gtsug rgyan dpung rgyan dang / /rna rgyan
@#/ /tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / /mgul pa brgyan cing spyi bor phreng / /ska rags rkang gdub sgra nyid do/ /ri steng sna tshogs pad+ma yi/ /ge sar A li kA li las/ /nyi shu
rtsa bzhir yang dag ldan/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs bcas/ /u ma'i bdag po yang dag mnan/ /rdo rje dril bu sku la 'khyud/ /he ru ka dpal rgyal po che/ /go 'phang mchog
ni bsgom par bya/ /de nas rtag tu spos chus 'dir/ /rtag tu lus ni yan lag dril/ /dri zhim yan lag gis brgyan cing / /thal ba'i phyag rgya sogs pas bsgos/ /kha dog la
sogs g.yogs pa'i gzugs/ /rang gi lus ni yongs su bsgyur/ /spyod pa'i brtul zhugs la zhugs par/ /shes nas rnal 'byor la legs gnas/ /yan lag can
dang tshigs can dang / /sdud dang de bzhin snying stobs dang / /gar gyi tshul ni bzhi po 'di/ /de nyid mthong bas shes par bya/ /btung ba'i tshul zhes bya ba ni/ /rnal 'byor shes
pa yin par bshad/ /de la 'bad de bya ba ni/ /skal ba bzang po'i gar chen yin/ /gar gyi gnas su gnas pa kun/ /rgyan rnams de ni yin zhes bya/ /kun tu dgug dang bcing
bya dang / /gzhug dang de bzhin bskyod pa dang / /'bebs dang 'di ni 'khyil ba dang / /de bzhin 'dir ni brgyan pa dang / /tshangs skud lus las dgrol ba dang / /rnam pa kun tu
bcing ba dang / /rkang gdub rab tu zhugs pa dang / /lag pa'i rgyan ni nyid dag dang / /srog shing gcig gyur srad bu yin/ /'og pag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang / /rol ldan bcu drug
par shes bya/ /phreng ba nyi shu rtsa lnga yin/ /rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las/ de kho na nyid dag pa la sogs pa bstan pa ste bcu bdun pa'o// //rnal 'byor ma'i
kun tu spyod pa rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ tsa tur yo gi nI saM
pu Ta tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor bzhi
yi kha sbyor te/ /zhal bzhi zhes ni rnam par bshad/ /rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa ste/ /zhal rnams kyang ni kha sbyor ma/ /'di ru rgyas par brjod pa yin/ /'og dang steng du rnam
bshad dang / /de bzhin g.yon dang g.yas pa'o/ /A li kA li bye brag gis/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/ /zla ba nyi mar rnam par bshad/ /sa dang rlung gi nyid dag dang //
chu me de bzhin nam mkha' dang / /khams lha dag dang yang dag ldan/ /gzugs dang reg pa de bzhin sgra/ /mig gnyis dang ni sna dag dang / /lus kyi steng 'og tu yang gsal//
@#/ /rtag tu rdor can rnam par gnas/ /cha dang cha min rnam par grol/ /stong pa'i ngang las yang dag gnas/ /ya yi sde mtha' yang dag rdzogs/ /u yig
dag ni thig ler bcas/ /'byor zhing gsal bar 'gyur ba ste/ /kha sbyor rnam pa rnal 'byor gyi/ /rdor can ci ltar chang gis myos/ /'khor nas sems ni rnam par grol//
khams gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /bdun gyi rgyal po'i dngos grub kyis/ /ma lus lus pa med pa mthong / /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang
ldan dang / /dbang po de bzhin 'dod dbang phyug /pha rol stobs kyis mnan na ni/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis ni chod/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kyis/ /dam
tshig sgra yis bshad pa ste/ /srog dang rtsol ba kun tu bya/ /de yis 'di ni dam tshig sdom/ /de la kha sbyor rnam pa bshad/ /zhal bzhi ru ni rab tu gnas/ /rnal 'byor ma
bzhi de shes bya/ /sbyor ba bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /gang gang dbang po'i lam nas byung / /de dang de yi rang bzhin nyid/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod pa/ /sangs rgyas
kun gyi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /gzugs ni ji ltar rdzogs pa las/ /de la sgom pa ji lta bu/ /sngags rnams ji ltar bskyed par bgyid/ /rdzogs par yang ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /
de dag thams cad tha snyad tsam/ /sngags dang rgyud rnams yang dag 'byung / /byang chub sems ni 'di ru bsngags/ /'dod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /mtshon bya mtshan nyid kyis ni
mtshon/ /mtshon bya du ma'ang mtshon mi bya/ /sngags rnams rgyas par bshad nas ni/ /lha rnams kyi ni sgom pa nyon/ /steng gi sgo ni gsum yin te/ /lte ba rlung gi gzugs can ma/ /de yi
dbus su rtag tu stong / /dag pa yi ni shel lta bu/ /longs spyod chen po nges par 'gyur/ /dgu pa bcu yis ldan pa ste/ /cha brgyad de yi yan lag gis/ /sgo dgu'i sa bon yin
pa ste/ /lus la sa bon rjes su brjod/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag nyid kyis/ /steng gi char ni shes rab ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'byung / /sems kyi rdo rje zhes ni
bshad/ /'dir ni steng gi pad+mar bshad/ /de la gnas ni b+ha gar bshad/ /shes rab de nyid rdor can bcas/ /rten dang brten pa 'byung ba yis/ /rtsa rnams kun la rnam par
gnas/ /khu ba'i gzugs su gyur pa yis/ /spro dang sdud par byed pas so/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sgom pa'i rim pa phye bas so/ /gdams ngag rim pa'i
rnal 'byor gyis/ /lha rnams sgom par brjod pa ste/ /de rnams sna tshogs rnal 'byor gyis/ /zla ba nyi mar bshad pa yin/ /gzhan yang gzhan min rnam par grol/ /sangs rgyas
@#/ /gzugs ni g.yo ba med/ /der ni gzung bar bya ba ste/ /gang zhig de ru ji ltar gnas/ /nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /mtshan mo shes rab tu
ni brjod/ /nam mkha'i nang song mchog tu zhi/ /dag cing dge la yid du 'ong / /sangs rgyas la sogs mu stegs kun/ /lha min gnod sbyin srin po dang / /de nyid 'dod
chags chags bral dang / /'dod pas thar bar gyur pa 'di/ /de nyid bud med rnams la chags/ /de nyid mngal ni rab tu len/ /de nyid 'chi ste ril po'i gnas/ /de nyid
bskams pas mthong ba yin/ /de nyid gong du gyur pa ste/ /de nyid dri ru rnam par gnas/ /de nyid sdug bsngal rig pa ste/ /rig pas bde ba nyid dag la/ /de nyid gcig
pus khyab pa yin/ /bdud rtsi thigs pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /gzugs bzang gzugs dang ldan pa'i mchog /sna tshogs gzugs rnams yid du 'ong / /gzugs kun
gsal bar byed pa'i dpal/ /gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba'o/ /bcu drug phyed phyed de yi phyed/ /rtag tu de nyid rig pa po/ /sna tshogs rtag tu zhi ba'i gzugs/ /nam
mkha' lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /de nyid rab tu zhugs par brjod/ /'gro la gsal bar mar me bzhin/ /sna yi rtse mor rnam par 'byung / /'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'od
zer te/ /'di rnams kun ni bdag gis brjod/ /rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid du/ /gang gis shes pas cho ga shes/ /de yi dpal ni rgyas par 'grub/ /gzhan yang sngags kyi tshigs
bshad de/ /gsang ba'i sbyor pa sbas pa ste/ /sde tshan brgyad kyis mtha' ma gzung / /sa bon lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /de bas b+h+ru yig sbyin par bya/ /dang por oM yig yang dag
ldan/ /a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /thig le chen po yi ge med/ /nam mkha' nam mkha'i dbus gnas par/ /sngags dang rgyud ni yang dag 'byung / /ji ltar de ltar sngags
kyang ni/ /de bzhin nyid kyi tshul lta bur/ /yi ge tsam dang yang dag ldan/ /de la dbus su rab tu grags/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /gang yang gzhan gyi lha
tshogs dang / /'byung po ma lus thams cad dang / /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /de yi dbus su yang dag rdzogs/ /yi ge la sogs gzugs can gyis/ /gzugs can rnal 'byor
lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma yi bye brag gis/ /zhal bzhi zhes ni rnam par bshad/ /rnal 'byor bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /lte ba dang ni ge sar ldan/ /'dab ma bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /
de la dbus su dpa' bo che/ /phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dang po la ni sha yis gang / /gnyis pa khrag gis bkang ba nyid/ /gsum pa bzhi pa lus phyag rgya/ /kha T+wAM ga dang DA ma ru//
@#/ /de bzhin kha dog dkar po 'phro/ /dri med ston ka'i nam mkha' bzhin/ /dkar dang dmar dang de bzhin gnag /ljang gu'i zhal te gtsigs pa'o/ /phyag rgya
brgyad ni mdo ru bshad/ /phyag gis mtshon char rab tu grags/ /dang por 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /gnyis pa snying ni 'byin pa'o/ /gsum pa rmongs byed phyag rgya yin/ /bzhi par
ltung byed de bzhin no/ /lnga par gar ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /drug par gsod byed mar ni brjod/ /bdun par za byed ma'i phyag rgya/ /brgyad par steng du len par nges/ /gshin rje mo dang
skrag byed drag /gtum mo dang ni bzang za dang / b+ha su ma dang 'dod pa nyid/ /de nyid brgyad po phag mo nyid/ /mi bzad rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs/ /khrag dang khu ba za ba mo/ /
'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs 'bar/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya/ /mang por rnam bshad ye shes ni/ /de la dbus su rnam par 'byung / /dpag tshad 'bum gyi rgya khyon
du/ /de yi gsal bar byed pa yin/ /sems can thog ma tha ma med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chags pa che/ /thig le rdo rje can du 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed pa lta bur gsal/ /gdan ni pad+ma rA
ga ste/ /rgyal po'i gzugs ni gsal ba yin/ /rgyal po nyid ces rnam par bshad/ /steng du 'byung bar rab tu grags/ /yang ni dgod par bya ba ste/ /rigs kyi dbye bas brjod pa'o//
shar du rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /lho ru rnam par snang mdzad brjod/ /nub tu rta bdun rgyal po'o/ /byang du pad+ma gar dbang ste/ /'khor lo'i dbus su he ru ka /steng gi sgra ni rta gdong
yin/ /'di rnams 'di ru dgod par gsungs/ /rigs kyi dbye bas rnam pa lnga/ /de ru bsgom par bya ba yin/ /gzhom med gzhig tu med pa ste/ /de yi dbus su yang dag rdzogs/ /mgon
po rnam par snang mdzad sogs/ /rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis bsgyings pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor zhes bya ba ste brtag pa dang po'o// //de nas rdo rje
phag mo de/ /rkang rgyan dang ni do shal rgyan/ /de yi dkyil 'khor la gar byed/ /dbang bskur ba ni ster ba yin/ /dam tshig la ni legs gzhag phyir/ /phag mo de bzhin rdo rje can/ /
ci 'dod de bzhin rdo rje can/ /dri chen dri chu za ba dang / /khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha /rtag tu bud med dang nus sam/ /b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o byed dam/ /smos shig rdor can bde ba
che/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /bzhad par gyur nas 'di dag smras/ /lha mo ci ste bdag mi spro/ /khrag dang khu ba la sogs bza'/ /rtag tu bud med gus par bgyi/ /b+ha ga'i
pad mar 'o bgyid do/ /yang ni legs so legs so byin/ /sgo skyong de bzhin rdo rje can/ /thod pa yang dag blangs nas ni/ /rdo rje can la bza' ba dbul/ /zhi zhing gcer bur
@#/ /'dug pa dang / /rdo rje can ni skra grol bas/ /legs par dbang bskur ster bar byed/ /b+ha gar 'o byed rdo rje can/ /de nas brtsams te rdo rje khyod/ /
sems can don gyis brtul zhugs bzung / /bza' ba dri chen dri chu dang / /khrag dang khu ba sha dag go /b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o bya ste/ /bdud rtsi rnams ni bsgrub par
bya| |rdo rje rnal 'byor pho nya mos/ /de nas rtag tu dbang bskur ro/ /huM hUM hAHhAHaHAHhIHhrIH swAhA/ /de nas de ma thag tu kun/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid kyis/ /sgra chen
po ni rab tu bsgrags/ /rdo rje can de dbang bskur ro/ /sna tshogs gzugs can drag po che/ /thod pa'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /sha dang khrag dag 'thung ba ste/ /gsang ba'i
dkyil 'khor du ni sbyor/ /la la rol mo'i cha byad rdung / /pa Ta ha sogs mu kuN Da/ /la la rab tu glu len cing / /la la pi wang sgreng ba ste/ /la la dor can gar byed do/ /la
la dril bu'i sgra sgrogs byed/ /la la sgra dag rab tu sgrogs/ /phyogs bcur pheM gyi sgra dag go /la la gar dag rab tu byed/ /la lar dkyil 'khor du glu len/ /la la me tog
rab tu 'grems/ /de yis rdor can la dbang bskur/ /la la spos kyis rab sbyin byed/ /la la dri yis de bzhin no/ /'di ltar gyur pa'i mchod pa yis/ /gsang ba'i dkyil
'khor la ni bya/ /de nas rdor can lha mo de/ /tshig 'di dag ni brjod pa ste/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid dag dang / /dbang dag legs par brjod nas ni/ /nga yis gzhan
yang bshad bya ba/ /lha rnams dgod pa mchog dag go/ rgya ru kun tu khru brgyad do/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sngags pas de yis nyis 'gyur dpyad/ /gang du mkha' 'gro'i
tshogs 'gying ba/ /nam mkha' 'od kyi rgya khyab par/ /gang de dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /dbus su 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /lte ba dag ni ge sar ldan/ /'dab ma bzhi dang
yang dag bcas/ /kha dog dkar por yang dag ldan/ /de la dbus su dpa' bo dgod/ /dag pa'i shel dang 'dra ba ste/ /dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad/ /dang po'i spyan gyis
rnam par gzigs/ /smin ma khro gnyer rab tu gsal/ /mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa ni/ /lho ru bltas pa'i zhal dag go /g.yon pa rmad du byung ba ste/ /rgyab ni 'jigs
pa chen po yin/ /mdun rgyab rta yi zhal gyis brgyan/ /dkar po dmar po de bzhin gnag /ljang gu yi ni kha dog go /phyag brgyad pa yang bri bar bya/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam
par brgyan/ /dpal ldan mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin/ /'jigs byed ljags ni 'dril ba ste/ /'jig dus chen po'i me dang mtshungs/ /dur khrod lta bur 'jigs su rung / /brtsegs
@#/ /par dgod cing bzhad pa che/ /phaiM gyi sgra ni sgrogs pa'o/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ru/ /lha bzhi rnams ni brjod par bya/ /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa'i
lag |khrag dang khu ba dag 'thung ngo / /'khor lo gnyis pa yang dag bshad/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum po la/ /'khor lo chen po yi ge brgyad/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar
ba ste| |gzugs can ma dang 'o byed ma/ /lam mchog 'phel dang sa ma li/ /phyir mi ldog dang i hi ki /rdor can brgyad par brjod pa yin/ /lha mo brgyad po 'di ru dgod//
kha dog dkar po shin tu 'bar/ /lag pas kha T+wAM ga bzung zhing / /thod pa khrag gis bkang ba 'o/ /phyi rol 'khor lo yang dag brjod/ /lha rnams bkod pa mchod dang ni/ /
sa ki nI dang puk+ka si/ /gsod ma dkar mo sgrog ma dang / /gtum mo ri khrod ma nyid dang / /sgrol ma de bzhin khro gnyer ma/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal glang chen mo/ /de bzhin
g+hasma rI dag dang / /durga tsa mun+d+ra dag dang / /de bzhin tshangs ma khyab 'jug ma/ /sgo skyong yang dag bshad pa ni/ /sgo bzhi dag tu sbyar bar bya/ /'khor lo chen po kha dog lnga/ /
'bar ba'i phreng ba tshogs kyi 'od/ /lha mo chen po kha dog dkar/ /kha T+wAM ga dang nya phyis 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni rgyal po ste/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i sdom pa ni/ /rang
gi rgyud du thun mong ste/ /dkyil 'khor bla ma'i bla ma yin/ /srub pa chen po'i sdom pa ni/ /de yi bla ma zhes su gsungs/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las/ dkyil 'khor
gyi brtag pa zhes pa ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig chen po'i sgrub thabs so/ /glang po rta dang bong bu dang / /ba lang rnga mo dag
dang ni/ /khyi yi sgron ma rab tu 'byung / /sgron ma chen mo rab tu bshad/ /'gro ba dga' bas gso bar byed/ /bya rog 'ug pa khra dang ni/ /chu skyar bya rog lnga po yis/ /spos chen
po ni rab tu bshad/ /spos su 'bul bar byed pa'o/ /'di rnams dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /sa gsum po ru rnam par spyod/ /ji srid sbyor ba tshogs pa yis/ /dngos grub
thams cad byed pa'i mchog /bdud rtsi lnga ni rnam brjod pa/ /'chi med dngos po med pa'o/ /rtog pa med par bza' bar bya/ /blo ldan rang bzhin med pas so/ /sde tshan tha ma'i
sngags btus te/ /bcu drug cha yis yang dag ldan/ /pra Na ba sbyor steng du ste/ /thig les mnan cing brgyan pa yin/ /dri zhes kun tu brjod pa yin/ /kun nas thugs kyi 'khor
lo'o/ /nyi shu bdun pa 'og tu sbyin/ /sngags la sogs pas phye ba yin/ /spyi bo de ru yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge lha yi gzugs kyi ni/ /nyi shu rtsa drug yang ni sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gnyis
@#/ /pas brgyan pa yin/ /nyi shu rtsa gsum yang ni blang / /'og gi char ni sbyar bar bya/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pa yang dag ldan/ /bzhi pas sbyar bar bya ba
yin/ /de yi dbus su yang dag gsungs/ /yi ge dbang phyug gis ni brgyan/ /bcu drug mtha' ni yang dag bshad/ /steng dang 'og tu khyab pa yin/ /de la dbus su yang
dag gsungs/ /stong pa chen po'i yi ge ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gzhig tu med/ /dag pa yi ni shel lta bu/ /rdzas 'di rnams ni bza' ba yin/ /rnal 'byor 'di rnams
mchog yin te/ /rnal 'byor kun las mchog tu 'phags/ /khyod la mdo ru bsdus par bshad/ /bza' ba rnams ni yang dag brjod/ /gang gi rigs pas thams cad
bza'/ /dngos po ro mnyam bsres nas ni/ /dag dang ma dag mi byed par/ /de bzhin nyid rnams thams cad dang / /bza' ba thams cad bza' bar bya/ /de nyid bcu
yis rab dbye bas/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par grol/ /sbyin pa'i snying po sbyin par bya/ /sems kyis rnal 'byor rdzogs nas ni/ /thams cad rtswa sogs bzhin du
btang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims gyur/ /de nyid kun gyis mi 'jigs pa/ /skye bo thams cad 'tshe mi byed/ /dang por snying rje bla na med/ /bzod pa tshul khrims
bgegs med dang / /gzhan gyi gnod pa 'gegs pa ste/ /gur dang phur bu dra ba dag /gdug pa'i bdud ni 'joms pa ste/ /bdud med 'chi ba med pa yin/ /bdag gi sems ni
bcing bar bya/ /gang gis rang sems btul ba yis/ /bdud kyis gnod pa smos ci dgos/ /mnyam pa'i sems kyis dri yis ni/ /gru bzhi ba ru yang dag bri/ /lus la ste'u dang
tsan+dan dang / /sems kyis mnyam par gnas pa na/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes brjod/ /dngos po bdag med bsres pa ste/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor rgyal bar 'gyur/ /gang
dag rnal 'byor ma yi ni/ /zhu ba rnams la za ba dag /de yis sa steng mtha' dag tu/ /rga dang na ba rnam par 'joms/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las/ dam tshig chen
po'i bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya ba'i brtag pa ste gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sbyor ba dang po'i sgrub thabs te/ /sbyor ba rnam bzhir
shes par bya/ /dam tshig bzhi ni sgrub pa ste/ /dang po khu ba rnams shes bya/ /gnyis pa de bzhin khrag nyid do/ /rdo rje chu dang dri chen no/ /dam tshig bzhi ni bsten pa ste/ /'dod chags
khu bar rnam par bshad/ /phrag dog khrag ni nyid dag go /gti mug rnam snang rgyal po ste/ /zhe sdang dri chur bcas pa yin/ /dam tshig bzhi yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /dam tshig bzhi la
@#/ /spyod pa pos/ /dang po sbyor ba 'grub 'gyur zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/ /bris sku gzhug pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /dam tshig de nyid
bsgrub bya ste/ /stong pa'i rdo rje brjod bya ste/ /ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsam/ /mdor bsdus pa ni sngags bzlas bya/ /hUM dag sngags ni brjod par bya/ /dngos pos
bsgom pas bsgom par bya/ /spro dang sdud dang byed pa po/ /bdud bzhi gzhan las rgyal ba yi/ /go cha mtshon cha 'di yis bcing / /ra ba phur bu gur sogs kyis/ /phyogs
bzhi la sogs bcing bar bya/ /khams bzhi por ni yang dag 'byung / /bdud bzhi po ni rnam par brjod/ /bad kan sha dang rkang dag dang / /rus pa'i khams la yang dag
'byung / /spyan dang bdag ma sgrol ma dang / /gos dkar la sogs bzhi po 'o/ /khams bzhi dang ni rnam dag pa/ /sbyor ba dang por brjod pa'o/ /brtson chen zhes su rnam
bshad pa/ /rlung dang me ni mchog yin te/ /de la dbus su yang dag gnas/ /dzA ta ri yi rang bzhin ming / /dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /kha dog med par rab
tu grags/ /dbyangs dang yi ge'i tshul dag tu/ /dbyangs med yi ge med pa'o/ /tshangs min khyab 'jug drag po min/ /nam mkha' min zhing 'dod pa min/ /zla ba min
zhing skar ma min/ /nyi ma min zhing rlung yang min/ /gnod sbyin srin po lha min min/ /'byung po yi dwags nyid min cing / /snod dang bcud ni sna tshogs dang / /khams gsum po ni
ma lus la/ /bdag nyid chen po de yis khyab/ /bems po nyid la yid kyis rtogs/ /de nyid 'jig rten pa ru 'gyur/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /zla ba gza'i zin skar

ma lha| |de nyid thams cad bde ba che/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam snang mdzad/ /pad+ma nyi ma khrag 'thung rta/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor pho nya mo/ /de nyid rdo rje bde ba che/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ /
de bzhin pad+ma pad+ma 'dzin/ /nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid/ /rigs 'di rnams su bsgyur ba'o/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor bri ba nyid/ /rdul tshon kha dog lnga ba 'o/ /de nyid sngags su
rab tu bya/ /hUM hUM phaT kyi yi ge nyid/ /dmyal pa dud 'gro yi dwags dang / /lha dang mi dang lha min dang / /rmongs pa'i sems su gyur pa yis/ /'khor ba 'di ru 'khod par
'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po mdor bsdus pa/ /rdo rje can la gnas pa'o/ /lha mo chen mo slar yang bri/ /'gro dang 'ong ba ji ltar 'gyur/ /gnas nas 'di yi sems dag ni/ /
skye ba ji ltar brjod pa yin/ /khu ba ji ltar gzugs su 'gyur/ /skye bo'i skye ba ji ltar yin/ /de yi gzugs kyi skye mal ni/ /khrag las ji ltar 'byung ba lags/ /'byung ba rnams
@#/ /gyi 'byung ba ci/ /de yi skye ba ji ltar lags/ /sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dang ni/ /skye gnas kun la chags pa ni/ /dngos po
rnam pa ji ltar khyab/ /zhi ba'i gzugs ni ji ltar yin/ /thams cad du ni ji ltar skye/ /'di rnams yang dag bshad pa ni/ /lha mo bden par bdag la gsungs/ /ji ltar
de bzhin rdo rje nyon/ /sems can kun gyis bskyed pa dag /'khor bar yang dag bsrubs pa las/ /deng 'dir thabs kyis 'di 'gyur ro/ /thog ma tha ma med dus su//
sems can thams cad yang dag 'byung / /rgya mtsho 'khrugs sogs gting gi bar/ /blo gros chen po bsrubs pa yin/ /de las de dag skye bar 'gyur/ /sa yi khams
dang yang dag ldan/ /me yis mnyam par nges par bsrubs/ /chu dang rlung gis bye brag go /yid kyi de ru rab zhen pa/ /mngal ni bzung zhing blangs pa ste/ /de ni 'khor
bar 'khor bar 'gyur/ /dga' ba mya ngan ldan pa ste/ /de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/ /so sor skye ba smra ba ste/ /de bzhin chos dag zab mo nyid/ /sangs rgyas rnams
kyis sangs rgyas brjod/ /de nyid 'di rnams mnyam bshad pa/ /sum cu pa ste rnyed par dka'/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las/ de kho na nyid kyi man ngag sbyor ba bzhi'i
cha zhes bya ba ste brtag pa bzhi pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sgrub/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/ /phyi dang nang du
yang dag gnas/ /phyi ru ji ltar gsungs pa lags/ /nang du yang ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /nyon cig rdo rje nang gi ni/ /ji bzhin sbyin sreg rab bsgrub bya/ /me chen po dag rab tu sbang //
rnam rtog med pa'i sbyin sreg bya/ /bza' dang btung ba gang yang rung / /de ru thams cad sbyin sreg bya/ /sreg rdzas rang bzhin gsungs pa dag /gzugs phung la sogs lnga po dag /
rnam rtog med pa'i sbyin sreg bya/ /de dag thams cad sems las byung / /khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha /dri chen dri chu lnga po dag /rnam rtog med par bza' bar bya/ /blo ldan rang
bzhin med pas so/ /gti mug nga rgyal de bzhin chags/ /zhe sdang de bzhin 'dod chags nyid/ /phrag dog ser sna phra ma dag /dam tshig de nyid dri ma med/ /ji ltar nyi ma 'bar
ba bzhin/ /de ltar dri ma med par 'gyur/ /ji ltar ston gyi zla gsal ba/ /de ltar 'di yi dbus gsal yin/ /'dod chags chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /rdo rje snang byed sgron ma
bzhi| |de nyid thar par gsungs pa ste/ /bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg 'di la rab gnas na/ /lha rnams dga' bas tshim pa yin/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab
@#/ /gsungs nas/ /rab gnas dag ni brjod par bya/ /sngon gyi rnal 'byor la gnas nas/ /de nas rab gnas bya ba ste/ /rab gnas sku sogs thang ka dang //
rnal 'byor can gyis glegs bam ste/ /dpal ldan g.yon gyis dril bu 'dzin/ /g.yas kyi rdo rje yongs su bzung / /don kun rnal 'byor kun gyis ni/ /mdzes par sku gzugs
mchod par bya/ /sha dang chang dag rab tu bkang / /ro yi steng du yang dag gnas/ /par pa Ti kA shaM ku li/ /mchod pa kun gyis dgyes bar bya/ /me tog spos dang mar me dang / /
dri nyid dang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /glu dbyangs de bzhin gar dag dang / /sgrub pos pa Ta ha sogs te/ /sku la sogs pa 'di rnams la/ /rab gnas chen po bya ba yin/ /ya iM
aM hiM ya i aM/ /dze idz+dza i mA a uM/ /mA a uM mA a d+ha m+mu pA/ /pidz+dza i tsit+ta yaM mu/ /tsiN+Ti dz+dza ai sa e la/ /sat+t+rAt+thu ki ri dz+dza i/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /dbang
rnams kun kyang blang ba ste/ /chos rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gzhi/ /mchod pa kun gyi sprin chen po/ /spro zhing bsdu bar brjod
pa 'o| |nga yis rab gnas bshad pa ni/ /rgyud rnams kun las rnyed par dka'/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi 'i kha sbyor las/ sbyin sreg rab gnas kyi brtag pa ste lnga
pa'o|| ||de nas mdor bsdus rab bshad pa/ /de nyid gtan la dbab pa'i mchog /rtag tu sems ni rnam rtog med/ /rnam rtog bcas pas ci ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar me
ngag rab 'bar ba/ /rtag tu shing rnams tshig par brjod/ /de la tshig pa shing rnams te/ /'di yis tshig par mthong ba yis/ /de yis tshig pa ji bzhin du/ /blo ldan rnam rtog
med pa yis/ /phung po lnga yi shing rnams te/ /de bzhin gzugs kyi phung po nyid/ /rus pa rkang dang bad kan dang / /khrag dang khu ba dri chen dag /mig gnyis de bzhin rna ba
dang | |de bzhin du ni sna nyid dang / /sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag dang / /'byung ba lnga po thams cad la/ /de nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga dag /de yi gnas
ni bye brag tu/ /nga yis bye brag brjod pa ste/ /lte bar gnas pa'i 'khor lo chos/ /'dab ma drug cu bzhi dang ldan/ /shes rab gnas su rab tu gsungs/ /zla ba'i gzugs
bzhin gsal ba ste/ /de yis dpus su gnas pa dang / /me lta bur ni 'bar ba yin/ /me chen de ni 'bar ba ste/ /de yi rtse mo mthong ba ni/ /de yi de ni gzugs mthong
yin| |dngos po thams cad gzugs 'dzin pa/ /blo yi gnas su gsungs shing brjod/ /hUM yig nga ro tshul 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje can ni rtag tu 'byung / /rdo rje 'dzin chen gzugs bzhin no//
@#/ /rlung gi bskyod pa me yin te/ /de yi dbus su rab tu grags/ /gang zhig ri bong can gzugs gsungs/ /shes rab de nyid mdor bsdus so/ /ji ltar
nyi mar rab tu brjod/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'gyur/ /sde tshan brgyad kyis tha ma gsungs/ /thig le dang ni zhabs kyis bcas/ /de nyid nyi ma zhes su gsungs/ /'od
zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ /de yi dbus su yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje can gnas mnyam par 'gyur/ /ji ltar gnyid kyis bzung ba ni/ /cung zad kyang ni mthong ba med/ /gzugs
la sogs pa'i gzung ba dag /langs na rtag tu mthong ba yin/ /de ru thabs ni bsgom pa yis/ /de yi rang bzhin mchog tu grags/ /sems can thogs med bde chen
brjod/ /de ru der gnas dngos po yis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa gsal/ /de phyir de nyid dngos po yis/ /blo ldan sems kyis de nyid gsum/ /sems ni rnam par dag pa
ste| |'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyams par 'gyur/ /sngags pa gar 'dod 'gro ba yin/ /skad cig gis ni gnas par 'gro /'dod chen rnams ni chags par 'gyur/ /drag po rnams
la drag po mtshon/ /zhi ba rnams la zhi ba ste/ /'di ni mdun rgyab rgyal ba rim/ /ji ltar 'di ru pad+ma rim/ /'dod chags skyon gyis gos mi 'gyur/ /sna tshogs bag chags skyon
mi chags/ /khams gsum po ni de bzhin dag /stong pa ma yin mi stong min/ /dbu ma nye bar thob pa'o/ /shes rab pha rol phyin rnal 'byor/ /thabs ni snying rje'i bdag nyid do/ /'di ni
byang chub sems rdo rje/ /sems dang sems byung rang bzhin gyis/ /dngos po med par sgom pa'i dngos/ /de la sogs par brjod pa yin/ /phreng ba med cing bya ba med/ /spungs pa med
par brjod pa ste/ /rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa ni/ /dbu ma'i mchog gi go 'phang ngo / /bla na med pa'i ye shes ni/ /bla med ces ni rim pa med/ /'dis ni 'khor ba rnam par
grol| |phyir mi ldog pa'i go 'phang mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su gsungs/ /de yis rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub/ /skye ba 'di la 'grub pa ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam

'gyur/ /khrag dang khu ba bza' ba ste/ /dri chen dri chu sha dang lnga/ /de yi tshe ni rgyas par 'gro /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/ /ba hU bi ha hUM kA ra ga ti ba hUM bi ha/ rU pa d+hA ri Ni ba hUM

bi d+ha nA nA rany+dzi ha/ ba hU bi ha br-it+ya gI ta t+ya/ /ba hu bi ha dzi ba san+ta t+ya she/ /ShaHni she Sha satwa bi na ya bi diSh+b+han sa ma ra stu bi shud+d+he haHhaHhaHhaHhoH/ a hai sam+ba re sidz+dz+ha ma hUM a ho/ shuM ha hUM re
u pa rU a la la la la hoH/ glu 'di dag ni blangs pa ste/ /brtag pa kun gyi bla na med/ /de yi tshe na rgyas par 'gro /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor
@#/ /las/ de kho na nyid gtan la dbab pa'i brtag pa ste drug pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /de nyid rnal 'byor thams cad ni/ /sbyin dang tshul
khrims de bzhin brtson/ /bsam gtan bzod pa shes rab dang / /stobs dang de bzhin thabs dang ni/ /smon lam ye shes yang dag 'byung / /pha rol phyin pa bcu rdzogs
pa| |byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yi/ /sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/ /tshul khrims gsum gyi ngo bo nyid/ /bsam gtan rnam bzhir gsungs pa ste/ /brtson 'grus
rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur/ /bzod pa rnam pa bcur shes bya/ /shes rab rnam pa drug tu 'gyur/ /stobs ni rnam bcu rab tu gsungs/ /thabs ni rnam pa lngar 'gyur te/ /smon
lam gnyis su shes bya ste/ /ye shes rnam lngar gnas pa 'o/ /chos dang mi 'jigs rdzas dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi po ni/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
ngar 'dzin med cing khengs pa bral/ /bden pa gnyis med gnas pa ni/ /tshul khrims rnam gsum brjed pa ni/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin par gsungs/ /gang gis rnal
'byor ma gnyis dang / /phyi yi rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa ni/ /dri chen dri chu de bzhin sha/ /khrag dang khu bar yang dag 'byung / /'di rnams
brtson 'grus lnga po ni/ /dam tshig sgra yis brjod pa 'o/ /tshig rtsub rdzun dang dag 'khyal dang / /chags sdang zhe sdang phrag dog dang / /nga rgyal khro dang de bzhin dbyen/ /'di bcu rnam
par bshad pa ni/ /rdo rje can ni bzod bcas 'gyur/ /yang dag lta ba yang dag rtog /yang dag ngag dang yang dag las/ /yang dag 'tsho dang yang dag rtsol/ /bdag gis mdo ru bsdus
nas ni/ /shes rab rnam pa drug tu brjod/ /dad pa'i stobs dang dran pa'i stobs/ /ting 'dzin stobs dang shes rab stobs/ /lus kyi stobs dang ngag gi stobs/ /ye shes stobs dang smon
lam stobs/ /brtson 'grus kyi ni stobs rnams te/ /'di rnams stobs ni bcu pa'o/ /ma skyes pa yi dge ba bskyed/ /skyes pa'i mi dge yang dag spong / /mi dge ma skyes
mi bskyed dang / /dge ba skyes pa 'phel ba ste/ /bzhi po thams cad chos rnams kyi/ /dge ba'i chos rnams gsungs pa ni/ /rdzogs par byed pa nyid dag go/ /smon lam rnam
pa gnyis su gnas/ /me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog /bya grub chos dbyings rnam par dag /ye shes rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur/ /'di rnams bcu bzhi po dag ni/ /pha rol phyin pa
mdor bsdus pa/ /bdag gis de nyid brjod pa ste/ /rdor can nyon cig gtan la dbab/ /bcu gnyis mtha' dang rgya yi mtha'/ /mgo nas rkang pa'i mthil bar du/ /de yi dbus su
@#/ /nges 'gyur ba/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/ /rtag tu shar bar 'gyur ba ste/ /'di ru rdo rje can gyis mthong / /lus ngag sems kyis dbus
dag tu/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bar ba 'o/ /steng gi sgo ru rtag gnas pa 'o/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer phreng ba can/ /cung zad lus las mthong ba med/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo'i
gzugs can te/ /de nyid rnal 'byor lam gyis ni/ /rtag pa'i dus su rnam par gnas/ /de yi dbyar gyi dus med cing / /dpyid med ston yang yod ma yin/ /dgun med sos
kyang med pa ru/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom/ /sngags pas seng ge bzhin du spyod/ /sngags dang rgyud la ji ltar gnas/ /nya dang sha ni bza' bar bya/ /chang gi btung ba
mchog yin no/ /bcud kyi len gyi cho ga yis/ /sngags ni brjod par mi bya 'o/ /mtshon cha'i gnas la dus rtag tu/ /mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid mtshon par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis de skad ces gsungs pa la 'khor lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin rnams dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
do|| ||rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// //dpal oD+D+yAn nas nges par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgyal bo chen po dpal in+d+ra b+hU ti'i zhabs kyis bkod cing gsal bar mdzad pa'o//
bod kyi lots+tsha ba la chings yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur te/ slad kyis de nyid kyi tshe paN+Di ta gnyis la 'ang gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ saM pu Ti
nA ma mahA tan+ta/ bod skad du/ yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal
'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nang nas rdo rje snying po la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu de'i tshe rdo rje snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos
phrag pa gcig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ye shes kyi dbang
po rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i gsang ba yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i mtshan nyid mnyan par 'tshal lo/ /e ma'o rdo rje snying po/ legs so/ /legs so/ /
@#/ /snying rje chen po/ legs so/ /legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi phung po/ legs so/ /legs so/ /gang zhig rgyud thams
cad du gsang ba de thams cad 'dod pas zhus shig /de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams rab tu 'dzum zhing mig phye bas phyag
btsal te/ rang gi the tshom yang dang yang du zhus pa/ rgyud ni thams cad ci zhes brjod/ /gleng gzhi yang ni ji ltar lags/ /'di la gsang ba ci zhes gsungs/ /ji ltar
yang dag sbyor byung ming / /de la mtshan nyid ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ rgyud thams cad de ni rgyud thams cad do/ /rgyud thams cad kyi sgras
ni 'dus pa la sogs pa'o/ /de rnams kyi gleng gzhi ni byung bar nges pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / nyan thos dang /
rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o/ /yang dag par sbyor ba ni thabs dang / shes rab kyi bdag nyid can no/ /de las byung ba ni yang dag par
sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i don to/ /'byung ba ni skye ba ste/ /de ltar gnas pa dang / g.yo ba'i dngos bo'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can du gyur pa'o/ /mtshan nyid ces
bya ba ni 'dis mtshon par byed pa'o/ /yang na rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rdo rje sems dpar gsungs so/ /gsang ba
zhes bya ba 'dis ni man ngag can gyi sngags btu ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud/ /de ni nga yis bshad
kyi nyon/ /dang por stong nyid bsams pa ni/ /lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru/ /gzugs kyi khams ni stong pa yi/ /sgra la de nyid kyis ni bya/ /dri yi khams ni stong pa yis/ /ro
la de nyid kyis ni bya/ /reg bya'i khams ni stong pa yi/ /yid la de nyid kyis ni bya/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ mig gi rang bzhin stong pa yi/ /nang du rnam shes ji ltar
lags/ /rna ba'i rang bzhin stong pa yis/ /nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags/ /sna yi rang bzhin stong pa yi/ /nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags/ /lce yi rang bzhin stong pa yi/ /nang
du rnam shes ji ltar lags/ /lus kyi rang bzhin stong pa yi/ /nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags/ /yid kyi rang bzhin stong pa yi/ /dbus su rnam shes ji ltar lags/ /de phyir
gzugs med lta ba med/ /sgra med thos pa po yang med/ /dri med snom pa po yang med/ /ro med myong ba po yang med/ /reg med reg pa po yang med/ /sems med sems
@#/ /las byung ba'ang med/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis med gnyis ni rnam spangs pa'i/ /de nyid lam ni ji bzhin nyon/ /rtog ge
med cing rnam shes med/ /de bzhin rtog ge pas mi rtogs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni/ /nam mkha' lta bur mnyam pa nyid/ /nyan thos rnams kyis mi shes te/ /mi
shes pa yi mun pas bsgribs/ /bag chags sad pa'i ye shes gang / /rang rgyal rnams kyi sprul pa 'o/ /gsang ba sangs rgyas spyod yul nyid/ /de rnams kun gyis mi shes
so| |'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'jigs pa las/ /rgal bar 'gro ba'i sems kyis ni/ /lus kyi dbus su bskor ba yi/ /rgal ba mtshon par gsungs pa ste/ /rnam shes ye
shes sems kyis ni/ /mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi mtshon par byed/ /ye shes kyis ni shes bya blta/ /shes bya rnams kyis 'gro ba brtag /'gro ba brtag pa'i sems kyis
ni| |ji ltar rang 'dod la sogs 'gro/ /'gro bar sngon gyi skye ba ni/ /stong phrag du ma dag tu 'gro/ /yo gis sngar gsungs mtshan nyid kyis/ /mnyam nyid stong par bsams
nas ni/ /lus kyis stong pa'i zhing sogs la/ /blo dang ldan pas sa bon gdab/ /rtsa yi mdzes spyi las byung ba/ /de ni rdul bral rab tu grags/ /dag pa'i shel gyi 'od dang
mnyam/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'od gsal ba/ /ye shes lnga yi dngos de nyid/ /yungs kar gyi ni spom phra tsam/ /de yi nang du gnas pa'i lta/ /mi gsal gsal ba'i rang
bzhin can/ /ma mo phyed pa mchog tu phra/ /thig le'i gzugs ni yid kyi dngos/ /snying gi dbus su rtag gnas shing / /'od zer ldan zhing gzi brjid che/ /bcu gnyis mtha'
dang dgu yi mthar/ /rkang mthil mgo bo med par ni/ /theg pa gcig ni rnam phyung nas/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/ /cha ni lnga pa tsam nyid ni/ /rlung dbang dbyibs
su rgyas pa la/ /de yi cha yang phye nas ni/ /rdo rje'i dbus su rnam phyung ste/ /skye gnas dbus su sa bon gnas/ /chos dbyings khu bar byas nas ni/ /sgo ni dgu po thams cad du//
de ni rim pas 'pho bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin me ni tshangs pa'i dngos/ /sa yi sa bon gnyis kyis ni/ /mig la de nyid sbyar bar bya/ /rlung gi stong sogs sa bon gyi/ /sems kyis sna
dang rna ba sogs/ /bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon lce/ /dbang por gtso bo dbang phyug nyid/ /mgrin par gti mug sa bon te/ /lag par nyon mongs de bzhin no/ /g.yo ba snying gi gnas
rnams su/ /phyugs bdag lte ba'i rtsa bar ni/ /yan lag brgyad kyi sa bon nyid/ /yan lag brgyad kyi cho gas 'dzin/ /brtan sogs g.yo bar bcas pa yi/ /'gro kun khyab par
@#/ /byed pas khyab/ /tshangs sogs lha dang lha min ni/ /de yi gdan du gyur pa yin/ /gang la gtso bor spyod gyur pa'i/ /khyim ni b+ha ga zhes su gsungs/ /ji
srid lus la rnam gnas pa/ /de yi las dang las min 'gyur/ /dge dang mi dge'i gang cung zad/ /byas pa'i las ni thams cad byed/ /rnal 'byor mnyam pa nyid du gsungs//
rab tu sbyor ba sgom pa yin/ /gang tshe las kyi lus bcom pa/ /de ltar lha ru 'gyur ba yin/ /gang gis brtan dang g.yo khyab pa/ /des ni de tshe rang gis nus/ /nam mkha'
lta bur mnyam nyid ni/ /de yi kha dog shes par bya/ /mya ngan 'das gnas dpa' bo ni/ /gos pa med cing dri ma spangs/ /ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang / /bu mo de bzhin gnyen mo
dang | |bram ze mo dang rgyal rigs dang / /rje'u mo de bzhin dmangs mo dang / /gar ma tshos ma g.yung mo dang / /de bzhin du ni gdol pa mo/ /thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis//
de nyid rig pas mchod par bya/ /ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsten par bya/ /ma gsang sbrul dang tshom rkun sogs/ /sa la spyod pa sdug bsngal byed//
rigs kyi dbye bas phye nas ni/ /phyag rgya rnam pa lngar ni gsungs/ /bram ze skye gnyis rigs skyes ma/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gsungs/ /rgyal rigs ma ni rgyal po'i rus//
rma bya zla sogs rigs las skyes/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes byar grags/ /rje'u mo ba glang skyong ba ste/ /las kyi rigs las skyes par gsungs/ /dmangs mo yang ni bran mo ste/ /rnam par
snang mdzad chen por gsungs/ /gar ma pad+ma'i rigs nyid de/ /chos ma de bzhin las kyi rigs/ /g.yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/ /rin chen gdol pa mor shes bya/ /
phyag rgya lngar ni rnam par nges/ /'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya/ /dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing / /de bzhin slar
yang gshegs pa nyid/ /'dis ni shes rab rigs pas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs par mngon par brjod/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru gsungs/ /rigs ni brgya dang mtha' yas
dang | |sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /phyi nas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /rigs dang 'byung ba lnga rnams dang / /phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /rdo rje rin chen pad nor bu/ /
'dzin pa'i rim pa'i rigs rnams so/ /sgom pa po med bsgom bya med/ /sngags med lha yang yod ma yin/ /spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /sngags dang lhar ni yang dag
gnas/ /rnam snang mi bskyod don yod dang / /rin chen dpag med sems dpa' 'o/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang / /thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid brjod/ /tshangs pa sgrib bral
@#/ /sangs rgyas nyid/ /'jug phyir khyab 'jug brjod par bya/ /zhi brtag tu dge ba ste/ /thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas/ /dam ba'i bde bas de nyid
de| |dga' ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas/ /gang phyir lus las byung ba'i phyir/ /lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya/ /'di la b+ha ga mnga' ba'i phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das
zhes brjod par bya/ /b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod/ /dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun/ /yang na nyon mongs la sogs pa/ /'joms pa'i phyir ni bcom ldan 'das/ /gang
phyir skye 'gro bskyed pa'i phyir/ /shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya/ /gang phyir skal ba ston pa'i phyir/ /shes rab de nyid sring mo nyid/ /shes rab tshos mar brjod pa ni/ /
sems can thams cad 'tshed ba'i phyir/ /btso blag ma zhes de bzhin brjod/ /yon tan 'jo bar gsungs pa'i phyir/ /shes rab bu mor brjod par bya/ /snying rje chen pos
g.yo ba'i phyir/ /shes rab gar mar brjod par bya/ /gang phyir bcom ldan mi reg pa/ /de phyir g.yung mor brjod par bya/ /A li kA li rab smras pas/ /bzlas pa smra par
yang dag bshad/ /rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor yin/ /nyid phyir dkyil 'khor brjod par bya/ /lag pa sgyur ba phyag rgya yin/ /sor mo nyed pa'ang de bzhin no/ /gang phyir
rnam sems bsam gtan ni/ /gang sems de ni bsam gtan no/ /pha las bde ba gang thob pa/ /de yi bde ba rang gis bza'/ /bde ba gang gis 'ching ba 'dir/ /de yi bde ba
bsam gtan brjod/ /brjod par bya ba dang / rjod par byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i sgom pa'i de kho na'i rab tu byed pa ste dang po'o// //de nas
byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bshad par bya'o/ /nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gnyis ka'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhang gnas pa'i phyir yang
dag par rab tu shes te/ ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o/ /nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi
nang gnyis ka'i tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes te/ ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su gyur ba'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran
pa dang ldan pa'o/ /nang gi chos rnams dang / phyi'i chos rnams dang / phyi nang gnyis ka'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu
shes te/ ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su gyur ba'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o/ /nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang
@#/ /gnyis ka'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes te/ ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su gyur pa'i
'dul ba'i sems can la dran pa dang ldan pa'o/ /'di rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'o/ /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed
do| |'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'jug go /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad
do| |brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'jug go/ /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson
'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'jug go /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /de ltar dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba'i phyir thabs tshad med pa bsgoms pas
yongs su gang ba'i phyir yongs su gang bar gyur pas sgom pa dam pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsam mo/ /sems rab tu 'jug go/
smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /'di rnams ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi'o/ /'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya
ste| bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / /'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / rnam par byang bar gyur bas bdag gi
'dun pa nub par 'gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/ bye brag
phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / rnam par byang bar gyur pas bdag gi brtson 'grus
nub par 'gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o/ /dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/ bye brag phyed
pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / rnam par byang bar gyur pas bdag gi dpyod pa
nub par 'gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o/ /sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/ bye brag phyed pas
nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / rnam par byang pas nges par 'byung bas bdag gi sems
@#/ /nub par 'gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o/ /'di rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/ /'dod par spyod pa dang bcas pa'o/ /'jig rten
pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la dad par byed de/ rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa la so sor yid ches par gyur pa gang zhig de ltar las byed par 'gyur ba dge ba'am/ sdig pa
de dang de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de ni 'tsho ba'i rgyur yang sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa'o/ /'di ni dad pa'i dbang
por gsungs so/ /gang zhig chos rnam la dad pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jog par byed pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos shes par byed do/ /'di ni brtson
'grus kyi dbang por gsungs so/ /gang zhig chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos shes pa'i chos rnams ni dran pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jog par byed do/ /'di ni
dran pa'i dbang por gsungs so/ /gang zhig chos rnams la dran pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jig par mi byed pa de'i chos rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu
byed pa'o/ /'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang por gsungs so/ /gang zhig chos rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed pa de'i chos rnams ni shes rab kyi dbang
bos so sor rig pa ste/ de ni chos de dang de rnams la so sor rtog pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni shes rab kyi dbang por gsungs so/ /dbang po lnga po 'di rnams 'phel ba ni stobs
lnga ru 'gyur te/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te/ 'di rnams ni stobs
lnga'o| |de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi
yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang
ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral
bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ chos rab tu 'byed pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sogs pa
sgom pa'o/ /de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba ni gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ bdag tu lta bas kun nas bslang ba
@#/ /ma yin pa dang / sems can med pa dang / 'tsho ba med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / skyes bu med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / shed las
skyes med pa dang / shed bu med pa dang / byed pa po med pa dang / tshor ba po med pa'i lta bas kun nas bslang ba chad pa ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta bas kun nas bslang
ba ma yin pa dang / sring pa dang bral ba'i lta bas kun nas bslang ba dang / rigs su lung bstan pa'i lta bas kun nas bslang ba dang / ji srid 'khor ba ma yin zhing mya
ngan las 'das pa yang yin pa'i lta bas kun bslang ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i lta bar gsungs so/ /gang zhig yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
gti mug dang / nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang ba'i rtog pa de ni yang dag pa'i rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhig tshul khrims dang / ting nge
'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung pos kun nas slong pa de'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa de ni yang dag pa'i
rtog par 'gyur te/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtog par gsungs so/ /gang zhig tshig gis bdag la gdung par mi bya zhing gzhan la gdung bar mi bya ba dang / bdag la nyon mongs par mi bya
zhing gzhan dag nyon mongs par mi bya ba dang / bdag la mi dpya zhing gzhan dag la'ang dpya bar mi bya ba ste/ de mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldan pas tshig dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / gang zhig tshig
gis yang dag pa'i 'phags par 'jug par 'gyur ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces gsungs so/ /gang zhig las nag po dang / nag po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las
mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / gang zhig las dkar ba dang / dkar po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang / gang zhig las dkar po dang / nag po'i
rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / gang zhig las dkar po dang / nag po dang / dkar po'i rnam par smin pa dang / nag po zad pa'i bsam pas gnas pa
de'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ dam pa'i las lta bur 'gyur ba ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mthar gsungs so/ /gang gi tshe 'phags pa lta
bur dul ba dang / yon tan yang dag pa'i chas zhum zhing dul ba dang / kha gsag med pa dang / mang du smra ba ma yin pa dang / gtam la mi dga' ba dang / rang gi spyod pa'i tshul
khrims dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang / bdag gi rnyed pa kha na ma tho ba med pas bdag chog par 'dzin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bka' gnang bas 'tsho ba
@#/ /ste| 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho bar gsungs so/ /rtsol ba ni gang zhig rdzun dang / 'phags pas ma gnang pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
mug dang / nyon mongs ba rjes su sten par mi 'dod pa ni rtsol ba ste/ rtsol ba gang zhig yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyi bden par 'jug cing mya ngan las 'das par
'gro ba dang / so so'i gnas su skyed par byed pa de ni rtsol pa yang dag par rjes su 'brang ba ste/ /'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol bar gsungs so/ /gang la nye bar gnas pa de ni
rab tu mi g.yo ba dang / lus drang pos kyog po ma yin pa dang / 'khor ba'i skyon sna tshogs la sogs pa dbang du byed pa ston cing / mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas 'dod pa'i
dran pa ni mi brjed pa/ 'di ni 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor ba'o/ /'di ni yang dag pa'i dran par gsungs so/ /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gang la
gnas nas sems can thams cad rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par gnas te/ mya ngan las 'das pa mnan ba'o/ /'dis ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes gsungs so//
de nyid yang dag bshad pa ni/ /dga' ba la sogs sa rnams te/ /dbang po la sogs rang bzhin gyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas/ /phung po la sogs khyad
par gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gnas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni mchog tu 'bab/ /byang sems sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis/ /gang tshe
'dir ni gang gyur pa/ /dbang po phung po 'byung ba yi/ /sangs rgyas de yi de ma thag /rang lus nyid la sangs rgyas nyid/ /gzhan ni gang du'ang mi gnas so/ /lus las gzhan du sangs
rgyas nyid/ /mi shes pa yis bsgribs par brjod| /ye shes chen po rang lus gnas/ /rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/ /dngos po kun la khyab pa po/ /lus gnas lus la
ma skyes pa'o/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ lus la rtsa du lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'khor lo bzhi yi rab dbye bas/ /brgya phrag gcig dang nyi shu lhag/
byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /rtsa rnams sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog /gsungs pa/ 'di lta ste/ mi byed ma zhes brjod pa dang / phra gzugs ma dang / rtse ba ma dang / g.yon
pa ma dang / thung du ma dang / rus spal skyes ma dang / sgom pa ma dang / dbang ma dang / skyon ma dang / 'jug ma dang / ma mo dang / mtshan mo dang / bsil sbyin ma dang / tsha ba ma
dang | rkyang ma dang / ro ma dang / kun 'dar ma dang / 'bab ma dang / rangs ma dang / mdog ma dang / gzugs can ma dang / spyi ma dang / rgyu sbyin ma dang / sbyor bral ma dang / sdu gu ma
@#/ /dang | grub ma dang / 'tshed ma dang / de bzhin du yid bzang ma dang / sum skor ma dang / 'dod ma dang / khyim ma dang / gtum mo dang / bdud dral
ma'o| |bcom ldan 'das/ rtsa 'di dag ji lta bu lags/ srid gsum yongs su gyur pa ste/ gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag
pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa'i mthar thug pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'grel ba byang chub kyi sems 'jug pa zhes bya ba ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// //de nas
bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas nas phyag btsal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gsang ba'i ye shes bla na med/ /snying po bcom
ldan bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ rgyud thams cad kyi snying po ye shes
mar me rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rgyud thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i mchog ni dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag
nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /brtan pa rtag pa mchog tu yang / /
yid srub so sor skyes pa nyid/ /rtag tu rang bzhin mnan dka' ba/ /sna tshogs las kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /sna tshogs cho ga 'dod pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs
rnams/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul bar brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun sogs brtan dang g.yo/ /thams cad dngos po srid pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha'
'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/ /'dis ni sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /thams cad las ni sna tshogs mchog /sangs rgyas sogs pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ /dngos grub sems can kun don
mchog /rang gi ngo bos yang bsgyur bas/ /bud med sgyu ma thams cad 'grub/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes kla klo'i skad/ /De bai hA ya sar 'gro bar//
skad dbyings 'di ni rnam par brtag /nam mkha' kun tu spyod 'grub pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /kun nas sna tshogs phyag rgya ste/ /kun las sna tshogs
sdom pa 'o/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ /pad+ma de bzhin pad+ma 'dzin/ /nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid/ /'di rnams kyi ni rigs rnams yin/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
@#/ /cad zil gyis gnon pa rdul dang bral ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di bka' stsal pa/
stong min stong pa min pa'ang min/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /thabs ni snying rje'i bdag nyid de/ /de nas mdzes pa'i snying
rje thabs/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba/ /rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la/ /dngos po med cing sgom pa'ang med/ /rnam rtog med pas rtag mos pas/ /brtag
pa kun gyis brtag par bya/ /rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la/ /sems can don ni yongs su brtag /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag chos/ /chos can med cing
chos nyid med/ /sgra brnyan lta bur mnyam pa nyid/ /de nas 'di ni chos dag 'byung / /de nas theg pa chen po las byung ba'i sgom pas yon tan rgyas pa rnams kyis dus
gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis yang dag par bstod pa/ rnal 'byor gyi bdag po sems can grol bar mdzad pa la bsod
cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can bdag nyid skyes pa gcig par mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i gti mug gcod par mdzad pa la
bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /de kho na thams cad kyi ye shes gcig tu ston bar mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshal te/ bdag rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang mchod pa byas
nas phyag btsal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /chos rnams thams cad gcig pa'i sku'i/ /snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
dbang po gang dang gang lam nyid/ /de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor gyis/ /rtag par shin tu mnyam gzhag nyid/ /gang phyir thams cad
bdag nyid kyi/ /rnam shes phung por gnas pa ni/ /skyes bu tha mal sems rmongs pa/ /la las so sor rtog mi nus/ /sems dang sems byung sems kyi dngos/ /ye shes
shes bya rang bzhin can/ /'bras bu rnams la byed pa nyid/ /chos dang chos can sgom pa nyid/ /gang phyir chos ni du mas ni/ /chu bo'i rgyun ni rgya mtsho ltar/ /thar pa nyid ni gcig
pu yin/ /mang po dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar nang du rnam gnas pa/ /bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed par 'gyur/ /de kho na nyid mdor bstan pa ste/ rab tu byed pa gsum
pa'o|| ||de nas rgyud rnams thams cad du/ /gtan la phab pa rab bshad bya/ /sems can kun la mnyam pa'i phyir/ /gru gsum rgya che'i gzugs can nyid/ /
@#/ /tshangs sogs lha dang lha min bcas/ /de rnams kyi ni gnas su 'gyur/ /de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin/ /kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs can ma//
de nyid yul las rnam par 'das/ /srog chags kun gyi snying la gnas/ /de phyir de rgyas ci zhig bya/ /mdor bsdus pas ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med pas//
ji ltar sangs rgyas gang thob pa/ /gang gis dam pa'i bde bas khyod/ /skye ba 'dir ni thob par 'gyur/ /yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ /yang na rdo rje 'khor los bsgyur ba'am/ /'dis ni dngos grub
chen po brgyad/ /gzhan yang yid la 'dod pa yang / /gti mug chags sdang nga rgyal dang / /phrag dog dang ni nyon mongs lngas/ /sems can so sor bcings pa gang / /rang gi
yan lag nyid kyis 'joms/ /'dis ni 'gro drug sems can bcings/ /'khor bar 'khor zhing skye ba nyid/ /nyon mongs pas ni rmongs gyur pas/ /sdig pa du ma byed par
'gyur/ /de phyir 'di bcom cang mkhyen nyid/ /sangs rgyas kyis sprul rigs pas ni/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba yi/ /spyor bral sdug bsngal mthong nas ni/ /thabs dang
shes rab sprul pa'i rgyus/ /nyon mongs rnams ni yid ces 'gyur/ /mtshon pa 'di ni 'bras bur gyur/ /khams gsum du ni dri med snang / /gang dang gang gis gnas gyur
pa| /de ni de yi do bo can/ /bud shing bsregs pa'i rigs pas ni/ /dgyes pa'i rgyal ba gar mkhan mchog /phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ /'di nyid rnam dag mtshon pa 'di/ /
ji ltar dgra bo nus pa la/ /dgra po nus pas de bsnun pa/ /gti mug dag pas gti mug ste/ /zhe sdang dag pas zhe sdang nyid/ /'dod chags dag pas 'dod chags te/ /nga
rgyal rnam dag nga rgyal che/ /phrag dog dag pas phrag dog snyed/ /thams cad rnam dag rdor 'dzin mgon/ /de yi ngo bo rnam dag pa/ /nyon mongs lnga ni mnyam par 'gyur/ /de
ltar rigs ni lnga rnams dang / /ye shes lnga dang sangs rgyas lnga/ /'di las rdo rje snying po dang / /khro bo khams gsum sems can skye/ /nang gi dbye ba 'di nyid ni/ /bla ma'i
zhal las rnyed par 'gyur/ /bla ma dman pa'i sems can rnams/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rnyed mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig shin tu gsal ba ni/ /'dzam gling de 'dir sangs rgyas
bsngags/ /gru gsum dag pa e yi dbyibs/ /dbus su dgyes pa'i e baM yin/ /gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar/ /rdo rje ra li rnam par byung / /btsun mo'i b+ha ga
zhes kyang bya/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes byar bshad/ /de yi nang song pad+ma ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa snying por bcas/ /de la A li kA li 'dres/ /sde tshan brgyad ni rnam par
@#/ /gnas/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis lus can kyi/ /las kyi tshogs ni byed par 'gyur/ /yi ge rnams ni lnga bcu nyid/ /rig byed rnams la nye
bar gnas/ /sngags rnams nyid dang rgyud rnams dang / /phyi rol tshul gyis bstan bcos kyi/ /rdo rje snying po'i rang bzhin 'di/ /gzhan du 'ang las cung zad med/ /a
ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha/ /sde tshan dga' ba lnga bcu yang / /mnyam pa dag tu sprul pa rnams/ /rdo rje ra li pad+ma son/ /'dab ma brgyad po phyogs rnams dang / /mtshams rnams
su ni 'di rnams rigs/ /de rnams dbus su ze 'bru la/ /dam pa'i dbang phyug ma yod de/ /sde tshan brgyad po rnams kyis ni/ /yi ge dam pa yongs su bskor/ /a ni yig
'bru kun gyi mchog /don chen sde tshan gtso po ni/ /lus can rnams kyi sngags kun ni/ /de nyid las ni yang dag 'byung / /gang zhig ral gri mig sman dang / /rkang byug
ril bu rkang 'og dang / /gnod sbyin mo yi yan lag ma/ /'jig rten gsum gyi khongs su rgyu/ /dngul chu'i 'gro bas rjes su 'brang / /gang zhig thams cad mthu che ba//
rang gi khyim du lnga bcu 'dod pa dang ldan par 'grub bo/ /de ni sde tshan brgyad nang son/ /dbyangs mchog sde tshan bdag nyid 'byin/ /skye bo rnams kyi tshig rgyas pa/ /
gang zhig cung zad rtogs bya pa/ /de kun sngags kyi gzugs kyis ni/ /de phyir rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /lus can rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /sgra ni sngags zhes brjod par bya/ /
sna tshogs mdud pa'i gnas chen las/ /chos kyi ra li rnam par 'byung / /dngos grub rdzu 'phrul rnam gnas pa'i/ /sngags dang nges pa gang yang med/ /rang bzhin gyis ni ma
skyes pa'i/ /sngags kyis yig 'bru dbang phyug mchog /yang dag sbyor 'byung mtshan nyid ni/ /de nas mchog tu rab bshad bya/ /e ni sa ru shes par bya/ /las kyi phyag rgya
spyan ma nyid/ /snying rje chen mo thabs chen mo/ /rang bzhin sna tshogs spyod yul ma/ /lte bar sna tshogs 'dam skyes la/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lor rnam par gnas/ /baM ni chu ru
shes par bya/ /chos kyi phyag rgya mA ma kI /byams pa dang ni smon lam tshul/ /lha mo rdo rje'i rigs gtso ma/ /snying gar chu skyes 'dab brgyad la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yang
dag gnas/ /ma ni me ru brjod pa ste/ /phyag rgya chen mo gos dkar mo/ /dga' dang stobs kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /lha mo pad+ma'i rigs byung ma/ /lkog ma chu skyes 'dab brgyad
gnyis/ /longs spyod 'khor lor yang dag gnas/ /yA ni rlung gi rang bzhin te/ /nyon mongs thams cad rab 'joms byed/ /dam tshig phyag rgya chen mor nges/ /lha mo las kyi
@#/ /rigs gtso ma/ /btang snyoms ye shes rnal 'byor gyis/ /sgrol ma 'khor ba sgrol ba mo/ /'dam skyes 'dab ma sum cu gnyis/ /bde chen 'khor lo
chen por gnas/ /es ni shes rab brjod par bya/ /baM ni thabs dang ldan pa nyid/ /baM gyis rnam par brgyan ma nyid/ /e ni nges par mdzes par 'gyur/ /thabs dang
shes rab rang bzhin gyis/ /steng dang 'og tu snyoms par 'jug /e nyid dang ni baM nyid dag /gnyis gnyis su ni brjod pa nyid/ /'di skad ces bya ba'i tshig gi phrad ni de
skad ces gsungs nas zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i rgyud kyi tshogs la bsnyegs so zhes brjod do/ /bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni de skad du 'dod chags chen po 'di la
rtag tu gnas pa'o/ /shru zhes bya ba ni 'dzag bar gsungs so/ /ta zhes bya ba ni gang yang bde ba chen po'i mgon po'o/ /bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis
thos pa'i phyir rna ba'i ye shes kyi thos pa yin gyi/ rtogs pa ni ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /mi rtogs pa'i skyon gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| sdud par byed pa dang / 'chad pa bo dag dbyer med par 'gyur ro/ /yang na rtogs pa nyid ni gdul bya'i skye bo'i dbang du byas nas 'chang pa po nyid sdud par byed pa
yin te/ 'chang pa po nga chos kyang pa/ /rang gi tshogs ldan nyan po nga / /de dag ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ /gang du bde ba chen po'i mgon po gar mdzad pa'i tshe/ gcig nyid gcig
dang /du ma'i ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gis rol par mdzad pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang cung zad gsungs pa de bdag gis gcig na zhes bya ba ni dus gcig
nyid la'o/ /gcig na zhes bya ba ni skad cig gcig la'o/ /thos pa zhes bya ba ni lhag par son pa ste/ 'dis bsam gyis mi khyab lhag par mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed do zhes bya bar bsnyegs
so| |dus zhes bya ba ni dus tshod ces gsungs so/ /dus ni rnam pa gsum du brjod/ /bde ba'i dus dang sdug bsngal dus/ /bsam gyis mi khyab dus nyid do/ /'o ma'i rgyun ltar sna
bug tu/ /'ong ba bde ba'i dus su gsungs/ /me yi gzugs kyis 'gro ba nyid/ /sdug bsngal dus dang de gcig grags/ /gcig ni lhan cig med pa yin/ /dus ni bsam
gyis mi khyab 'gyur/ /'dod chags med cing chags bral med/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la 'dod chags nus mtshan nyid/ /'dod chags bral ba 'gog
par gsungs/ /'di bral dbu mar mi rtog pas/ /'di gsum dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dod chags nyid dang chags bral nyid/ /'dres par gyur par rnyog pa med/ /de
@#/ /bzhin 'dod chags chags bral las/ /ro mnyam gcig pu'i skad cig ma/ /dngos po kun gyi ro mnyam pa/ /sgom pa'i dus ni gcig tu gsungs/ /
'di lta ste/ dbang phyug dang / gzugs dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang / ye shes dang / brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste/ b+ha ga drug ces gsungs so/ /de 'di la
mnga' ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so/ /yang na gang zhig mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos de rnams bcom pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnams dang / de rnams nyid kyi snying po dang / de nyid kyi rdo rje dang / de nyid kyi btsun mo dang / de'i b+ha ga de la bzhugs so/ /kye bcom
ldan 'das/ bzhugs so zhes bya bas ci gsungs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ro gcig pa thabs sna
tshogs kyis 'dul ba'i skye bo'i yid 'phrog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje'i
rang bzhin gang gis chos kyi 'byung gnas la/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de'i tshe bdag gis thos pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab gang gis nyon mongs pa
dang | nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'dzoms pa de'i phyir shes rab b+ha gar gsungs te/ b+ha ga der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang btsun mo lhan cig tu bzhugs so/ /e ma
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /kun mkhyen ye shes bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde don gang / /btsun mo nye bar mdzad pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di skad bdag gis thos
pa zhes bya ba'i yig 'bru ni chos kyi thog mar rtag tu yang dag par gnas pa ste/ dag pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngos grub skyed par byed pa'o/ /lag na
rdo rjes ma bshad pa de ngas khyod la bshad do/ /tshig 'bru 'di rnams kyis sems can rnams 'khor ba las pha rol tu shin tu ring bar 'gro ba mngon du mtshon par mdzad
pa dang / mngon du ma mdzad pa de nub pa'i sems kyi skye ba 'dir sangs rgyas nyid dam/ rdo rje sems dpa' thob par 'gyur te/ gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas
ma thob pa de ni bde bar gshegs pa ste sangs rgyas yin no/ /mtshan gzhi mtshon par byed pa ni sems dpar yang dag par gsungs te/ sdang bas bstan pa tsam gyis
mnar med par rab tu ltung bar 'gyur ngas na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis ro spangs bar bya'o/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi srid pa'i 'jigs pa las 'das
@#/ /pa'i sgrub pa po dpal dang ldan pas dag pa'i sems sgom par byed na/ /thabs dang / shes rab kyi sbyor ba 'dis ji ltar yang dag pa thob pa
dag pa'i yang dag par rig pa'i bdag nyid can gyi mtshan gzhi thabs dang / shes rab kyi nus pas nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing gnas gsum du snang ba ste/ de'i mtshan gzhi
ni mtshon par dka' ba dang / /thams cad du son zhing rgyu dang / rkyen spangs pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bur 'jig rten gyi rang dang / gzhan gyi don byed de/ dngos grub thams
cad kyi mchog go /rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi gsang ba dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i brtag pa'i rgyal po ste dang po rdzogs so// //de nas
yang dag rab bshad bya/ /sgrub pa po la phan don du/ /gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i/ /cho ga yang ni bshad par bya/ /dang por lha yi bdag nyid kyi/ /rnal 'byor
pas ni nor 'dzin sbyangs/ /'bad pas hUM las rdo rje can/ /byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri/ /tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i khyim dang yang //
khang stong dang ni khyim nang du/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs par bya/ /rdul tshon dam pa nyid dang ni/ /yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te/ /rin chen lnga yi bdag nyid phyes//
yang na 'bras la sogs pas bri/ /dkyil 'khor khru gsum bya ba dang / /mthe bong gsum yang lhag par bya/ /der ni rigs lnga las byung ba'i/ /rig ma bzang po gzhug
par bya/ /sngags kyi lam gyi rjes btsal bas/ /gang tshe mkhas pas dbang bskur ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum du/ /dkyil 'khor bde bar gshegs gnas su//
'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas bdag /blo dang ldan pas de bzhin blang / /rang byin brlab pa'i gnas thob pas/ /dam tshig nyams pas 'jigs pa yis/ /rdzogs sangs
rgyas kyis don dam las/ /sngags kyi lam ni de bzhin gsungs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i/ /dam tshig rim pa shin tu ring / /de phyir don kun la 'bad pas/ /
dbang don rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes/ /rdo rje slob dpon yon tan mtsho/ /ji bzhin sbyor bas gsol ba gdab/ /yang na ma dang sring bu mo/ /bu sring mo yi bu mo nyid/ /'di
nang gang de ji lta bar/ /rnyed nas sgrub pa nyid du gyis/ /yang na mngon du 'di med na/ /kun gyis bsngags pa'i rig ma ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis khyad mdzad pa/ /de ni de phyir
gzung bar bya/ /skye ba gnyis kyi bu mo dang / /yang na btso blag ma dang / yang na gdol pa mo dang / g.yung mo dang / rigs las skyes ma dang / yang na rgyal mo dang / gar mkhan gyi
@#/ /bu mo dang / bzo mo dang / yang na ri dwags kyi mig ma dang / rked pa phra ba dang / ro smad rgyas pa dang / nu ma mtho ba dang / b+ha ga bzang ba dang / dam
tshig gi spyod pa la shin tu dam pa dang / de kho na la gnas pa dang / sngags dang / rgyud shes pa ste/ sgrub pa po'i dbang po la gnas gsum du che ba'i bu mo 'di dag bshad
do| |rigs kyi rim pa nyid kyis 'di rnams kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ma rnyed ji ltar gang rnyed de/ /de bzhin bcu drug lon pa nyid/ /dang po'i lang tsho phun
sum tshogs/ /mig mdzes phyag rgya rnyed nas ni/ /rig ma de nyid blangs nas ni/ /skyabs su 'gro ba'i rim pas ni/ /sbyangs nas de nyid gsang ba dang / /sngags dang rgyud kyi rim
kun bsgrags/ /sgra'am 'og gi lam du lces/ /de nyid de bzhin steng du gzhug /kun gyi cha rig sna tshogs byed/ /rim pa nyid kyis rna cha dang / /ska rags che dang se mo do/ /
lag gdub dang ni rkang gdub ldan/ /de ltar dngos grub dam pa ster/ /gang zhig sbyangs pa'i rig ma kun/ /nye bar 'tshe ba med gnas su/ /rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor mang
po| |de nas tsan+dan gos phreng sogs/ /rnam par brgyan nas dbul bar bya/ /dri dang phreng sogs rim gro yis/ /'o ma'i mchog sogs rgyas pas ni/ /phyag rgya thabs gcig
sgrub pa pos/ /gus par 'bad pas yang dag mchod/ /slob mas pus mo'i lha nga ni/ /sa la dad bas btsugs nas ni/ /thal mo sbyar nas bstod pa 'dis/ /ston pa la ni zhu ba bya//
stong pa'i snying po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshogs/ /ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'gro ba'i mi shes
gcod pa can/ /dag pa'i de nyid don ston mdzad/ /bdag med chos las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems/ /pha
rol phyin pa'i yon tan rnams/ /mgon po las ni rtag tu byung / /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dkon mchog gsum dang theg chen dang / /de bzhin bstan dang 'gro ba
dang | |khams gsum po ni 'di dag kun/ /'gro ba'i dpa' bo phyag 'tshal bstod/ /yid bzhin nor bu ltar gyur pa'i/ /'gro ba'i 'dod pa'i don grub phyir/ /dpal ldan bde
gshegs bka' bzhin mdzad/ /sangs rgyas sras po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nyid bla med bdag 'tshal bas/ /yon tan mtsho khyod bka' drin las/ /kun mkhyen rdo rje
dbang gis ni/ /da lta nyid du bka' drin skyobs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni/ /ji ltar dpal thugs rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje chos can la gsungs pa/ /de bzhin mgon pos
@#/ /bdag grub mdzod/ /bcom ldan zhabs pad spangs nas ni/ /gzhan du bdag la 'gro ma mchis/ /'khor ba'i 'gro las nges rgyal bar/ /de phyir
mgon pos thugs rje mdzod/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon dpal/ /rjes su brtse bcas phan sems kyis/ /slob la snying rje bskyed nas ni/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dgug pa
dang | |'dod yon lnga yis gang ba dang / /bla res bres pas nye bar 'bar/ /rnal 'byor ma dang sbyor ldan zhing / /dril bu sil sil sgra dang ni/ /me tog bdug 'khyil nyams
dga' ba/ /lha yi dri phreng bde ba'i mchog /dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs lha'i/ /dkyil 'khor mchog tu ngo mtshar bar/ /slob dpon skal ba bzang po mchog /de nas
