phyag rgya sbyor byas nas/ /rgyal ba'i bdag skyes byang chub sems/ /pad+ma'i snod du gzhug par bya/ /rnga yab g.yob cing gdugs dang ni/ /bkra shis tshigs bcad glu rnams
kyis| |phyag rgya ldan pas slob ma de/ /'gro ba'i gtso bos dbang bskur bya/ /slob dpon mchog gi dbang phyug gis/ /dbang ni rin chen mchog byin nas/ /bzang po'i rang
bzhin legs sbyangs pa'i/ /dam tshig yid 'ong nges par sbyin/ /khrag chen dang ni ga bur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar po sbyar ba dang / /rigs kyi bdag po'i chu ldan zhing / /lnga pa
sems las yang dag byung / /'di rnams dam tshig yang dag par/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis nye bar gsungs/ /bzang po rtag tu bskyang bar gyis/ /sdom pa yang ni da ltar nyan//
srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing / /bud med rin chen yongs mi spang / /des ni slob dpon spang mi bya/ /sdom pa shin tu 'da' bar dka'/ /gong du gsungs pa'i rig ma'am//
yang na bdag gi rnal 'byor ma/ /dag cing sprul pa'i rig ma ni/ /sih+la ga pur bsgos pa ni/ /ji srid khu ba ldan gyur pa/ /de srid phyag rgya bsten par bya/ /phyag rgya'i gdong yang
bcing ba dang / /thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin te/ /bsten pas yang dag gang byung ba/ /slob ma'i kha ru btung bar bya/ /ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid/ /de nyid la ni bya bar
bshad/ /rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur/ /rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs/ /mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid/ /dngos dang dngos min bdag nyid mchog /thabs
dang shes rab rnam par 'dres/ /'dod chags 'dod chags bral bas 'dres/ /de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog /de nyid yi ge dam pa nyid/ /de nyid 'di ni kun khyab byed/ /de nyid
sangs rgyas ye shes can/ /he ru ka dpal zhes byar brjod/ /gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams dang / /dngos dang dngos med de las byung / /dga' ba dang po dpa' bo ste//
@#/ /mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma/ /shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges/ /de bde thabs las thams cad rig /dang po dga' ba tsam nyid de/ /mchog
tu dga' ba gnyis pa'i grangs/ /gsum pa dga' bral dga' bar bshad/ /bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod/ /de yang dbang ni rnam par bzhi/ /dang po la ni bum pa'i
dbang / /gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang / /gsum pa shes rab ye shes te/ /bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no/ /byang chub sems kyi dbang gis ni/ /slob ma sdig pa bral
ba yin/ /sangs rgyas grong khyer mchog sngon du/ /de nas de la gnang ba sbyin/ /byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/ /phyogs kun tu ni 'khor lo ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla na
med| |kun tu mchog tu rab tu bskor/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin bdag /yid bzhin nor bu ltar mthong bas/ /sbyor med bral zhing ma zhum pas/ /sems can
don ni da ltar gyis/ /dbang dang bka' gnang thob nas ni/ /bya ba byas pas rab 'dzum zhing / /'gro ba dga' bar byed pa yi/ /shin tu snyan pa'i tshig 'di brjod/ /deng bdag
skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /bdag gi 'tsho ba 'bras bur bcas/ /de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /nga ni sangs rgyas rigs su 'gyur/ /bskal pa rgya mtshor 'jigs chen
por| |mnar med skye ba yang dag 'khrugs/ /nyon mongs 'dam ni brgal dka' las/ /bdag ni mgon po khyod kyis bsgral/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin las/ /theg pa
rdzogs pa lta bur bdag /bag chags thams cad bral bas na/ /bdag la byang chub 'tshal ma mchis/ /rangs shing mig ni phye ba yis/ /zhabs la 'jus nas gus bar
bya| |gang dang gang zhig sdug pa'i rdzas/ /re ba med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /de dang de nyid dbul bar bya/ /bla ma'ang snying rje ldan pas ni/ /slob ma bsdu ba'i bsam pa'i phyir//
de la phan pa'i bsam pas bzung / /de nas phyag 'tshal mchod nas ni/ /bla ma la ni yon rnams dbul/ /gser ni stong phrag brgya dang ni/ /rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs
dang | |gos ni zung 'gyur brgya nyid dang / /glang po rta dang yul 'khor nyid/ /rna cha dang ni rkang gdub dang / /nor bu dang ni sor gdub mchog /gser las byas pa'i mchod
phyir thogs/ /rang gi chung ma bu mo dang / /bran pho bran mo sring mo nyid/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni dbul bar bya/ /bdag gi dngos po thams cad kyis/ /blo dang ldan pas bla mar
dbul/ /de ring tshun chad bdag bran du/ /khyod la bdag ni 'bul lags zhes/ /de ltar zhu ba byas gyur pas/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas thob nas/ /da ni sangs rgyas
@#/ /thams cad kyis/ /bdag la bka' drin legs par skyobs/ /ji ltar bla med byang chub de/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag gis bsgrubs/ /bla na
med pa'i byang chub gnas/ /kun mchog mchod pa bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can gnas gsum 'khor ba rnams/ /de nyid la ni bzhag par bgyi/ /dbang cho ga 'dis
sbyin par bya zhing slob ma'i lhag par mos pa dang / /zab pa dang / rgya che ba rig pas lhag par mos pa'i yid kyis shes par byas nas tshig nyid kyis dbang rin po che sbyin
par bya'o/ /gang thob dbang rab mchog ni rigs kyi bdag por bzung ba rnyed par dka' zhing mtshungs pa med par gdams/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhing gi dpal
dag blang bar byas pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur ba/ /bka' yi gnang ba rnyed nas 'jig rten gsum gyi dgra bo las rgyal rtsom pa'i go bgos pa
yi blos/ /byang chub dag la dgod pa'i sangs rgyas 'dir ni de nyid rnal 'byor pas ni dri ma med par spyod/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang gnyis pa las/ rab tu byed
pa dang po'o// //de nas thabs dang shes rab don/ /sgom pa yang dag rab bshad bya/ /pha rol don brtson brtson 'grus kyi/ /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir//
'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'jigs pa las/ /bsgral dka' gang zhig rnam sgom pas/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rang don du/ /mya ngan 'das par gnas mi 'gyur/ /gang gis khyad 'phags
mthar thug par/ /sangs rgyas dri med ngo mtshar rmad/ /'grib dang 'phel las rnam par grol/ /byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur/ /phung po lnga sogs chos rnams dang / /
theg gsum shin tu spang mi bya/ /chos dbyings mi mnyam mnyam pa nyid/ /chu shing lta bur yongs su bzung / /stong pa bsgom par mi bya ste/ /stong min bsgom par mi
bya'o| |stong pa mi spang rnal 'byor pas/ /stong min yongs su mi spong ngo / /stong dang stong min bzung ba las/ /rtog pa nyung min skye bar 'gyur/ /yongs su spangs na kun
rtog ste/ /de phyir de gnyis yongs su spang / /gnyis kyis gzung ba yongs spangs pa/ /rnam grol gnas dang bral ba ste/ /nga zhes bya ba'i kun rtog 'di/ /de phyir de ni yang dag
spang | |rnam pa med cing dogs pa med/ /'dod pa med cing sdig pa bral/ /thog ma tha ma'i rtog las grol/ /nam mkha' lta bur mkhas pas sgom/ /snying rje ldan pas sems
can la/ /rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya zhing / /sems can yod dang yod min zhes/ /de ltar yongs su brtag mi bya/ /spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /shes rab ces ni rab
@#/ /tu grags/ /yid bzhin nor ltar ma lus pa'i/ /thams cad don byed snying rje nyid/ /dmigs med gnas su shes rab dang / /dmigs med
snying rje chen po nyid/ /blo dang lhan cig gcig gyur pa/ /nam mkha' nam mkha' ji lta ba'o/ /gang la sgom pa po yang med/ /gang yang rnam par sgom pa'ang med//
bsgom bya nyid kyang yod min pa/ /de yi de nyid sgom pa brjod/ /gang yang bya ba yod min 'dir/ /bza' bya nyid kyang yod ma yin/ /byed po bza' las rnam par grol/ /
don dam rnam par bsgoms pas ni/ /'di la sgrub po gang yang med/ gang yang bstod par byed pa med/ /dor ba cung zad med par brjod/ /blang pa'ang cung zad yod ma
yin| |dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / /sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang / /'phrog pa zla ba'i grong khyer mtshungs/ /rmi lam rtse ba lta bur blta/ /sgyu ma ji bzhin thams cad du/ /blta
ba nyid dang reg par bya/ /'gro ba thams cad gnas pa ni/ /gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /sbyor ba'i 'dus par bsam mi khyab/ /rmi lam sad pa lta bu ni/ /ji ltar gzhon
nu'i gzugs kyis ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni 'dus pa yis/ /b+ha gar ling ga bzhag nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom/ /ye shes ci zhig skye zhe na/ /thog ma dbus
mtha' dri ma med/ /rang gis rig pa'i ye shes de/ /gzhan du smra bar mi nus so/ /gzugs rnams thams cad blta ba dang / /sgra rnams nyid kyang nyan pa dang / /smra ba dang ni
rgod pa dang / /sna tshogs ro ni za ba dang / /las rnams thams cad byed pa ni/ /gzhan du sems ni mi 'gro bas/ /de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/ /rnal 'byor rtag tu skye bar 'gyur//
'di ni gnyis su med par brjod/ /'di ni byang chub sems mchog nyid/ /rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa' dpal/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub nyid/ /'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /pha rol phyin pa kun
gyi dngos/ /mnyam nyid bsam bya nyid du gsungs/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog bsgom bya nyid/ /'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba'i bdag /byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang / /rdzogs
sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogs/ /de nyid las ni thams cad skyes/ /dngos dang dngos med sbyor bral ba/ /rnal 'byor pas ni de nyid sgom/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba/ /
bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /ma lus skyon la sdang ba dang / /kun nas nyon mongs rgyab phyogs nges/ /dpal ldan bde gshegs yon tan rnams/ /mtha' yas
de las skye bar 'gyur/ /kun rtog mang po'i mun pas khyab gyur ba'i/ /rab tu 'joms pas smyo zhing glog 'gyur ba/ /chags sogs dgag dka'i dri mas gos gyur ba'i//
@#/ /sems ni rdo rje can gyis 'khor bar gsungs/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal rtog las rnam par grol/ /'dod chags la sogs dri mas gos bral
ba'i| |gzung ba dang ni 'dzin med sems dpa' mchog /de nyid mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu gsungs/ /sdug bsngal phung po du ma'i mtshan gyur pa/ /'di las gzhan
du cung zad yod ma yin/ /bde ba mtha' yas 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa/ /de las gzhan du grol ba'ang yod ma yin/ /sdug bsngal ma lus zad par 'dod pa dang / /rdzogs
sangs rgyas kyi bde mchog thob 'dod pas/ /sems ni brtan par byas nas 'bad pas dpyad/ /de yi rang bzhin dngos po med par byed/ /ji srid rtog pa'i mun pa'i
yol stug po/ /skye dgu'i yid bsgribs sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa/ /ji srid de nas de ni bral yin pas/ /de srid bde ba rgya chen tha dad min/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug 'phags
dgyes pa'i/ /de yi zad phyir rang gi bya ba yang / /rgyas pa de yi yan lag 'gro ba blta/ /de ltar de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor gyi nges pa byas nas bka'i
gnang ba dang / /rang gi dam tshig la gnas pas sgom pa byed na lag pa'i phyag rgya dang / /sngags dang / sku gzugs kyi nga rgyal sgom pa dang / dam tshig gi thun mong gi
dngos grub skyed par byed pa yin no zhes pa ci zhig bya/ sangs rgyas nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtshon pa mngon du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor yin te bskyed pa dang / de
mtshon pa na gnas gsum po nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur ro/ /gzhung thams cad spangs nas thob pa'i gnas kyi bsam gtan gyi rnal 'byor de la brtson pas rang rig pa
tsam la spro bas nyin dang / mtshan du goms par bya'o/ /ri'i rtse mo dang / zhi ba'i gnas dang / pad+ma'i tshal dang / rgyal po'i tshal dang / dben ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i
gnas dang / rang gi khyim mam/ sems la mngon par 'dod pa'i thams cad mkhyen pas bsngags pa 'di'i nang du gang dang / gang gi gnas der gnas shing sngags shes pas
spro ba dang ldan pa des sgom par byed de/ thabs dang / shes rab pa ma gtogs par sangs rgyas nyid mngon du thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir shes rab ma dngos yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par byed pa bzang mo spang bar mi bya ste/ phyag rgya re re dang ldan pa 'di ma gtogs par dngos grub ster bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyir ye shes
bskyed pa yi/ /phyag rgya bzhi ni sbyar bar bya/ /gti mug dam tshig phyag rgya ste/ /zhe sdang phyag rgya chen por brjod/ /phrag dog las kyi phyag rgya ste/ /'dod chags chos kyi phyag rgya bdag
@#/ /yo gis phyag rgya sna tshogs 'di/ /bskyed nas rig ma bza' bar bya/ /de la gnyis ka la'ang lha'i gzugs su mngon du bsams nas gti mug
zhi ba dang / khro ba las ma rungs pa dang / 'dod chags las chags pas las rnams byed pa'o/ /de'i don du rab tu byed pa lnga po 'di rnams kyis rgyal ba rnams yin
no| |snga dro dang / nyi ma'i mtha' dang / nyi ma phyed dang / nam phyed kyi dus su 'ang phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bya'o/ /mnyam par sbyor ba las gzhan du ni 'grub par mi 'gyur
ro| |bstan pa la smod pa'i 'jigs pa dang / skye bo gdug pa'i nang du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi sems 'ba' zhig de bsams pas sems la lhag par
mos pa mngon du bya'o/ /gang zhig yang rnal 'byor pa brtson 'grus kyi 'bad pas rnal 'byor 'di bsgrub par bya'o/ /shes rab mngon du ma rnyed na byol song dag la'ang
rtag tu goms par bya'o/ /de ltar gang zhig rnal 'byor pas gal te pad+ma 'dzin pa la mngon du nyi ma re re'am/ zla ba so so'am/ lo la reg par mi byed na dam tshig
nyams par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig nyams pas rnal 'byor pa bag med par skye bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dam tshig blang bar byas nas yang mi byed par
sdom pa gzung bar bya ste/ de'i phyir kun gyis sdom pa dang ldan zhing de kho na la gnas pas phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bya'o/ /gsang ba'i nye ba'i rdzas dang / sngags dang / rgyud kyis
'di skad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor kyis rtag tu nye bar 'dug ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas su gnas gsum po rtse
gcig pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o/ /thabs dang / shes rab kyi don sgom pa zhes bya ba gnyis pa las/ rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// //de nas 'khor lo
thams cad kyi/ /rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag bshad/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs lha'i/ /thams cad las ni sna tshogs mchog /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /
thams cad bdag nyid 'di la sgrub/ /rnam par bral dang gnas su yang / /rang gi tshal sogs rnams su yang / /kun las sna tshogs phyag rgya ste/ /kun las sna tshogs sdom
pas ni/ /kun las sna tshogs bya ba rnams/ /ji ltar bde bar bsgrub par bya/ /bde gshegs kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid/ /khro bo'i sgrub thabs
thams cad dang / /zhi ba rnams kyi lha rnams la/ /ci zhig nga yis bshad par bya/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas gar/ /sgom pa lha yi rnal 'byor dang / /sngags kyi bzlas
@#/ /pa'i chog rim dang / /bris sku'am ni sku gzugs kyang / /sems kyis thams cad sprul pa ste/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ /nga yis rgyud du bsgrags pa
yin| |stong nyid gcig las rdo rje can/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru gsungs/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ /bskyed pa'i yig 'bru gzugs dang ni/ /phyag rgya dbyings kyi chog
rim dang / /sngags kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga yang / /gang gis sgrub po 'grub 'gyur ba/ /gtso bo shin tu dga' chen pos/ /bka' drin gyis ni bskyab tu gsol/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang por byams pa bsgom par bya/ /gnyis par snying rje rnam par sgom/ /gsum par dga' ba sgom pa dang / /kun gyi tha mar btang snyoms
so| |yang na snyom sa'i byang chub sems/ /gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu/ /gsum pa la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs/ /bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod/ /re bas nyi ma sngon du
rnam bsgoms nas/ /nyi der hUM byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje de nyid kyis ni ra ba dang / /gur yang cho ga bzhin du bsgom par bya/ /dang por ro ni bsgom par bya/ /chos
kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid brjod/ /de steng rnal 'byor pa gnas nas/ /he ru ka nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rang gi snying gar re pa bsgom/ /de las byung ba'i nyi dkyil 'khor/ /
ra ni hUM gi dbyibs nyid ni/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ /hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje nyid/ /rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas par/ /yang na hUM
gi de nyid bsgom/ /de nyid yongs su gyur bltas nas/ /zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje skye ba dpa' bo che/ /'dam skyes sngon po 'dra ba 'am/ /yang na sngo dang nyi ma
ltar| |dad pas nges par bsgom par bya/ /nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni/ /rdo rje skye ba snying rje che/ /rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi/ /lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bya//
dkar mo ri dwags mtshan pa 'dzin/ /chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snod/ /ro langs ma ni chu lag ma/ /g+hasma ri ni sman 'dzin cing / /puk+ka sI ni rdo rje lag /de bzhin ri khrod
ma ro 'dzin/ /gdol ba mo ni cang te'u rdung / /g.yung mo sku la 'khyud pa ste/ /mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yis/ /'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod/ /de nas gnas las rnam grol
ba'i| |chos rnams kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /A li zla ba kA li nyi/ /sa bon nang du son rig pa/ /de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar brjod/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin
can| |nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa yi/ /rang gi lus mtshungs rnam par spro/ /bsdus nas snying gar dgug pa na/ /yo gi zhe sdang bdag nyid 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i khams
@#/ /kyi nang son por/ /de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /hUM skyes sngo dang nyi ma ltar/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /phyag gnyis pa la
zhal gcig pa/ /spyan gsum skra ni gyen du ser/ /sdang mig brgyad gnyis lo yi dbyibs/ /'jigs byed mnan cing g.yon pa na/ /rdo rje kha T+wAM ga nyid dang / /thod pa yang ni g.yon
pa na| |g.yas na rdo rje nag po nyid/ /hUM ni 'don par byed pa'i bdag /lha mo brgyad kyis bskor nas ni/ /dur khrod du ni mgon po rol/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pas ni
bsgom/ /rnal 'byor bdud rtsi sdom pa kun/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /khro bo'i gzugs ni 'dzin gyur pa/ /phyag bzhi
yis ni rnam par brgyan/ /bdud bzhi rnam par dag pa ni/ /dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin no/ /sngar gsungs dkyil 'khor 'khor lor gnas/ /hUM gi sa bon las byung ba'i//
g.yon na thod pa lha dang ni/ /lha min khrag gis bkang ba dang / /g.yas na rdo rje me lta bus/ /'jigs pa'ang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /gzhan pa yi ni phyag dag gis/ /lus la
yang dag 'khyud pa nyid/ /shes rab rdo rje phag mo ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs su bsgom/ /dang por stong ba bsgom bya zhing / /ze 'bru la ni cha bral nyid/ /zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /hUM ni der ni bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin zhal gsum phyag drug par/ /lha yi gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /dang po'i zhal ni dkar min
zhing | |g.yas pa dkar zhing zhi ba nyid/ /g.yon pa dmar po lta bu ste/ /spyan gsum bzang po'i gzugs can nyid/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag gang / /thod pa'i gdan
la yang dag gnas/ /bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams kyi/ /thod pa phyag gis bzung ba dang / /gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid/ /de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid/ /dang po rdo rje 'bar
ba nyid/ /gsum par de bzhin rtse gsum pa/ /dpal ldan shes rab 'khyud pa dang / /ral ba'i cod pan brgyan pa ste/ /sprin gyi 'od 'bar du ma ni/ /sangs rgyas dam tshig
spro bar bya/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su sgrub pa pos/ /der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /lha mo lhan cig ldan par ni/ /de nas phyag rgya bsgom par bya/ /thod pa'i stan la gnas
par ni/ /'dab mar lha mo bri bar ba/ /sna tshogs gzugs ma yid 'ong ma/ /zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/ /dang por rim pa bri bar bya/ /gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin ma mdzes//
thod pa khu bas gang ba dang / /lcags kyu lag pas 'dzin pa mo'o/ /gnyis pa rtse gsum lag pa dang / /khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang / /rdo rje de bzhin zhags pa nyid/ /gsum pa
@#/ /lag par ral gri dang / /thod pa chu yis gang ba dang / /de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid/ /bzhi pa kha T+wAM ga lag ma/ /g.yon pa'i lag pas thod pa nyid/ /
mu suN+Di dang ba dan gsum/ /lnga pa zhags pa'i lag pa dang / /thod pa lag pas bzung ba dang / /de bzhin ut+pal cang te'u nyid/ /drug pa'i lag pas pad+ma dang / /thod pa
tshil gyis gang ba dang / /de bzhin me long dgra sta nyid/ /bdun pa 'phang mdung lag pa dang / /dung dang 'khor lo'i mtshon cha 'dzin/ /thod pa khrag gis gang bar ni/ /khru
gang tsam du yang dag bri/ /brgyad pa bum pa'i lag pa dang / /de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid/ /thod pa skyes pa'i lpags pa yis/ /bkab pa rdzas kyis gang ba ni/ /ze 'brur
bde ba chen po dang / /'dab mar lha mo bri bar bya/ /rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /lha mo rdo rje lcags kyu dang / /rdo rje zhags pa
lcags sgrog dang / /de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid/ /sgo yi skyong ba yang dag bri/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom bya zhing / /phyis ni bzlas pa yang dag brtsams/ /hUM ni rdo rje sems
dpa' yi/ /oM ni dbyangs kyi dbye ba nyid/ /A ni ngag dang yang dag ldan/ /shel ni dag pa lta bu nyid/ /hrIH ni de la yang dag sbyar/ /de bzhin du yang swAhA nyid/ /sngags
kyi bzlas par yang dag gsungs/ /bsam gtan yi ge gcig po nyid/ /lha mo rnams kyi hrIH nyid ni/ /'dab ma rnams la de nas dgod/ /mchod pa bzhi yi rang bzhin
gyis| |sa bon bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sgo yi skyong ba thams cad du/ /dang po dbyangs yig la sogs ldan/ /b+ha ga nyid du sgrub pa pos/ /de nas rdo rje gzhug par bya/ /hrIH
yi rnam pa nyid dang yang / /de la hUM ni brjod par bya/ /zla mtshan dus su khrag bcas pa'i/ /khu ba kha yis bza' bar bya/ /bdag nyid dang ni b+ha ga la/ /me tog dri yis
mchod par bya/ /gal te sgrub po sgrub 'dod na/ /de nyid la ni bzlas par bya/ /rdo rje drag mo de bzhin gcig /de bzhin rdo rje gzugs brnyan nyid/ /gsum pa rdo rje 'dod
chags ma/ /bzhi pa rdo rje zhi ba ma/ /lnga pa rdo rje gnod sbyin ma/ /drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /bdun pa sgra yi rdo rje ma/ /de bzhin brgyad pa rdo rje sa/ /gnyis pa las/ /rab tu
byed pa gsum pa'o// //'khor lo sgrub pa'i khyad par gyi/ /rim pa ji bzhin rdo rje nyon/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/ /srung dang de bzhin mngon spyod nyin/ /re'u
mig dgu sogs 'khor lo yi/ /phyi rol mu khyud nyid du bya/ /'khor lo las kyi kha dog sogs/ /mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ 'di yis
@#/ /sa bon thams cad kyi/ /phyag 'tshal sreg blugs tha ma ni/ /dbus su ming ni sbyar bar bya/ /srung ba'i tshig kyang rnam par bya/ /mnyam nyid ye
shes stong pas ni/ /bdag nyid kyi ni gzugs su bya/ /mnyam nyid thams cad rig pa'i gnas/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyar bya ba/ /srung ba ye shes can gyis bsgom/ /
'jigs pa thams cad ring du byed/ /sems can dngos po med na ni/ /rnal 'byor dngos po bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /pad+ma'i gdan ni
bsam par bya/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster mar/ /bdag gi lus ni bsgom par bya/ /oM tA re swAhA/ mgo bo la'o/ /oM tu re swAhA/ mig dag la'o/ /oM tA re
swAhA| sna dag la'o/ /oM tu swAhA/ rna ba dag la'o/ /oM re swAhA/ lce la'o/ /oM tA re ni swAhA/ snying gar ro/ /yan lag drug ni rtag tu bzung / /'phags ma sgrol ma
bsam par bya/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /kun la skyabs sbyin lag pa dang / /g.yon pa ut+pal lta bu
mchog /sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis/ /lha rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /oM ku ru ku l+le hrIHswAhA/ las thams cad pa'i sngags so/ /dgra dang rgyal pos
bcings pa dang / /'gro ba'i shin tu 'jigs pa'i dug /yan lag rims ni sna tshogs dang / /dug sogs dus min 'chi ba yi/ /'jigs pa'i gnas ni gang gang la/ /de
dang de la rab sbyar bya/ /shes rab chung ba blo ldan par/ /srung ba bris nas bzung bar bya/ /srung ba bzang po 'di nyid ni/ /'jigs pa thams cad du ni spangs/ /srung ba 'di ni
thams cad las/ /rnal 'byor de nyid gong na med/ /zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu yi/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/ /de yi dbus su hrIH nyid ni/ /kha dog dmar po lta bu'i 'od//
de nas bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/ /mda' dang gzhu yi lag pa ma/ /ut+pal dang lcags kyu 'dzin/ /'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /'jig
rten gsum po dbang du byed/ /'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams/ /khri yis 'jig rten phal pa nyid/ /bye bas phyugs dang gnod sbyin sogs/ /'bum phrag bdun gyis lha
ma yin/ /'bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid/ /brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid/ /'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa 'di/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/ /mnyam nyid
gzugs su bsams nas ni/ /khams gsum gyi ni rang bzhin las/ /sngar gsungs mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /gong du gsungs pas bsgrub par bya/ /shes rab 'bar
@#/ /ba'i las rnams ni/ /'di yi 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /oM pradz+nye ma hA pradz+nye hUM swAhA/ /dngos po'i ngo bos bsgom par bya/ /'od zer 'bar ba du
ma yi/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /shes rab bdag nyid rnam par sprul/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/
kha dog dkar mo 'od gsal ma/ /shes rab bdag nyid gzung bar bya/ /'di yi sa bon bzlas nas ni/ /shes rab 'dab ma lta bur 'phel/ /gu pa'am blo ni dman pa
yi| |shes rab 'phel ba'i rnal 'byor ro/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yi ge de la dgod par bya/ /thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par/ /zhal gcig pa
la phyag bzhi pa/ /zhi ba'i 'khor lo dril bu 'dzin/ /thod pa dang ni zhags pa nyid/ /de bzhin 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs par/ /kun tu rnam par spro bar bya/ /'dis ni
rnal 'byor rim pas ni/ /rin chen 'byung gnas bsgom par bya/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog lta bu/ /sku mdog ser po gzi brjid che/ /thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus
bzhugs pa/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /dpa' bo rin chen lcags kyu 'dzin/ /thod pa de bzhin zhags pa nyid/ /'dir ni rnal 'byor rim pas ni/ /pad+ma rdo rje
'chang ba bsgom/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i 'od/ /dpa' bo mda' dang gzhu 'dzin cing / /thod pa'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /pad+ma zhags pa
'dzin pa nyid/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /'dis ni rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /don yod phyag na ral gri 'dzin/ /thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus bzhugs pa/ /zhal
gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /thod pa rdo rje dril bu dang / /lcags kyu dang ni g.yas pas 'phyar/ /bai DUR+ya ltar ljang gu ste/ /rgyan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /nam mkha'i
khams kyi dbus son par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /de yi nang son sa bon ni/ /bruM las spyan gyi dbyibs su ni/ /thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par/ /phyag
ni brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /'khor lo'i lag pa mda' dang gzhu/ /de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid/ /zhags pa ral gri thod pa nyid/ /spyan gsum pa la zhal gcig ma/ /
rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag gang / /do shal dang ni rkang gdub rgyan/ /kha dog dkar mo shin tu mdzes/ /de bzhin thod pa'i dbu rgyan nyid/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi
dbus son pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs gang pa/ /de yi nang son bsam par bya/ /hUM las mA ma ki yi dbyibs/ /thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par/ /kha dog sngon
@#/ /mo 'bar chen no/ /spyan gsum pa la zhal gcig ma/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa nyid/ /lcags kyu dang ni
ral gri nyid/ /zhags pa rdo rje de bzhin du/ /dril bu dang ni thod pa'o/ /'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang / /kha T+wAM gdang bcu gnyis ni/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//
rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su yongs gang ba'i/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /der ni hrIH ni bsam bya zhing / /gos dkar zhes bya rnam
par sgom/ /thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par/ /kha dog dmar mo 'bar chen mo/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs gang ba/ /phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /gzhu dang
mda' ni 'dzin pa dang / /pad+ma'i lag par ral gri dang / /thod pa rdo rje dril bu dang / /zhags pa de bzhin rin chen nyid/ /do shal dang ni rkang gdub sgra/ /rgyan rnams kun
gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgoms na/ /myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbus su yongs gang ba'i/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom
par bya/ /de yi nang song tAM nyid ni/ /sgrol ma'i dbyibs su bsam par bya/ /thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par/ /phyag ni brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /ral gri phyag na
chags bcas ma/ /ut+pal de bzhin lcags kyu dang / /thod pa khrag gis gang ba dang / /zhags pa de bzhin 'khor lo dang / /gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid/ /zhal gcig ma ni yang
dag bri/ /kha dog ljang gu spyan gsum ma/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur/ /rgyud thams cad
kyi gleng gzhi'i gsang ba dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las/ brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa'o// //he ru ka dang bdag med ma'i/ /bskyed pa'i sgrub dang de nyid nyon/ /gang
gis gdug pa drag po yi/ /sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba yi/ /mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro mas mdzad pa'i/ /de dag thams cad khyod la bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gyur
nas kyang / /rdo rje can nyid rdo rjer dbab/ /'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs drag po ni/ /kun tu rnam par spro bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sa bon phreng ba de nas
dgod/ /de nas rdo rje chags chen las/ /rig mar bcas pa khu bar gyur/ /sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa las/ /de nas rig ma bskul bar bya/ /rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs
shig |pu k+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la/ /bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed mdzod/ /khyod med na ni bdag 'gums pas/ /kye yi rdo rje khyod
@#/ /bzhengs shig /stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la/ /ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod/ /dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer ba/ /stong pa
nyid la bzhugs sam ci/ khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas/ /gdol pa mo bdag zhu ba bgyid/ /bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyi/ /mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs
shig |g.yung mo bdag yid dran nyams pas/ /snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig /aM dang hUM las rdo rje che/ /khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas ni/ /zhabs rnams sa la rdebs
pa dang / /lha dang lha min bsdigs par mdzad/ /gaM tsaM baM g+haM paM shaM laM DaM/ /'di yi sa bon dbyung bar bya/ /bdag po dga' ma'i sa bon las/ /aM hUM sngon po 'bar btsigs
pas| |ma mo'i 'khor lo grong nyams dgar/ /gtso bo 'di ltar bsgom par bya/ /zhal brgyad ba la zhabs bzhi pa/ /phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan/ /bdud bzhi mnyam
par mnan pa nyid/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs pa po/ /sgeg cing dpa' bo mi sdug pa/ /rgod cing drag shul 'jigs su rung / /snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yi/ /gar dgu'i ro
dang ldan pa nyid/ /mgo yi phreng bas do shal mdzad/ /nyi mar bzhugs shing rol mor bcas/ /kha dog gnag pa 'jigs pa po/ /sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin/ /nyid kyi
zhal nas hUM spro zhing / /thal bas sku la byugs pa nyid/ /bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing / /dga' ba gnyes gnyis snyoms 'jug pas/ /dba' rlabs med pa'i rang
bzhin can/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni bzhad cing gnag /g.yas pa'i zhal ni kun da mtshungs/ /g.yon pa dmar zhal cher 'jigs pa/ /steng ma'i zhal ni rnam par gtsigs/ /spyan
ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi che/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa dang / /mda' dang de bzhin 'khor lo nyid/ /de bzhin gshor dang dbyig pa dang / /rtse gsum
pa dang lcags kyu nyid/ /g.yon par dril bu pad+mar bcas/ /gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga 'phyar zhing / /thod pa dang ni rin chen nyid/ /bsdigs mdzub zhags pa de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas
sprin gyi 'od zer ldan/ /kun tu rnam par spro bar bya/ /de ltar cho ga sna tshogs kyis/ /dkar mo la sogs de rnams dgod/ /dkar mo kha dog dkar mo ste/ /gzhu dang mda' ni
'gengs ma mchog /thod pa khrag gis bkang ba dang / /de bzhin rdo rje gri gug nyid/ /chom rkun ma ni kha dog dmar/ /'khor lo lcags kyu 'dzin mar brjod/ /thod pa dang ni cang te'u
nyid| |gsal ba'i gzugs can dgod par bya/ /rmongs byed ma ni sku mdog gnag /de bzhin thod pa dang ni gshor/ /sa la zlog pa nyid dang ni/ /g.yas pa rtse gsum 'phyang
@#/ /ba'o| |ro langs ma ni dkar ser mtshungs/ /phyag dag na ni chang dang chu/ /ral gri dang ni thod pa nyid/ /mdzes ma'i gzugs can bsgom par bya/ /
puk+ka sI ni kha dog ser/ /dpag bsam shing gi lcug ma dang / /sha yis gang ba'i thod pa dang / /rin chen dang ni mchod sbyin nyid/ /gdol pa mo ni sngo mdog ma tshungs/ /de
bzhin rlung gi gos 'dzin ma/ /gzhan pa dag gis thod pa dang / /de bzhin pad+ma dkar po nyid/ /g.yung mo sngo dang dkar ba'i mdog /rdo rje dang ni lcags kyu 'dzin/ /g.yon
pas thod pa 'dzin pa ste/ /gzhan pas rlung gi gos 'dzin ma/ /g+hasma rI ni ljang ser mtshungs/ /rdo rje me thab dgra sta'i lag /thod pa tshil bus yongs gang ba'i/ /g.yas
pa mi 'jigs sbyin byed ma/ /ri khrod ma ni dkar mdog mtshungs/ /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa'i lag /rdo rje de bzhin zhags pa nyid/ /sna tshogs gzugs can bsgom par
bya| |ro hi ta dang phag nyid dang / /rus sbal de bzhin lto 'phye nyid/ /seng ge de bzhin stag nyid dang / /wa dang dge slong nyid rnams dang / /de ltar dkar mo la sogs pa'i//
thod pa brgyad du cho ga bzhin/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /sgeg pa la sogs ro ngang ldan/ /rta yi gzugs dang phag gi gdong / /khyi gdong de bzhin seng ge ma//
zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi ma/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /gling bu dang ni pi wang dang / /mu kun da dang rdza rnga ste/ /phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma/ /rgyan rnams kun
gyis rnam par brgyan/ /nag mo dkar ser lta bu dang / /de bzhin steng du rta gdong ljang / /ser mo nag mo dkar ma tshungs dang / /de bzhin steng du phag gdong dmar/ /dmar zhing
gnag dang dkar mtshungs shing / /de bzhin steng du khyi gdong ser/ /ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i gdong / /steng du 'bar ba'i seng ge gdong / /thams cad skra ni steng du
'bar/ /g.yon brkyang ba yis ro mnan cing / /spyan gsum khro zhing sgeg pa dang / /rgod pa'i bzhin ni bsgom par bya/ /he ru ka bskyed pa gsum pa las/ rab tu byed pa dang
po'o|| ||ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sgrub thabs ni/ /rdo rje gtso bo rgyal po nyon/ /gnyis med ye shes chos ldan pa'i/ /gnyis kyi dngos po spangs pa yis/ /rnal
'byor kun sogs dang por ni/ /dag pa gsum ni gdon par bya/ /swa b+hA ba shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud d+ho nyahaM/ badzra shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA badzra shud / /yo ga shud d+hAH sarba
d+ha rmA yo ga shud d+ho haM/ /de ltar byas nas rnal 'byor pas/ /yang na bsam gtan de nyid bya/ /yid dang rjes mthun gnas rnams su/ /de nas bsam gtan brtsam par bya//
@#/ /bla re yang ni bre ba nyid/ /sna tshogs gos ni 'phyang ba dang / /'phan dang rgyal mtshan sgreng ba dang / /phyogs bcu'i gnas ni thams cad du/ /dri zhim
me tog sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin dri yi dkyil 'khor du/ /skad cig gcig pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag gi lus ni bsam par bya/ /blo gros ldan pas sngar mchod
nas| |ye shes mkha' 'gro ma ni gzung / /de ltar cho ga sna tshogs ni/ /nges par bsgom pa nyid du bya/ /ye shes rgya mtsho ri bo'i mgor/ /phyogs sogs kha dog bzhi
ni bsam/ /de bzhin gser gyi rgyan byung dang / /rin chen bdun gyis rnam par spras/ /g.yer ka 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni/ /'dod pas kun tu rgyas par ni/ /gnas ni lnga
ra seng ge yi/ /gdan ni bsgom pa nyid du bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/ /gdugs ni dkar pos rnam par spras/ /bdag gis dbugs kyis phyung nas
ni| |dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /zhal gsum ma la phyag drug nyid/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi gnas/ /ma bcings skra yi mdzes pa dang / /sangs rgyas
lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /kha dog sngon mo 'jigs chen mo/ /sprul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rgod dang khro ba sgeg pa dang / /spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs
can ma/ /sgra cher dgod dang 'jigs pa mo/ /gos ni dmar pos shin tu mdzes/ /steng du kha T+wAM gnyid dang / /gnyis pa la ni dgra sta nyid/ /gsum pa la ni rdo rje nyid/ /g.yon
na de bzhin dril bu'i sgra/ /gnyis pa la ni lhung bzed nyid/ /gsum par de bzhin ral gri 'dzin/ /'od zer 'bar ba du ma dang / /dbus su mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /
ye shes mkha' 'gro'i mdun du ni/ /bdag gi dbugs kyis phyung nas ni/ kha dog dkar mo shin tu mdzes/ /ma bcings pa yi skra yis brgyan/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa
dang | |sgeg pa'i ro dang ldan pa dang / /shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par spras/ /rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom
bya| |ye shes byang gi cha la ni/ /bdag gi dbugs las phyung nas ni/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /btso ma gser gyi mdog lta bu/ /rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha
T+wAM ga /ma bcings skra yis rnam par brgyan/ /yan lag sbrul gyis brgyan dang ni/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/ /'jigs pa'i mkha' 'gro zhes bya bsgom/ /ye shes nub
kyi cha la ni/ /yang ni ro langs ma byung nas/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / kha dog sngon mo shin tu mdzes/ /rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga /ma bcings pa yi skra
@#/ /yis brgyan/ /lus la sbrul gyis brgyan pa dang / /shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/ /ye shes lho yi cha la ni/ /gdol pa mo ni dmar mo ltar/ /
rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga /ma bcings pa yi skra yis brgyan/ /phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /yongs gang gzugs dang
gzi brjid ldan/ /'di ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom/ /dbang ldan lha mo seng ge ma/ /gdong ni seng ger bsam par bya/ /dkar dang ser ba lta bur ni/ /klu dbang stan la g.yas
brkyang gnas/ /rdo rje lcags kyu sdigs mdzub zhags/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/ /'od zer 'bar ba du mas ni/ /lus ni 'bar bar bsgom par bya/ /mer ni stag mo
zhes bya ba/ /rin chen bdun po mchog gi gdan/ /phyag gnyis sngo dang dkar ba mtshungs/ /gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /'bar ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu dang / /de bzhin
sdigs mdzub zhags pa nyid/ /'od zer 'bar ba du mas ni/ /lus ni 'bar bar bsgom par bya/ /bden bral lha mo wa gdong ma/ /sgra cher dgod dang 'jigs pa mo/ /ma he'i
gdan dang yang dag ldan/ /dmar zhing gnag pa'i kha dog ma/ /lus la shin tu mdzes gos dang / /phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par spras/ /lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub
ma| |sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /rlung du lha mo 'ug pa ma/ /ser dang dmar ba'i kha dog ma/ /klu yi gdan la gnas pa dang / /de nyid rgyan ni rab tu brtag /phyag gnyis sems
dpa'i skyil krung gnas/ /lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub ma/ /'od zer 'bar ba du ma yis/ /thams cad kyi ni thams cad 'bar/ /mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dbus su ste/ /
phyi rol tu ni bzhi po rnams/ /de ltar dgod pa'i rim bltas nas/ /phyi nas gnas ni rab tu brtag/ shar du mkha' 'gro'i rgyal dbang mo/ /phyag gnyis dang ni mdog dkar
mo| |yi dwags gdan la gnas pa dang / /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /skra ni grol zhing drag mo dang / /me ni 'bar ba'i 'od lta bu/ /khar ni lag pa bcug nas ni/ /sgra
cher dgod dang de bzhin 'bar/ /byang du mar me rgyal mo dbang / /kha dog gser mdog drag shul ma/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can gtsigs pa can/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i gos
kyis brgyan/ /rab tu song ba'i stan la gnas/ /'bar ba'i me ni lta bu'i 'od/ /thal mo gnyis kyi lag pa ni/ /mgo bo'i steng du mar me bzhin/ /nub tu lha mo 'jib byed ma/ /
kha dog dmar mo 'jigs pa mo/ /rab tu song ba'i stan la gnas/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/ /khrag gi srad bu lag pa yi/ /snyim par khrag ni 'thung bar
@#/ /byed| |me ni 'bar ba'i 'od drag mo/ /lha mo gtso mo 'jigs byed ma/ /lho ru g.yo ldan ma zhes pa/ /kha dog gnag mo lta bu'i 'od/ /rab tu song
ba'i stan la gnas/ /ma bcings pa yi skra yis brgyan/ /gos ni dmar po shin tu mdzes/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /sdigs mdzub dang ni gtun shing lag/
thams cad sems ni rmongs par byed/ /'bar ba'i me yi 'od drag mo/ /thams cad rig pas thams cad bsgom/ /'di rnams gzugs sogs mdun du ni/ /dam tshig
de bzhin bstan par bya/ /rlung dang me yis bdun pa'i don/ /rdo rje'i sa bon gyis ni bskul/ /thig le sgras ni mnan pas ni/ /rgyun gyi char ni zhes byar gsungs/ /gsum
pa las/ rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// //de nas bdag med sgrub pa ni/ /ci gsungs mdo ru bsdus nas bshad/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son
par| |nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par/ /lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid/ /'khor lo sa dang chu ni sngon/ /go rim bzhin du
byin za dang / /lha rnams kyi ni rlung chen dang / /ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba'i/ /chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo ni/ /'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa/ /ze 'bru
las ni gcig yin te/ /rdo rje can gyi sku gsum mchog /bco lnga'i gdan dang ldan pa yi/ /ro ni nges par bsam par bya/ /de yi steng du zla ba yin/ /zla ba'i steng du sa bon nyid/ /phyi
nas bdud las rgyal bas mnan/ /gnyis 'dus pa las bde chen po/ /A li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas/ /kA li'i gzugs kyis snang byed do/ /zla ba nyi ma gnyis 'dus
pas| |dkar mo la sogs rab tu grags/ /zla ba me long ye shes ldan/ /de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes nyid/ /rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni/ /so sor rtog par
brjod par bya/ /thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid/ /gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa dag pa'o/ /mkhas pas cho ga gsungs pas ni/ /rnam pa lnga po bsgom par bya/ /A
li kA li mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi gdan/ /yi ge las byung gong bu la/ /hUM phaT rnam par 'dod mi bya/ /sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba/ /dkyil
'khor bdag po bsgom par bya/ /phyag mtshan zhal sogs gong ma bzhin/ /zla ba chu shes nor bu'i 'od/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las/ /de ltar thams cad
rdzogs pa nyid/ /A li shes rab kA li thabs/ /zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas/ /gang phyir dkar mo la sogs pa/ /kha dog dbye bas so so yin/ /de phyir kun tu rab 'bad
@#/ /pas| |dkyil 'khor pa yang rab tu brtag /rnal 'byor ma lnga 'di dag ni/ /nang gi 'bar ma yang dag gnas/ /phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /
rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu sgom/ /dbang por rdo rje gshin rjer dkar/ /chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /
phyi rol 'phar ma dkar mo dang / /chom rkun de bzhin ro langs ma/ /g+hasma rA+e dang puk+ka sI/ /ri khrod ma dang gdol pa mo/ /brgyad pa g.yung mos gang ba'o/ /'og ldan
ma dang steng ldan nyid/ /mkha' spyod sa spyod ma zhes brjod/ /srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /ngos su gyur ma yang dag gnas/ /lha mo thams cad sna tshogs mdog/
dran chen phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/ /zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/ /spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs can ma/ /'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang / /lag par gdu bu
skra rags nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas/ /'di lnga phyag rgya dag par gsungs/ /ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad/ /g.yon
pas rnal 'byor lhung bzed dang / /de bzhin steng du kha T+wAM ga /g.yas na rdo rje sngon po dang / /de bzhin du yang gri gug nyid/ /ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar/ /spyan dmar
de bzhin steng skyes ser/ /kha dog sngon mo chas gsal ma/ /stag gi pags pas rnam dkris shing / /'jigs pa'i me ni lta bur ni/ /gsal ba'i gzugs can ma de gnas/ /
g.yas na dkar dang sngo ba ste/ /g.yon na ma rgad sngo dang mtshungs/ /phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /lag pa gcig na thod pas
brel| |g.yas na gri gug 'dzin pa ma/ /rgod dang khro dang sgeg pa dang / /de ni mchod pa'i gzugs gnas pas/ /sangs rgyas sprin dang mnyam pa yi/ /'od zer sna tshogs kun
tu spro| |de nyid gsum gyi rang bzhin bdag /mkhas pas dbus su bsgom par bya/ /gsum pa las/ rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// //de nas dkyil 'khor
chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad par bya/ /rdo rje dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyibs/ /rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs nas ni/ /phyag rgya
chen por yongs su gzung / /thams cad rnam par bltas nas ni/ /sngags pas 'di ni bsgrub par bya/ /sar pa legs par bkal pa dang / /shin tu tshad ma mdzes pas
ni| |srad bus thig gdab shes rab can/ /ji ltar nub par dkyil 'khor nyid/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs rnams kyis shin tu mdzes/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag
@#/ /ldan| |gos dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /mtshams kyi cha rnams thams cad dang / /sgo yi khyud kyi grwa rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis
spras| |phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de yi 'khor lo so so'i skabs/ /nang du yang ni zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje thig ni yongs bcug cing / /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje ka pa'i nang
legs su/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /de nas dkyil 'khor nang du ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam par dgod/ /gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga yi/ /sgrub
pa'ang khyod la bshad par bya/ /de la dang por lha nyid kyi/ /khyim du sngags pa zhugs nas ni/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /bsams nas de steng rdo rje ni/ /dkar
po rtse mo lnga pa nyid/ /cho gas bsam par byas nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun sogs la/ /mchod nas phyags 'tshal 'di skad gsol/ /sangs rgyas byang chub
sems dpa' kun/ /bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol/ /bdag ni che ge mo zhes bgyi/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/ /ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /ji ltar
dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa/ /byang chub sems ni bla med mchog /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /
sems can don byed tshul khrims dang / /tshul khrims bslab pa rnam pa gsum/ /so sor bdag gis brtan par gzung / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon
mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i/ /sdom pa deng nas brtan por gzung / /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /de nyid las ni so sor
gzung | |slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog rnal 'byor gyi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyi ma re drug byas nas/ /sbyin pa rnams bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /
byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang so sor gzung / /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /
sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /thams cad so sor gzung bar bya/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /
sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /sdom pa ma lus gzung bar bgyi/ /ma bsgral ba dag bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba dag sgrol bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin ba dbugs dbyung
zhing | |sems can mya ngan 'das la gzhag /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rtse mo las byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te tshig
@#/ /'di dag bka' stsal pa/ /de nas bsam gtan gnas 'dug nas/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag med par/ /yang dag rjes su blta bar
bya| |phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can/ /'di dag thams cad sems kyis brtags/ /sems las ma gtogs pa nyid ni/ /gzhan du yod pa ma yin no/ /chos kun rang bzhin
'od gsal ba/ /chos kun dang por ma skyes phyir/ /yid kyis a nut+pa n+na brjod/ /de nas rang sems de nyid 'dis/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/ /'dod pa'i
sngags kyi bzlas pas ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par blta/ /oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+haM ka ro mi/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor che dag pa/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med/ /yid
gnyis kun las rnam par grol/ /mchog tu rnam par rtog pa 'joms/ /nyon mongs dri ma thams cad dag /dang po zla ba ltar bltas nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan
'dir/ /a sogs gzugs kyis 'jug par 'gyur/ /a A i I u U r-i r-I l-i l-I e ai o au aM aH/ bcom ldan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /yon tan khyad
par ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gru gsum rgya cher rang bzhin can/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan gnas/ /'di ni a sogs gzugs
kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas yon tan 'jug par 'jug /shel dang zla ba lta bur ni/ /de yi steng du 'jug par 'gyur/ /sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/ /de nyid dga' bar byed
pa'i rgyu| |sngags pas 'di yi sngags kyis ni/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par byed/ /oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pa da yA mi/ /byas pa'i rjes su rim 'byung ba/ /sems can rjes su 'dzin
pa'o| |dge ba'i chos kyis yang dag dang / /nyon mongs thams cad nges par gnon/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /byang chub zla ba gnyis pa can/ /'dir yang skar ma'i rnam
pas ni/ /sangs rgyas yon tan ka sogs kyi/ /gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu yi/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta T+ha Da D+ha Na/ ta
tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ 'di yi dkyil 'khor cho ga kun/ /rgyud ni gzhan du ma gsungs so/ /de la dbus su rtse lnga pa/ /'od zer dkar po bcas
pa nyid/ /kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed pa/ /brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yi phyir/ /bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan du/ /'di yi sngags kyis bsgom par bya/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra/
byang chub spyod pa bla na med/ /de yi sa ni rtogs pa 'di/ /ye shes dag pa zag pa med/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje nges par brtag par bya/ /nam mkha'i kham
@#/ /ni thams cad kyi/ /tshad du yang dag gang ba yi/ /rdo rje'i lus kyi bdag nyid du/ /sngags pas bsgom par bya ba'o/ /'dis ni sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis
spro ba dang ni bsdu bar bya/ /oM badzra At+ma konyahaM/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang ni/ snang ba med cing gnas pa med/ /ma skyes ma byas dag pa nyid/ /dngos po med pa la sogs
spangs| |bcad med dbyer med gzung du med/ /chos kyi sku ni gzugs med pa/ /rdo rje bdag med yang dag gyur/ /rdo rje'i sku ni gong na med/ /de ltar yang rdo rjes
mtshan pa bsgom par bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyon cig /yang ni rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams
kyi gzugs brtan ni/ /'di yi sngags kyis bsgom par bya/ /oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tAsta thA haM/ /sku dang gsang ba de bzhin spyod/ /spyod yul de nyid rtogs pa ni/ /mngon par byang
chub rnam pa lnga/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid dge /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gsang ba'i rdo rje dang / pad+ma'i rigs kyi ming ci lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rdo rje de bzhin gshegs ba kun
la gnas/ /pad+ma'i rigs ni lha mo chen po ldan/ /de yi rdo rje pad+ma'i steng du gnas/ /de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don/ /de nas de ltar bdag nyid rnam par snang
mdzad du bskyed nas steng dang / 'og tu sngags kyi yi ge bkod/ cho ga bzhin du ri rab dang / gru gsum rgya chen po bskyed par bya ste/ 'od zer sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis
brgyan pa las yang dag par byung ba'i mdzes pa'i gnas bsgoms nas/ der paM las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /rlung dang / /me'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa
ya ra la was brgyan pa'o/ /de nas de yi steng du sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab cing bstod pa rab tu bsngags pa nor bu rin po che chen po 'od
gsal ba dang / kha dog sna tshogs shing dril bu dbyangs ba dang / rlung gis bskyod pa'i gos dang / 'phan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / do shal dang / do shal phyed pa dang / zla
bas nye bar mdzes par rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor gzhal med khang bsam par bya'o/ /hUM gi sngags 'dis rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du sngags 'di bkod de gyur pa las rdo
rje rtse lnga pa bsgom par bya'o/ /yang sangs rgyas thams cad spro ba dang / /bsdu bar bya zhing rdo rje de nyid yang yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa zla
@#/ /ba'i kha dog gi 'od lta bu ste/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na bzhugs shing brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dpa' bo shes rab dang / dga' ba gcig
pus mdzes pas rdo rje dang / dril bu dang / ral gri dang / lcags kyu nyid dang / thod pa dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa nyid do/ /g.yas pa ni kha dog nag pa'o/ /g.yon pa ni pad+ma rA ga'i
'od do/ /zhal gsum pa dang / phyag drug pa nyid dang / spyan gsum pa nyid dang / bzang po'i gzugs can te/ rang gi rig ma'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor
bsgom par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par dkyil 'khor pa'ang rab tu brtag par bya'o/ /shar du ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /lhor ni rin chen 'byung gnas
so| |nub tu ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o/ /byang du ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'o/ /dbang ldan du ni spyan no/ /mer ni mA ma kI'o/ /bden bral du ni gos dkar mo'o/ /rlung du ni sgrol
ma'o| |phyi rol gyi 'phar ma la drag shul ma ni kha dog dkar mo'o/ /lho ru ni rdo rje gzugs brnyan ma ni kha dog ser mo'o/ /nub tu ni 'dod chags rdo rje ma kha dog dmar mo'o/
byang du ni rdo rje zhi ba mo kha dog ljang gu ma'o/ /dbang ldan du ni rdo rje gnod sbyin mo kha dog dkar ser lta bu'o/ /me ru ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dmar ser lta bu'o/ /bden bral du ni sgra'i

rdo rje ma ni sngon dmar lta bu'o/ /rlung du sa'i rdo rje ma ni kha dog ljang skya ma lta bu'o/ /phyi rol gyi 'phar ma la dbang ldan du ni gling bu ma'o/ /me ru ni pi waM ma'o/ /bden bral du ni mu kun
da ma'o/ /rlung du ni rdza rnga ma'o/ /gling bu ma la sogs pa ni phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma'o/ /phyi rol gyi snam bu la me tog la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma de gzhag
par bya ste/ de bzhin du phyag gnyis ma'o/ /shar gyi sgo la lha mo rdo rje lcags kyu ma nam mkha' sdo bsangs ma'i mdog bri bar bya ste/ zhal g.yas pa dang / gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang /
dkar ba'o/ /phyag g.yas pa'i dang po na ni lcags kyu'o/ /gnyis pa la ni ral gri 'phyar ba'o/ /gsum pa la ni 'khor lo'o/ /g.yon pa na ni zhags pa dang / sdigs mdzub dang / dril bu 'dzin
pa ste phyag drug pa bri bar bya'o/ /lho'i sgor lha mo rdo rje zhags pa ma kha dog dkar ser te/ zhal g.yas pa dang / gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang / dmar ba'o/ /g.yas pa na ni zhags pa dang / rdo
rje dang / ral gri 'phyar ba'o/ /'khor lo dang / dril bu dang / sdigs mdzub zhags ba can ste phyag drug /nub kyi sgo la ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ma ste/ de bzhin du'ang kha dog dmar zhing gzi

brjid che ba ste/ zhal g.yas pa dang / gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang / dkar ba'o/ /phyag dag na lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / dril bu dang / lcags kyu'o/ /byang gi sgo la
@#/ /ni rdo rje dril bu ma 'jigs par byed ma ste/ zhal gsum ni ljang gu dang / nag mo dang / dkar mo'o/ /phyag drug na ni dril bu dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo
dang | lcags kyu dang / zhags pa'o/ /thams cad kyang skra steng du 'bar ba ste/ sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o/ /me'i phyogs nas brtsams te me tog la
sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma de gzhag par bya ste phyag gnyis mar gsungs so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su ni rnal 'byor ma lcags kyu ma dang / zhags
pa ma dang / lcags sgrog ma dang / dril bu'i lag pas ste/ sgo srung ma dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi snying po bstan pa ste the tshom mi za'o/ /de
ltar bkod pa dang byas pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis kyang mtshan ma dang / phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /gong ma lta bu de'i phyed kyis
de'i nang du zla ba phyed pa'i dbyibs lta bu'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang / ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa dang / phyi rol tu ri mo bzhis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /lha mo thams cad kyi
gnas su ji skad gsungs pa'i gdan rnams ni dkar mo la sogs par rab tu brtag par bya'o/ /de la dbus su hrIH'i yi ge rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i shar gyi re'u mig

la ni hrIH'o/ /lho ru ni ho'o/ /nub tu ni gI'o/ /byang du ni dzi'o/ /me ru ni haM ngo / /bden bral du ni dzaM ngo / /rlung du ni maM ngo / /dbang ldan du haM ngo / /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu bkod pa ni me'i
mtshams su aM ngo / /bden bral du ni u'o/ /rlung du ni e'o/ /dbang ldan du ni ai dgaud par bya'o/ /shar gyi sgo la dzaH'o/ /lho ru ni hUM ngo / /nub tu ni baM mo/ /byang du ni hoH dgod
par bya'o/ /phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te/ der dbang po la sogs pa'i 'byung bo chen po brgyad po 'jigs par byed pa dgod par bya'o//
shar du ha ri b+ha sa la/ /lha yi tshogs ni yang dag bri/ /lho ru tsu ta'i shing la ni/ /gshin rje'i gtso bo'i dbang phyug bri/ /nub tu a sho ka gnas su/ /sprin gyi rgyal po der ni dgod//
de bzhin byang du byang chub shing / /gnod sbyin sde dpon mnyam par gzhag /de bzhin mer ni ka rany+dzar/ /drang srong tshogs kyis yang dag khyab/ /bden bral ta dza ta ra ni/ /srin po la
sogs de nas dgod/ /rlung du b+ha li pa lar ni/ /rlung gi bdag po yang dag bri/ /dbang ldan pa Da s+tha lar ni/ /yi dwags tshogs ni yang dag bri/ /drag bcas dbang bcas nye dbang bcas//
zla bcas nyi ma gshin rje'i che/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas zos byas shing / /thal ba'i dngos bcas 'tsho bar byed/ /thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor gyis/ /g.yon par kha T+wAM brten
@#/ /nas su/ /dril bu sil sil sgra sgrogs shing / /khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa bsnams/ /g.yasu rdo rje 'bar ba ste/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par
mdzad/ /skyil krung phyed pa byas nas ni/ /nyid kyi brla steng g.yon pa mnan/ /tshangs pa la sogs mnan pa de/ /grags pa nye bar mi za ste/ /kun tu 'od zer sna tshogs kyi/ /sangs
rgyas sprin dang mnyam pa 'dis/ /spro ba yang ni sbyin par bya/ /de ltar rnal 'byor bas bsgoms na/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung
ba ste brtag pa'i rgyal po gsum pa'o// //bcom ldan rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'i/ /ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ci/ /gsang ba nyan par 'tshal lags na//
thub ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mkha' 'gro ma'i

dam tshig gi phyag rgya bka' stsal pa/ kol+la i ri T+wI a bo l+la/ mu m+mu Ni re kak+ko lA/ gA Na ki bIT+Ta ho bAdz+dza i/ kA ru Ni ki a in ro lA/ ta hi ba lA khAdz+dza i/ g+ha De ma a NA bidz+dza i/ ha

le kA liny+dza ra pa Ni a i/ du d+hu ra badz+Sha a i/ tsa u sa ma kAs+thu ri sah+lI/ kap+pu ru lA i a i/ ma la in+d+hA NaM shA li dza/ ta hiM b+ha ru khA i a i/ phreM kha Na kheT+Ta kar n+te/ shud+d+ha a

shud+d+ha na mu Ni a i/ ni raM shu ang ga tsa DA bi a/ ta hi dza sa rA ba pa Ni a i/ ma la a haM kun du ru bAT+Ta i/ Di Di ma ta hiN+Na badz+dza a i/ mu khe g+ho g+hu gu g+hu/ mu g+hu lu g+hu/ draSh+TA/ 'di
rnams bltas nas rnal 'byor pas mtshan ma gsungs pa zhes bya ba la spro bar bya'o/ /DA/ DI/ bu/ su/ mA/ yo/ b+hi/ d+hI/ lu/ sti/ sa/ pe/ pI/ b+ha/ b+hu/ pI/ b+hu/ hI/ ga/ tri/ ku/ hA/ dzA/
ke| b+ha/ swA/ pu/ dzA/ o/ a/ go/ rA/ de/ mA/ kA/ o/ tri/ kau/ ka/ la/ kA/ hi/ pre/ gr-i/ sau/ su/ nA/ shi/ ma/ ku/ de nas ngag gi ts+tshe ma yi/ /cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya/ /gang

gis spun dang sring mor yang / /the tshom med par shes bya ba/ /po taM gI dang / /bra ti po taM gI dang / ga mu dang / lum+ba dang / ni gar dang / tsa Tu kaM dang / hr-i da yaM dang / kau ra ba dang /

kar+N+Na kA dang / a li ka ra Na dang / pa rA ha dang / shra wa Na dang / man+thA na dang / na raH dang / tA li kA dang / na ra kaM dang / a mru kaM dang / kA khi lA dang / swa sa Ni dang / ba ri d+hiH dang / bi ra

d+hiH dang / kru rA dang / an+taH dang / a li kA dang / b+ha gi nI dang / bu da kaM dang / gr-i hA Na dang / mu dra dang / dan+ta spaR+sha dzi hwA dang / gan+d+ha bA hi nI dang / A ga ma naM dang / s+thA nA ta dang / ki ra NaH

dang | go ma dang / nA dA dang / lam+bo da ra dang / dan+taHdang / ni ro d+ha dang / bidz+nya p+ti dang / d+huR+ya dang / d+hu mra pri yA dang / sA nu dang / sa ri taH dang / aM gu l+yA dang / ba da naM dang / rA dza
@#/ /ka dang / a da nA dang / paM k+ti dang / ts+tshan do dang / tsa loH dang / mr-i ga pa ti dang / maN+Da laM dang / sa maM dang / phal gu ShaM dang / mahA k+Sha raM dang / ts+tshA/ nA/ go dang /

ma dang / b+ha dang / hA dang / a bya kA dang / s+tha dang / dan+ta spaR+sha na dang / mu kha spaR+sha ne dang / ho dang / hrI kA dang / shU n+ya spaR+sha ne dang / u ru spaR+sha ne dang / steng dang / 'og tu yod
pa ni phyag rgya'i lan du gsungs so/ /yi ge dang / ngag gi ts+tsho ma ste bzhi pa las/ rab tu byed pa dang po'o// //rdo rje snying po snying rje che/ /yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon/ /
gzugs can ma dang 'o byed ma/ /lA ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo/ /mi ldog mo dang 'dod pa mo/ /'di dag mkha' 'gro bdun du gsungs/ /mngon par zhen pas lta ba dang / /smin
ma yon por gang byed cing / /sngon gyi gzugs ni sdud pa dang / /phyis nas 'jigs par byed pa ni/ /de ni gzugs can ma zhes bya/ /dpa' bos gnyis med sten pa'o/ /sdug
pa'am gal te mi sdug pa'i/ /byis pa lta zhing 'o byed na/ /de ni 'o byed mar shes bya/ /mkha' 'gro mchog kyang de nyid yin/ /byol song lta stangs khro gnyer gdong / /'di ni sman
sgyur sdigs par byed/ /gzhan du dbugs kyi 'jigs byed ma/ /de ni lA mar rnam par bstan/ /phag dang lce spyang byi la dang / /rta rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /de ni
yongs gyur ma ru gsungs/ /rab tu dga' zhing gsal bar dgod/ /song bar gyur nas mi ldog ma/ /de ni byis bcas mo ru gsungs/ /gang zhig skyo bas lag pa'am/ /bong ba
'am ni rkang pas sam/ /gos mtha' 'am yang na shing gis ni/ /des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /de ni mi ldog mar shes bya/ /dgod dang smra dang du ba dang / /glo bur du ni khro
'gyur ba/ /de ni 'dod pa mar shes bya/ /mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mor gsungs/ /thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang / /chu srin rgyal mtshan ral gri dang / /'phang mdung dang ni bdun

du gsungs/ /yang dag sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mtshon/ /lus srul mo'i mtshan ma dang / /phyag rgya ste bzhi pa las/ rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// //de nas lA ma'i mtshan nyid ni/ /yang dag rab tu bshad par bya/ /dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang / /pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i 'od/ /dkar po'i gos la rtag dga' zhing //
tsan+dan sar pa'i dri dang ldan/ /bde gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'/ /chags shing mthong na rjes 'gro ma/ /khyim du pad+ma'i dra byed pa/ /pad+ma gar dbang rigs las byung / /
smin ma'i dbus su rtse gsum son/ /lus ni sngo bsangs skya ba dang / /ut+pal sngon po'i dri dang mtshungs/ /khyim du rdo rje bris nas ni/ /rtag tu mchod par byed pa ni/ /he ru ka dpal
@#/ /rigs byung ba/ /de ni mkha' 'gro mar shes bya/ /mig dmar dkar dang dmar ba dang / /de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar/ /ra skyes khyim bya dag
gis kyang | |rtag tu dga' bar gyur pa dang / /de yi khyim du rdo rje ni/ /bris nas rtag tu mchod byed pa/ /he ru ka dpal rigs byung ba/ /mkha' 'gror 'di la the tshom med/ /
'khor lo gang gi dpral ba 'am/ /lag par yang ni mthong gyur pa'i/ /ser zhing sngo sangs bud med gang / /rtag tu gos ser dga' ba nyid/ /me tog dkar po dri chen dang //
skal bzang phun sum tshogs ma de/ /khyim du 'khor lo 'dri bar byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rjes 'gro /gnag cing sdo sangs bud med gang / /so ni dkar
zhing mtho ba dang / /rtag tu gdug pa'i g.yon pa ni/ /skra ni rtag tu grol ba yin/ /rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang / /spyod cing mang du smra ba dang / /rdo rje khyim du bris nas ni//
rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni/ /rdo rje phag mo'i rigs las byung / /dkar zhing gser dang mtshungs pa dang / /'bar ba'i mig dang ba spu gang / /rdo rje gang gi dpral ba'am//
lag par yang ni mthong gyur pa/ /rtag tu rgyal srid dga' ba dang / /snyems shing bden par smra ba dang / /ma li ka yi dri dang ldan/ /khyim du rdo rje bris nas ni/ /rtag tu mchod
ma byed pa ni/ /dum skyes ma yi rigs las byung / /rnal 'byor dbang chen mo ni mchog/ sha la dga' ba'i bud med gang / /mig sman nag po lta bu'i 'od/ /dpral bar mdung
rtse'i rnam pa nyid/ /drag shul las la dga' ba gang / /rtag tu dur khrod 'gro gang dang / /'jigs med skyug bro med pa dang / /gang gi dpral bar bsdus nas ni/ /khyim du thod pa
'dri byed cing / /rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni/ /he ru ka yi rigs las byung / /char sprin mdog 'dra'i bud med gang / /so ni mi mnyam par gnas shing / /rtag tu drag shul
las rnams dang / /g.yon pa'i mche ba byung ba ni/ /khyim du dgra sta 'dri byed cing / /rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni/ /rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs byung ba/ /de ni mkha' 'gror the
tshom med/ /gang gi skra ni li ba dang / /bzhin ni yongs su zlum pa dang / /rtag tu kha la sma ra dang / /smin ma ring zhing ba spu dang / /gos dkar gtsang zhing zhi ba dang / /mi bskyod
bden par smra ba dang / /rtag tu dam pa'i chos dga' ba/ /dpa' bo'i sring mor de shes bya/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya sbyin par bya/ /yang na rus spal phyag rgya bya/ /ril ba spyi blugs
mchod byed pa/ /phyag rgya lan du brjod par bya/ /de ni tshes bcu'i res dag la/ /khyim du pad+ma 'dri bar byed/ /ma mchu 'phyang zhing mig yangs ma/ /mig ni dmar zhing
@#/ /ser pa dang / /che zhing skal bzang nor dang ldan/ /ser zhing tsam pa lta bu nyid/ /ring zhing lag pa ring pa dang / /sna tshogs gos la dga' ba dang / /ri
mo gsum ni dpral ba'am/ /steng gi mtshams su nges par gnas/ /dgod pa dang ni dga' ba nyid/ /lam gyi rnam pa gnon cing mnan/ /g.yul du shi ba rnams kyi ni/ /
gtam la rtag tu dga' ba nyid/ /de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni/ /mdung rtse'i phyag rgya rab bstan bya/ /rkang pa g.yon pa bskums pa yi/ /gar nyid kyang ni rab bstan bya//
g.yon gyis yongs su bskor ba ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya/ /de yi bcu bzhi'am brgyad pa la/ /de khyim mdung rtse bris shing mchod/ /'jig rten dbang phyug
mtshan nyid yin/ /dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang / /mig ni ljang zhing ser ba dang / /de bzhin skra ni 'khyil ba dang / /dar dbyangs bcings par snang ba nyid/ /ri
mo gcig par rab tu gnas/ /de bzhin steng du ring ba dang / /rtag tu gos dmar la dga' zhing / /rtag tu dgod cing glu len dang / /glo bur du ni khro ba dang / /khyad par
du ni sems g.yo dang / /rtsod pa rtag tu dga' ba nyid/ /de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni/ /'phang mdung phyag rgyas rab bstan bya/ /gnyis pa yis kyang 'bad pa yis/ /
dril bu'i phyag rgya rab tu sbyin/ /g.yon nas yongs su bskor ba dang / /phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya/ /thung zhing byin pa sbom pa dang / /rtag tu gos ser dga' ba dang / /mgrin pa nas
ni gos 'phyang ba/ /de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya rab bstan bya/ /gnyis pa'ang rab tu 'bad pas ni/ /dung gi phyag rgya sbyin par bya/ /de bzhin yongs su
bskor ba nyid/ /de yi dus na bcu bzhi la/ /khyim du rdo rje 'dri bar byed/ /yan lag kun la ba spur bcas/ /mig ni gnag cing ser ba dang / /gtsigs shing rnam 'gyur 'jigs pa
dang | |bzhin sbom kha ni sbom pa dang / /ma mchu 'phyang zhing khung mig dang / /sna ni nyams par gyur pa dang / /rtag tu dri ba 'dod pa dang / /sprin gyi kha dog lto che ba/ /de 'dra'i rab
myos mthong nas ni/ /klu yi phyag rgya rab sbyin bya/ /gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis/ /'phang mdung phyag rgya sbyin par bya/ /yongs su bskor ba gong ma bzhin/ /de ni bcu gcig tshes la ni//
mche ba 'dri zhing rtag tu mchod/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ste bzhi pa las/ /rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// //de nas yan lag phyag rgya yi/ /mtshan nyid yang dag rab
bshad bya/ /bud med gang zhig spyi gtsug reg /spyi bo de yis rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la/ /mkhur tshos de yis rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig so ni ston pa la/ /lce ni de yis rab
@#/ /bstan bya/ /gang zhig ma mchu ston pa la/ /kos ko de yis rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig mgrin pa reg pa la/ /lto ba de yis rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig
lto ba ston pa la/ /lto ba de yis rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig mjug ma ston pa la/ /sa ni de yis rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig gsang ba ston pa la/ /ling ga de yis rab bstan bya/ /
gang zhig bus mo ston pa la/ /dbung pa de yis rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig rkang pa ston pa la/ /rkang mthil de yis rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig sor mo ston pa la/ /sen mo de
yis rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig sa ni ston pa la/ /nam mkha' de yis rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig nam mkha' ston pa la/ /nyi ma de yis rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig chu bo
ston pa la/ /rgya mtsho de yis rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig sor mo gcig ston pa/ /legs par 'ongs shes brjod pa yin/ /gang zhig sor mo gnyis ston pa/ /shin tu
legs 'ong brjod pa yin/ /g.yas pa'i smin ma sgyur tshul dang / /g.yon pa'i smin sgyur tshul ston pa/ /slob dpon gnyis dang 'du ba ston/ /rgyud thams cad kyi gsang ba
yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i brda ste brtag pa'i rgyal po bzhi pa'o// //de nas skye bo dam pa kun/ /'du ba yang dag rab bshad bya//
de la zas gcig bza' bar bya/ /snod gnyis su yang ma lus brtson/ kye/ bcom ldan 'das/ /'du ba'i gnas gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dang

nye ba'i gnas dang ni/ /zhing dang de bzhin nye ba'i zhing / /ts+tshon+do nye ba'i ts+tshan+do ha/ /'du ba de bzhin nye 'du ba/ /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod dang / /'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcig nyid/ /'di
rnams sa ni bcu gnyis te/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid/ /'di ni gzhan gis brjod mi bya/ /kye/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnas la sogs pa gang lags/ /de bzhin du sa
bcu gnyis po rnams rgya chen po las 'byung ba bka' drin gyis bskyab tu gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas ni dzA lan+d+ha rar gsungs/ /de bzhin du ni
uD+yan nyid/ /gnas ni ko l+la gi ri dang / /de bzhin arbu da nyid do/ /nye gnas go dA ba yi nyid/ /de bzhin dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / /de bzhin de bI ko Tar bshad/ /de bzhin
mA la ba nyid dang / /de bzhin kA ma rU par gsungs/ /o tre zhing ni nyid du gsungs/ /nye zhing tri sha kun ni dang / /de bzhin ko sha la nyid dang / /ka li kar ni ci gsungs pa'o/ /de
bzhin laM pA ka nyid dang / /kany+tsi kha ba'i gnas nyid ni/ /ts+tshan+do ra yang dag gsungs pa dang / /nye ba yi yad ts+tsha n+do'o/ /pre ta a hi pA si gsungs/ /de bzhin khyim gyi lha nyid dang //
@#/ /sau rASh+Ta dang gser gling nyid/ /'du ba de bzhin nye 'du ba/ /nA gar dang sin+d+hA ni/ /dur khrod nyid du brjod ba dang / /ma ru dang ni ku lu ta/ /nye pa yi ni dur

khrod nyid/ /snying rje de bzhin las kyi brang / /ha ri ke la nyid dang ni/ /lan tshwa rgya mtsho'i nang song dang / /bin+d+hA gzhon nu'i grong khyer nyid/ /'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod do/ /de dang
nye ba dur khrod nyid/ /rab song dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i 'gram/ /skyed mtsho tshal gyi rdzing bu'i 'gram/ /nye ba'i dur khrod brjod par bya/ /de nas gnas la lhag par gnas pa'i cho
ga bshad par bya ste/ /rdul bral gnas su tsU ta gnas/ /kong ka nar ni zla ba'i gling / /ka rany+dza ra gnas tsA ri tra/ /aT+Ta ha sar ka dam pa/ /lha mo'i mkhar du ba Ta gnas/ /ha
ri ke la ra ha ri gnas/ /uT+yan a sho ka ni gnas/ /dzA lan+d+ha rar gser shing gnas/ /gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/ /de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med/ /zhing ni 'od byed shes

bar bya/ /nyes pa'i zhing ni 'od 'phro can/ /ts+tsha n+do mngon du 'gyur par nges/ /nye ba'i ts+tsha n+do sbyang dka' ba/ /'du ba ring du song ba ste/ /nye ba'i 'du ba mi g.yo ba/ /dur khrod legs pa'i
blo gros nyid/ /nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin/ /pha rol phyin bcu'i sa rnams la/ /rnal 'byor ma yi kla klo'i skad/ /bu la sogs pa ri gsungs pa/ /phyi ngang mang du bsam par
bya| |rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'du ba'i/ /nyin par nyid kyang legs bshad bya/ /yi dwags zla phyed bcu bzhi dang / /brgyad pa la yang khyad par du/ /rgyal mchen dang ni mtshon bsnun
nyid/ /skye ba bdun pa khyad par du/ /'bad pas snying rje bskyed nas ni/ /mkhas pas gsad par bya ba nyid/ /snying rje med na mi 'grub pas/ /de phyir snying rje yang dag bshad/ /ji ltar
bdag bzhin sems can nyid/ /ji ltar sems can de bzhin bdag /'di ltar sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bdag /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /'du ba'i gnas te lnga pa las/
rab tu byed pa dang po'o// //gsang ba'i pad+ma'i mtshan nyid ni/ /ye shes dbang po nyan par 'tshal/ /ye shes sems dang 'dres pa yi/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim pa ci//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gnas bzhi mnyam par gnas nas ni/ /rdzogs bya rim pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed nas ni/ /'dod chags
la sogs ring du spangs/ /yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su ni/ /bde ba'i bstan la 'dug nas ni/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun/ /snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /spyi bo
med pa'i spyi bo dang / /sgra mtha'i de bzhin gsang pad+ma/ /cha ni sna tshogs yig 'bru rnams/ /de bzhin du yang bstan rnams nyid/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /chos kyi dbyings
@#/ /kyi rnam par byed/ /bsdus nas gong bu'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpar rang nyid 'gyur/ /chu yi khams dang me yi khams/ /ro gcig
mchog gi gnas su ni/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid sbyor/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dbang po drug /bstan bcos tshad ma slob dpon dang / /lung gi rjes 'brangs
de nyid shes/ /gsang don de nyid dngos po yang / /de nyid las ni gcig las gcig /sngar gyi mtshan nyid thams cad kyi/ /stong sogs de nyid mtshan nyid kyis/ /lus
kyi dri ma bkrus nas ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par sbyar/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes sems dpa' bsam par bya/ /mdog dkar kun da zla
pa yi/ /'od zer rnam par spro ba ni/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /pad+ma'i gnas la yang dag bzhugs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas
lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /phyag rgya chen po phyag gnyis kyis/ /snying gi gnas su gzir bar mdzad/ /gzugs dang gzi brjid yongs gang ba/ /ye shes sems dpar sgom
pa nyid/ /chu shing me tog lta bur ni/ /lte ba ru ni yang dag gnas/ /langs nas snying gar kun tu gnas/ /sngar gyi mtshan nyid yongs gang ba/ /bton nas dang po pad+ma ni/
'dab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes/ /ze ba dang ni ze 'brur bcas/ /yi ge rnam dgod dgod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas pa yi/ /phyag gnyis zhal gcig dkar po ni/ /bzang po dri
med dbus su bsam/ /de yi dbus su rnam shes dang / /ye shes de nyid sbyar bar bya/ /dang po shar gyi 'dab ma la/ /byams par ldan pa'i mi bskyod pa/ /lho yi sgor ni snying rje nyid/ /
rim chen de nyid sa bon las/ /nub kyi sgo yi 'dab ma la/ /'od dpag med pa'i sa bon dgod/ /byang gi sgo yi gnas su ni/ /sems kyi don yod gtso bo nyid/ /dang po'i dbyangs
sogs sa bon gyi/ /zla ba'i thig le ji bzhin rim/ /zla ba'i 'od zer dkar brgyan pa'i/ /yi ge bzhi ni dgod par bya/ /mtshams rnams su ni ma ni pa nyid/ /rnam pa bzhi po sngar
gsungs pa/ /de yi dbus su de yi sems/ /yi ge yis ni sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol ba/ /sems la the tshom 'khrungs lags pa/ /bcom ldan bdag la bshad du
gsol/ /stong ba mtshon du med pa la/ /yi ge'i rnal 'byor la sogs ci/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /de nyid ji ltar rdo rje nyon/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid stong pa
nyid/ /snying po med pa'i chu shing las/ /snying po bdud rtsi 'bras 'byung ltar/ /'bras bu rnam shes ye shes ni/ /gzugs med pa la ye shes gzugs/ /ye shes sku ni skyon med
@#/ /pa| |mchan nyid mtshon du med pa nyid/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/ /yig 'bru med las yig 'bru'i gzugs/ /de dbus ngo bo stong pa
nyid/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pa yis gzung / /ji ltar mtshan nyid shes kyang ni/ /mnyam nyid ye shes sems kyis ni/ /de yi rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam/ /myur ba nyid du mthong bar 'gyur
bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni/ /ye shes rnam shes ngo bo las/ /mtshan nyid bstan bcos mdor bsdus pa/ /de nyid dpa' bo ston pa po/ /'di yi sgom pa thams cad kyi//
'od zer dkar pos rnam par brgyan/ /lcags sgrog lnga po mchod rten gyi/ /bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsams nas ni/ /kha dog dkar po 'od gsal ba/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag
par 'gyur/ /snying gi sa bon pad dbus su/ /mthe bong yongs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid/ /de yi dbus su sa bon ni/ /A li kA li yongs btus pa/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu
mdzes/ /zla ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba ni/ /de yi dbus su sgo rnams kyi/ /thig le bsam par rab tu grags/ /skra yi rtse mo brgya stong char/ /phra rab gzugs su yang dag gnas/
rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin las/ /ye shes can gyi mtshan nyid mtshon/ /go 'phang gnas kyi thig le ltos/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid thams cad shes/ /snying la tshangs
pa'i sgo yi ni/ /thig le sgo yi lam las ni/ /bla ma'i man ngag brtson pa yis/ /rnam shes ye shes kyi yang blang / /lam gyi pha rol bstan bcos kyang / /ma yin ring bar gyur pa min//
bstan bcos rnams ni rnyed sla yang / /sbyor ba de la rnyed par dka'/ /rnal 'byor pa yi thabs kyis ni/ /bla ma gsol ba 'debs la brtson/ /bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni/ /rnam
par mkhas pas mthong bar 'gyur/ /mnyam gzhag dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /g.yo ba med cing 'tshe ba med/ /yid ni chos rnams sngon du 'gro /yid ni dag cing yid
ltar mgyogs/ /yid kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis/ /smra ba dang ni byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir yid kyis bdag nyid kun/ /yid la byung bar blo ldan pas/ /snying gar sems sgom
sdom pa ni/ /gal te 'dod na yo gis bzlas/ /rgyu ru gyur pa'i sa bon te/ /de nyid dpyad pas ma yin no/ /'bras bu rgyu yi sa bon te/ /de nyid mthong ba ma yin no/ /gzugs sogs
srid pa'i longs spyod kyi/ /dmigs pa'i sa bon rnam pa lnga/ /spyi bo spyi med yang dag gnas/ /kun nas kun tu 'bar bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu rtsa ba'i sa bon gyi/ /ye shes rnam shes
sa bon las/ /thig le sgra dang yang dag ldan/ /'khor ba'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis/ /yid kyi bzlas pa yang dag ldan/ /yi ge ngag ni rnam par spangs/ /nges par rtag tu go
@#/ /'phang gnas/ /rtag pa dang ni chos kyi dbyings/ /rtag tu phra zhing skyon med pa/ /ye shes la ni rnam shes nub/ /ye shes dngos pos rnam shes kyi//
rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim mthong 'gyur/ /dang por mtshan ma thams cad kyi/ /mar me'i rnam pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa mtshan mo me khyer gyi/ /rnam pa'i rdul du
mtshon par byed/ /rdul dkar tsa na ka dbyibs su/ /phyogs bcur de bzhin mthong bar 'gyur/ /gsum par nyon mongs bcom pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par
brtag /lha yi longs spyod 'dod pa yang / /bzhi par yang ni bstan pa'o/ /lha yi gzugs ni rnams cad kyang / /lnga par sems kyis brtag par bya/ /drug pa gzugs
ni med pa'i tshe/ /bdun pa chos kyi dbyings nyid de/ /brgyad par rang 'dod rnal 'byor pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu'i don/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snying rje che/ /yid
ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon/ /nges par dngos po thams cad kyi/ /dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod/ /phyis ni re rer dbye ba yis/ /lha rnams kyi ni brjod par bya/ /lus can
rnams kyi phung po dang / /khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag /nyon mongs mi shes sgrib sbyang bya/ /rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid/ /dag pa
gzhan gyis rnam grol min/ /yul gyi dngos po dag pa'i phyir/ /rang gis rig pa'i bde ba mchog /gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gang dang / /gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa snang ba//
de kun rang bzhin dag pa ste/ /de phyir sangs rgyas sna tshogs dngos/ /kye| bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par ma dag pa gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs la
sogs pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol ba/ gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mig gis
gzugs ni gzung bar bya/ /sgra ni rna bas mnyan par bya/ /dri ni sna yis tshor bar bya/ /lce yis ro ni rig par bya/ /lus kyis dngos po rig par bya/ /yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni/ /
dag pas dug med byas nas ni/ /bsten bya 'di dag bsten par bya/ /gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma ste/ /'du shes pad+ma gar dbang phyug /de bzhin 'du
byed rdo rje rgyal/ /rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /kun gyi ngo bo he ru ka /mig la gti mug rdo rje bshad/ /zhe sdang rdo rje mngon thos pa/ /phrag dog rdo rje de bzhin sna/ /kha ni 'dod
chags rdo rjer bshad/ /reg las ser sna rdo rje ma/ /khams dang skye mched thams cad ni/ /dam pa'i dbang phyug he ru ka /sa yi khams ni ltung byed ma/ /chu khams gsod par byed
@#/ /mar brjod/ /me yi khams ni 'gugs byed ma/ /de bzhin rlung ni gar dbang phyug /nam mkha'i khams su brjod pa ni/ /pad+ma 'bar ba 'khyil ba nyid/ /'di ltar
lus can rnams kyi lus/ /phung po la sogs lha bdag nyid/ /bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin las/ /nyon mongs la sogs der bskyed pa'i/ /bskyed pa'i cha la legs gnas pas//
srid dang mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /phung po dang / skye mched rnam par dag pa ste lnga pa las/ rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// //de nas spyod ba rtog pa rnams/ /'jig
par byed pa bshad par bya/ /chos rnams kun la mnyam byung ba/ /de nyid spyod pa gong na med/ /sangs rgyas sras la phan pa'i phyir/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam gnas pa/ /gang
zhig yang ni de nyid las/ /rdo rje yan lag med pa yi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog /skye ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs chen por/ /rga ba'i rlabs kyis 'khrugs pa las/ /
sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed/ /tshong pa dge bar 'gro ba dang / /myur du dngos grub gsal byed cing / /snying po'i yon tan kun gyi gnas/ /sems kyi rin chen las byung
ba| |'dod yon rab tu sgrub par byed/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas rab bsngags pa'i/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i yon tan kun/ /lus 'byung 'di las ma gtogs par/ /dga' ba'i dngos
grub 'byung mi 'gyur/ /mkhas mchog spyod pa mtshungs med 'di/ /grol bar 'dod pas spyad par gyis/ /lha yi dgra dang brgya byin dang / /grong khyer sum brtsegs dgra bo dang / /nor sbyan
tshangs pa la sogs pas/ /zhabs kyi 'dam skyes mchod pa yi/ /sdig pa 'jig byed 'di la spyod/ /myur du de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /gnas kyi mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /dpal
ldan rdo rje sems dpas ni/ /gang zhig 'gro la phan par ni/ /kun 'dar gyi ni spyod pa gsungs/ /de ltar mchog tu bsam yas gnas/ /shin tu gsang ba yo gis sgom/ /rtog pa
thams cad bral ba ni/ /dam tshig la ni spyod par bya/ /rgyu mthun 'bras bu rang bzhin las/ /dang po'i rtsom bar yo gi gnas/ /de nas bsgoms pas dub pa na/ /bsdus nas byis
ba'i rtse bar bya/ /sna tshogs gdul bya'i 'jig rten la/ /'jam pa'i gzugs can rang nyid bsgom/ /grub par grags pa ma lus pa/ /ci gsungs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /spyod pa bla
na med pa yis/ /kun bzang mtshungs pa med 'grub pas/ /spyod pa nges rig rdo rje can/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /dpal ldan slob dpon rdo rje can/ /kun gyi mgon la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang ba'i spyod pas gnas nas ni/ /blo gros chen po bya ba byas/ /de nas rang gi 'dod sgyur bas/ /sbyor ba kun la kha phyir bltas/ /kun tu seng ge lta bur ni/ /de nyid
@#/ /ldan pas bdag gis spyad/ /ji ltar byung don yang dag rig /'gro ba 'don pa'i bsam pa yis/ /yang dag lta ba rab sgyur bdag /brtan pa'i sems
ni gnas med pas/ /phung po khams sogs mtshan nyid ni/ /thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma ltar/ /khams gsum 'di dag thams cad ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni 'dir shes
bya| |sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol/ /'tsho bar dbang phyug 'du ba dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad ni/ /thams cad shin tu ring du spangs/ /rtag tu rtog pa med
gyur bas/ /gnyis su med bar nges byas nas/ /pha rol phyin drug rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub rab grub phyir/ /sems can don la legs nus kyang / /sems
can yongs su brtag mi bya/ /byang chub la ni sems bzhag nas/ /phyogs las rgyal ba'i spyod pa brtsam/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i bdag /sbyor ba kun la rgyab kyis
phyogs/ /de nyid goms par rab byas pas/ /skye ba 'dir ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtog pa kun las rnam par grol/ /sems can bsam pa'i khyad par las/ /sgyu ma ltar
sogs rnal 'byor gyis/ /thams cad nyid ni bza' bar bya/ /chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung / /mi mthun phyogs ni gang yang med/ /dogs ba med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /
ji ltar 'dod par rab tu bza'/ /longs spyod rdzogs don 'di dag kun/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sprul/ /
ye shes mtha' yas thob pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs phyag mi bya na/ /rtag tu sgom pa ldan pa yis/ /dbang bskur med sogs smos ci dgos/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin
las/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di/ /de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /de phyir de nyid lha rnams nyid/ /dkyil 'khor smyung bar mi bya zhing / /phyag rgya mchod rten las mi bya/ /dpal
ldan rdo rje mgon pos ni/ /gang yang gzhan du bstan pa rnams/ /lag par mos pas gnas gang yang / /de rnams kyis kyang de nyid rig /ji ltar bdud rtsi don gnyer bas/ /snying po
blangs nas dor ba spong / /de ltar chos kyi snying po ni/ /thob nas rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /rtog med gang tshe blo ldan pas/ /dogs pa spangs shing gnas med pa/ /thugs kyi rdo rje
ci gsungs bzhin/ /de tshe 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /rtog pas dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur te/ /'gro ba drug gi 'khor bar yi/ /rgya mtsho ru ni 'khor bar 'gyur/ /rtog pa med na grol
'gyur zhing / /gnas ni dri med zhi ba nyid/ /de phyir rtog pa'i dra gzhom phyir/ /dam tshig sangs rgyas mdzad pa gang / /de ni rtag tu goms par bya/ /gang gis dam tshig gnas gyur
@#/ /pa| |sngags shes bsam pa'i nus pas bya/ /dngos bo kun la blta bar bya/ /nges par thams cad ma skyes pa'i/ /rnam ba yi ni rnal 'byor gyis/ /
khyi dang bong bu rnga mo dang / /glang po la sogs khrag 'thungs nas/ /sha yang rtag tu bza' ba nyid/ /sha chen khrag gis gos pa ni/ /thams cad khyad par du ni blta/ /dman pa'i
sha ni thams cad dang / /srog chags 'bum phrag brgya ldan bza'/ /rnam snang shin tu rul pa yi/ /srin bu brgya phrag zi zir ldan/ /khyi dang mi skyugs bsres nas ni/ /sha ni
