pa'o|| ||de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dpal ldan nag po chen po yi/ /rnal 'byor ting 'dzin la zhugs te/ /mngon par spyod pa brtsam par bya/ /khyad
par dur khrod pa yi shing / /lha 'dre gtum po gnas pa las/ /ma mo'i bye brag brtags pa las/ /bcad pa mgo mjug ma nor bar/ /gnyis bshags de nas sngags bris la/ /
bsdams te blang ba mig gis ni/ /phye ba'i bdun phrag gsum pa la/ /legs par bzhag ste tshad du bya/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa la zugs/ /gzhan yang bsgrub bya'i gzugs dag
ni| |zur gsum tshud pa sngags dang bcas/ /ming spel bskul tshig ldan pa ni/ /grangs ni rab 'bring tha ma ste/ /ci rigs par ni bya bar gsungs/ /yang na ro sgrom shing la yang / /byang
bu byas la ling ga bri/ /gzhan du mgon po yab yum gyi/ /'khor lo legs par bris pa dang / /bsgrub bya srog gi 'khor lo ni/ /gri gug lnga pa 'khor ba dag /de dag bar du bcug pa
dang | |yang na mgon po'i 'khor lo dang / /bsgrub bya du yod ling ga rnams/ /de yi nang du dril bar bya/ /'khor lo tshon skud rnam lngas dkri /de yi phyi rol ku sha yi/ /rtswa yi mi gzugs
byas nas kyang / /rang mdun gru gsum nag po yi/ /nang du gzugs de gzhug par bya/ /de la lha dang dbye ba dang / /nyes pa bsgo zhing bsgrag par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid lha dang ni/ /mdun
du nag po chen po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /yum dang bcas pa bskyed pa dang / /spyan drangs mchod cing bstim par bya/ /las mgon rnams dang ma mo bzhi/ /
rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu/ /lha srin sde brgyad ma lus dang / /gzhan yang dur khrod sha za dang / /ma mo ro langs lce spyang dang / /stag dang dred dang bya gcan sogs/ /bya rog khwa
@#/ /ta la sogs pa/ /yongs su bskor cing 'phrin las byed/ /de nas rang dang mgon po dang / /lha mo bzhi la sogs pa yi/ /sa bon las ni 'od zer yang / /lcags
kyu lta bu dpag med pas/ /bsgrub bya de dag ma lus pa/ /snying gi srog rtsa nas drangs te/ /rang dbang med par rlung gis bteg /myur du 'ong ba mdog nyams pa/ /rid cing skra 'dzings
shin tu 'dar/ /yed yed sdang zhing skrag pa de/ /zhags pas bcings dang bsdams pa dang / /dril bu la sogs sgra yis ni/ /shin tu dbang po myos gyur te/ /de yi rnam par shes pa
ni| |ming dang bcas pa'i gzugs la bstim/ /de yi dus su gsang sngags ni/ /'phrin las sngags rings mtha' ru ni/ /A ka rA ya dzaH zhes brjod/ /mgon po nag po yab yum
gyi| |lte bar gru gsum lcags khang ni/ /btson dong mun khang gnas pa bsam/ /de las thar dus med par bya/ /de nas dong de ro g.yam la/ /rdo rje rgya gram bris pas mnan/ /mtha'
mar las sbyor dus su yang / /bsgrub bya'i them pa'am lam dag tu/ /mnan pa byas la 'phrin las bcol/ /gal te de nyid sbyin sreg gis/ /las sbyor bsgrub bya'i chu rjes sogs//
dri ma gos dang skra sogs dang / /tsha ba gsum dang dug sna dang / /khrag dang skye tshe shang tshe dang / /da d+hu ra dang de la sogs/ /sa sna gzhan dang sbyar bar bya/ /bong bu'i chu dang bsres
nas ni/ /'jim pa byas la g.yogs par bya/ /dug chu ro sol dag gis ni/ /de la byug cing gnas lnga ru/ /seng ldeng lcags phur btab la bzhag /de yi lus po thams cad la/ /spra tshil
gyis ni byug par bya/ /de la drag po'i shing gi ni/ /tsher ma sna tshogs btsugs la bzhag /gru gsum e yi nang du ni/ /de gzugs phyi gan dag tu bzhag/ kha nang dur khrod thal bas
brdzang / /de nas dong kha bcad la bzhag /de la thun bzhir bya ba'am/ /dus drug dag tu bya ba ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis lhor bltas la/ /nyin phyed mtshan phyed dus su bya/ /yang na dus
bzhir las la sbyar/ /phyogs kyi DA ki bzhi yis ni/ /dgug gzhug bstim dang bsngags par bya/ /de nas thod pa mtshan ngan du/ /nyungs kar nyungs nag la sogs pa'i/ /thun rdzas
rnams la sngags bzlas shing / /dus dus dag tu brdeg par bya/ /skabs skabs dug gi chu yis brdeg /gal te gu gul nag po dang / /sha chen dag gis bdug par bya/ /yang na 'bras
phub me la ni/ /spra tshil ma zhu tsam du bsre/ /de nas sngags kyis brdeg par bya/ /'di ni nye bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ltar cho ga'i thabs 'di yis/ /dgra yi khang par bya rog dag /mang
po 'ba' zhig skad 'don dang / /lus la tsha bas thebs la sogs/ /du ma'i cho 'phrul 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dang por nang rtags gsal bar 'char/ /phyi rtags rim gyis 'byung bar
@#/ /gyur/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ /drag po'i mngon spyod bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas
gdug pa 'dul don du/ /nag po chen po khros pa yi/ /sgrub pa'i rim pa mchog gyur pa/ /gzhan yang rab tu bshad par bya/ /rje btsun he ru ka dpal dang / /nag po chen po'i lha
tshogs rnams/ /nam mkha' mngon par bltas nas ni/ /bdun po yongs su dag par bya/ /bzod par gsol ba gshegs su gsol/ /de rjes stong pa'i ngang las ni/ /tshad
med bzhi po bsam par bya/ /byang chub sems kyi ngang las ni/ /pad+ma zla nyir gnas pa yi/ /hUM yig nag por bsam par bya/ /de yi 'od kyis khyab pa las/ /bsdus shing skad cig
yongs gyur pa/ /dpal ldan nag po chen po ni/ /zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/ /phyag gnyis sku mdog shin tu gnag /dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes/ /g.yas pa gshin
rje'i lce 'dra ba'i/ /gri gug rnon po 'dzin par mdzad/ /g.yon pa thod pa khrag bkang bsnams/ /thod pas skra mtshams bcings pa dang / /yan lag thung zhing rags pa'i gzugs//
mche gtsigs 'jigs su rung ba ste/ /ltos 'gro brgyad dang rin chen brgyad/ /rgyu ma'i ga sha stag lpags can/ /mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba 'phyang / /zhal nas khrag 'dzag gang
rgyangs can/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la spras/ /drag po'i nyams dang ldan pa ste/ /skud cig tsam gyis bskyed par bya/ /de yi thugs kar nyi ma la/ /ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar
dmigs/ /ting 'dzin sems dpa' dang bcas pa/ /rten dang brten par bcas pa bsam/ /de la 'di yi gsang sngags byung / /oM badzra mahA kA lA ya hUM hUM phaT/ ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa/ /
gsang sngags phreng ba bzlas par bya/ /de nas sha chen spos sreg cing / /gzhan yang dug dang khrag la sogs/ /bdug pa'i du bas mchod par bya/ /ma sha 'bras dang so ba dang / /'bru
nag me tog byug pa dang / /sgron ma lnga dang mi 'chi lnga/ /khur ba chan dang chang la sogs/ /gtor ma nag po che la dbul/ /mchod dang bstod pa tshul bzhin bya/ /'di yi nye bar spyad pa
ni| |bsgrub bya'i zag pa'i rdzas rnams dang / /tsha ba gsum la sogs pa la/ /gang gi ming dang bcas pa'i gzugs/ /byas te dug gis byugs nas kyang / /tsher mas bkang ste thab
khung du/ /'bras phub me la gdung la sogs/ /bya ba sna tshogs las byas na/ /skad cig gis ni brlag par byed/ /rdo rje slob dpon smod byed cing / /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig byed
pa| |dkon mchog gsum la sdang ba dang / /sems can kun la 'tshe ba rnams/ /'di dag nag po chen pos sgrol/ /yan lag dag gi sha chod la/ /mgon po nag po'i zhal du
@#/ /gsol/ /yang na de yi spyi nas ni/ /til tsam du ni mdzad du gsol/ /khrag gi rgyun yang 'thung bar mdzod/ /de ltar 'phrin las las bcol bya/ /de nas sbyin
sreg brtsam par bya/ /phung shul g.yul sprad la sogs pa/ /dur khrod sol bas byug byas te/ /gru gsum rim pa kha khyer ldan/ /de yi nang du drag po'i shing / /tsher ma can gyis
brtsig par bya/ /mchod dang bsreg rdzas gtor ma dang / /bsgrub bya'i ling ga sha chen dang / /yungs kar bcas pas yongs su bskor/ /sngags pas lhor bltas ting 'dzin zhugs//
me lha bskyed cing dgug gzhug bya/ /ling ga phur btab gtubs byas la/ /me sbar bsregs pas lha la mchod/ /gsang sngags 'dod yon bsgyur ldan pa/ /phrag gcig gis ni lan
gcig ste/ /lan grangs rol mtsho'i khyad par gyis/ /phyir mi bzlog cing srog gtor byed/ /de rjes gsol gdab bcol bskul bya/ /shin tu myur bar rtags rnams 'grub/ /
nag po chen po'i gsang ba'i las/ /ma grub lan gsum spogs pa dang / /sa bon 'phrog cing gcud pas 'grub/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/
drag po'i sbyin sreg bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dur khrod gnas pa'i zhing skyong dang / /nyi shu rtsa bzhi zhing skyong
bcas| |de dag rim pa bshad par bya/ /rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya mo/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'phrin las dang / /dI nyid gsang ba'i mgon po yi/ /thabs mchog 'di ni kun tu sbas/ /dpal ldan
mgon po rdo rje can/ /khro bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs dpa' bo ni/ /shin tu 'gying zhing 'bar ba'i sku/ /le tshe dgu pa'i dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs pad+ma
nyi dbus la/ /dpa' bo chen po phyed dkyil tshul/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum b+hi ru la ltar dmar/ /sku mdog sngon po 'jigs chen po/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam
par brgyan/ /phyag rgya lnga ldan gar gyis rol/ /dang pos gri gug thod pa dang / /gnyis pa ral gri kha T+wAM ga /klu brgyad rgyan gyi phrin las can/ /de yi thugs kar gnas pa yi/ /sa bon
spro dang bsdu pa'i dngos/ /oM mahA kA la A kaR+Sha ya ma pra sha ma nA ya ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ thams cad sdud cing dbang byed pa/ /skad cig cam gyis bskyed par bya/ /de yi shar gyi le tshe
la| |drag po shin tu 'jigs pa ste/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/ /mthing nag rngam pa'i tshul du gnas/ /de yi mdun du rgan byed ma/ /g.yas su mi sdug drag po che/ /
g.yon du 'jigs ma gnas pa dang / /rgyab tu u ma rnam par rol/ /nag po'i lho yi phyogs su ni/ /drag po chen po du ba'i mdog /zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/ /thod
@#/ /phreng gis brgyan gtsigs pa'i tshul/ /de yi mdun du rnam rgyal ma/ /g.yas su rnam par rgyal ba ma/ rgyab tu mi sdug ma gnas la/ /g.yon du gzhan gyis mi thub
ma'o| |lha gter mnyam gnas nub phyogs su/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/ /mdog ser rgyu ma'i phreng bas dkris/ /shin tu bzhad pa'i tshul du gnas/ /de yi mdun du nag
mo che| |g.yas su drag chen drag shul chen/ /rgyab tu nag sbom ma ni gnas/ /g.yon du bzang mo mche ba can/ /nag po khyab byed byang phyogs su/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum
pa| |char sprin nag po'i mdog 'dra ba/ /shin tu gdangs shing ljags 'dril ba/ /de yi mdun du dbang mo ste/ /g.yas su zla ba mo zhes bya/ /rgyab tu drag tu sdang ba la/ /g.yon du rna
ba 'phyang ba'o/ /gtso bo nag po chen po ni/ /shar lho mtshams kyi gnas bzhugs pa/ /gtsigs pa can ni shel gyi mdog /stag lpags gos kyis dkris pa 'o/ /mdun du lha
mo 'phrog byed ma/ /g.yas su 'bar byed ma gnas la/ /de yi rgyab tu 'jib byed ma/ /g.yon du yul skyong ma gnas so/ /gtso bor gyur pa'i sku yi ni/ /lho nub mtshams su
bzhugs pa ni/ /mi sdug pa ni du ba'i mdog /shin tu mi srun gzugs 'chang ba/ /gzig gi ko ba rlon pas dkris/ /mdun du 'jigs byed drag mo che/ /g.yas su gzugs
chen mo zhes bya/ /rgyab tu mche ba gtsigs ma ste/ /g.yon du thod can ma yin no/ /nag po chen po'i sku yi ni/ /nub byang mtshams kyi grwar zhugs pa/ /dga' bar ldan pa pad dmar mdog
glang po'i pags pa 'dzin pa 'o/ /de yi mdun du thod phreng 'dzin/ /g.yas su phreng ba 'dzin ma ste/ /rgyab tu tri shul 'dzin ma 'o/ /g.yon du ltos 'gro bsnams pa 'o/ /gtso bo nag po chen
po yi| |byang shar mtshams su gnas pa ni/ /log sred can gyi rdza gsar mdog /spre'u'i pags pa 'dzin pa 'o/ /de yi mdun du ral gri ma/ /g.yas su dgra s+t+wa 'jin ma ste/ /rgyab tu rdo
rje mda' thogs ma/ /g.yon du rdo rje'i gzhu ma 'o/ /khro bo'i pho nya 'di dag ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi gar gyis rol/ /dang po gri gug thod pa 'dzin/ /gnyis pas Da ma ru dang ni/ /
tri shu la ni 'dzin par mdzad/ /pho nya'i rnal 'byor ma 'di dag /'di dag phal cher zhal gcig la/ /phyag gnyis gri gug thod pa can/ /nag mo ser dang dmar ljang ste/ /phyag rgya lnga
dang ldan pa'o/ /dur khrod gnas su rol par mdzad/ /pho brang de yi phyi rol du/ /zhing skyong rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /ka Ta ha ri ka taM shing / /shan+ti pa la yab yum can/ /ko la

kir ni ro yi shing / /g+han d+ha pa la yum dang ldan/ /d+ha ra brta ba yi shing / /aM gi bA la yab yum sbyor/ /ko Tir d+hi ba pa d+hi shing / /dzA la pA la yab yum sbyor/ /b+hi ra tsa rte a mra'i shing / /
@#/ /shwa ra d+ha sa gnyis med gnas/ /o Ta dbyangs can ka na ka'i/ /ka pA la yi lha srub byed/ /sa Ta b+ha rur dza ti'i 'bras/ /g+han stod da pa lhan cig sbyor/ /o la pU ri
ram Na/ /ha ti pa yi rna ba can/ /ha na mo ha yab yum sbyor/ /karmi ra bar rtsa ba'i sdong / /tsan dras ni go Ta'i bdag /ma ri Na par thang sgron shing / /byin pa k+She tra pA lar ldan/ /nA
ga ba rar sa shing can/ /keng rus ldan pa rol par 'gyur/ /suN+De par ri dzA lu'i shing / /bu yi rkang pa rtag tu rol/ /dzA lan d+ha rar khang brtsegs shing / /bum pa can de bde bar
rol| |b+ha sna gu bar drag glog 'khrug /dzA Ta tri pa mnyam par gnas/ /sos par ni tril sha yi shing / /sgra gcan sgrogs pa'i yul dang bcas/ /tsa ri Ta pa'i ka ran tsar/ /mdzes
pa shag ti can yul ldan/ /o Ta ya bar a sho ka'i/ /shin tu sgra gcan gsong mor bcas/ /gzung 'dzin sa sar ka ko li/ /sred pa dpa' bo dbang phyug bcas/ /k+Shi ri ke par sA
la'i shing / /lhun po 'bar ba dbang phyug bcas/ /k+Shi ri ki sar sA la'i shing / /lhun po 'bar ba lhan cig bcas/ /b+ha yang ma 'bur 'byung po'i shing / /stobs chen 'jigs pa
gnas byed pa'o/ /pu Ta nar ni d+ha du pa'i/ /a b+ha ke pa brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /rA dza g+hi har dza pa na/ /sna chen dzi li sgra gcan no/ /khang pa can du rang byung brag /thub dka' rgyal
mtshan 'dzin mar bcas/ /ma hA tra yer tsan+dan shing / /sna tshogs dbang phyug dbang bskur bcas/ /'di dag k+She tra pA la ni/ /zhing skyong zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /gri gug cang te
g.yas pa na/ /g.yon pa thod khrag rtse gsum can/ /yum ni so so'i phyag mtshan ldan/ /skye gnas las byung sgra sgrogs mdzad/ /rtag tu sgrub pa po rnams kyi/ /lus la yang dag
gnas nas ni/ /dngos grub ster byed stobs mchog byed/ /'di dag zhing skyong thugs brtse bas/ /rtag par mtshan mo 'du bar mdzod/ /'di dag sa gsum khyab pa ste/ /sna
tshogs mdog can 'bar ba 'o/ /oM shAn+tiM k+She pa hUM phaT/ oM ma hA smr-i ta hUM phaT/ oM b+ha lan pU hUM phaT/ oM shaM ka ri hUM phaT/ oM kA lA d+hi pa hUM phaT/ oM dza ya b+ha lan hUM phaT/ oM be

su b+ha ga hUM phaT/ oM bar+Na sa na hUM phaT/ oM k+She tra pA la ha hi hUM phaT/ oM ki li ki li pheM pheM phaT phaT/ k+ShAM k+ShAM k+ShAM k+ShAM/ ka ha ka ha/ hriM hriM hriM hriM/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ ha hA/ Da DA/

raM rAM raM rAM/ kruM kruM kruM kruM/ khaM khaM khaM khaM/ ru ru ru ru/ DaM DaM DaM DaM/ kaM kaM kaM kaM/ tsaM tsaM tsaM tsaM/ kraM kraM kraM kraM/ saM saM saM saM/ baM baM baM baM/ yaM yaM yaM yaM/ pheM pheM pheM pheM/ b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ b+h+rUM/ k+ShaM k+ShaM
k+ShaM k+ShaM/ kleM kleM/ kluM kluM/ pAM pAM pAM pAM swAhA/ yul ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/ /drag po'i zhing skyong nyi shu bzhi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yi/ /sa gsum rnam par khyab nas
@#/ /gnas/ /'di dag gsang ba'i sngags yin te/ /gzhan du nam yang 'khrul par 'gyur/ /oM DA ki nI/ ka ka k+na ta na/ b+ha ba ban+d+ha na/ kha kha khA hi/ ban

d+ha na| sar+b+ba duSh+Ta nAM/ ha na ha na/ g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya/ g+hA ta ya/ sarba pA pa a mu ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ /'di dag grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /dngos grub stsol bar the tshom
med| |'di nyid dkyil 'khor dgod pa yis/ /sna tshogs 'phrin las byad pa ste/ /dur khrod brgyad kyi bdag po mchog /pho nya legs brten 'khor lo yin/ /dpal mgon po chen
po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ dur khrod kyi bdag po rnams dang / /pho nya ba khyad par rnams dang / ma mo dang / zhing skyong gi 'phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig
pa'o|| ||de nas gzhan yang nyi shu bzhi/ /gsang ba'i mgon po 'di nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor pho brang gnas pa 'o/ /mkha' 'gro'i gsang sngags
bstan par bya/ /pho nya legs skyes rnal 'byor ma/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ro yis ni/ /phye ba'i rdo rje nor bu dang / /pad+ma ral gri'i rigs dang ni/ /bde gshegs ye shes dam
tshig gis/ /sna tshogs sha za'i ma mo rnams/ /gnas skyes yul dang grong gnas pa/ /klu yis mtshon pas kun tu phye/ /oM b+hai ra khi ni swAhA/ Du tri ni/ Da sha ka ra li ni/

dz+wa la mu khi ni/ bA yu be ga ni/ pra tsaN+Di Ni/ ru pra ak+Shi Ni/ mahA Na se ni/ a se ni ya ma ni/ kI rti ni/ lak+Sh+ma Ni/ bi dza ye ni/ shrI dzA na ye/ shrI dzA ya ka ra Ni/ shrI badzri Ni/ kaM kA li ni/ kA la

rA tri ni/ pra kro d+ha mu khi ni/ kA la dzi hwA ni/ ga rA li ni/ badzra b+hai ra bA kA ra Ni/ d+hu ru si ni/ ya ni ma na aM ka ri ni/ mr-i ka ra sa ti s+thA ni/ rat+na mA li ni/ su kra ak+Shi ni/ ku su li ni/

khat+t+ri Ni/ badzra bra b+ha Ni/ badzra kA la ya ni/ sa ma paM tsa ni/ ka ma ni b+hi/ tsi trA la gi ni/ shu ki ni/ sarba d+hi ni/ sU tra ri Ni/ g+ha las sa ni/ pad ma k+Sh-i ni/ dza la dza la kha Di b+ha ba b+hu d+hi

ni/ shrI g+ho ra Ni/ tsaN+Da le kha ni/ tsaN+Da mu khi ni/ ha sa wa rmi Ni/ wa ki me shwa ra Ni/ g+hi ta ru da ye/ ka ra Ni swa ka b+hi ru sa ni mr-i d+ha ni d+hi/ g+hu ri Na sho sha Ni/ su shI g+h+raM/ b+han+du b+ha ra Ni/ shrI

mu khi ni/ pa ra ka li ni/ ka li ni/ ha ri Ni thA ye/ pad+mi ni/ na gra pa a k+Shi Ni b+hI ma la tsaN gri ni swAhA/ pak+Sha pak+Sha sarba yo gi ni kA me shwa ri/ sarba duSh+Ta gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/
tshes brgyad dang ni nya ba dang / /nyi shu dgu dang dgu stong dang / /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi/ /las ni the tshom med 'grub pa'o/ /dbyug gu drag po'i pho nya dang / /chu tshod kyi
ni ma mo dang / /'pho ba gnod sbyin brgya phrag gnyis/ /thun ni pho nya brgya dag go /dus sbyor bcu gnyis gnas pa'i yul/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi de yi phyed/ /rtsa rlung yi ge khams
@#/ /rgyu| |'ching grol tshar gcod rjes 'dzin pa'o/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ phyi dang / nang gi dngos po pho nya ma'i las bstan
pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /nag po chen po gtum po ni/ /zhal gdangs mche gtsigs ljags 'dril cing / /a la la
yi sgra sgrogs pa/ /rab 'jigs bzhengs pa'i stabs kyis ni/ /gsang ba mchod byed lha mo brgyad/ /kun nas gar gyis rol pa ste/ /'di yis 'phrin las dbang thob byed/ /oM

badzra ka wu ma hA kA lA ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-i d+h+ra sa kA ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM b+ha ga byA g+h+rA ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM b+ha na su ba ra ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM si ma lA ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM b+ha na shwA nA s+yai hUM hUM
phaT/ oM kro ne d+ha ka rA s+yai hUM hUM phaT/ oM u lU kA s+yai hUM hUM phaT/ oM ga ru Da sa gA s+yai hUM hUM phaT/ 'di ni dpal nag po chen po 'khor lha mo brgyad dang bcas pa'i sngags so/ /
mtshan phyed dus na gtor ma 'bul/ /sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga/ /myos byed stobs dang bcas bas mchod/ /gsang ba sgrub pa'i mchog tu bshad/ /bsnyen pa sngon
du song ba yis/ /dben par dug dang tsha ba dang / /sa la dgra bo'i gzugs bya ste/ /gro ga 'am ni ro ras la/ /rgya skyegs dug dang khrag rnams kyis/ /bya rog mo yi
rus pas ni/ /gzugs bris de yi snying gar ni/ /e yi rnam pa'i 'khor lo la/ /mA ra ya yi mtha' can gyi/ /man ngag bzhin du bri bar bya/ /de nas rkang pa nas brtsams te/ /
dril la dur khrod skra yis dkris/ /sngar gyi gzugs kyi snying ga ru/ /bcug ste tshigs dang lci ba sogs/ /dug dang bcas pa'i tsher ma gzugs/ /de nas sngags pa 'dod lha yi/ /
nga rgyal chen po rab ldan pas/ /snying ga'i hUM las 'od 'phro bas/ /lha la bka' bsgo rnam shes ni/ /man ngag can gyis dgug par bya/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la che ge mo A kaR+Sha ya dza/
dzaHhUM baM hos dgug pa dang / /gzhug dang bcing dang myos par bya/ /de nas tsha ba dug gis brab/ /de bzhin bdun phrag nyi shu gsum/ /zla ba gcig tu las bsgrub la/ /drag po
thab tu tsher ma dang / /bra ma'i me la bsro bar bya/ /des kyang mdud par mi byed na/ /bstan pa bde la gnas pa'i phyir/ /snying rje chen por rab bskyed de/ /gri lcags las byas
mtshon gyis gtub/ /khrag dang dug dang tsha ba dang / /tsher ma ling gar bcas te bsregs/ /thal ba bla ma'i man ngag ltar/ /mnan dang chu bor dor bar bya/ /gzhan yang
mi shis thod pa la/ /dug gis myu gus gzugs bris te/ /de yi lce la ud ma ni/ /ming spel bris la thod pa gnyis/ /kha sbyar skud pa nag pos dkri/ /nag po'i gos kyis
@#/ /gtums nas ni/ /mi shis sa phyogs dag tu mnan/ /bsnyen dang sgrub pas mnyes gyur na/ /'chi dang smyo bar gyur pa ni/ /the tshom yod pa ma yin no/ /yi
dwags sam ni dgra bo gang / /gro ga la ni gzugs bris la/ /snying gar sngags 'dis bskor bar bya/ /oM badzra mahA kA la che ge mo mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT/ ces pa'i sngags bris
gtor ma gzhug /de nas sgrub sngags bzlas par bya/ /de yi rjes la gtor ma dbul/ /mgon po nag po 'khor bcas la/ /sha khrag bskang sogs bstabs byas nas/ /gtor
mas bsang pas bsgral bya ste/ /dmigs par bya ba myur du brlag /gzhan yang gdug pa pha rol te/ /nus pa cung zad yod gyur na/ /rang shed rang la dbab pa'i phyir/ /ngag
mnan sbyor ba 'di ltar bya/ /gro ga 'am ni ro ras la/ /khrag dang dug dang gdug pa yis/ /gzugs ni lces khengs sngags bri ba/ /stam+b+ha ming spel ldan pa bskor/ /phyin ci log
tu dril la bcings/ /zag pa'i rdzas sogs sa la ni/ /tsha tsha byas pa'i nang bcug la/ /bstim zhing mnan la mdun byas la/ /rnal 'byor sbro bsdu phyag rgya bcing / /thun gyis
brabs la bzlas pa bya/ /las bcol zhag bdun thun bzhir bya/ /de la sngar bzhin byas nas ni/ /gnod pa'i sa phyogs dag tu mnan/ /myur du 'grub par the tshom med/ /thod
pa 'am ni snod gzhan du/ /sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba de/ /thun rdzas kyis brab ling gar bcas/ /yang na drag po klu la gtang / /gru gsum dong bcug brdzi bar bya/ /kha bcad na sa ni drag po
yi| |nges par thob par the tshom med/ /de ltar las la sbyor dus su/ /nyes pa bsgo ba'i thabs shes ni/ /srung byed nyes pa 'di ltar bsgrag/ bstan pa 'jig par byed pa yi/ /dgra bo srung
byed lha khyod nyon/ /gdug pa'i sems ldan dgra 'di yis/ /dkon mchog bla ma la smon cing / /rnal 'byor la sdang sems can 'tshe||sgrub pa po la brnyas gyur pas/ /dpag tshad stong du
ltung ba yin/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myos gyur pas/ /bdag gis myur du bsgral nas ni/ /gzugs kyis lha rnams mchod pa yin/ /khyed kyis srung bar ma byed par/ /sdig can 'di
ni myur du spongs/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /bstan pa srung ba'i bsam pa dang / /snying rje chen po ldan pa yis/ /yengs pa med par byas gyur na/ /nges par 'grub par gdon mi za/ /brgya
byin dag gi srog kyang g.yo/ /sdig can dgra bgegs smos ci dgos/ /byang chub sems dang rab ldan na/ /ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal mgon po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud
las| lha mo'i 'khor lo dang / las sgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas bzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i cho ga nyams dga' ba/ /dpal
@#/ /ldan lcam dral thams cad kyi/ /sgrub pa rab tu nyams dga' ni/ /mgon po kun gyi gnas 'di ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag drug pa/ /dang po gri gug thod
khrag 'dzin/ /spyan gsum mthing nag rngam pa yi/ /g.yas g.yon bar ma'i phreng ba dang / /Da ma ru ni 'dzin cing rdung / /tha ma gnyis kyis kha T+wAM dang / /sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'ching bar
mdzad/ /klu brgyad kyis brgyan khrag 'dzag zhal/ /sa bon rang sngags phreng ba can/ /rgyas btab pas ni byin brlabs shing / /rdo rje sems dpa' dbu rgyan pa/ /n+ya gro d+ha
yi shing la brten/ /bi nA ya ka mnan par bsam/ /oM badzra mahA kA lA k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+naM bi nI ya ka nAM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ sha chen bsregs spos phul nas ni/ /skyo bar gyur na gsang sngags
bzlas/ /de la gtor ma dbul bar bya/ /khyad par byin rlabs gyur par bya/ /'phrin las thogs pa med par 'grub/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya mahA kA lA ya hUM phaT/ sku'i mgon po'i
sngags so/ /oM mahA kA lnga gu Na hri da hUM phaT/ yon tan gyi mgon po'i sngags so/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la rak+sha ru dri b+ha Sha ni hUM phaT/ gsung gi mgon po'i sngags so/ /oM badzra kr-iSh+Na
tsaN+Da mA ra ya ma hA kA la tsit+ta la hrIHdzaH las kyi mgon po'i sngags so/ /oM badzra ma hA kA li ha na badzra hUM phaT/ yi ge bcu pa'i gsang ba'i mgon po'i sngags so/ /
oM tsaN+De shwa rI ye swAhA/ gtum po mo'i sngags so/ /oM tsaN+Di tsa kI ye swAhA/ drag mo'i sngags so/ /oM kA li kA ye swAhA/ /bzlog byed ma'i sngags so/ /oM ku li she Sha rI ye
swAhA/ dpa' mo'i sngags so/ /oM shri ma hA kA la ga Na mai tri dzaH beng 'dzin ma'i sngags so/ /oM re dan+ti ma hA kA li tri shU la sar+b+ba sha trUM dzaH rtse gsum 'dzin pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra
ma hA kA la kro tri gaN+De sa ya hUM phaT/ /gaN+De 'dzin pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la te tsi tso ta ka ra mA ra NAM hUM phaT/ rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i sngags so/ /gsang ba beng 'dzin mgon po
yi| |lha ma yin gyi grong khyer ni/ /sum brtsegs la sogs khang bzang rnams/ /khro bo tsan+dan beng bsnams kyis/ /lha dmag bye ba dung phyur rnams/ /phyung nas brlag par mdzad pa
yi| |grong khyer 'bum phrag brgyad cu 'am/ /rlag byed bdud 'dul chen po ste/ /'di nyid g.yon gnas lha mo ni/ /kun tu dgyes nas gar stabs gnas/ /oM shrI ma hA kA la du bem

ni dza a mu ka'i mgo bo la ru Ta hUM b+h+yoH oM shrI ma hA kA la traka rak+ShaM du baM ni dzaH muM nag shig b+h+yoH muM shi b+h+yoH che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ oM badzra ma hA kA la rak+Sha tri yak+Sha/ ru dra sa ma ya/
sar+b+ba sha trUM ru ru tsa pa lA ya/ mA ra Na rbad rbad/ nri rbad bu rbad bu/ tshal pa tshal pa/ ni shi ku ru sa ma ya/ che ge mo gtubs gtubs dza dza/ oM ru ru ma ma b+h+yoH ma ma sha trAM/ tsi ta
@#/ /la hriM hriM/ mA ra ya rbud rbud/ re shaM g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ kA lo yaM b+ha sha ni ma hA kA la yak+Sha shA sa na/ a pa ka ri di na me ke na me ru ru ma ma b+h+yoH tsit+ta la hriM hriM
rbad| tri ri tri pri tri ka hi swAhA/ ti ka pa tra hUM/ a tra ka ti swa mo sha mo sna/ tig bug shig /ku mi ta rbad shig rbud sod/ gaN+De 'dzin pa'i khro bo che/ /ma rungs klad pa 'gems par byed//
tsa mu N+Di ldan rol pa ste/ /gdug pa 'dul ba'i las la shis/ /kha T+wAM rtse gsum 'dzin pas ni/ /dgra bgegs lus ngag yid la 'debs/ /gtum po thog 'bebs mig sgyur ma/ /
sangs rgyas bstan pa skyong ba'o/ /gang du keng rus rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs skrag byed/ /'di nyid legs ldan rgyal po che/ /rdo rje bse gdong sna tshogs gdong /
dkyil 'khor lha tshogs 'di dag gis/ /gsang sngags rim pas bstan pa 'o/ /thun mong khyad par bye brag gis/ /lus kyi mtshan nyid rtags bcas pa/ /grub pa kun tu
bgrod pa 'o/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor ba'i mgon po dang / yum dang bcas pa'i gsang sngags dang / 'phrin las kyi le'u
ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas bden pa tsam gyis ni/ /grub pa stsol bar mdzad pa po/ /dngos grub 'byung gnas rim pa ni/ /yang dag nyid du bshad par
bya| |bya rog g.yang gzhis brgyan pa yi/ /nag po phyag bzhi pa yi sku/ /gsang zhing dam tshig ldan pas bri/ bde yis sku yi rten du bshad/ /gser dngul la sogs kyis bris pa'i/ /nag bo chen

po'i snying po dang / /nye ba'i snying po bris pa rnams/ /gsung gi rten du 'dod pa 'o/ /bya rog sogs dang rtan ga snying / /khyi yi snying dang mi yi snying / /rin chen lnga dang bcas pa rnams/ /thugs kyi
rten du gzung bar bya/ /snying gi rnam pa thams cad dang / /nya sha la sogs 'bru yi chan/ /sman gyi rnam pa thams cad dang / /bsnyen pa'i gtor ma bya ba yin/ /rdzas dang gtang gtor steng
dang 'og/ /steng nas dar nag gur gyis dbub/ /sha lnga sman lnga myos byed bcas/ /rgyun du thugs dam bskul phyir mchod/ /rta nag lug nag g.yag rog la/ /mgul du snying po bris la
gdags/ /de yi ngo bo legs phul la/ /phyi yi rten du bya bar bshad/ /nag po ras sam dar la yang / /rin chen lnga dang bcas pa yis/ /nag po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /bris pa
nyin gcig gis rdzogs nas/ /bar chad med par rab gnas bya/ /gsang rten lus la bcing ba 'o/ /sna tshogs 'bru nag dpal byas pa'i/ /gtor ma mi shes brgyan pa dang / /pho brang
rten dang brten par bcas/ /nang gi rten du slob pa 'o/ /skyes pa grir shi'i 'od phreng ni/ yon tan ldan phyir rtag tu sba/ /mi gsod mtshon las byas pa yi/ /rdo rje gri gug hUM bris pa/ /'phrin
@#/ /las byed pa'i khyad par ro/ /dam tshig gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /nyams dga' dben pa'i gnas nyid du/ /lha mo 'i rten yang 'di ltar ro/ /rigs
med kyi ni thod pa la/ /gsang sngags yi ge 'di dang ni/ /bris pa tsam gyis las 'grub byed/ /sgrub mi dgos par nus pa 'byung / /dur khrod sol bas sngags 'di bri/ /oM shrI de wi

tsa muN+Da rak+ta tsa muN+Di/ seM ka mor/ d+ha ke saM ha sa ti/ mu khe ka ra ha ra/ kI la kI la/ phre k+Sha ti ta sa na sa ta b+h+rUM b+h+rUM la la ta ya/ ka pA la ma lA d+ha ra Ni hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ thod pa'i nang
du 'khor bar bri/ /phyi yi rten du bshad pa yin/ /bong bu nag mo'i thod pa la/ /rten pa lha mo'i sku bris pa/ /nang gi rten du bshad pa yin/ /nal gri'i snying ni ma nyams pa/ /mtshon
gyi rtse la bkon pa bzhag /gsang ba'i rten du gzugs par bya/ /bu mo'i thod pa ja ril dang / /gri gug dar gyis gtums pa dang / /dri bzang mtshon gyis bdug par bya/ /de kho
na nyid rten du bshad/ /de nas nub phyogs dag nas ni/ /gsum gyis khur nas 'ongs pa'i rdo/ /mi nag gsum gyis 'di skad brjod/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can/ /rdo
rje mgon po 'khor bcas pa/ /rang bzhin gnas nas sku bzhengs la/ /'dir ni bstan srung bzhugs su gsol/ /lan gsum brjod nas bzhugs par bya/ /rol mo'i
sgra dang spos dud dang / /sna tshogs rol mos ba su nas kyang / /'phrin las gang 'grub rom shes bya/ /'di ni rang bzhin rten yin no/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud
las| phyi nang gsang ba dag sku gsung thugs kyi rten gzugs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /dpal ldan nag po chen po yi/ /bka'
yi tshogs kyis 'khro gyur pa/ /'di ni kun tu shes par bya/ /klas kyi mgon po rnams dang ni/ /lha mo chen po 'khor dang bcas/ /lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pa/ /pho nya mngag gzhug
las byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang phyogs skyong bcu dang ni/ /klu chen brgyad dang lha chen brgyad/ /gza' chen brgyad dang rgyal chen bzhi/ /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad de/ /gnod sbyin brgyad
dang 'phrog ma'i bu/ /sha za dang ni ma mo dang / /'jig rten pa dang dam tshig gnas/ /zhing skyong ma lus 'khor dang bcas/ /'di dag las kun byed pa yi/ /'jig rten skyong pa bzhi
bcas pas/ /grub pa rab tu stsol mdzad pa/ /lha dang lha min mi 'am ci/ /lto 'phye grul bum srul po dang / /lus srul grib gnon skem byed sogs/ /nam mkha' lding dang dri za
dang | |'byung po ma lus 'dus pa kun/ 'di dag sgrub la grogs byed cing / /mthu stobs dpung dang nus pa yis/ /srung zhing bar chad nges par sel/ /sgra gcan 'dzin pa'i
@#/ /rA hu la/ /'di la sogs pa thams cad la/ /tshogs kyi gtor mas cher mchod na/ /dpal dang rdzu 'phrul myur du ster/ /'di dag 'khor dang bcas pa yi//
nye dang nye ba'i mtshan ma dang / /rtags dang cho 'phrul du ma 'byung / /sku gsung thugs kyi rtags dang ni/ /phyi nang gsang ba rtags gyur pa/ /dngos dang nyams snang rmi lam dang / /sprul
pa'i 'phrin las nges 'byung ba/ /gtso bo nyid dang 'khor rnams kyi/ /rim pa rjes su 'brel par 'byung / /rtags byung nas ni las la bskul/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub
'byung ba'i rgyud las/ /gtso bo dang / 'khor du bcas pa mchod par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dpal ldan mgon
po chen po yi/ /thar pa'i grong khyer nyams dga' bar/ /dbang bskur cho ga bshad par bya/ /'dis ni bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs/ /de las rgyal bar byed pa yi/ /cho ga bzang po bla
na med/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bzhengs par bya/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu/ /rgyud shes yang dag bla ma la/ /snod ldan dag pa'i slob ma yis/ /gsol ba lan
gsum gdab byas la/ /maN+Dal me tog sngon 'gro yin/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa ma lus dang / /rgyal ba mgon po ma lus dang / /dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / /dbang
bskur gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /lan gsum brjod nas gnang gyur pas/ /dang po bsnyen pa brtsam par bya/ /mtshan ma nye ba'am tshul shes nas/ /de nas sngon 'gro brtsam par bya/
dang po bgegs rnams nyer zhi yi/ /'phrin las mchod pa gtor ma yi/ /ye shes lha rnams mchod pa dang / /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni/ /sdig pa bral zhing bgegs dbyung ba'i/ /
sngags dang bcas pa'i yungs kar gyis/ /me sbar sreg dang bral bar bya/ /rdo rjes sa phyogs gtsang ma las/ /sa brtag pa dang sbyang bar bya/ /sa blangs nas ni bka' thob pas/ /brko
zhing ro lnga bsal bar bya/ /de nas bsrung zhing bcag par bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhengs nas ni/ /rdo rje gom pa'i gar stabs kyis/ /hUM hUM drag po'i sgra brjod pas/ /phyogs kun bcing
ba byas nas ni/ /bgegs la bka' bsgo gtor ma sbyin/ /slob ma kun la bsrung byas la/ /rdo rje mgon po chen po yi/ /ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa la/ /gsol ba gdab pas gnang
ba sbyin/ /khyad par bdud rtsi 'khyil bas bsrungs/ /yang dag ye shes sems dpa' che/ /'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal byed pa/ /rgyal ba ma lus bstan skyong che/ /de nas lhag
par gnas pa brtsams/ /sa 'dzin lha mo nyid mchod pas/ /bka' byin nas ni thim par blta/ /bum pa bkra shis yang dag ldan/ /ma nyams mtshan nyid ldan pa lnga/ /kha tshar ma
@#/ /nyams ras zung dkri /snying po sman dang 'bru lnga sogs/ /spos dang rin chen dag gis dgang / /rgyun 'bab chu yis gang ba dang / /'bras ldan shing
gis kha brgyan pa'o/ /de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo yi/ /bka' yi khro bo rnam par bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor dri yi thig le la/ /me tog gcal bkram lha rnams ni/ /bskyed cing
mchod la gnyis med bstim/ /so shing dor dang ltas brtag pa/ /srung skud ku sha sbyin par bya/ /de nas sems bskyed sdom gnas pas/ /dam tshig gsang ba sbyin par bya//
khyad par lha la gsol btab nas/ /rdul tshon dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /dang por ye shes thig gdab cing / /phyi nang dam tshig nges par gdab/ /go rims ma nor
nges pa'i tshul/ /srad bu shes rab can thig gdab/ /tshon ni byin gyis brlabs nas kyang / /pra brtag rdul tshon rim par dgye/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /lta babs bzhis
ni mdzes pa yi/ /zlum bskor pho brang ling tshe dgu/ /dbus ma e dbyibs drag po nyid/ /phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /lha khyams bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'dod
yon rin chen sked pad dang / /dra phyed ba ku li yi phreng / /yang na kha bad mdzes pa'i rgyan/ /chos 'khor ri dwags gdugs dang bcas/ /thod skam pad+ma'i phreng bar ldan/ /dur
khrod brgyad kyis yongs su 'khor/ /rdo rje me 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs/ /dam tshig ye shes gnyis med pa'i/ /gsang sngags nye ba sngags par gnas/ /brtan zhing mchod la gsol ba gdab/ /
nye bar brgyan cing yongs su bskor/ /de nas slob dpon bdag 'jug bya/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab tu shis/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba chen po'i
dkyil 'khor gsang bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang rnam bshad bya/ /yang na le tshe dgu ldan pa'i/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad phyi rol du/ /mu
khyud 'khor lo rim gsum la/ /e dbyibs zhing skyong rim pa dgod/ /lha dang sa bon phyag mtshan ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya mtshan/ /slob ma khrus byas rgyan btags te//
maN+Dal me tog phyag bya zhing / /ras kyis mig ni bkab nas su/ /dang por me tog dor bar bya/ /mtshan ma mthong bas legs par drang / /sgo bzhi nas ni nang 'jug cing / /gu gul
bdug cing ting 'dzin gyis/ /nag po chen po'i lha tshogs kyang / /nges par spyan drang bstim par bya/ /de las nges par rtags rnams byung / /yang na so so'i mgon por bskyed/ /ye
shes sems dpa' byin gyis brlab/ /bla ma dkyil 'khor gtso bcas las/ /'od 'phros rang byin brlab par 'gyur/ /mthong ba dri dang bdud rtsis gtor/ /gdong g.yogs
@#/ /dkrol zhing lha ngo bstan/ /de nas dbang po'i bye brag gis/ /nges par rim pas dbang bskur te/ /bstan pa 'dzin cing bstan pa skyong / /bstan pa srung bar
byed pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel mdzad pa/ /sku yi mgon po 'khor bcas kyis/ /bla med dngos grub sbyin pa'i phyir/ /yang dag ye shes dbang bskur ro/ /sku gsung thugs
dang yon tan dang / /'phrin las lha yi khyad par ro/ /me long ye shes dbang nyid can/ /rdo rje rigs kyi mgon po yis/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du ni/ /zhe sdang dag pas dbang
bskur ro/ /mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang / /bya ba nan tan chos kyi dbyings/ /ye shes lnga yi rigs kyi gtsang / /nges par dbang bskur brtan par bya/ /'phrin las bzhi yi
dbang yang bskur/ /lha mo brgyad kyis las rnams 'grub/ /bum pa spyi bor byin pa dang / /thod pa'i bdud rtsi blugs pa yis/ /gsang ba bde chen ye shes nyid/ /rang byung
dri med dbang bskur ba'o/ /de rjes ba liM gtad pa yis/ /nus pa thogs med sbyin byed yin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba mchog/ /lha dang sngags kyi zab pa'i chos/ /ting
'dzin chen po'i phyag rgya che/ /'di nyid dngos grub kun gyi gter/ /zab cing rgya che'i don sgrub pa/ /skal ba can la sbyin par bya'o/ /he ru ka dang nag po che/ /bla ma tha dad med pa
la| |tshogs kyi 'khor los legs mchod cing / /zhabs la gtugs la smon lam btab/ /'di ni thob par the tshem med/ /'phrin las kun tu grub ster byed/ /dpal mgon po chen
po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dpal ldan mgon
po de nyid kyi/ /phyogs bzhi yongs su skyong ba yi/ /rgyal po chen po rnam pa bzhi/ /shar phyogs nas ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs nas ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs nas
ni spyan mi bzang / /byang phyogs nas ni rnam thos sras/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed ba/ /'di nyid grub pa ster byed pa'o/ /rab tu dben zhing gtsang pa dang / /bkra shis nyams
dga'i sa phyogs su/ /rnam thos sras ni bsgrub par bya/ /sa gzhi ba yi lci bas byug /dri bzang tsan+dan dkar dmar dang / /a ka ru dang du ru ka/ kha che gi hang sna tshogs sman/ /
bsreg cing tshogs pa'i sman du bya/ /maN+Dal gru bzhi mda' gang ba/ /dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi rta babs dang / /rin chen khang pa yid 'ong ba/ /po brang rin chen las grub pa/ /sna tshogs
pad+ma rin chen gling / /gter dang dpag bsam ljon shing bcas/ /ka ba stong phrag du ma yis/ /rab tu rgyas shing yongs su bskor/ /lte ba rin chen mu khyad la/ /lha mo brgyad
@#/ /kyis yongs su bskor/ /bar ma lha khyams mdzes pa la/ /gnod sbyin chen po brgyad kyis bskor/ /phyi ma ra bas bskor ba la/ /klu chen brgyad kyis yongs
su bskor/ /sgo bzhir gnod sbyin bzhi bkod pa/ /dbus su rin chen seng ge'i khri/ /sna tshogs pad+ma ge sar bcas/ /de dbus zla ba dar gyi gdan/ /de la sku gsung thugs
kyi gnas/ /sa bon phyag mtshan sku dgod bya/ /sna tshogs mchod pas yongs bskor te/ /'bras dang gro dang 'bru sna la/ /gtor ma shin tu bzang bar bsham/ /khyad par me tog
sna tshogs ni/ /nA ga ge sar ku mu da/ /puN+Da ka ba ba ku li/ /par shi ka dang tsam pa ka /d+ha nu ska ri ma li ka /su ti ka dang ut+pa la/ /pad+ma man dA ra ba dang / /daN+Dod pa la sogs
pa'o| |sna tshogs chu dang sreg spos tshogs/ /gu gul khyad par bsreg par bya/ /ka ra bu ram sbrang rtsi dang / /khur ba 'bras chen zhun mar dang / /zhal zas bye brag thams cad
dang | |snang gsal mar me byug pa dang / /sgra snyan sna tshogs mchod pa'i rdzas/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /'phan dang bla re la sogs pa/ /sna tshogs dar
gyi lnga ldi dang / /de ltar bkod pa legs brgyan nas/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas kyang / /rang lhar bskyid pa'i sa bon las/ /'od 'phros mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la/ /
rab tu 'phros pas 'od du 'bar/ /de las dbus su rgyal chen ni/ /sku mdog gur gum mdog 'dra ba/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /seng+ge'i khri la legs bzhugs pa'i/ /phyag
g.yas yid bzhin nor bu ste/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan can/ /g.yon pa ne'u le'i snod can las/ /kha nas rin chen skyug par bsam/ /gnod gnas dbang po gang ba bzang //
nor bu bzang dang rta yi bdag /yang dag shes dang 'brog gnas dang / /lnga rtsen pi tsi kuN+Da li/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang phyag mtshan bcas/ /re re'ang du mas yongs bskor nas/ /shin tu
gsal zhing brtan par bsam/ /de nas sa bon las 'phros te/ /rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs la/ /mchod cing bstod de gnyis med bstim/ /khyad par gsol ba gdab par bya//
rgyal ba mgon po 'khor bcas pa'i/ /yid 'ong khang bzang pho brang 'di/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i char 'bebs pa'i/ /rin chen gter gyi dngos grub gsol/ /oM bai swAhA/ /oM bai shra ma NA

ya swAhA/ oM dzam+b+ha lA ya swAhA/ oM pU r+Na b+ha drA ya swAhA/ oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya swAhA/ oM ku be rA ya swAhA/ oM saM pra dza nA ya swAhA/ oM gu h+ya s+tha nA ya swAhA/ oM pI tsi kA ya swAhA/ oM pi tsi
kuN+Da lA ya swAhA/ dang po lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/ /gnyis pa rin chen 'bar ba nyid/ /gsum pa kun nas bstod par bya/ /de nas gtor ma dbul bar bya/ /gsol ba btab nas
@#/ /'phrin las bcol/ /de nas ye shes gshegs su gsol/ /der gnas pa ni bzhugs par bya/ /phyi rten nang rten khyad par ba/ /rim pa 'khor lo sngags dang
bcas/ /mis mi mthong bar sbas te bcang / /khyad par rtags ni gsal bar 'byung / /nye ba'i mtshan ma nges mthong nas/ /dngos grub blang zhing gtor ma dbul/ /sbyin sreg las
kyis myur du 'grub/ /gsang sngags 'bum phrag bcu yis ni/ /'bras bu yid la 'dod kun 'grub/ /kha skong me yi mchod pa bya/ /gtor ma chen po dang bcas pas/ /lan bdun
nye bar bsnyen pas 'grub/ /'di ni lha rnams kun gyi gter/ /sgrub pa po la stsol bar mdzad/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ /khyad par du 'phags pa
rnam thos sras gnod sbyin chen po brgyad dang bcas ba bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /'phags pa chen po de nyid la/ /klu
chen brgyad kyis yongs bskor ba/ /rim pa 'di ni bstan par bya/ /khyad par sa bcu'i dbang phyug che/ /dpal ldan thugs rje'i bdag po nyid/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa
nyid| |spyan gsum cung zang khro bo'i tshul/ /sku mdog dmar dang ljang gu'i mdog /rin chen 'bar ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sku la dar ber sum rim la/ /sna tshogs cod pa na
rgyan gyis spras/ /phyag g.yas rin chen 'bar ba bsnams/ /lha yi ba dan mdzes pa 'phyar/ /g.yon pa mchod rten sku gdung bsnams/ /ne'u le'i rgyal pa nor skyug 'chang / /'khor du
khyad par klu chen brgyad/ /sku lus mi yi rnam pa la/ /sbrul mgo bdun pa'i gdengs ka can/ /phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba nas/ /yid bzhin nor bu legs bsnams pa/ /sems dpa'i
'dug stangs phyed dkyil can/ /thams cad gtsol 'dud par byed/ /nor rgyas pad+ma nyid dang ni/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang 'jog po nyid/ /pad+ma che dang hu lu che/ /dung skyong rigs ldan brgyad
po nyid/ /rgya mtsho chen po nang dag gi/ /pad+ma la ni gnas bcas te/ /de ltar bskyed la ye shes pa/ /spyan drangs mchod la gnyis med bstim/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor la/
yid 'ong dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur/ /oM shri badzra yak+Sha bai shrA ma NA ya hUM phaT/ oM ba ru NA ye swAhA/ oM a nan+tA ya swAhA/ oM tak+Sha kA ya swAhA/ oM shaM kha pA lA ya swAhA/ oM karko
TA ya swAhA/ oM pad+mA ya swAhA/ oM ma hA pad+mA ya swAhA/ oM ku li kA ya swAhA/ des ni gsang sngags bzlas pa yis/ /sngags kyi 'od zer spro bsdu bya/ /de nas klu rnams thams cad
la| |yid 'ong gtor ma dbul bar bya/ /nA ga ge sar pus pa dang / /rgya mtsho lbu ba a ru ra/ /dzA ti pha la gur gum dang / /tsan+dan dkar dmar pu shel tse/ /dbang po lag dang snyig zho
@#/ /sha| chu srin sder mo le brgan dang / /'gron bu dung dang mu tig dang / /nya phyis gla gor zho sha dang / /mkhal ma zho sha rma bya'i mdongs/ /ru rta rgun 'brum
mngar gsum dang / /gser gyi bye ma ras skud dang / /'o ma dang ni 'bru sna lnga/ /rin chen sna tshogs ma lus pa/ /khyad par du ni dbul bar bya/ /de nas mchod cing bstod bya ste//
dngos grub gang 'dod stsol bar bsam/ /de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya/ /gsang sngags khri phrag bcu bzlas nas/ /rtags byung nas ni dngos grub blag/ /dpal mgon po chen po
dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ rgyal po rnam thos sras la klu chen po brgyad kyis bskor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /drang srong
sras mchog de nyid la/ /lha mo brgyad kyis yongs bskor ba'i/ /thabs nyid rnal 'byor bas shes bya/ /rin chen bdun pa'i khang bzangs su/ /nor bu sna tshogs gdan bzhugs
pa'i| |'phags pa sku mdog bai DUR+ya/ /zhal gcig phyag drug spyan gsum pa/ /rin chen sna tshogs du mas spras/ /gdug pa klu yis nyer brgyan cing / /g.yas kyi dang po
rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /g.yon gyi dang po rin chen snod/ /bar ma gnyis ni rdo rje dang / /pad+ma 'bar ba bsnams pa dang / /thams zhags pa tho ba 'phyar/ /stag gi pags pa'i
sham thabs can/ /dar gyi cod pan dag gis mdzes/ /skad cig gis ni bsam par bya/ /oM badzra pi ru ka/ ku be ra At+ma ka/ ma hA yak+Sha rA dza rat+na sid+d+hi hUM swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brjod pa

yis| |gnod sbyin mo rnams mdun du 'gugs/ /oM tsan+d+ra kAn+t+yai swA hA/ oM saM b+ha dra yai swA hA/ oM dat+tA yai swA hA/ oM gu h+yA yai swA hA/ oM su dat+ta yai swA hA/ oM de byai swA hA/ oM AR+ya yai swA hA/ oM sar swa t+yai swA hA/
zla 'od can ma rab bzang mo/ /sbyin byed ma dang gsang ba ma/ /rab sbyin ma dang dpal lha mo/ /'phags ma dang ni dbyangs ldan te/ /thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /kun tu
rgyal ba 'od 'phro ma/ /gdu bu dpung rgyan mgul rgyan dang / /zhabs gdub do shal legs brgyan cing / /dar dang nor bus rnam par mdzes/ /dkar dang ser dang dUr ba'i 'od/ /
gser 'od pad+ma rA ga dang / /ut+pal pad+ma rA ga dang / /ut+pal puN+Da ri ka dang / /pa la sha yi mdog mtshungs pa/ /'od kyi phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i nang / rin chen sgrom bu gter
gyi snod/ /rin chen gzhong pa dung chos dang / /be tsu ra dang nor bu ma/ /dpal be pany+tsa li ka ste/ /g.yon pa kun tu pad+ma bsnams/ /sgeg cing 'gyid dang ldan par bsam/ /gtso bos
lha mo brgyad po bskul/ /lha mo brgyad po thams cad kyis/ /rin chen char pa phab nas ni/ /bka' bzhin bgyid pa rnam par bsam/ /mgon po myur du bskul ba'i tshe/ /gtso bos mi
@#/ /'jigs seng ge chibs/ /thun mong gi ni las byed pa'o/ /stobs ldan gang chen rab brtan chibs/ /khyad par sgrub pa'i las rnams byed/ /g.yu 'phrug
sngon po chibs nas ni/ /snad srid ma lus dbang du sdud/ /dbang du byed pa'i las rnams dang / /khyad par sbyin sreg drag po ni/ /bzhad dang rngam pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /myur du
las la 'gro ba yin/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i rim shes pa'i/ /stong phrag bcu yis 'grub pa ste/ /'di ni rin chen ga'u'i nang / /rin chen 'bar ba'i 'khor lo la/ /gsang sngags yi

ge'i phreng ba can/ /sa bon spro bsdus ting 'dzin sgom/ /na mo bai shra ba Na badzra mu sa la/ mu su na sti/ /tri shU la aM ku sha/ pA sha pa ra shu/ /ban+d+ha mu dag ra lA laM k+Shi da/ /ha sta h+ya/ na

mo na maH sar+b+ba de wa ta su tsi ta/ kr-i ta Ta s+ya/ ma hA kI la kI lA ya/ sarba gra hA/ a ka ri Sha ni ya bi dza ya/ dza yaM du/ b+ha ga bAM/ nA da ku be rA/ k+Shi ti sa ti/ tsakra ti ni/ ka la ka la/ nA da ku

be ra ki ri ki li/ nA da ku be ra/ kri ti pa ti/ tsa kra ti ni/ /bi dzi ma hA b+ha ga ba ni/ nA da ku be ra/ b+h+ya krata/ drang srong kar la/ ban d+ha na/ ra'u tra/ d+hi h+ya sa/ gu h+ya sa/ ka na ga na pa
ri br-i dA/ bai sha ma Na/ b+ha ne b+ha ne/ b+hi ba na ba si ti/ /ku ti ku ti/ ku be ra/ /nA da ku be ra/ nA ma stu ste swA hA/ 'di ni khyad par sgrub pa ste/ /gsang sngags gnod sbyin stong sde'i
tshogs/ /ma lus 'di yis bskul bar byed/ /gar mkhan mchog ces bya ba yi/ /lha ni du mas yongs bskor ba'i/ /'di ni bskyed cing spyan drang ba/ /spyan drang mchod cing bstod pa dang //
gang sgrub las la bskul bar bya/ /'di yis rnal 'byor dgos pa sgrub/ /zhi bas nad gdon ma lus pa/ /dbang gis khams gsum ma lus bsgyur/ /rgyas pas nor dang 'bru sogs
'phel/ /mngon spyod kyis ni gdug pa 'dul/ /nor bu bzang pos gter la spyod/ /yang dag shes kyis dus gsum mthong / /gang ba bzang pos longs spyod 'phel/ /gtsug na 'khyil
pas tshe dpal ster/ /'brog gnas rgyal bas dud 'gro spel/ /gnod sbyin lnga po 'di dag gis/ /sa gsum g.yo bar byed pa ste/ /'di dag sgrub pos mchod gyur na/ /phun sum tshogs
pa'i dpal rnams ster/ /rang nyid lhag pa'i lha yis ni/ /sa bon las 'phros lcags kyus ni/ /'di dag srog gi dbang po la/ /dbang byed las byed mi bzlog 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin
rnams la shing thog dang / /klu rnams gtor mas kun tu mchod/ /lha mo a ru ra yi 'bru/ /ma lus myur du mchod pa'o/ /gang po dang ni mdzes ma dag/ /khyad par mngag gzhug
gyur pa'o/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras 'khor dang bcas pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //
@#/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /'khor ba'i srid pa ji srid par/ /byang chub sems kyi chos rnams ston/ /ri bo'i rtse
dang nags tshal brag /rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang shing gcigs/ /gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod de/ /gnas 'di dag tu bsam gtan bsgom/ /las kyi mgon po 'jigs pa'i
gzugs/ /gru gsum pho brang la gnas pa/ /dur khrod gzhal yas 'bar ba ni/ /me dpung 'bar ba 'phro ba'i dbus/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /sku mdog nag cing mche
ba rno| |yan lag thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang / /thod pa skam po'i dbu rgyan byas/ /spyan gsum sdang mig khro tshul ston/ /bzhin sgyur mi sdug lus can ni/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje
gri gug 'phyar/ /g.yon pa dam nyams snying khrag gis/ /thod pa bkang nas gsol bar mdzad/ /dug sbrul gdug pas lhu tshigs brgyan/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes/ /
mi thod rlon pa'i do shal byas/ /ro yi gdan la brdzis nas kyang / /drag po'i nga ro sgrogs pa'i gnas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mgon po ni/ /gsod byed rngam byed sgrol byed tshe//
bsgrub bya nges par sgrol ba'i cho/ /sku yi mgon po dam nyams kyi/ /lte ba'i srog rtsa gcod par byed/ /gsung gi mgon pos dam nyams kyi/ /mgrin pa nas ni khrag rnams
'dren/ /rdo rje thugs kyi mgon po yis/ /snying gi dkar nag mtshams su yang / /bya rog mchu ni btsugs nas kyang / /srog rtsa myur du gcod par byed/ /pho nya sha za'i gdong can gyis//
spyi gtsug nas naM rtsa la 'jib/ /las byed ma mo tsaN+Di kas/ /gsang ba'i 'doms sor dwangs ma rdub/ /rtsa 'jib ma dang khrag 'thung ma/ /srog 'phrog mas ni las la sbyor/ /nyin mtshan
dus las 'da' mi byed/ /'di dag gsang sngags ma yengs bzlas/ /dus gsum dag tu ting 'dzin 'bad/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni srog yin te/ /gsung gi dngos grub snying po yin/ /nye
ba'i snying pos thugs bskul ba'o/ /ye shes sa bon mi shigs pa/ /dwangs ma'i gnas bar de bshad do/ /sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las/ /rim par bzlas pas bsam gtan
'grub/ /rtags rnams nye bar ma byung na/ /'bad pas bsten cing mchod par bya/ /gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /oM ma hA kA la gu Na hri da hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA lA trag shad dzaH ma hA
kA la sid+d+hi yaM du dzaH A li kA li mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rtsa brgyad phreng ba rab tu bsgrags/ /rim par byin rlabs ldan bya'i phyir/ /bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad du bya/ /bgrang phreng nus par ldan
pa yis/ /las ni myur bar shis pa yin/ /shel gyis zhi ba chen po 'grub/ /mu tig gis ni rgyas pa la/ /dred po'i so yis gsad pa 'grub/ /de gnyis 'gyur ba bong bu'i so/ /sdang
@#/ /dang bskrad pa rnga mo'i so/ /ka sogs rnam dag yum bcu drug/ byis pa 'tsho byed dbang sogs la/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams bsres pas/ /bzhi yis
lhag pa'i pad 'bras shing / /lung tang dmar bo bdun gcig drug/ /yang na tsan+dan 'bru dgu 'am/ /rgyu skar phyed po'i grangs mnyam pas/ /lung tang nag pos rmongs byed nus/ /
dbyangs dang gsal byed phyed sbyangs pas/ /ru rak+sha ni mngon spyod la/ /de lta'i cho ga shes pa yis/ /tshar bcad phan gdags las rnams spyad/ /gsang sngags yi ge'i
'khor lo ni/ /'gal me bzhin du bskor bar bya/ /de ltar dus bzhir bsgrub par bya/ /des ni nye bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /des kyang grub par ma gyur na/ /rang nyid ye shes nag
po yi| |gdug pa 'dul bar bsams nas ni/ /las byed mgon po'i srog rtsa 'phrog/ de ltar bskul bas las la sbyor/ /gzas pa po de sgrol bar byed/ /gal te las la
'gyangs pa na/ /srog gi thigs pa blang ba dang / /gsang sngags snying po go bzlog cing / /lto ba dkrugs pa'i las byas na/ /shi sa bstan par 'gyur ba ste/ /srog ni dmar len
byed par 'gyur/ /ma rungs 'dul ba'i las 'di dag /sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba las/ /gzhan du byas na nyes par 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg dang ni mnan pa dang / /de bzhin zos
dgyes las byas pa/ /gsad pa rang gshed gnad la dbab/ /de las myur bar rtags byung tshe/ /thugs dam bskang zhing gtor ma 'bul/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa dang / /rnal

'byor nar mar 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ las nye bar sgrub par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /dpal ldan lha mo 'khor dang bcas/ /nag mo mngon par 'byung ba yi/ /las kyi dngos grub cho ga bshad/ /dam tshig gsang ba'i sngags pa yis//
brag nag rtse mo rno ba yi/ kha lhor bltas pa'i brag phug gam/ /gzhan yang ri bo'i zom mam rtse/ /shing gcig dur khrod ma mo'i gnas/ /rab tu 'jigs pa'i gnas mchog
tu| |maN+Dal dang ni mchod pa dang / /gtor ma legs par bshams nas ni/ /sha chen bsregs spos phul nas kyang / /bar chad bgegs rnams bskrad par bya/ /gru gsum
khrag dang dug gas byug/ dug shing tsher ma can gyis brtsig /gzhan yang ling ga byas pa la/ /mi bsad lcags kyu tri shU la/ /de yi lus la gdab par bya/ /tshil chen mar
me zur gsum pa/ /btang nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed la/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum legs gnas pa/ /mahA kA la phyag bzhi pa/ /mdog nag khrag 'dzag me dpung dbus/ /
@#/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum 'bar ba ste/ /g.yas kyi dang po chu gri dang / /'og ma tri shu rtse gsum pa/ /g.yon gyi dang pos mda' gzhu dang / /gnyis pas
mgo bo khrag 'dzag bsnams/ /dur khrod kyis brgyan sham thabs can/ /de yi g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su/ /sha za gnyis ni gnas par bsam/ /las kun byed pa'i pho nyar
bskul/ /dang po lha mo chen mo ni/ /e dbus gsang sngags las grub pa'i/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum shin tu sku mdog gang / shin tu rngam zhing sgeg pa'i
sku| |g.yas kyi dang po ral gri 'chang / /'og ma shag ti 'bar ba can/ /g.yon gyi dang po thong khrag 'dzin/ /'og ma kha T+wAM bsnams pa'o/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du brdzes/ /mche
gtsigs thod pa dug sprul brgyan/ /glang po'i stod g.yogs stag sham dang / /re lde nag po'i sham thabs gsol/ /bong bu gwa dmar steng nas ni/ /phyed krung 'bar bas
bzhugs pa'o/ /yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /ral gri ne'u le'i rkyal pa 'dzin/ /dam tshig bskyed la ye shes dgug/ /'phrin las bcol bar bya ba'o/ /oM shrI ya de

bi kA li kI li ma hA kA li b+h+yo hUM/ oM ru ru ro ru bi ti Sh+Tha bA to si tri tsa pa la a shug me b+ho dzaH ma hA kA li de wI ka rA li bi kraM ta gA la ra tri ni tseN+Da rU pi Ni hUM hUM phaT/ rag mo tsi ta kha

rag ma hUM b+h+yoH oM ma hA kA lI de wI gr-ih+na ba liM ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ s+pho Ta ya sho Ta ya/ khA hi hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang / /skyes pa grir
shi'i snying khrag gis/ /nag po chen po'i gtor mar blugs/ /mi nyams grir shi'i baM blangs la/ /ma hA ru tra bstims nas ni/ /mgo bo lho nub mtshams su bstan/ /rkang pa byang
shar mtshams su bstan/ /gan rkyal bzhag la bsgral bar bya/ /de yi sha dang khrag dang ni/ /phags pa tshil bu rkang mar bcas/ /klad pa klad rgyas zhag dang ni/ /dbang po lnga dang don
snying lnga/ /rus pa'i bye brag thams cad kyis/ /ye shes nag po chen po dang / /dpal ldan nag mo re ma ti/ /las kyi mgon po 'khor dang bcas/ /pho nya bran g.yog dur khrod gnas/ /
DA ki'i tshogs kyi thugs dam bskang / /de yi sha yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /nag po stong gi thugs dam bskang / /de yi khrag dang cu ser gyi/ /ma mo bye ba'i thugs dam bskang / /de yi
chu rgyus rus pa rkang / /sha za 'bum gyi thugs dam bskang / /mkha' 'gro lnga dang lha mo brgyad/ /de yi 'phrin las mgon po dang / /sha za 'khor dang bcas la dbul/ /phung po bsgral
ba'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /rnam shes bsgral ba'i ye shes bsgyur/ /mi bskyod pa yi zhing khams su/ /rgyal ba'i sras bur skyes pa yin/ /rnal 'byor 'chi ba slu ba dang / /bar chad thams
@#/ /zlog par byed/ /ma rungs bstan la sdang zhing 'tshe/ /sgrub na gnod na las 'di bya/ /gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur/ /de yi sha la sbyin sreg bya/ /tshil ni zhu chen
mar me bya/ /klad rgyas thod pa'i lnga pags bya/ /pags pa tshogs kyi gdan du bya/ /bsregs pa'i rus pa tsha tsha bya/ /'di ni mgon po 'khor bcas tshogs/ /mnyes par gyur cig thugs
dam bskang / /gzhan yang phran tshegs las kyi gsang ba rab tu bshad par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i 'phrin las kyi rnal 'byor dang rab tu ldan pas zhi ba'i las sgrub pa la ni/ bil
ba la sogs pa la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya'o/ /'bras ldan gyi shing gang las rgyas pa'i las sgrub na stong phrag gis bya'o/ /khI Di ra'i shing dang / dmar ba'i shing gis ni dbang gi las
sgrub na khri phrag gis bya'o/ /shin tu rtsub pa'i tsher ma dang ldan pa'i shing dag gis ni mngon spyod la 'bum phrag gis bya bar shis so/ /bskrad pa la ni shing gi lo ma rlung dmar byung ba'i
tshes la ma lhung bar blangs te gzugs brnyan bris nas yul gzhan gyi hor khral btags te gtang bar bya'o/ /gal te bzlog par 'dod na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi thal bas gtor zhing
ba ser skya'i 'o mas lus bkrus na zhe bar byed do/ /rus phye sna tshogs pa la khrag byugs te gzugs brnyan bris la dgra bo de'i phyogs su gtor bas ni sha za chen pos 'dzin par byed
do| |yang na lce spyang gi sha la sbyin sreg byas te dur khrod du thal ba phyar nas lhag ma gzas pa po'i sgo la btor nas btang na dur khrod kyi lce spyang gi tshogs rab tu 'du zhing du la/ sgo la
sder mos 'brad par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu lan gsum byas na lce spyang gis za bar 'gyur ro/ /gang du thog gis shi ba'i rus pa la rab tu bsngags te ri bong gi thod par bcug ste shing
rkang gcig pa'i rtse mo la btags na thog 'bab pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de nyid kyi gzugs byas te de nyid dang rigs mthun pa'i rus pa rnyed na yungs kar gyis brdeg cing pha
mes kyi dur khrod du grib so lhags pa dang sbas te gtor mas mnan cing dong brus par sbas la ro bsregs pa'i g.yam pas mnan na rigs 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /grog mkhar gyi sa
la gzugs byas la/ de la dug dang til mar gyis byugs la 'bras phub kyi me la rab tu bsro zhing sngags brdeg na rims tsha ba chen pos btab par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan pa la ni spra tshil
gyis phyugs shing tsher ma'i rigs mang po btab par byas nas dus ma yin pa'i rlung la phyar na yul gzhan du gshis ngan du 'chi bar byed do/ /mtsho nang gi nya se ba bzung ste gro ga la ling
ga bris pa de bag zan gyi gzugs dang bcas ba la rab tu bsngags te slar gtang na chu grir myur du 'chi bar byed do/ /bse shing la ling ga bsregs te sgo khang du sbas na skrangs pa chen
@#/ /pos btab par 'gyur ro/ /gal te grog mkhar gyi sa la gzugs byas te/ mchod rten rnying pa'i 'og tu 'byung po'i nyi ma la mnan nas ro g.yam gyis kha
bcad na ni 'khor dang bcas pa nus pa med cing rab tu gnon par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyi zag pa gang yin pa dang phung shul nas sa blangs te gzugs brnyan byas la gnas kyi sar
rus pa'i phur bus btab na ni 'on pa dang / long ba dang / yan lag nyams pa dang / lkugs par 'gyur te/ klu gnas pa'i sar sbas na dbang po nyams pa nyid byed do/ /gal te
sa phyogs der char mi 'bab par gyur na ka ra bI ra'i shing btsugs la ba dmar ser gyi 'o ma gtor bar byas pas klu gnas pa'i sar song nas rang ting nge 'dzin du gnas pas bka'
bsgo na char chen po 'bab par byed do/ /bal po se'u'i shing dang / 'brug shing du bcas pa g.yab cing klu gzir na char 'bab cing sprin sad par byed do/ /gal te sprin bral bar 'dod
na rlung lha'i gtor ma byas la rlung gi ba dan g.yab par bya'o/ /khrag sna tshogs pa yungs kar yungs nag tu sbyar te klu gnas pa'i sar sbyin sreg tu byas na bzlas pa'i thun par du
gtor na ser ba mod la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar yungs nag thal chen la rab tu bsngags nas gtor na ser ba mod la gcod par byed do/ /d+ha du ra'i shing la sbyin sreg byas
na smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /nim pa'i shing gis ni rangs par byed do/ /me tog ban d+hu ri ka dang / pa la sha yis 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg byas na gang la yang gso bar byed
do| |a ru ra'i sbyin sreg gis myur du zhi bar byed do/ /ma he'i 'o mas bkrus na bcings pa thams cad grol lo/ /a ga ru'i shing 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i shing dang gcig tu bsregs te mtshor
dor na rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /glang po cha'i rus pa la gi hang dang bcas pa'i glang sna can gyi me tog dang ser ba'i rigs kyi me tog dang bcas pas kun dga'i ra bar sbyin sreg byas na 'byor
pa phun sum tshogs par byed do/ /de dag thams cad sdags dang bcas pa'i nus pas 'grub bo/ /drang srong gi rus pa ri bo'i rtser sbas te 'bru snas mchod pa byas te chu bo rgyun du 'bab pa mthong
ba'i sar spyod yul du gyur na rigs thams cad rab tu 'phel bar byed do/ /a ma'i 'bras bu dang shing thog dzi tsin ta ka dad dza lu dang dzi ba ka rnams la snod du bkang ste gtor ma byas nas
sku gzugs kyi mdun du phul na ni gnod sbyin gyis 'byor pa thams cad spel bar 'gyur ro/ /phur bus gdab cing nyungs kar thal chen gyis mtshams bcad par gyur na gnod pa thams cad
las srung bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ sna tshogs pa'i las kyi rab tu byed pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas
@#/ /gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /shin tu gsang ba bla na med/ /nag po mngon par 'byung ba yi/ /las kyi dngos grub cho ga bshad/ /dpal nag po chen po'i phyogs kyi 'phrin las
kyi lha mo la/ /shar gyi lha mo 'phrog mas 'gugs pa'i las byed pa'o/ /lho'i lha mo glang sna mas 'chi ba'i las byed do/ /nub kyi lha mo ral pa can gyis sdom pa'i las byed do/ /byang gi lha mo sa'i
gtsug gis myos cing dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo bya rgod mgo bo can mas rengs pa'i las byed do/ /stag gi mgo bo can mas bskrad pa'i las byed do/ /phag rgod kyi mgo bo can ma'i
smyor 'jug pa'i las byed do/ /lce spyang gi gdong gis dbye ba'i las byed do/ /khyi gdong mas ni rnam par rmongs pa'i las byed do/ /khwa'i gdong gis rnam par gnon pa'i las byed do//
'ug pa'i gdong gis ni khrag drang ba'i las byed do/ /khyung gi gdong gis ni rgyal ba'i las byed do/ /gzhan yang /grong khyer dkrugs pa'i las bya bar 'dod na gro ga 'am/ shing shun la
dbyangs dang / gsal byed spel zhing go bzlog tu bris la bsnol bar byas la rlung gi shugs kyis bsgrub bya gang gis gzugs dang ming spel gyis 'khrul 'khor go bzlog tu bris la bsnol bar
bya ste| rlung gi shugs kyi bsgrub bya dag gis gzugs dang / ming spel gyi gnas de myur du bskyod pa rlung dang / me dang / chu bsnol ma rnam par 'khrug par byed do/ /de nas yang kha sbyar dbye ba'i
las dag gis pha rol gyi sde dag gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi dbye bas phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis bskul nas lan bdun myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gal te klu'i dug
gis gzas pa po 'dzin du 'jug par 'dod na ti tha la'i 'bru la byas pa'i dug sbrul gyi gzugs mgo gsum pa lce brkyang ba'am/ ci rigs su byas pa de'i kha'i nang du gang la dmigs pa'i rdzas
de ming dang bcas pas klu gnas pa'i sa phyogs su btang na sbrul gyis 'dzin pa'i las byed do/ /ma he dang / rta'i 'khrul 'khor 'byung po'i nyi mal sa ti tsa'i khu bas bris te/ de nyid kyi sha khrag
dang bcas pas bskul bar gyur na ni shin tu 'khrug cing 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na bi ta na rau pa la trai zhes bya ba'i cho ga'i thabs kyis bgegs chen po bsgral ba'i gzugs la brten nas cho
ga phyag mtshan dag btsugs te las su bya'o/ /yang na sa nag po gru gsum pa la nag po'i tshogs kha phyir bltas pa dang / nang du bltas pa dag bkod de/ phyi rol rgol ba'i phyogs su bskyal na
ni myur du yul dang bcas pa rlag par byed do/ /sha za chen po'i gzugs shin tu 'jigs pa kha gdangs pa nag po gri gug dang / zhags pa thogs pa mdun du dmigs la phur bus btab pa dang
bcas pa'i thabs kyis pha rol gyi dpung g.yo ba dang bcas pa zlog par byed do/ /gtor ma chen po byas te yang gtor na g.yul bshams pa las rnam par rgyal bar byed do/ /ri rab kyi gzugs
@#/ /la sna tshogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bkod de 'phrin las sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i phyag rgyas btab na g.yul chen po las rgyal bar byed do/ /dpag bsam gyi
shing ljon pa'i tshul du bya ba las a sho ka'am/ bi Da ka'i shing la brten nas thabs dang ldan pa'i yul phyogs de yongs su rgyas pa'i gnas thob par byed do/ /rdo rje bya khyung gi phyag rgya
bcas la des klu non par byas na de nyid kha dog dkar por gyur pa'i 'jam pa'i spyod kyis 'dul ba la nag por bsgyur ba'i rtsub pa'i thabs kyis dkrugs pa'i klu'i gnas thams cad
du ltas chen po drug byung bas thams cad 'dar zhing mgo bo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas pa snyam byed nas myur bar 'ongs te bka' nyan cing 'dzam bu'i gling du char gyi rgyun chen
pos rab tu gang bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang du skyes pa g.yul ngor bsad pa'i mgal dum dang / lag ngar I rus pa la dpal nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan ji lta bar byas la bskyed
pa dang bstims te bzlas pa bya/ /dben par sbas nas gsol ba btab na gang 'dod pa 'byung par 'gyur ro/ /sa kun la'ang srung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'das pa la sogs pa'i don shes pa
dang / de'i mdun du khrus byas te/ nyal na lung ston pa'am/ dge mi dge gsal po ston par 'gyur ro/ /yang na dur khrod kyi ras sam/ dar nag po la yang rung ste/ dam tshig dang ldan
pas bris te/ mchod pa dang / gtor mar ldan pas rab tu gnas par byas na sku byin rlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyang rin po che las byas nas de'i mdun du gsol ba btab na zla ba
drug gi nges par yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yang na nag po chen po'i gsang sngags sngon du byas te shes rab yongs su 'dzin pa khri phrag gcig bzlas na thos pa'i gzungs yongs su 'dzin
pa dang / blo yongs su dag pa dang / mi brjed pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/ /srung bas bsrung zhing bcings pa thams cad las yongs su grol lo/ /gang du sgrub pa po phun sum tshogs pas
sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyi rten la rab tu gnas pa mtshan nyid dang ldan par byas na dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa dang / bar chad thams cad las bzlog par 'gyur ba yin
no| |khyad par du'ang gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig la nges par gnas pa nyid kyis phyogs dang / dus thams cad du ye shes kyi nag po chen pos rjes su skyong ba dang / rgyang ring po nas kyang nges
par gzigs par mdzad do/ /'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu sgrol bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs dang / tshe dang / dpal rab tu ster cing / mi zad pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa dang / nyam da
ba dang / bag tsha ba med par seng ge'i stobs kyis rgyu zhing bdud kyi rigs kyi phyogs ma lus pa pham zhing / skrag ste mgo 'gyes pa tsam byed par 'gyur zhing rgya mtsho chen po'i mthar thug
@#/ /par 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis gtum pa dang / dpa' ba dang / drag po'i brtul zhugs kyis kun tu spyod la rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin mi shigs par 'gyur
ba med pa'i tshul gyis khyab par rgyu ba'o/ /gnas kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang / pho nya'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro ma dang / dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro ma dang / sha za'i
mkha' 'gro ma'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhis kyang 'phrin las thogs pa med par 'grub par byed do/ /zhing skyong chen po dang / nye ba'i
zhing skyong nyi shu rtsa bzhi po dag gis kyang / 'phrin las thogs pa med pa sgrub par byed pa'o/ /gdul dka' ba ma lus pa 'dul zhing 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bar byed
do| |gang du rgyud 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / sems pa dang / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa dang / rnal 'byor du gang gnas pa la nye bar skyob par byed do/ /nye

bar dgongs pas mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ sa gsum du sgrub pa'i dbang phyug tu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i gnas/ /drang srong thub pas yang dag bstan/ /nges par gsang ba 'dzin gyur pa/ /rgyal ba yon tan 'byung ba'i
gter/ /ye shes mgon po chen po dang / /las kyi mgon po du mar bcas/ /dpal ldan lha mo nag mo ni/ /'khor bcas dkyil 'khor bstan pa ste/ /skal ldan lam 'di 'dzin pa gang / /nga yis
lung bstan gyur pa yin/ /gdug pa rnams ni gsung ba'i phyir/ /mkhas pas snying rje bskyed nas ni/ /cho ga kun mchog gis rab sgrub/ /bdag nyid ji bzhin sems can de/ /de bzhin bdag de
dam pa'i bdag /dpal he ru ka'i go 'phang gnas/ /'di la the tshom mi bya ste/ /sun 'byin pas ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rnam dag rnam pa can sems kyi/ /rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das/ /ma
rungs pa ni gang dag gis/ /skye bo bcings par gyur pa gang / /de nyid thabs dang bcas pa yis/ /srid pa'i bcings las grol bar 'gyur/ /de ltar grub pa'i lam brten cing / /thun mong khyad
par 'grub par 'gyur/ /dus bzhi dag tu gtor ma 'bul/ /bgegs med bsod nams 'phel byed pa'o/ /'dir 'jig rten dang / /'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal ye shes kyi mgon po
lcam dral 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ sha chen po dang bcas pa'i gtor ma bshams la/ oM ba liM ma Ni raM hUM dza/ rak+Sha Ni rak+Sha Ni rak+Sha mi/ kha kha khA hi khA

hi gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ba liM/ mahA bi ShA NaM/ pra sA d+ha ya pra sA d+ha ya/ hu lu hu lu phaT/ kha kha khA hi khA hi mA ra mA ra/ sar+b+ba ta sa na sa traM/ wa ri ha d+hi ra pra yats+tshan+tu swAhA/ oM AH hUM zhes pas mtshan
@#/ /phyed na gtor ma sreg spos dang bcas pa dbul bar bya'o/ /oM hAH ka ha ka ha mA li ni mu khe yaM sA d+ha ya/ ma hA kA la bud+d+ha dza/ pra ti to si/ kA ra ya kA ra ya/ pra duSh+TA na/ gr-ih+NaM

gr-ih+Na/ mA ra mA ra/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ shI g+h+raM/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hu ra hu ra/ maM raM hUM phaT/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ shrI sarba oM AH hUM/ dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i
rgyud las/ gsang ba grub pa dang / gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //dpal mgon po chen po khros pa'i mgon po gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud kun gyi
rtsa bar gyur pa bstan pa 'dzin pa/ bstan pa skyong ba/ bstan pa srung nges pa/ gsang ba bdud dpung 'dul bar byed pa'o/ /dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud kun
gyi snying por gyur pa gdod nas grub pa'i bla ma yin no rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA paN+Di ta a b+ha yA ka ra gup+ta'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba
mkhas pa chen po khe'u rkang 'khor lo grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/ /yang slad nas mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas grags pa'i spyan sngar kre bo shes rab dpal gyis kyang zhu
tig bgyis pa'o// //sarba mang+ga laM//
